Movie Plot: On regaining his vision after a cornea transplant, a nine-year-old boy embarks on a journey to explore India along with his father.

Title: The Power of the Dog
Movie Plot: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

Title: West Side Story
Movie Plot: An adaptation of the 1957 musical, West Side Story explores forbidden love and the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two teenage street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.

Title: King Richard
Movie Plot: A look at how tennis superstars Venus and Serena Williams became who they are after the coaching from their father Richard.

Title: Rent
Movie Plot: In New York City's gritty East Village, a group of bohemians strive for success and acceptance while enduring the obstacles of poverty, illness and the AIDS epidemic.

Title: Mainstream
Movie Plot: In this cautionary tale, three people struggle to preserve their identities as they form an eccentric love triangle within the fast-moving internet age.

Title: Dear Evan Hansen
Movie Plot: Film adaptation of the Tony and Grammy Award-winning musical about Evan Hansen, a high-school senior with social anxiety disorder, and his journey of self-discovery and acceptance after a classmate's suicide.

Title: All the World Is Sleeping
Movie Plot: Fighting for her own life and the ones she loves, a Mother in New Mexico sinks deeper in her addiction while struggling to surface for her daughter.

Title: Justin Bieber's Believe
Movie Plot: A backstage and on-stage look at Justin Bieber during his rise to super stardom.

Title: Justin Bieber: Never Say Never
Movie Plot: This documentary follows Justin Bieber with some footage of performances from his 2010 concert tour.

Movie Plot: Although he's now eighty years old, Claude Lherminier is still as imposing as he ever was. His moments of forgetfulness and confusion are becoming increasingly more frequent, but he stubbornly refuses to admit that anything is wrong.

Title: How to Marry a Millionaire
Movie Plot: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

Title: Niagara
Movie Plot: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

Movie Plot: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who is struggling to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle.

Movie Plot: Molly and Terry Donahue, plus their three children, are The Five Donahues. Son Tim meets hat-check girl Vicky and the family act begins to fall apart.

Movie Plot: A sheriff's milquetoast son has a chance to prove himself when a medicine show run by con artists comes into town.

Movie Plot: IMF agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancée in response.

Title: The Scarecrow

Title: Mission: Impossible
Movie Plot: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

Movie Plot: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

Movie Plot: Ethan and his team take on their most impossible mission yet when they have to eradicate an international rogue organization as highly skilled as they are and committed to destroying the IMF.

Movie Plot: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

Movie Plot: A gunslinger returns to his hometown to warn of an impending outlaw gang attack, but he's met with hatred and fear for his previous killings.

Movie Plot: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by the Cause and its charismatic leader.

Movie Plot: Socially frustrated Barry Egan calls a phone-sex line to curb his loneliness. Little does he know it will land him in deep trouble and will jeopardize his burgeoning romance with the mysterious Lena.

Title: Magnolia
Movie Plot: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

Movie Plot: Back when sex was safe, pleasure was a business and business was booming, an idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.

Movie Plot: A short film crafted out of extra footage from Paul Thomas Anderson's "Phantom Thread."

Movie Plot: Professional gambler Sydney teaches John the tricks of the trade. John does well until he falls for cocktail waitress Clementine.

Movie Plot: A cover-up spanning four U.S. Presidents pushes the country's first female newspaper publisher and her editor to join an unprecedented battle between press and government.

After being shut down, no one knew anything was going on there, until the 4 friends stumble upon Ingen's most recent creation: Operation Rebirth.—Jackson Snorek

Movie Plot: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.

Movie Plot: A transport ship crashes and leaves its crew stranded on a desert planet inhabited by bloodthirsty creatures that come out during an eclipse.

Movie Plot: A programmer at a Toronto TV station that specializes in adult entertainment searches for the producers of a dangerous and bizarre broadcast.

Title: Silent Hill
Movie Plot: A woman, Rose, goes in search for her adopted daughter within the confines of a strange, desolate town called Silent Hill.

Title: Poltergeist
Movie Plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.

Movie Plot: Teenager Nancy Thompson must uncover the dark truth concealed by her parents after she and her friends become targets of the spirit of a serial killer with a bladed glove in their dreams, in which if they die, it kills them in real life.

Movie Plot: The almost-human son of "Brundlefly" searches for a cure to his mutated genes while being monitored by a nefarious corporation that wishes to continue his father's experiments.

Movie Plot: Ash Williams, the lone survivor of an earlier onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits, holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

Title: The Fly
Movie Plot: A scientist has a horrific accident when he tries to use his newly invented teleportation device.

Movie Plot: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

Movie Plot: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to try to prove his innocence.

Movie Plot: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.

Movie Plot: When George, a silent movie superstar, meets Peppy Miller, a dancer, sparks fly between the two. However, after the introduction of talking pictures, their fortunes change, affecting their dynamic.

However, the life of this American Indian princess was anything but a fairytale. Join us as we look beyond the fiction and reveal the real story of Pocahontas, a tale of kidnapping, conflict, starvation, cannibalism, ocean journeys, and the future of an entire civilization.

Movie Plot: A comprehensive survey of the American Civil War.

Movie Plot: While Dr. Loomis hunts for Michael Myers, a traumatized Laurie is rushed to Haddonfield Memorial Hospital, and The Shape is not far behind her.

Movie Plot: A group of camp counselors trying to reopen a summer camp called Crystal Lake, which has a grim past, are stalked by a mysterious killer.

Title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
Movie Plot: Five friends head out to rural Texas to visit the grave of a grandfather. On the way they stumble across what appears to be a deserted house, only to discover something sinister within. Something armed with a chainsaw.

Title: Halloween
Movie Plot: Laurie Strode confronts her long-time foe, Michael Myers, the masked figure who has haunted her since she narrowly escaped his killing spree on Halloween night four decades ago.

Movie Plot: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a masked killer who targets her and her friends by using scary movies as part of a deadly game.

Movie Plot: Surviving victims of Michael Myers form a vigilante mob and vow to end his reign of terror.

Movie Plot: After being committed for 15 years, Michael Myers, now a grown man and still very dangerous, escapes from the mental institution and immediately returns to Haddonfield to find his baby sister, Laurie.

Movie Plot: World War II-era drama centered on the lives of ordinary people affected by the war.

Title: Pagan Peak
Movie Plot: Ellie Stocker and Gedeon Winter have become bitter enemies. A ritual murder leads to the formation of a German-Austrian Soko and forces the two opponents to investigate together.

Movie Plot: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

Sites to escape include an airplane graveyard, a spooky bayou swamp, an old abandoned insane asylum and The infamous Rock - Alcatraz! Can you plan your Great Escape?—kaylawilmes

Movie Plot: Inside an abandoned gold mine lurks a mysterious supernatural being conjured by a Native-American shaman ages ago to defend their tribe. This legendary phantom can appear in the flesh and pose as anyone. Luke's old west ancestors trapped it in the mine, but it has haunted their descendants ever since, causing them to go insane. Now Luke's niece, Poni, has come down with "the family curse." He believes that with the proper psychiatric treatment she can live a normal life but he needs to urgently make money for the costly medication. With the help of a couple friends, Luke ventures out to the deserted western mine to try his luck. As he discovers the ghost stories are true, he realizes that he must confront the evil spirit before it takes over his mind.—Paul Collett

Title: Dying to Sleep
Movie Plot: Terrifying nightmares, a broken family, and a mysterious Holistic Doctor, haunt Mary as she searches for the strength to find forgiveness amongst dark betrayals.

Title: The Thing That Scared Us
Movie Plot: Four individuals recall encounters with a strange, paranormal, otherworldly entity. After their interview, they are asked to draw what they saw. The images may shock you.

Title: The Great Escapists
Movie Plot: Shipwrecked on a remote desert island, Hammond and Belleci use their engineering and scientific skills to not only to survive, but to construct a paradise island playground.

Title: Patton
Movie Plot: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.

Title: Above Us the Waves
Movie Plot: The attack by British submarines on the German battleship "Tirpitz" in a Norwegian fjord during World War II.

Title: Mortal Sins
Movie Plot: A serial killer confesses to a priest, who becomes a suspect and a sleuth because he cannot tell the police.

Title: Nightmare in the Daylight
Movie Plot: A married Wisconsin teacher fears a Los Angeles lawyer who has mistaken her for his long-lost wife.

Title: The Rose and the Jackal
Movie Plot: Union detective Allan Pinkerton falls in love with an aristocrat caught spying for the Confederacy.

Title: Morning Glory
Movie Plot: An ex-convict on parole is accused of murdering a loose woman in the town where he works.

Title: The Village
Movie Plot: A series of events tests the beliefs of a small isolated countryside village.

Title: Bump in the Night
Movie Plot: An ex-New York reporter fights alcoholism as she and her ex- husband search for their kidnapped son.

Title: Unbreakable
Movie Plot: A man learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

Title: Lady in the Water
Movie Plot: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

Title: The Happening
Movie Plot: A science teacher, his wife, and a young girl struggle to survive a plague that causes those infected to commit suicide.

Title: Glass
Movie Plot: Security guard David Dunn uses his supernatural abilities to track Kevin Wendell Crumb, a disturbed man who has twenty-four personalities.

Title: Devil
Movie Plot: A group of people are trapped in an elevator and the Devil is mysteriously amongst them.

Title: Split
Movie Plot: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

Title: The Visit
Movie Plot: Two siblings become increasingly frightened by their grandparents' disturbing behavior while visiting them on vacation.

Title: War of the Worlds
Movie Plot: An alien invasion threatens the future of humanity. The catastrophic nightmare is depicted through the eyes of one American family fighting for survival.

Title: Old
Movie Plot: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day.

Title: The Secret Life of Brian
Movie Plot: A documentary about the making of the controversial Life of Brian (1979) and the surrounding accusations of blasphemy.

Title: Monty Python's and Now for Something Completely Different
Movie Plot: An anthology of the best sketches from the first and second seasons of Monty Python's Flying Circus (1969).

Title: Monty Python's Fliegender Zirkus
Movie Plot: A two-part Monty Python German television comedy special.

Title: Python Night: 30 Years of Monty Python
Movie Plot: Series of new sketches performed by the Monty Python team, linking programmes to celebrate their 30th Anniversary.

Title: Airplane!
Movie Plot: After the crew becomes sick with food poisoning, a neurotic ex-fighter pilot must safely land a commercial airplane full of passengers.

Title: Monty Python Live (Mostly)
Movie Plot: The reunion of the Monty Python team on stage for the first time in over 30 years, and for the very last time ever.

Title: Monty Python: The Meaning of Live
Movie Plot: Uniquely intimate documentary following the stars of Monty Python as they reunite for a final time to stage a marathon ten shows of Monty Python Live (mostly) - One Down Five to Go at The O2, London in July 2014.

Title: Blackadder II
Movie Plot: In the Tudor court of Elizabeth I, Lord Edmund Blackadder strives to win Her Majesty's favour while attempting to avoid a grisly fate should he offend her.

Title: Blackadder the Third
Movie Plot: In the Regency era, Mr E. Blackadder serves as butler to the foppish numskull Prince George amidst the fads and crazes of the time.

Title: The Twilight Zone
Movie Plot: Ordinary people find themselves in extraordinarily astounding situations, which they each try to solve in a remarkable manner.

Title: Monty Python's Flying Circus: Live at Aspen
Movie Plot: This reunion show features the five surviving members of Monty Python, with Graham Chapman's ashes in attendance. The Pythons look back at their work and receive an American Film Industry award. It also features some memorable moments, including when Gilliam "accidently" kicked over the urn. Hosted by Robert Klein and featuring a cameo by Eddie Izzard.

Title: Time Bandits
Movie Plot: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

Title: The Adventures of Baron Munchausen
Movie Plot: An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences across late 18th-century Europe with his band of misfits.

Title: A Fish Called Wanda
Movie Plot: In London, four very different people team up on a jewel heist, then try to double-cross one another for the loot, complicated by their efforts to fool a very proper barrister.

Title: Earwig and the Witch
Movie Plot: An orphan girl, Earwig, is adopted by a witch and comes home to a spooky house filled with mystery and magic.

Title: Monty Python: Almost the Truth - The Lawyer's Cut
Movie Plot: A documentary on the history on British comedy group Monty Python. Features interviews with the five surviving members plus other comedians and artists whose careers they have influenced.

Title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
Movie Plot: Laura Palmer's harrowing final days are chronicled one year after the murder of Teresa Banks, a resident of Twin Peaks' neighboring town.

Title: The Meaning of Monty Python
Movie Plot: Five Pythons reflect on their creative process, politics, television and the making of their award-winning final film, "The Meaning of Life."

Title: My Neighbors the Yamadas
Movie Plot: The life and misadventures of a family in contemporary Japan.

Title: Mulholland Dr.
Movie Plot: After a car wreck, an amnesiac woman sets out to learn what happened to her with the help of a wannabe actress.

Title: Inland Empire
Movie Plot: As an actress begins to adopt the persona of her character in a film, her world becomes nightmarish and surreal.

Title: Twin Peaks
Movie Plot: An idiosyncratic FBI agent investigates the murder of a young woman in the even more idiosyncratic town of Twin Peaks.

Title: Weather Report
Movie Plot: David Lynch gives daily weather reports in Los Angeles.

Title: Twin Peaks
Movie Plot: Picks up 25 years after the inhabitants of a quaint northwestern town are stunned when their homecoming queen is murdered.

Title: Twin Peaks
Movie Plot: An FBI agent investigates the murder of a small town's homecoming queen. A self-contained, 20 minutes longer version of the pilot episode of Twin Peaks (1990) and an alternate version of Twin Peaks (1990) that brings closure to the story.

Title: Donnie Darko
Movie Plot: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

Title: Twin Peaks: The Missing Pieces
Movie Plot: Twin Peaks before Twin Peaks (1990) and at the same time not always and entirely in the same place as Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me (1992). A feature film which presents deleted scenes from Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me (1992) assembled together for the first time in an untold portion of the story's prequel.

Title: Brave
Movie Plot: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

Title: Tangled
Movie Plot: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

Title: Despicable Me
Movie Plot: Gru, a criminal mastermind, adopts three orphans as pawns to carry out the biggest heist in history. His life takes an unexpected turn when the little girls see the evildoer as their potential father.

Title: American Psycho
Movie Plot: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

Title: The Social Network
Movie Plot: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

Title: Baby Driver
Movie Plot: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

Title: Southpaw
Movie Plot: After a fatal incident sends him on a rampant path of destruction, a champion boxer fights to get custody of his daughter and revive his professional career.

Title: Night Crawlers
Movie Plot: Blood is thicker than water in this tiny Texas town. After two centuries of Vampire blood lust one man becomes a hero...without a clue.

Title: The Hire
Movie Plot: Recompilation of the all short films of from the series of short films produced by BMW The Hire, starring Clive Owen as the Driver.

Title: The Legend of Lizzie Borden
Movie Plot: In 1893 Massachusetts, Lizzie Andrew Borden is put on trial for murdering her father and stepmother with an axe.

Title: Elvis and Me
Movie Plot: The story of Priscilla Presley's life with rock and roll star Elvis Presley.

Title: North & South: Book 1, North & South
Movie Plot: Two friends, one northern and one southern, struggle to maintain their friendship as events build towards the American Civil War.

Title: Birthright Outlaw
Movie Plot: A daughter kidnapped. A hidden past revealed. A seemingly futile chance at rescue. Now, Rev. Jeremiah Jacobs and his wife Martha must overcome the lies of the past to find their Hope for the future.

Title: The Jazz Singer
Movie Plot: The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of being a popular singer.

Title: Mrs. Brown
Movie Plot: When Queen Victoria's husband Prince Albert dies, she finds solace in her trusted servant, Mr. John Brown, but their relationship also brings scandal and turmoil.

Title: North & South: Book 2, Love & War
Movie Plot: The story of two friends and their families on opposite sides of the American Civil War.

Title: Who Will Love My Children?
Movie Plot: Based on a true story of Iowa farm wife Lucile Fray. Ann-Margret plays a dying mother of ten whose last wish is to find loving families for her children.

Title: Gracepoint
Movie Plot: When a young boy is found dead on an idyllic beach, a major police investigation gets underway in the small California seaside town where the tragedy occurred. Soon deemed a homicide, the case sparks a media frenzy, which throws the boy's family into further turmoil and upends the lives of all of the town's residents.

Title: Charlie's Angels
Movie Plot: A wealthy mystery man named Charlie runs a detective agency via a speakerphone and his personal assistant, John Bosley. His detectives are three beautiful women, who end up in a variety of difficult situations.

Title: Legacy
Movie Plot: Widower Ned Logan struggles to raise his family alone while upholding the legacy of running a prestigious Kentucky horse farm.

Title: Just Getting Started
Movie Plot: An ex-F.B.I. Agent (Tommy Lee Jones) and an ex-mob lawyer in the Witness Protection Program (Morgan Freeman) have to put aside their petty rivalry on the golf course to fend off a mob hit.

Title: Goin' South
Movie Plot: Due to the lack of men after the Civil War, a small western town allows a bachelorette with ulterior motives to save a horse thief from the gallows by marrying him. They must deal with his old gang, the Sheriff, the bank, and each other.

Title: Murder on the Cape
Movie Plot: Based on the Christa Worthington case. An out of work fisherman has an affair with a fashion writer wintering on the Cape. She returns two years later with his child, and when she is murdered, the fisherman is the prime suspect.

Title: Prizzi's Honor
Movie Plot: Two professional assassins fall in love.

Title: Renegade
Movie Plot: After crooked cop Lieutenant "Dutch" Dixon kills his girlfriend and frames him for murder, Reno Raines escapes from jail and goes on the run.

Title: The Crossing Guard
Movie Plot: Freddy Gale is a seedy jeweller who has sworn to kill the drunk driver who killed his little girl.

Title: Ironweed
Movie Plot: An alcoholic drifter spends Halloween in his hometown of Albany, New York after returning there for the first time in decades.

Title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
Movie Plot: The sensuous wife of a roadside diner proprietor and a rootless drifter begin a sordid, steamy affair and conspire to murder her Greek husband.

Title: Wolf
Movie Plot: Publisher Will Randall becomes a demon wolf and has to fight to keep his job.

Title: Virtuosity
Movie Plot: When a virtual reality simulation created using the personalities of multiple serial killers manages to escape into the real world, an ex-cop is tasked with stopping its reign of terror.

Title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
Movie Plot: An ordinary British couple vacationing in Switzerland suddenly find themselves embroiled in a case of international intrigue when their daughter is kidnapped by spies plotting a political assassination.

Title: Torn Curtain
Movie Plot: An American scientist publicly defects to East Germany as part of a cloak and dagger mission to find the solution for a formula resin before planning an escape back to the West.

Title: V for Vengeance
Movie Plot: After learning that their younger sibling escaped an earlier kidnapping attempt that also killed their parents, two estranged sisters must join forces to rescue her from a group of bloodthirsty vampires.

Title: Expired
Movie Plot: In an uncharted future, two hardened souls meet and confront each other with the things they have done and what they have become.

Title: The Rooster
Movie Plot: When the body of his oldest friend is found buried in a shallow grave, Dan, a small-town cop, seeks answers from a volatile Hermit who may have been the last person to see his friend alive.

Title: The Raven
Movie Plot: When a madman begins committing horrific murders inspired by Edgar Allan Poe's works, a young Baltimore detective joins forces with Poe to stop him from making his stories a reality.

Title: Across the Furious Sea
Movie Plot: A young girl was killed, and the shocking truth is hidden behind the families of the suspects and victims.

Title: The Unhealer
Movie Plot: Spiritual healing gone wrong turns a relentlessly bullied teenager into a super-powered killing machine just as his tormentors do the unthinkable.

Title: Baby Boy
Movie Plot: In South Central L.A., a misguided 20-year-old African-American man, a "baby boy", faces the commitments of real life.

Title: Everlasting
Movie Plot: A High School Filmmaker travels to Los Angeles to confront the man who murdered his girlfriend.

Title: For Which He Stands
Movie Plot: A Las Vegas casino owner, after an unwanted clash with a Colombian crime family member, becomes deeply engaged with several unsavory groups in his attempt to achieve safety for him and his family. Based upon actual incidents.

Title: The Death Collector
Movie Plot: Neighborhood kid goes to work for the Mafia as a debt collector.

Title: The Assistants
Movie Plot: A group of Hollywood assistants who strive for something bigger, conspire to make a movie behind their bosses' backs using their resources.

Title: Carlito's Way
Movie Plot: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

Title: The Russian
Movie Plot: It's the middle of the night in a diner at the edge of town and a man has settled in to read a book and enjoy a club sandwich. Unfortunately, he is in the wrong place at the wrong time.

Title: Leader of the Pack
Movie Plot: A dark comedy that takes place in suburban America. Doug has landed his dream gig - he is about to join the Venture Scouts (a Boy-Scout-like organization) as a Troop Leader. He is taking over for his childhood mentor, Jerry, the former leader of Venture Scout Troop 544 who has been offered a plush job at the Venture Scout National Headquarters. The film takes place over the course of a day, as Jerry shows Doug the ropes before his initiation ceremony. An old, corrupt regime is leaving with a new one taking over - but not without conflict first. It is a story of power, corruption, and morality.—Doug Elliot

Title: Cape Fear
Movie Plot: A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.

Title: Sleepers
Movie Plot: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized. Thirteen years later, an unexpected random encounter with a former guard gives them a chance for revenge.

Title: A Bronx Tale
Movie Plot: Robert De Niro and Chazz Palminteri give captivating performances in this intense drama about a boy torn between his tough, hard-working father and a violent yet charismatic crime boss.

Title: Son of the Bride
Movie Plot: A dissatisfied 40-year-old, separated and without time for his own daughter and girlfriend must rethink his life when his father decides to marry his mother, who suffers from Alzheimer's disease, by church.

Title: Chinese Take-Away
Movie Plot: A well-ordered hardware store owner in Buenos Aires will see his life turn upside down when he helps a stranded Chinese man who doesn't speak a word of Spanish find his uncle in the bustling city. But can this coexistence bear fruit?

Title: Heroic Losers
Movie Plot: In times of the infamous Argentinian Corralito, the neighbors of a little town trace a plan to recover the money they lost after learning that their bank manager and a corrupt lawyer have stolen it.

Title: Los simuladores
Movie Plot: A team of 4 talented men solve their clients' problems by staging "drills" to deceive people.

Title: The Heist of the Century
Movie Plot: In 2006, a group of thieves performed what is considered one of the most famous and smart bank heists in the history of Argentina when they rob the Banco Río branch in Acassuso.

Title: Waiting for the Hearse
Movie Plot: Each member of this family tries to endorse someone else to care for the old Mother.

Title: The Aura
Movie Plot: A deluded taxidermist plans the perfect crime.

Title: Argentina, 1985
Movie Plot: A team of lawyers takes on the heads of Argentina's bloody military dictatorship during the 1980s in a battle against odds and a race against time.

Title: Carancho
Movie Plot: An ambulance chaser/carancho falls for an ER/ambulance doctor, he meets one night "at work" in Buenos Aires.

Title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
Movie Plot: The two top Agents of the United Network Command for Law and Enforcement (U.N.C.L.E.) fight the enemies of peace, particularly the forces of T.H.R.U.S.H.

Title: The Clan
Movie Plot: The true story of the Puccio Clan, a family who kidnapped and killed people in the 80s.

Title: After Hours
Movie Plot: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho he met that evening at a coffee shop.

Title: New York, New York
Movie Plot: An egotistical saxophonist and a young lounge singer meet on VJ Day and embark upon a strained and rocky romance, even as their careers begin a long, uphill climb.

Title: Belly
Movie Plot: Two young friends involved in organized crime and drug dealing find that their priorities differ.

Title: Who's That Knocking at My Door
Movie Plot: A young man can't accept the girl he likes because of her bitter past.

Title: Boxcar Bertha
Movie Plot: During the Great Depression, a union leader and a young woman become criminals to exact revenge on the management of a railroad.

Title: The Last Temptation of Christ
Movie Plot: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

Title: Riley's First Date?
Movie Plot: Riley, now 12, who is hanging out with her parents at home when potential trouble comes knocking. Mom's and Dad's Emotions find themselves forced to deal with Riley going on her first date.

Title: Kung Fu Panda 4
Movie Plot: After Po is tapped to become the Spiritual Leader of the Valley of Peace, he needs to find and train a new Dragon Warrior, while a wicked sorceress plans to re-summon all the master villains whom Po has vanquished to the spirit realm.

Title: Bringing Out the Dead
Movie Plot: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, a monumentally burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three increasingly turbulent nights.

Title: The Color of Money
Movie Plot: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

Title: The Last Waltz
Movie Plot: A film account and presentation of the final concert of The Band.

Title: The Body
Movie Plot: A detective searches for the body of a femme fatale which has gone missing from a morgue.

Title: Mirage
Movie Plot: Two storms separated by 25 years. A woman murdered. A daughter missed. Only 72 hours to discover the truth.

Title: God's Crooked Lines
Movie Plot: Follows a woman checking into a psychiatric ward to investigate a homicide.

Title: The Innocent
Movie Plot: An accidental killing leads a man down a dark hole of intrigue and murder. Just as he finds love and freedom, one phone call brings back the nightmare.

Title: The Hidden Face
Movie Plot: Shattered by the unexpected news of their irreversible break-up, an aspiring orchestra conductor is puzzled by his girlfriend's mysterious and seemingly inexplicable case of disappearance. But can he look beyond the facts?

Title: Forgotten
Movie Plot: When his abducted brother returns seemingly a different man with no memory of the past 19 days, Jin-seok chases after the truth behind the kidnapping.

Title: The Platform
Movie Plot: A vertical prison with one cell per level. Two people per cell. Only one food platform and two minutes per day to feed. An endless nightmare trapped in The Hole.

Title: Julia's Eyes
Movie Plot: The story of a woman who is slowly losing her sight whilst trying to investigate the mysterious death of her twin sister.

Title: Exam
Movie Plot: Eight candidates for a highly desirable corporate job are locked together in an exam room and given a final test with just one seemingly simple question. However, it doesn't take long for confusion to ensue and tensions to unravel.

Title: The Invisible Witness
Movie Plot: Adriano Doria is "the entrepreneur of the year" in Milan. He drives a BMW, wears a flamboyant Rolex, has an adorable wife and daughter and a beautiful mistress. But now he is under house arrest, accused of murder.

Title: Before I Go to Sleep
Movie Plot: A woman wakes up every day, remembering nothing as a result of a traumatic accident in her past. One day, new terrifying truths emerge that force her to question everyone around her.

Title: The Interpreter
Movie Plot: Political intrigue and deception unfold inside the United Nations, where a U.S. Secret Service agent is assigned to investigate an interpreter who overhears an assassination plot.

Title: Money Monster
Movie Plot: Financial TV host Lee Gates and his producer Patty are put in an extreme situation when an irate investor takes them and their crew as hostage.

Title: Dark Places
Movie Plot: Libby Day was only eight years old when her family was brutally murdered in their rural Kansas farmhouse. Almost thirty years later, she reluctantly agrees to revisit the crime and uncovers the wrenching truths that led up to that tragic night.

Title: Strangerland
Movie Plot: A family's dull life in a rural outback town is rocked after their two teenage children disappear into the desert, sparking disturbing rumors of their past.

Title: Taking Lives
Movie Plot: An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim.

Title: Ben Is Back
Movie Plot: A drug addicted teenage boy shows up unexpectedly at his family's home on Christmas Eve.

Title: Rabbit Hole
Movie Plot: Life for a happy couple is turned upside down after their young son dies in an accident.

Title: Solace
Movie Plot: Psychic John Clancy (Sir Anthony Hopkins) works with the F.B.I. in order to hunt down a serial killer.

Title: Fargo
Movie Plot: Bill's brother dies due to a stampede started by cattlemen. Barb wire is installed to keep herds away from lands cultivated by farmers. The cattlemen state that the wire is dangerous to their herds but lose the case in court. War begins.

Title: Minnesota Nice
Movie Plot: A special behind the scenes documentary about one of the greatest films of all time, with actors and the directors revealing stories and curiosities about the film and also about the location's hospitality. And there's also the truth behind the "real story" that inspired the Coen brothers in creating Fargo.—Rodrigo Amaro

Title: Dead Man Walking
Movie Plot: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

Title: Shock and Awe
Movie Plot: A group of journalists of the Knight-Ridder news service covering President George W. Bush's planned invasion of Iraq in 2003 are skeptical of the President's claim that Saddam Hussein has "weapons of mass destruction."

Title: Grace of Monaco
Movie Plot: The story of former Hollywood star Grace Kelly's crisis of marriage and identity, during a political dispute between Monaco's Prince Rainier III and France's Charles De Gaulle, and a looming French invasion of Monaco in the early 1960s.

Title: Tales of Wells Fargo
Movie Plot: Agent Jim Hardie splits his life between being an agent helping Wells Fargo cope with bad guys, and owning a ranch near San Francisco, California.

Title: Aquarius
Movie Plot: A gritty 1960s cop drama about LAPD detective Sam Hodiak and his trainee, who must deal with gangs, brutal crimes, changing times, family crises and unhinged manipulative small-time crook Charles Manson, who's slowly building his cult.

Title: Shallow Grave
Movie Plot: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

Title: The Beach
Movie Plot: On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise.

Title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
Movie Plot: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

Title: Filth
Movie Plot: A corrupt, junkie cop with bipolar disorder attempts to manipulate his way through a promotion in order to win back his wife and daughter while also fighting his own inner demons.

Title: Bronson
Movie Plot: A young man who was sentenced to seven years in prison for robbing a post office ends up spending three decades in solitary confinement. During this time, his own personality is supplanted by his alter-ego, Charles Bronson.

Title: A Life Less Ordinary
Movie Plot: Upon being fired, a desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss. Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case.

Title: Free Your Mind: The Matrix Now
Movie Plot: Experience The Matrix like in this mind-expanding live show, directed by Danny Boyle and with a dream team of top creatives including Es Devlin, Kenrick 'H2O' Sandy, Michael 'Mikey J' Asante and Sabrina Mahfouz behind the controls.

Title: Six Shooter
Movie Plot: A black and bloody Irish comedy about a sad train journey where an older man, whose wife has died that morning, encounters a strange and possibly psychotic young oddball....

Title: In Bruges
Movie Plot: After a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

Title: The Banshees of Inisherin
Movie Plot: Two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, with alarming consequences for both of them.

Title: The Guard
Movie Plot: An unorthodox Irish policeman with a confrontational personality is partnered with an uptight F.B.I. agent to investigate an international drug-smuggling ring.

Title: National Theatre Live: Hangmen
Movie Plot: Local hangman Harry is unaware of the recent abolition of hanging in Great Britain, and everyone, including his old assistant Syd, and the peculiar Mooney, are just dying to hear Harry's reaction to the news.

Title: Moon
Movie Plot: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

Title: Burn After Reading
Movie Plot: A disk containing mysterious information from a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous and daft gym employees who attempt to sell it.

Title: Confessions of a Dangerous Mind
Movie Plot: An adaptation of the cult memoir of game show impresario Chuck Barris (Sam Rockwell), in which he purports to have been a C.I.A. hitman.

Title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
Movie Plot: After being mistaken for an actor, a New York thief is sent to Hollywood to train under a private eye for a potential movie role, but the duo are thrown together with a struggling actress into a murder mystery.

Title: Calvary
Movie Plot: After he is threatened during a confession, a good-natured priest must battle the dark forces closing in around him.

Title: The Sopranos
Movie Plot: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

Title: Breaking Bad
Movie Plot: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

Title: Better Call Saul
Movie Plot: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the years leading up to his fateful run-in with Walter White and Jesse Pinkman.

Title: Black Mirror
Movie Plot: Featuring stand-alone dramas -- sharp, suspenseful, satirical tales that explore techno-paranoia -- "Black Mirror" is a contemporary reworking of "The Twilight Zone" with stories that tap into the collective unease about the modern world.

Title: Stranger Things
Movie Plot: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one strange little girl.

Title: The Last of Us
Movie Plot: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: The Bear
Movie Plot: A young chef from the fine dining world returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop.

Title: Peaky Blinders
Movie Plot: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.

Title: Brothers
Movie Plot: After living many years together, two brothers discover that they are not blood related so square off in a mixed martial arts tournament to determine whose blood is stronger.

Title: Lady of Csejte
Movie Plot: Based on a story of Countess Bathory, a serial killer in 16th century Transylvania who supposedly killed hundreds of children.

Title: Po tu storonu smerti
Movie Plot: The plot begins with a strange story in which the investigator of the IC Gleb Tochilin is trying to figure out before retiring. He must find the body of Alexei Bystrov, who disappeared from the morgue, who was hit by a train, and the next day ... got up and left on his own two feet. In search of a "living corpse", Tochilin is helped by an employee of the Brain Institute Yulia Demina, whom the missing person rescued from under the wheels of a train.

Title: Viking
Movie Plot: Kievan Rus, late 10th century. After the death of his father, the young Viking prince Vladimir of Novgorod is forced into exile across the frozen sea.

Title: Lyubov bez razmera
Movie Plot: Masha sings and dances on the backs of a Moscow star. However, she is already over thirty, and the producer hints that the breasts no longer pass according to "professional standards." The girl decides to rectify the situation, but for this she needs to go with the "former" to the foot of Elbrus. At the health resort, an unexpected meeting awaits her and completely new life prospects.

Title: Affliction
Movie Plot: A deeply troubled small-town cop investigates a suspicious hunting death while other events jeopardize his sanity.

Title: Sucker Punch
Movie Plot: After a lost fight, a fighter wants back in the ring, seeking revenge on the fighter who knocked him out. When he comes toe to toe with him, he'll make sure his fists do the talking.

Title: The Prince of Tides
Movie Plot: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp

Title: Eternals
Movie Plot: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.

Title: House of Ninjas
Movie Plot: The Tawara family, the last shinobi clan. It had abandoned its roots after an incident in the past, but now the family must take on the greatest crisis in Japanese history, one that threatens to shake the nation to its core.

Title: Reacher
Movie Plot: Itinerant former military policeman Jack Reacher solves crimes and metes out his own brand of street justice. Based on the novels by Lee Child.

Title: Banshee
Movie Plot: An ex-con assumes the identity of a murdered sheriff in the small town of Banshee, Pennsylvania, where he has some unfinished business.

Title: Resident Alien
Movie Plot: A crash-landed alien takes on the identity of a small-town Colorado doctor and slowly begins to wrestle with the moral dilemma of his secret mission on Earth.

Title: Into the Badlands
Movie Plot: A mighty warrior and a young boy with supernatural powers search for enlightenment in a ruthless post-apocalyptic America controlled by feudal barons.

Title: The Tourist
Movie Plot: When a man wakes up in the Australian outback with no memory, he must use the few clues he has to discover his identity before his past catches up with him.

Title: Yellowstone
Movie Plot: A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.

Title: Tiger Zinda Hai
Movie Plot: Inspired by real events, Tiger Zinda Hai is a sequel to the blockbuster Ek Tha Tiger, and an espionage action drama that follows a daring rescue mission in Iraq.

Title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
Movie Plot: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

Title: Spider-Man 3
Movie Plot: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

Title: The Amazing Spider-Man
Movie Plot: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

Title: Ek Tha Tiger
Movie Plot: India's top spy Tiger and his love Zoya battle the dark world of intelligence and espionage that forbids its soldiers from loving the enemy.

Title: War
Movie Plot: Indian agent Khalid goes on a mission to hunt and eliminate his former mentor, the country's top agent Kabir who has gone rogue. A deadly war begins.

Title: Godzilla: Final Wars
Movie Plot: Godzilla's fiftieth Anniversary project, in which Godzilla travels around the world to fight his old foes and his allies plus a new, mysterious monster named Monster X.

Title: Godzilla, Mothra and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack

Title: American Hustle

Movie Plot: A desperate group of refugees attempts to recolonize Earth 20,000 years after Godzilla took over, but one young man wants revenge above all else.

Movie Plot: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

Movie Plot: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Title: The Town
Movie Plot: A proficient group of thieves rob a bank and hold an assistant manager hostage. Things begin to get complicated when one of the crew members falls in love with her.

Movie Plot: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson, and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

Movie Plot: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

Movie Plot: Mothra's egg washes ashore and is claimed by greedy entrepreneurs who refuse to return it to her fairies. As Godzilla arises near Nagoya, the people of Infant Island must decide if they are willing to answer Japan's own pleas for help.

Title: King Kong vs. Godzilla
Movie Plot: The advertising director of a pharmaceutical company seeks to boost the ratings of their sponsored TV program by capturing a legendary monster in a marketing scheme as Godzilla re-emerges. (Japanese Version)

Title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters!
Movie Plot: A 400-foot (122-meter) dinosaur-like beast, awoken from undersea hibernation off the Japanese coast by atomic-bomb testing, attacks Tokyo.

Title: Godzilla vs. Biollante
Movie Plot: Desolate by the loss of his daughter, a geneticist creates a monstrous new mutation.

Movie Plot: French nuclear tests irradiate an iguana into a giant monster that heads off to New York City. The American military must chase the monster across the city to stop it before it reproduces.

Movie Plot: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago.

Movie Plot: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

Movie Plot: It follows Vivian Cunningham, who winds up helping people who come too close to the edge as she endures her own comedic catastrophes like accidentally burning down her brother's vegan food truck with a vape.

Title: The White Balloon
Movie Plot: Several people try to help a little girl to find the money her mom gave her to buy a goldfish with.

Title: Leila
Movie Plot: Leila and Reza meet in a kind of celebration and fall for each other. Having discovered their love, they get married soon only to find out the infertility of Leila. That's when Reza's authoritative mother starts wheedling Leila to persuade Reza into second marriage for the sake of having a grandchild. Leila accepts at first but is unaware of her own strain threshold.—Hossein sr

Movie Plot: A hedonistic teenager in Mumbai is busted for dealing drugs and goes to his estranged sister for help, but complications land her in jail.

Movie Plot: its noroz holidays and Aghaye Mojri is speaking with children. Kolah Gere's and PesarKhale are in the show and many guests arrives.

Movie Plot: The everyday lives of the people frequenting the frenetic Accident and Emergency department of Holby City Hospital.

Movie Plot: Sugerland is a Tv series that tells the stories of a land with more than 180 characters from a crazy person who knows a lot but acts like wise people to a wise man who acts like a crazy.

Movie Plot: The world's longest-running television soap, Coronation Street focuses on the everyday lives of working-class people in Manchester, England.

Movie Plot: Two female police detectives cooperate with each other both in their professions and in their personal lives.

Movie Plot: Two separated twins, each living with a single parent and unaware from other one's existence, meet each other and switch places.

Movie Plot: When retired engineer Frank Corvin is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

Movie Plot: A kidnapped boy strikes up a friendship with his captor, an escaped convict on the run from the law, while the search for him continues.

Movie Plot: A daughter tries to remedy her dysfunctional relationship with her ailing father, a decorated baseball scout, by helping him in a recruiting trip which could be his last.

Movie Plot: A working-class English boy spends his free time caring for and training his pet kestrel.

Movie Plot: After being dumped by the girl he believes to be his soulmate, hopeless romantic Tom Hansen reflects on their relationship to try and figure out where things went wrong and how he can win her back.

Movie Plot: After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.

Movie Plot: Marion and Jack try to rekindle their relationship with a visit to Paris, home of Marion's parents -- and several of her ex-boyfriends.

Movie Plot: Gentle Sapper, a replicant, unleashes his true power when he sees his loved ones in trouble.

Movie Plot: When a policeman falls in love with a prostitute, he doesn't want her to see other men, so he creates an alter-ego who will be her only customer.

Movie Plot: A group of suburban teenagers try to support each other through the difficult task of becoming adults.

Movie Plot: Unloading its existential chamber like a Texas folk song, BUCK ALAMO is a dreamlike portrait of a modern day musical outlaw as he duels with Death.

Movie Plot: Upstairs-downstairs neighbors barter sounds captured in food storage containers. With the sounds come fragments of past relationships and the hopes and disappointments that remain.

Movie Plot: In 1980, a group of college baseball players navigate their way through the freedoms and responsibilities of unsupervised adulthood.

Title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
Movie Plot: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

Title: The Newton Boys
Movie Plot: The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, owing to their good planning and minimal violence.

Movie Plot: Gellert Grindelwald plans to raise an army of wizards to rule over non-magical beings. In response, Newt Scamander's former professor, Albus Dumbledore, seeks his help to stop him.

Title: Dazed and Confused
Movie Plot: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

Movie Plot: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realize that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen.

Movie Plot: Professor Albus Dumbledore must assist Newt Scamander and his partners as Grindelwald begins to lead an army to eliminate all Muggles.

Movie Plot: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, Oceanographer Steve Zissou (Bill Murray) rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

Title: Asteroid City

Movie Plot: This is a preview to the movie Moonrise Kingdom, In which Bob Balaban describes Suzy's books and Suzy reads from them. There is also some animation involved when Suzy reads from each book.

Movie Plot: When a poisonous snake slithers onto an Englishman's stomach in India, his associate and a doctor race to save him.

Movie Plot: A promotional short featuring Bill Murray's character who was unable to be in the film.

Title: The Rat Catcher
Movie Plot: In an English village, a reporter and a mechanic listen to a rat catcher explain his clever plan to outwit his prey.

Title: The Swan
Movie Plot: A small brilliant boy is tormented by two large idiotic bullies.

Title: Bottle Rocket
Movie Plot: Three friends plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

Title: Castello Cavalcanti
Movie Plot: Italy, September 1955. A Formula One driver crashes his car during a race, leaving him stuck in a small village but good surprises will come his way.

Title: American Express: My Life. My Card.
Movie Plot: A commercial directed and starred in by Wes Anderson in which he explains how to make a movie while answering various questions from his cast and crew.

Title: Hotel Chevalier
Movie Plot: A prologue of one heart-breaking history of love and the prologue of the travel told in The Darjeeling Limited (2007).

Title: Exodus: Gods and Kings
Movie Plot: The defiant leader Moses rises up against Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses II, setting six hundred thousand slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues.

Title: Risen
Movie Plot: In 33 AD, a Roman Tribune in Judea is tasked to find the missing body of Jesus Christ, who rose from the dead.

Title: Bottle Rocket
Movie Plot: Dysfunctional friends Dignan and Anthony plan and execute a robbery with their pot-growing friend, Bob.

Title: Pompeii
Movie Plot: A slave-turned-gladiator finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, who has been betrothed to a corrupt Roman Senator. As Mount Vesuvius erupts, he must fight to save his beloved as Pompeii crumbles around him.

Title: Gods of Egypt
Movie Plot: Mortal hero Bek teams with the god Horus in an alliance against Set, the merciless god of darkness, who has usurped Egypt's throne, plunging the once peaceful and prosperous empire into chaos and conflict.

Title: The Eagle
Movie Plot: In Roman-ruled Britain, a young Roman soldier endeavors to honor his father's memory by finding his lost legion's golden emblem.

Title: Ben Hur
Movie Plot: A young Jewish prince seeks revenge after an old friend wrongly imprisons him and his family.

Title: Centurion
Movie Plot: A splinter group of Roman soldiers fight for their lives behind enemy lines after their legion is devastated in a guerrilla attack.

Movie Plot: In ancient China, a group of European mercenaries encounters a secret army that maintains and defends the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures.

Movie Plot: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

Movie Plot: Having endured his legendary twelve labors, Hercules, the Greek demigod, has his life as a sword-for-hire tested when the King of Thrace and his daughter seek his aid in defeating a tyrannical warlord.

Movie Plot: Four Chaplin shorts from 1917: The Adventurer, The Cure, Easy Street and The Immigrant, presented with music and sound effects.

Movie Plot: After a wealthy San Francisco banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down as he begins to question if it might really be a concealed conspiracy to destroy him.

Movie Plot: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

Movie Plot: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for 40 years by young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander.

Title: Pay Day
Movie Plot: After a difficult day at work, a bricklayer tries to enjoy his pay day without his wife knowing.

Title: The Idle Class
Movie Plot: A tramp sneaks into a upper class golf resort. The tramp meets a rich woman who is having an argument with her drunken husband. Complications arise when she mistakes the tramp for her husband.
