Title: Sunnyside
Movie Plot: Charlie works on a farm from 4am to late at night. He gets his food on the run (milking a cow into his coffee, holding an chicken over the frying pan to get fried eggs). He loves the neighbor's daughter Edna but is disliked by her father. He rides a cow into a stream and is kicked off. Unconscious, he dreams of a nymph dance. Back in reality a city slicker is hurt in a car crash and is being cared for by Edna. When Charlie is rejected after attempting to imitate the slicker, the result is ambiguous--either tragic or a happy ending. Critics have long argued as to whether the final scene is real or a dream.—Ed Stephan <stephan@cc.wwu.edu>

Title: The Immigrant
Movie Plot: Charlie is an immigrant who endures a challenging voyage and gets into trouble as soon as he arrives in America.

Title: Easy Street
Movie Plot: A reformed tramp becomes a police constable who must fight a huge thug who dominates an inner-city street.

Title: Gandhi
Movie Plot: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

Title: My Beautiful Laundrette
Movie Plot: An ambitious Pakistani Briton and his white boyfriend strive for success and hope when they open a glamorous laundromat.

Title: The Age of Innocence
Movie Plot: A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

Title: The Ballad of Jack and Rose
Movie Plot: A father and daughter isolated on an island off the East Coast and living on a once-thriving commune grapple with the limits of family and sexuality.

Title: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
Movie Plot: Central Europe, 1968: A Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

Title: Kramer vs. Kramer
Movie Plot: After his wife leaves him, a work-obsessed Manhattan advertising executive is forced to learn long-neglected parenting skills, but a heated custody battle over the couple's young son deepens the wounds left by the separation.

Title: The Crucible
Movie Plot: A Salem resident attempts to frame her ex-lover's wife for being a witch in the middle of the 1692 witchcraft trials.

Title: Eversmile New Jersey
Movie Plot: Comedy about an American dentist (Daniel Day-Lewis) roaming the Argentinian countryside on his motorcycle preaching the gospel of dental hygiene.

Title: Handphone
Movie Plot: Talent manager Seung-min sees Yoon Jin Ah, a rising actress, as his one last hope to turn his life around. Just as Jin-Ah is on the path to stardom, he receives a threat from her former lover and gets her sex clip on his phone. Seung-Min tracks down the culprit and retrieves the tape but ends up losing his phone. He realizes there is one last evidence of the sex tape on his phone and anxiously looks for it. Lee Gyu, who found Seung-Min's phone, calls Seung-Min's wife and asks her to come pick it up. On the night the phone was suppose to be returned, Lee-Gyu doesn't show up. Now Lee-Gyu is the one holding the leverage. Seung-Min tries to do everything possible to get back his phone but Lee-Gyu's demands are escalating to the point of no return.—luraz isketambola

Title: Okja
Movie Plot: A young girl risks everything to prevent a powerful, multinational company from kidnapping her best friend - a fascinating beast named Okja.

Title: Joint Security Area
Movie Plot: After a shooting incident at the North-South Korean border DMZ leaves two North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss and Swedish team investigates what actually happened.

Title: Barking Dogs Never Bite
Movie Plot: An idle part-time college lecturer is annoyed by the yapping sound of a nearby dog. He decides to take drastic action.

Title: The Man from Nowhere
Movie Plot: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

Title: A Bittersweet Life
Movie Plot: Things go wrong for a high ranking mobster when he doesn't proceed by his boss's orders.

Title: A Tale of Two Sisters
Movie Plot: After being institutionalized in a mental hospital, Su-mi reunites with her sister, Su-yeon, and they return to live at their country home. But strange events plague the house, leading to surprising revelations and a shocking conclusion.

Title: New World
Movie Plot: An undercover cop finds it difficult to play both a cop and a goon.

Title: Train to Busan
Movie Plot: While a zombie virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

Title: Dead Poets: A Look Back
Movie Plot: This was a bonus feature on the newer addition of Dead Poets Society where some of the cast remember their roles.

Title: City of Angels
Movie Plot: An angel on Earth, a doctor unable to believe, a patient with a secret, a love story made in Heaven.

Title: Good Morning, Vietnam
Movie Plot: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

Title: Swing Kids
Movie Plot: A group of teens adores forbidden music in Nazi Germany just before the outbreak of World War II.

Title: The Yellow Sea
Movie Plot: When the attempt to kill a professor goes wrong, a series of violent events are triggered which force a taxi driver to run for his life.

Title: A Taxi Driver
Movie Plot: A widowed father and taxi driver who drives a German reporter from Seoul to Gwangju to cover the 1980 uprising, soon finds himself regretting his decision after being caught in the violence around him.

Title: Pornmaking for Dummies
Movie Plot: Jin-gyu, an out of work film school graduate, applies for the position of director with pornographic film company Only4Men. The following day he is hired as an assistant director for a production called All Nude Boy, and must become accustomed to working with makeshift locations, impromptu settings, and abuse from the general public. The production's lead actress, Sabine, becomes attracted to him, and the two end up spending the night together after a staff dinner. Later, Jin-gyu gets an offer to work on a real film for a major production company.

Title: Along With the Gods: The Two Worlds
Movie Plot: After a heroic death, a firefighter navigates the afterlife with the help of three guides.

Title: Snowpiercer
Movie Plot: In a future where a failed climate change experiment has killed all life except for the survivors who boarded the Snowpiercer (a train that travels around the globe), a new class system emerges.

Title: Han nyeohaksaengeui ilgi
Movie Plot: A student experiences different conflicts as she works toward being a scientist.

Title: The Uncanny Counter
Movie Plot: Noodle shop employees by day and demon hunters by night, the Counters use special abilities to chase down malevolent spirits that prey on humans.

Title: Wild Tales from the Village
Movie Plot: A year in the life of an extraordinary village hidden away in the French countryside.

Title: Recording
Movie Plot: It is a first featured film of group of young guys in Korea. Director, producer, and actors are all friends.

Title: Two Lunes
Movie Plot: What if there is another person that shares my soul?

Title: The Medium
Movie Plot: A horrifying story of a shaman's inheritance in the Isan region of Thailand. What could be possessing a family member might not be the Goddess they make it out to be.

Title: The Wailing
Movie Plot: A writer doing research for his next novel commits himself into a mental asylum in order to investigate a string of grotesque, unsolved murders.

Title: Battling Butler
Movie Plot: A love-struck weakling must pretend to be boxer in order to gain respect from the family of the girl he loves.

Title: Go West
Movie Plot: With little luck at keeping a job in the city a New Yorker tries work in the country and eventually finds his way leading a herd of cattle to the West Coast.

Title: Three Ages
Movie Plot: The misadventures of Buster in three separate historical periods.

Title: One Week
Movie Plot: A newly wedded couple attempts to build a house with a prefabricated kit, unaware that a rival sabotaged the kit's component numbering.

Title: The 'High Sign'
Movie Plot: A drifter at an amusement park finds himself both the bodyguard and hit man of a man targeted by a criminal gang.

Title: College
Movie Plot: Ronald's high-school valedictory address praises books and condemns sports. His girlfriend Mary condemns his attitude. Fearing to lose her to rival Jeff, he decides to go to college and pay more attentions to sports.

Title: Spite Marriage
Movie Plot: An unimpressive but well intending man is given the chance to marry a popular actress, of whom he has been a hopeless fan. But what he doesn't realize is that he is being used to make the actress' old flame jealous.

Title: The Goat
Movie Plot: A series of adventures begins when an accident during photographing causes Buster to be mistaken for Dead Shot Dan, the local bad guy.

Title: Drive My Car
Movie Plot: A renowned stage actor and director learns to cope with a big personal loss when he receives an offer to direct a production of Uncle Vanya in Hiroshima.

Title: Shoplifters
Movie Plot: On the margins of Tokyo, a dysfunctional band of outsiders are united by loyalty, a penchant for petty theft and playful grifting. When the young son is arrested, secrets are exposed that upend their tenuous, below-the-radar existence.

Title: Peppermint Candy
Movie Plot: Following a man's suicide, time traverses back to reveal six chapters of his life on why he committed suicide.

Title: Neighbors
Movie Plot: A young couple who live next to each other in tenement apartments do everything they can to be together despite of their feuding families.

Title: Poetry
Movie Plot: A sixty-something woman, faced with the discovery of a heinous family crime and in the early stages of Alzheimer's disease, finds strength and purpose when she enrolls in a poetry class.

Title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
Movie Plot: Brick is an alcoholic ex-football player who drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife. A reunion with his terminal father jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.

Title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
Movie Plot: A bitter, aging couple, with the help of alcohol, use their young houseguests to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other over the course of a distressing night.

Title: Rebel Without a Cause
Movie Plot: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

Title: East of Eden
Movie Plot: Two brothers in 1910s California struggle to maintain their strict, Bible-toting father's favor as an old secret about their long-absent mother comes to light.

Title: Roman Holiday
Movie Plot: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

Title: Giant
Movie Plot: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

Title: The Road Warrior
Movie Plot: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.

Title: Big Hero 6
Movie Plot: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

Title: A Streetcar Named Desire
Movie Plot: Tennessee Williams' Blanche DuBois (Jessica Lange) lives in New Orleans with her sister, Stella, and brutish brother-in-law, Stanley Kowalski (Alec Baldwin).

Title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
Movie Plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

Title: Safety Last!
Movie Plot: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

Title: Mad Max Motion Comic
Movie Plot: Deranged hunchback mechanic known as Chumbucket watches as Mad Max fights for his car and his life with a group of punks on the Road of War.

Title: Escape from New York
Movie Plot: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

Title: The Lady from Shanghai
Movie Plot: Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.

Title: Sweet Smell of Success
Movie Plot: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

Title: Year of the Dragon
Movie Plot: A police detective cracks down on organized crime in Chinatown after the murders of Triad and Mafia leaders.

Title: The Big Heat
Movie Plot: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

Title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
Movie Plot: With the help of an irreverent young sidekick, a bank robber gets his old gang back together to organize a daring new heist.

Title: The Sunchaser
Movie Plot: A prestigious oncologist learns a valuable lesson in humility and is forced to reexamine his relationship with medicine and his life in general when Brandon, a young patient and convicted for murder, kidnaps him at gunpoint.

Title: The Missouri Breaks
Movie Plot: Tom Logan is a horse thief. Rancher David Braxton has horses, and a daughter, worth stealing. But Braxton has just hired Lee Clayton, an infamous "regulator", to hunt down the horse thieves; one at a time.

Title: The Sicilian
Movie Plot: Egocentric bandit Salvatore Giuliano fights the Church, the Mafia, and the landed gentry while leading a populist movement for Sicilian independence.

Title: Pat Garrett & Billy the Kid
Movie Plot: Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman on behalf of a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.

Title: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
Movie Plot: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

Title: Desperate Hours
Movie Plot: An escaped con, on the run from the law, moves into a married couple's house and takes over their lives.

Title: Reds
Movie Plot: A radical American journalist becomes involved with the Communist revolution in Russia, and hopes to bring its spirit and idealism to the United States.

Title: The Long Riders
Movie Plot: The origins, exploits and the ultimate fate of the Jesse James gang is told in a sympathetic portrayal of the bank robbers made up of brothers who begin their legendary bank raids because of revenge.

Title: The Silence
Movie Plot: Two estranged sisters, Ester and Anna, and Anna's 10-year-old son travel to the Central European country on the verge of war. Ester becomes seriously ill and the three of them move into a hotel in a small town called Timoka.

Title: Hour of the Wolf
Movie Plot: While vacationing on a remote German island with his younger pregnant wife, an artist has an emotional breakdown while confronting his repressed desires.

Title: Shame
Movie Plot: In the midst of a civil war, former violinists Jan and Eva Rosenberg, who have a tempestuous marriage, run a farm on a rural island. In spite of their best efforts to escape their homeland, the war impinges on every aspect of their lives.

Title: Scenes from a Marriage
Movie Plot: Scenes from a Marriage chronicles the many years of love and turmoil that bind Marianne (Liv Ullmann) and Johan (Erland Josephson) through matrimony, infidelity, divorce, and subsequent partners.

Title: Fanny and Alexander
Movie Plot: Through the eyes of ten-year-old Alexander, we witness the delights and conflicts of the Ekdahl family, a sprawling bourgeois clan in turn-of-the-twentieth-century Sweden.

Title: Ford v Holden
Movie Plot: A feature documentary on rivalry between Australian car brands.

Title: Mann V. Ford
Movie Plot: Follows the Ramapough Indians and their legal team as they take on Ford and the EPA.

Title: The 24 Hour War
Movie Plot: In the early 1960s, Henry Ford II and Enzo Ferrari went to war on the battlefield of Le Mans(TM). This epic battle saw drivers lose their lives, family dynasties nearly collapse and the development of a new race car that changed racing.

Title: Fukrey
Movie Plot: The paths of four dream-chasing college friends cross with an array of colourful characters, from a tough-talking Punjabi female don to a Jugaad Baaz college watchman. Mayhem ensues.

Title: Fantastic Four
Movie Plot: Four young outsiders teleport to an alternate and dangerous universe which alters their physical form in shocking ways. The four must learn to harness their new abilities and work together to save Earth from a former friend turned enemy.

Title: Heroes
Movie Plot: Two-time Formula One World Champions, share never-before-heard tales of triumph and tragedy, as well as their memories of times alongside Formula One champion Michael Schumacher.

Title: Shelby American: The Carroll Shelby Story
Movie Plot: The story of automotive icon Carroll Shelby who started as a chicken farmer and went on to become one of the winningest racing drivers in American motorsports, and the only man in history to win in Le Mans as a driver and a manufacturer.

Title: DreamWorks Dragons
Movie Plot: The further adventures of Hiccup and his friends on the Island of Berk.

Title: Smiles of a Summer Night
Movie Plot: In Sweden at the turn of the century, members of the upper class and their servants find themselves in a romantic tangle that they try to work out amidst jealousy and heartbreak.

Title: Summer with Monika
Movie Plot: A pair of teenagers meet one summer day, start a reckless affair and abandon their families to be with one another.

Title: How to Train Your Dragon: Homecoming
Movie Plot: Hiccup and Toothless reunite to remind both their kinds of the inseparable bond between vikings and dragons.

Title: Kung Fu Panda 2
Movie Plot: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

Title: Kung Fu Panda 3
Movie Plot: Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness", Po must face two hugely epic, but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to home.

Title: Kung Fu Panda
Movie Plot: To everyone's surprise, including his own, Po, an overweight, clumsy panda, is chosen as protector of the Valley of Peace. His suitability will soon be tested as the valley's arch-enemy is on his way.

Title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
Movie Plot: Unlock the secrets of the Dragon Eye and come face to face with more dragons than anyone has ever imagined as Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders soar to the edge of adventure.

Title: Ratatoing
Movie Plot: Marcelle Toing, owner of the best restaurant in Rio de Janeiro, must go on missions to steal ingredients from human restaurants to keep his meals the best.

Title: Your Friend the Rat
Movie Plot: Remy and Emile plead the case for rats by illustrating the historical and scientific facts about the species and their interaction with humans.

Title: The Life of Emile Zola
Movie Plot: The biopic of the famous French muckraking writer and his involvement in fighting the injustice of the Dreyfus Affair.

Title: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
Movie Plot: A unassuming greeting card poet from a small town in Vermont heads to New York City upon inheriting a massive fortune and is immediately hounded by those who wish to take advantage of him.

Title: The Great Ziegfeld
Movie Plot: The ups and downs of Florenz Ziegfeld Jr., famed producer of extravagant stage revues, are portrayed.

Title: Mutiny on the Bounty
Movie Plot: First mate Fletcher Christian leads a revolt against his sadistic commander, Captain Bligh, in this classic seafaring adventure, based on the real-life 1789 mutiny.

Title: Grand Hotel
Movie Plot: A group of very different individuals staying at a luxurious hotel in Berlin deal with each of their respective dramas.

Title: The Lost Weekend
Movie Plot: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

Title: All the King's Men
Movie Plot: The rise and fall of a corrupt politician, who makes his friends richer and retains power by dint of a populist appeal.

Title: Gentleman's Agreement
Movie Plot: A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.

Title: Cimarron
Movie Plot: A newspaper editor settles in an Oklahoma boom town with his reluctant wife at the end of the nineteenth century.

Title: Jaws: The Revenge
Movie Plot: Chief Brody's widow believes that her family is deliberately being targeted by another shark in search of revenge.

Title: Jaws 3-D
Movie Plot: A giant thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in a SeaWorld theme park and it's up to the sons of police chief Brody to rescue everyone.

Title: Deep Blue Sea
Movie Plot: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease, a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the prey, as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

Title: Night of the Demons 2
Movie Plot: High school students throw a Halloween party in a mansion haunted by a young demon.

Title: Lake Placid
Movie Plot: Four people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

Title: Night of the Demons
Movie Plot: Ten teenagers party at an abandoned funeral parlor on Halloween night. When an evil force awakens, demonic spirits keep them from leaving and turn their gathering into a living Hell.

Title: Seed of Chucky
Movie Plot: Chucky and Tiffany are resurrected by their innocent gender-confused child, Glen/Glenda, and hit Hollywood, where a movie depicting the killer dolls' murder spree is underway.

Title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
Movie Plot: The Madagascar animals join a struggling European circus to get back to New York, but find themselves being pursued by a psychotic animal-control officer.

Title: Late Autumn
Movie Plot: A widow tries to marry off her daughter with the help of her late husband's three friends.

Title: Tokyo Twilight
Movie Plot: Two sisters find out the existence of their long-lost mother, but the younger cannot take the truth of being abandoned as a child.

Title: Early Spring
Movie Plot: A young man and his wife struggle within the confines of their passionless relationship while he has an extramarital romance.

Title: Equinox Flower
Movie Plot: A businessman clashes with his elder daughter over her choice of a husband.

Title: The Flavor of Green Tea Over Rice
Movie Plot: A childless middle-aged couple faces a marital crisis.

Title: Floating Weeds
Movie Plot: The head of a Japanese theatre troupe returns to a small coastal town where he left a son who thinks he is his uncle, and tries to make up for the lost time, but his current mistress grows jealous.

Title: I Was Born, But...
Movie Plot: Two young brothers throw a tantrum when they discover that their father isn't the most important man in his workplace.

Title: The End of Summer
Movie Plot: The family of an older man who runs a small sake brewery become concerned with his finances and his health after they discover him visiting an old mistress from his youth.

Title: The Only Son
Movie Plot: A widow sends her only son away to receive a better education. Years later, she visits him, finding him a poor school teacher with a wife and son.

Title: The Seventh Sign
Movie Plot: Abby Quinn is eagerly awaiting childbirth but is haunted by dreams where she suffers a miscarriage. When she decides to rent a room to a mysterious stranger, she realizes a chain of events that will unleash the end of humanity.

Title: Socrates
Movie Plot: A false accusation leads the philosopher Socrates to trial and condemnation in 4th century BC Athens.

Title: Stroszek
Movie Plot: In Berlin, an alcoholic man, recently released from prison, joins his elderly friend and a prostitute in a determined dream to leave Germany and seek a better life in Wisconsin.

Title: The Seventh Sense
Movie Plot: A blind street musician, shut off from everything but her music, begins working with a reclusive composer who uses sensual metaphors as teaching tools. Farced with the possibility of regaining her eyesight she fears she will lose her musical inspiration.—george91910

Title: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
Movie Plot: A boy is raised by a Buddhist monk in an isolated floating temple where the years pass like the seasons.

Title: Solaris
Movie Plot: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

Title: Andrei Rublev
Movie Plot: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

Title: The Sacrifice
Movie Plot: At the dawn of World War III, a man searches for a way to restore peace to the world and finds he must give something in return.

Title: Mirror
Movie Plot: A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.

Title: Nostalghia
Movie Plot: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy researching the life of an 18th-century composer, and instead meet a ruminative madman who tells the poet how the world may be saved.

Title: Ivan's Childhood
Movie Plot: During WWII, Soviet orphan Ivan Bondarev strikes up a friendship with three sympathetic Soviet officers while working as a scout behind the German lines.

Title: Voyage in Time
Movie Plot: Acclaimed Russian director Andrei Tarkovsky and his screenwriter Tonino Guerra travel all over Italy to scout locations for the film Nostalghia.

Title: 8½
Movie Plot: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.

Title: The Making of 'the Big Lebowski'
Movie Plot: A short documentary about the production of The Big Lebowski (1998).

Title: American Christmas
Movie Plot: After another ruined Christmas dinner, a mother is determined to make her family reflect on their misdeeds.

Title: The Jesus Rolls
Movie Plot: A trio of misfits whose irreverent, sexually charged dynamic evolves into a surprising love story as their spontaneous and flippant attitude towards the past or future backfires time and again.

Title: 7-10 Split
Movie Plot: An aspiring actor whose career is in the dumps, exploits his amazing bowling skills to take the PBA by storm and becomes rich and famous, only to lose his best girl and best friend...

Title: Bloodthirst
Movie Plot: In a post apocalyptic world run by vampires, only the strong survive. John Shepard, Vampire Hunter, is one of them. John has to track down and eliminate the master vampire before he himself gets turned.

Title: Incubus
Movie Plot: Stranded after a car accident, a medical school student and her friends try to find shelter - only to cross paths with a deranged killer.

Title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
Movie Plot: High schooler Greg, who spends most of his time making parodies of classic movies with his co-worker Earl, finds his outlook forever altered after befriending a classmate who has just been diagnosed with cancer.

Title: Short Term 12
Movie Plot: A day at a group home for troubled adolescents. Denim is the head counselor, involved somehow with Natalia, another counselor. During the day, we watch them and other staff deal with a boy who's getting into fights though he has only a week to go before his 18th birthday, a girl whose birthday it is, a foul-mouthed lad, and others. Denim uses music to calm one youth, orients a new staff member, sneaks a marijuana cigarette during a break, and by the day's end, talks to Natalia. Do any of us have it together?—<jhailey@hotmail.com>

Title: The Spectacular Now
Movie Plot: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical "nice girl."

Title: Last Call
Movie Plot: Underachieving cousins Phil and Danny O'Donnell are forced to run the family pub to save their eccentric uncle from jail time and financial ruin.

Title: The Glass Castle
Movie Plot: A young girl comes of age in a dysfunctional family of nonconformist nomads with a mother who's an eccentric artist and an alcoholic father who would stir the children's imagination with hope as a distraction to their poverty.

Title: It's Kind of a Funny Story
Movie Plot: A clinically-depressed teenager gets a new start after he checks himself into an adult psychiatric ward.

Title: The Fundamentals of Caring
Movie Plot: A man suffering a family loss enrolls in a class about care-giving that changes his perspective on life.

Title: Eighth Grade
Movie Plot: An introverted teenage girl tries to survive the last week of her disastrous eighth grade year before leaving to start high school.

Title: The Kings of Summer
Movie Plot: Three teenage friends, in the ultimate act of independence, decide to spend their summer building a house in the woods and living off the land.

Title: Captain Fantastic
Movie Plot: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

Title: Sing Street
Movie Plot: A young lad notices a beautiful girl who begins to occupy his thoughts. While struggling with poverty, personal relationships and life's woes, he starts a band, hoping to catch her attention.

Title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
Movie Plot: The early years of James Logan, featuring his rivalry with his brother Victor Creed, his service in the special forces team Weapon X, and his experimentation into the metal-lined mutant Wolverine.

Title: X-Men: The Last Stand
Movie Plot: The human government develops a cure for mutations, and Jean Gray becomes a darker uncontrollable persona called the Phoenix who allies with Magneto, causing escalation into an all-out battle for the X-Men.

Title: X2
Movie Plot: When anti-mutant Colonel William Stryker kidnaps Professor X and attacks his school, the X-Men must ally with their archenemy Magneto to stop him.

Title: The Passion of Anna
Movie Plot: A recently divorced man meets an emotionally devastated widow and they begin a love affair.

Title: X-Men: Apocalypse
Movie Plot: In the 1980s the X-Men must defeat an ancient all-powerful mutant, En Sabah Nur, who intends to thrive through bringing destruction to the world.

Title: X-Men
Movie Plot: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.

Title: The Incredible Hulk
Movie Plot: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.

Title: Creed II
Movie Plot: Under the tutelage of Rocky Balboa, newly crowned heavyweight champion Adonis Creed faces off against Viktor Drago, the son of Ivan Drago.

Title: Dark Phoenix
Movie Plot: Jean Grey begins to develop incredible powers that corrupt and turn her into a Dark Phoenix, causing the X-Men to decide if her life is worth more than all of humanity.

Title: Rambo
Movie Plot: In Thailand, John Rambo joins a group of mercenaries to venture into war-torn Burma, and rescue a group of Christian aid workers who were kidnapped by the ruthless local infantry unit.

Title: Creed III
Movie Plot: Adonis has been thriving in both his career and family life, but when a childhood friend and former boxing prodigy resurfaces, the face-off is more than just a fight.

Title: Rambo III
Movie Plot: Rambo mounts a one-man mission to rescue his friend Colonel Trautman from the clutches of the formidable invading Soviet forces in Afghanistan.

Title: The Imitation Game
Movie Plot: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.

Title: The Hurt Locker
Movie Plot: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

Title: The King Speak
Movie Plot: A man suffering from Tourette's syndrome has to give an important speech and enlists the help of a Chinese speech therapist to get him through it.

Title: Life of Pi
Movie Plot: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

Title: Captain Phillips
Movie Plot: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

Title: Zero Dark Thirty
Movie Plot: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L.s Team 6 in May 2011.

Title: Tales to Chill the Bone: Volume 4
Movie Plot: The final installment of the Tales to Chill the Bone Series with 5 more final short films.

Title: The 420 Murders
Movie Plot: A woman smoking marijuana is stalked and pursued by an unseen killer on April 20th

Title: The Mighty Lancelot
Movie Plot: Lancelot battles foes via sword fights in this comedic short

Title: Adam's Song

Movie Plot: Two sisters become roommates after growing up in separate households with opposite upbringings.

Title: Wasted
Movie Plot: Three twenty-something pals circa 1996 revisit their small-town roots to attend the funeral of their high school friend Bender. The guys spend a wild weekend reminiscing over football, booze and babes while struggling with their problems.

Title: Secrets of a Small Town
Movie Plot: The mysterious murder of a teenage girl and the disappearance of her sister shake up a small town.

Title: Gifted
Movie Plot: Frank, a single man raising his child prodigy niece Mary, is drawn into a custody battle with his mother.

Title: Lion
Movie Plot: A five-year-old Indian boy is adopted by an Australian couple after getting lost hundreds of kilometers from home. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

Title: Sabotage
Movie Plot: A Scotland Yard undercover detective is on the trail of a saboteur who is part of a plot to set off a bomb in London. But when the detective's cover is blown, the plot begins to unravel.

Title: Young and Innocent
Movie Plot: A man on the run from a murder charge enlists the help of a beautiful stranger who must put herself at risk for his cause.

Title: The Lady Vanishes
Movie Plot: While travelling by rail in interwar Nazi Germany, a young socialite finds that a fellow female passenger has disappeared from the train, but nobody else remembers her having been on board.

Title: Friends with Benefits
Movie Plot: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

Title: Clueless
Movie Plot: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other.

Title: Legally Blonde
Movie Plot: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen, is dumped by her boyfriend. She decides to follow him to law school. While she is there, she figures out that there is more to her than just looks.

Title: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
Movie Plot: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

Title: 13 Going on 30
Movie Plot: Unpopular schoolgirl Jenna Rink makes an unusual wish on her birthday. Miraculously, her wish comes true and the 13-year-old Jenna wakes up the next day as a 30-year-old woman.

Title: Mean Girls
Movie Plot: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

Title: 10 Things I Hate About You
Movie Plot: A high-school boy, Cameron, cannot date Bianca until her anti-social older sister, Kat, has a boyfriend. So, Cameron pays a mysterious boy, Patrick, to charm Kat.

Title: She's the Man
Movie Plot: When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguised as him, and proceeds to fall for his school's star soccer player, and soon learns she's not the only one with romantic troubles.

Title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
Movie Plot: Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days.

Title: Waterworld
Movie Plot: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

Title: The Devil Wears Prada
Movie Plot: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

Title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
Movie Plot: Robin Hood decides to fight back as an outlaw when faced with the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham.

Title: Open Range
Movie Plot: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

Title: Wyatt Earp
Movie Plot: From Wichita to Dodge City, to the O.K. Corral in Tombstone, a man becomes a myth in this thrilling journey of romance, adventure, and desperate heroic action.

Title: Tin Cup
Movie Plot: A washed-up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the U.S. Open in order to win the heart of his successful rival's girlfriend.

Title: Message in a Bottle
Movie Plot: A woman discovers a tragic love letter in a bottle on a beach, and is determined to track down its author.

Title: No Way Out
Movie Plot: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

Title: 3000 Miles to Graceland
Movie Plot: A gang of ex-cons rob a casino during Elvis convention week.

Title: Minority Report
Movie Plot: John works with the PreCrime police which stop crimes before they take place, with the help of three 'PreCogs' who can foresee crimes. Events ensue when John finds himself framed for a future murder.

Title: Tootsie
Movie Plot: Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.

Title: Ghost
Movie Plot: After a young man is murdered, his spirit stays behind to warn his lover of impending danger, with the help of a reluctant psychic.

Title: Dirty Dancing
Movie Plot: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Movie Plot: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

Title: Mrs. Doubtfire
Movie Plot: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

Title: Drishyam 2
Movie Plot: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

Title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
Movie Plot: An NRI and his wife decide to stay in his ancestral home, paying no heed to the warnings about ghosts. Soon, inexplicable occurrences cause him to call a psychiatrist to help solve the mystery.

Title: Welcome
Movie Plot: A man falls in love with a beautiful woman, but later discovers that her brothers are gangsters.

Title: Sardar Udham
Movie Plot: A biopic detailing the 2 decades that Punjabi Sikh revolutionary, Udham Singh, spent planning the assassination of the man responsible for the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

Title: Stolen Kisses
Movie Plot: After being discharged from the army, Antoine Doinel centers a screwball comedy where he applies for different jobs and tries to make sense of his relationships with women.

Title: Love on the Run
Movie Plot: Antoine Doinel is now more than thirty. He divorces from Christine. He is a proofreader, and is in love with Sabine, a record seller. Colette, his teenager love, is now a lawyer. She buys Antoine's first published autobiographical novel. They meet again in a station...—Yepok

Title: Bed & Board
Movie Plot: Antoine Doinel works dying flowers in the courtyard outside his apartment. He is married to Christine, who is pregnant. He has an affair with a Japanese woman, jeopardising his marriage.

Title: Love at Twenty
Movie Plot: "Love at Twenty" unites five directors from around the world to present their different perspectives on what love really is at the age of 20. The episodes are united with the score of Georges Delerue and still photos of Henri Cartier-Bresson. The directors create their peculiar scenarios with Truffaut revisiting Antoine Doinel, this time finding some meaning to his life while getting involved with a girl; Renzo Rossellini's episode about an abandoned mistress; Ishihara's tale about an obsessive love; Ophüls' story about a pregnant woman trying to plot against the baby's father; and Wajda presenting a confusing relationship between people from different generations.—Rodrigo Amaro

Title: Jules and Jim
Movie Plot: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

Title: The Mischief Makers
Movie Plot: A group of five boys, the brats of the title, are all in love with an unbearably beautiful woman and so they spend their summer jealously harassing her and her boyfriend.

Title: The Soft Skin
Movie Plot: Pierre Lachenay is a well-known publisher and lecturer, married with Franca and father of Sabine, around 10. He meets an air hostess, Nicole. They start a love affair, which Pierre is hiding, but he cannot stand staying away from her.

Title: Day for Night
Movie Plot: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.

Title: Shoot the Piano Player
Movie Plot: A pianist helps his brother escape from two gangsters, who retaliate by abducting their kid brother.

Title: The Last Metro
Movie Plot: In occupied Paris, an actress married to a Jewish theater owner must keep him hidden from the Germans while doing both of their jobs.

Title: Two English Girls
Movie Plot: At the beginning of the 20th century, middle-class young Frenchman Claude Roc meets young Englishwoman Ann Brown in Paris. They become friends and she invites him to spend holidays at the house where she lives with her mother and her sister Muriel, for whom she intends Claude. During these holidays, Claude, Ann, and Muriel become very close and he gradually falls in love with Muriel. But both families lay down a one-year-long separation with no contact before agreeing to the marriage. So Claude goes back to Paris and has many love affairs before sending Muriel a break-off letter.—Yepok

Title: Nadodikkattu
Movie Plot: After losing their jobs in Kerala, Dasan and Vijayan decide to migrate to the Middle East. But they end up in Tamil Nadu where they are mistaken as two CID officers by a group of smugglers.

Title: Bangalore Days
Movie Plot: A fun roller coaster ride about three young people, Aju, Divya and Kuttan who are cousins, reach Bangalore to dream, discover and explore.

Title: Manichithrathazhu
Movie Plot: When a forbidden room in an old bungalow is unbolted, the spirit of a vengeful dancer is unleashed.

Title: Kumbalangi Nights
Movie Plot: The film revolves around four brothers who share a love-hate relationship with each other. Their relationship progresses to another level when Saji, Boney, and Franky decide to help Bobby stand by his love.

Title: Devasuram
Movie Plot: Neelakandan squanders away the inheritance left by his father. However, his life turns upside down when his mother reveals a terrible secret on her deathbed that changes the course of his life.

Title: Kilukkam
Movie Plot: A tourist guide in Ooty shelters a mentally unstable woman in return for the reward offered by her relatives. Later, he comes to know that she is in danger from her relatives.

Title: Ayyappanum Koshiyum
Movie Plot: The story revolves around the clash between Ayyappan, a senior police officer who serves at the Attappadi Police Station and Havildar Koshi, who comes to the village with a motive.

Title: Kireedam
Movie Plot: The life of a young man turns upside down when he intervenes in a dispute in order to rescue his father (a cop) from a ruthless local outlaw.

Title: Premam
Movie Plot: A young man has three opportunities to find love. Will the third time be the charm?

Title: Pierrot the Fool
Movie Plot: Pierrot escapes his boring society and travels from Paris to the Mediterranean Sea with Marianne, a girl chased by hit-men from Algeria. They lead an unorthodox life, always on the run.

Title: Vivre sa vie
Movie Plot: Twelve episodic tales in the life of a Parisian woman and her slow descent into prostitution.

Title: Contempt
Movie Plot: A French writer's marriage deteriorates while working on Fritz Lang's version of "The Odyssey", as his wife accuses him of using her to court favor with the film's brash American producer.

Title: A Woman Is a Woman
Movie Plot: An exotic dancer is desperate to become a mother and accepts her reluctant boyfriend's suggestion that she be impregnated by his best friend.

Title: Band of Outsiders
Movie Plot: Two crooks with a fondness for old Hollywood B-movies convince a languages student to help them commit a robbery.

Title: Cléo from 5 to 7
Movie Plot: Cleo, a singer and hypochondriac, becomes increasingly worried that she might have cancer while awaiting test results from her doctor.

Title: Alphaville
Movie Plot: A U.S. secret agent is sent to the distant space city of Alphaville where he must find a missing person and free the city from its tyrannical ruler.

Title: Breathless
Movie Plot: When Jesse Lujack steals a car in Las Vegas and drives down to LA, his criminal ways only escalate - but when will it end?

Title: Saboteur
Movie Plot: A young man accused of sabotage goes on the run to prove his innocence.

Title: Hiroshima Mon Amour
Movie Plot: A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.

Title: Kahaani
Movie Plot: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met him.

Title: A Wednesday
Movie Plot: A retiring police officer reminisces about the most astounding day of his career. About a case that was never filed but continues to haunt him in his memories - the case of a man and a Wednesday.

Title: Major
Movie Plot: Based on the life of Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan, who was martyred in action during the November 2008 Mumbai attacks.

Title: A Passage to India
Movie Plot: Cultural mistrust and false accusations doom a friendship in British colonial India between an Indian doctor, an Englishwoman engaged to marry a city magistrate, and an English educator.

Title: Ryan's Daughter
Movie Plot: Set in the wake of the 1916 Easter Rising, a married woman in a small Irish village has an affair with a troubled British officer.

Title: Doctor Zhivago
Movie Plot: Young and beautiful Lara is loved by three men: a revolutionary, a mogul, and a doctor. Their lives become intertwined with the drama of Russian revolution. Doctor Zhivago is about to get married to another when he first lays eyes on Lara. Their love story is unfolding against the backdrop of revolution which affects the doctor's career, his family, and his love to Lara.—Steve Shelokhonov

Title: The Bikeriders
Movie Plot: Follows the rise of midwestern motorcycle club, the Vandals. Seen through the lives of its members, the club evolves from a place for local outsiders into a more sinister gang, threatening the original group's way of life.

Title: Rendezvous with Rama
Movie Plot: Rama is a vast alien spacecraft that enters the Solar System, A perfect cylinder some fifty kilometres long, spinning rapidly, racing through space, Rama is a technological marvel, a mysterious and deeply enigmatic alien artifact. It is Mankind's first visitor from the stars and must be investigated . . .—Paxgraham

Title: The Faithful
Movie Plot: On his thirteenth birthday, Kevin wishes that his dog, Danny, could be a real friend to him. Upon waking up the next morning, he finds that his furry friend has actually become human! Thanks to Danny's dog-like characteristics, he is able to become exceptionally popular in school and brings Kevin up with him. But when the girl of Kevin's dreams, Mary, falls for Danny instead of him, he quickly shuns him, forgetting what a great friend he had always been. Join Kevin on his journey as he learns the fleetingness of popularity while discovering that true friendship is rare and more significant than anything he could ever imagine.—Anonymous

Title: The Dead Don't Die
Movie Plot: The peaceful town of Centerville finds itself battling a zombie horde as the dead start rising from their graves.

Title: Terminator 3: TerminatorVision
Movie Plot: This features Director Jonathan Moscow (host) and cast and crew discussing the picture-at-large, working with a legendary Hollywood Action star, Terminator 3's place in the franchise, and plenty more. Fans are treated to behind-the-scenes footage in addition to the interview sequences. It shows interviews, storyboards, and behind the scenes footage and in terms of the soundbites, we hear from Mostow, Loken, Danes, Stahl, creature creator Stan Winston, producers Mario Kassar and Andrew Vanja, actor Arnold Schwarzenegger, visual effects supervisor Pablo Helman, production designer Jeff Mann, and a few unnamed participants.

Title: Wanted
Movie Plot: A frustrated office worker discovers that he is the son of a professional assassin, and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.

Title: Tales of the Wizard of Oz
Movie Plot: This 150-episode series of shorts chronicles Dorothy's long stay in the land of Oz. The Munchkins are portrayed as tiny globs; the Scarecrow is a fool named Socrates; the Tin Woodman is a bully named Rusty; and the dandy Lion is called Dandy. The Wizard, who speaks like W.C. Fields, can perform little magic beyond card tricks. Nevertheless, Dorothy continually pressures the Wizard to send her home. A constant threat is posed by the solid-green Wicked Witch of the West, who tries to make the dragonette Desmond follow her orders and attack the group of friends, even though he has no malice toward them.—Scott Hutchins <scottandrewh@home.com>

Title: Oz the Great and Powerful
Movie Plot: A small-time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.

Title: Return to Oz
Movie Plot: After Dorothy's friends are robbed of their prizes by a revived Wicked Witch, she is sent back to Oz to set things straight once again.

Title: The Wizard of Oz on Ice
Movie Plot: An ice-skating television adaptation of the 1939 musical film based on Lyman Frank Baum's 1900 fairy tale novel "The Wonderful Wizard of Oz".

Title: Return to Oz
Movie Plot: Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, is somehow called back to Oz when a vain witch and the Nome King destroy everything that makes the magical land beautiful.

Title: Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return
Movie Plot: Shortly after a tornado rips through her Kansas home, Dorothy returns to Oz to save her friends from a villainous jester.

Title: Mago de Oz Cuento de Frank Baum
Movie Plot: In this minimalist stage version of the MGM film, Dorotea is swept to Oz by an offstage tornado, greeted by Glinda and flowery Munchkins, not played by actors. Glinda looks suspiciously like Mother Ema (not Aunt). A Wicked Witch appears with blacked out teeth who looks like Dona Brujilda, who has been trying to get rid of Dorotea's dog. She meets Espantapajaros (the Scarecrow), Hombre de Hojalata (The Tin Man), and Leon (Lion). Professor Maravilla, dressed like The Wizard in Baum's silent films, but very young, sings "Do you hear me?" in Spanish, to the tune of "The Jitterbug," and when he appears as the Wizard, he is dressed like the Grand Poloni, with an emerald green turban. The Wizard sends them to retrieve the Witch's broomstick. The witch sings about her sleeping potion to the tune of "Just Call Smarmy" from the Disneyland Cowardly Lion of Oz record. A madcap chase ensues with the Witch's hunch-backed servant, Espantapajaros and Hombre de Hojalata French double kiss the witch's cheeks, to her great anger, and as they rest from the chase no one can tell who they are talking to, and so tired, they eventually drink the witch's "agua fresca" and fall asleep.—Scott Hutchins <scottandrewh@home.com>

Title: Tom and Jerry & The Wizard of Oz
Movie Plot: Tom the Cat and Jerry the Mouse get whisked away into The land of Oz.

Title: A Christmas Carol
Movie Plot: A bitter old miser who rationalizes his uncaring nature learns real compassion when three spirits visit him on Christmas Eve.

Title: Turkish the Wizard of Oz
Movie Plot: The adaptation of The Wizard of Oz.

Title: A Christmas Carol
Movie Plot: An animated retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about a Victorian-era miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

Title: A Christmas Carol
Movie Plot: An elderly miser learns the error of his ways on Christmas Eve.

Title: The Year Without a Santa Claus
Movie Plot: When a weary and discouraged Santa Claus considers skipping his Christmas Eve run one year, Mrs. Claus and his elves set out to change his mind.

Title: The Night They Saved Christmas
Movie Plot: Santa's home is threatened when an oil company blasts in the North Pole.

Title: The Cokeville Miracle
Movie Plot: Children who were held hostage in their elementary school tell stories of miraculous things, but many adults are skeptical that the Cokeville Miracle ever truly happened.

Title: Bill Nye the Science Guy
Movie Plot: Scientist/comedian Bill Nye explores various aspects of science for young viewers.

Title: The Magic of Lassie
Movie Plot: Lassie is trying to find her way home. She will have to run all the way from Colorado to California. Her loving owner is looking for her too.

Title: The Santa Clause 2
Movie Plot: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for eight years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.

Title: Pollyanna
Movie Plot: A young girl comes to an embittered town and confronts its attitude with her determination to see the best in life.

Title: Ernest Saves Christmas
Movie Plot: Ernest helps Santa Claus as he searches for his successor.

Title: Pete's Dragon
Movie Plot: An orphan boy and his magical dragon come to town with his abusive adoptive parents in pursuit.

Title: A Muppet Family Christmas
Movie Plot: Fozzie Bear surprises his mother on Christmas Eve by bringing the entire Muppet gang to her farm to celebrate the holidays.

Title: A Muppets Christmas: Letters to Santa
Movie Plot: When Gonzo accidentally diverts three letters to Santa, he talks Kermit and his friends into delivering them to the North Pole personally.

Title: Muppets Tonight
Movie Plot: Kermit the Frog, Clifford and friends struggle to put on a weekly TV variety show.

Title: Muppets from Space
Movie Plot: Gonzo is contacted by his alien family through his breakfast cereal. But when the men in black kidnap him, it's up to Kermit and the gang to rescue Gonzo and help him reunite with his long-lost family.

Title: Muppet Classic Theater
Movie Plot: The Muppets perform six classic fairy tales: Three Little Pigs, King Midas' Golden Touch, The Boy Who Cried Wolf, Rumpelstiltskin, The Emperor's New Clothes and The Elves and the Shoemaker. Hosted by Gonzo and Rizzo the Rat.

Title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
Movie Plot: Kermit and his friends go to New York City to get their musical on Broadway only to find it's a more difficult task than they anticipated.

Title: The Great Muppet Caper
Movie Plot: Kermit the Frog, The Great Gonzo, and Fozzie Bear are reporters who travel to Britain to interview a rich victim of jewel thieves and help her along with her secretary, Miss Piggy.

Title: The Muppet Show: Sex and Violence
Movie Plot: The original Muppet Show Pilot. The guests include the Seven Deadly Sins.

Title: Muppets Most Wanted
Movie Plot: While on a grand world tour, The Muppets find themselves wrapped into an European jewel-heist caper headed by a Kermit the Frog look-alike and his dastardly sidekick.

Title: The Muppets.
Movie Plot: Jim Henson's lovable Muppets return to the small screen in this mockumentary-style series that follows their personal and professional lives.

Title: John Denver and the Muppets: A Christmas Together
Movie Plot: In this beloved holiday classic, Kermit the Frog, Miss Piggy and all the Muppets join the singer for a heart-warming Christmas celebration, with traditional carols as well as lesser-known holiday songs.

Title: Father Knows Best
Movie Plot: The popular radio show comes to life in this hit sitcom about a wise family man, Jim Anderson, his common-sense wife Margaret and their children Betty, Bud and Kathy.

Title: The Many Loves of Dobie Gillis
Movie Plot: A young man schemes and attempts to get the "better things in life" mostly popularity, success, and most importantly, girls.

Title: Leave It to Beaver
Movie Plot: The misadventures of a suburban boy, family and friends.

Title: The Adventures of Ozzie and Harriet
Movie Plot: Ozzie and Harriet Nelson raise their two sons Ricky and David. As the sons age, they experience teenage dating problems, marriage and careers.

Title: My Three Sons
Movie Plot: Widower Steve Douglas raises three sons with the help of his father-in-law, and is later aided by the boys' great-uncle. An adopted son, a stepdaughter, wives, and another generation of sons join the loving family in later seasons.

Title: Dennis the Menace
Movie Plot: Television episodes built around the same sorts of incidents found in Hank Ketcham's long-running comic strip.

Title: The Andy Griffith Show
Movie Plot: Widower Sheriff Andy Taylor, and his son Opie, live with Andy's Aunt Bee in Mayberry, North Carolina. With virtually no crimes to solve, most of Andy's time is spent philosophizing and calming down his cousin Deputy Barney Fife.

Title: The Dick Van Dyke Show
Movie Plot: The misadventures of a TV writer both at work and at home.

Title: The Patty Duke Show
Movie Plot: Teenager Patty Lane and her worldly identical cousin Cathy navigate family and high school life.

Title: I Dream of Jeannie
Movie Plot: A United States astronaut finds his life vastly complicated when he stumbles on to a bottle containing a female genie.

Title: The Danny Thomas Show
Movie Plot: Danny is a New York entertainer. Between his co-stars at the nightclub where he performs and his wife and kids, he has dilemmas galore, which he somehow manages to resolve and still laugh.

Title: The Quiet Duel
Movie Plot: A surgeon gets syphilis from a patient when he cuts himself during an operation. The doctor's life is destroyed, but unlike the patient, he doesn't destroy others along with him.

Title: One Wonderful Sunday
Movie Plot: During a Sunday trip into war-ravaged Tokyo, despairing Yuzo and optimistic Masako look for work and lodging, as well as affordable entertainments to pass the time.

Title: The Little Drummer Boy
Movie Plot: An orphan drummer boy who hates humanity finds his life changed forever when he meets three wise men en route to Bethlehem.

Title: Rudolph's Shiny New Year
Movie Plot: Rudolph must find Happy, the baby New Year, before midnight on New Year's Eve.

Title: It's the Great Pumpkin, Charlie Brown
Movie Plot: The Peanuts gang celebrates Halloween while Linus waits for the Great Pumpkin.

Title: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer & the Island of Misfit Toys
Movie Plot: When the Evil Toy Taker takes all of Santa's toys, it's up to Rudolph and his friends Hermey, Yukon Cornelius and the Abominable Snowman "Bumbles" to stop him and bring Christmas to the children of the world.

Title: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer: The Movie
Movie Plot: It's up to Santa's most famous reindeer to save the day when an evil queen conjures up a storm on Christmas.

Title: Frosty's Winter Wonderland
Movie Plot: Frosty's kind of lonely, so the kids think of making him a wife, Crystal. But will Jack Frost let them be happy?

Title: Tau
Movie Plot: A woman is held captive by a scientist in a futuristic smart house, and hopes to escape by reasoning with the Artificial Intelligence that controls the house.

Title: The Osiris Child
Movie Plot: Set in the future in a time of interplanetary colonization, an unlikely pair race against an impending global crisis and are confronted by the monsters that live inside us all.

Title: Metropia
Movie Plot: A complex story of a misaligned man, though good intent, creating a nightmarish Dystopian existence.

Title: The Survivalist
Movie Plot: In a time of starvation, a survivalist lives off a small plot of land hidden deep in forest. When two women seeking food and shelter discover his farm, he finds his existence threatened.

Title: Extinction
Movie Plot: A father has a recurring dream of losing his family. His nightmare turns into reality when the planet is invaded by a force bent on destruction. Fighting for their lives, he comes to realize an unknown strength to keep them safe from harm.

Title: Project Ithaca
Movie Plot: A group of strangers awaken aboard an alien spacecraft. Divided they will die. Together, they can find a way home.

Title: Infinity Chamber
Movie Plot: A man trapped in an automated prison must outsmart a computer in order to escape.

Title: A Christmas Story Christmas
Movie Plot: Follows the now-adult Ralphie as he returns to the house on Cleveland Street to give his kids a magical Christmas like the one he had as a child, reconnecting with childhood friends, and reconciling the passing of his Old Man.

Title: Elf
Movie Plot: Raised as an oversized elf, Buddy travels from the North Pole to New York City to meet his biological father, Walter Hobbs, who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.

Title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
Movie Plot: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

Title: The Polar Express
Movie Plot: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

Title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
Movie Plot: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

Title: An American Tail
Movie Plot: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

Title: All Dogs Go to Heaven
Movie Plot: A canine angel, Charlie, sneaks back to earth from heaven but ends up befriending an orphan girl who can speak to animals. In the process, Charlie learns that friendship is the most heavenly gift of all.

Title: The Land Before Time
Movie Plot: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

Title: An American Tail: The Treasure of Manhattan Island
Movie Plot: The Fievel mouse discovers the secret world of mice lying deep beneath the city.

Title: An American Tail: The Mystery of the Night Monster
Movie Plot: Fievel and other mice haunt the monster, with the result they want to track him down.

Title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
Movie Plot: The magical inhabitants of a rainforest fight to save their home, which is threatened by logging and a polluting force of destruction called Hexxus.

Title: The Rescuers Down Under
Movie Plot: R.A.S. agents Miss Bianca and Bernard race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

Title: Fievel's Adventures in the West
Movie Plot: The continuing adventures of the Russian mouse Fievel.

Title: The Brave Little Toaster
Movie Plot: A group of dated appliances embark on a journey to the city to find their master after being abandoned in a cabin in the woods.

Title: Balto
Movie Plot: An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

Title: The Great Mouse Detective
Movie Plot: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

Title: The Secret of NIMH
Movie Plot: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she suspected.

Title: The Fifth Element
Movie Plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

Title: Demolition Man
Movie Plot: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

Title: Starship Troopers
Movie Plot: Humans, in a fascist militaristic future, wage war with giant alien bugs.

Title: Total Recall
Movie Plot: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.

Title: The Running Man
Movie Plot: In a dystopian America, a falsely convicted policeman gets his shot at freedom when he must forcibly participate in a TV game show where convicts, runners, must battle killers for their freedom.

Title: Last Action Hero
Movie Plot: With the help of a magic ticket, a young movie fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action movie character.

Title: Conan the Barbarian
Movie Plot: A powerful warrior seeks to avenge the genocide of his people and the murder of his parents at the hands of a snake cult.

Title: Terminator 7: Algorithm
Movie Plot: The year is 2029 and the Resistance are at war. There's a secret weapon that only one person knows and he must find help to stop the war for good.

Title: Terminator No Fate
Movie Plot: Set just before the end of the war, John Connor sends an elite Tech-Com team to infiltrate a SAC-NORAD facility. During the mission the team uncover a sinister plan that hinges the fate of humanity.

Title: Terminator II
Movie Plot: In a polluted future Venice researchers work to improve the situation. One day, unknown forces start killing them. A team of soldiers and a couple of civilians is sent to investigate. Soon, they encounter strange murderous creatures.

Title: Skynet
Movie Plot: The last man on earth will finally come face to face with the program that drove mankind to extinction.

Title: Wolf Children
Movie Plot: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident while hunting for food for their children, a young woman must find ways to raise the werewolf son and daughter that she had with him while keeping their trait hidden from society.

Title: Dollhouse
Movie Plot: A top secret organization erases the identities of attractive young people, turning them into blank "dolls" ready for imprints of temporary identities they need to fulfill assignments for clients.

Title: V
Movie Plot: An extraterrestrial race arrives on Earth with seemingly good intentions, only to slowly reveal their true machinations the more ingrained into society they become.

Title: Falling Skies
Movie Plot: Survivors of an alien attack on earth gather together to fight for their lives and fight back.

Title: Terra Nova
Movie Plot: Centers on the Shannons, an ordinary family from 2149 when the planet is dying, who are transported back 85 million years to prehistoric Earth where they join Terra Nova, a colony of humans with a second chance to build a civilization.

Title: The 4400
Movie Plot: As the reappearance of 4,400 missing persons on a single day confounds the global community, federal agents on the case slowly discover the ways in which the victims have been changed.

Title: Revolution
Movie Plot: Fifteen years after a permanent global blackout, a group of revolutionaries seek to drive out a tyrannical militia that's taken over the former United States of America.

Title: Caprica
Movie Plot: Two families, the Graystones and the Adamas, live together on a peaceful planet known as Caprica, where a startling breakthrough in artificial intelligence brings about unforeseen consequences.

Title: Dark Angel
Movie Plot: A group of genetically-enhanced children escape from a lab project. Years later we meet Max, one of the escapees who now works for a messenger service in the post-apocalyptic Pacific Northwest.

Title: A Charlie Brown Thanksgiving
Movie Plot: Peppermint Patty invites herself and her friends over to Charlie Brown's for Thanksgiving, and with Linus, Snoopy, and Woodstock, he attempts to throw together a Thanksgiving dinner.

Title: Mickey's Christmas Carol
Movie Plot: The classic Disney animated characters play the roles in this animated retelling of the Charles Dickens masterpiece.

Title: It's Christmastime Again, Charlie Brown
Movie Plot: The Peanuts gang prepares for the holidays in their own unique ways.

Title: Charlie Brown's All Stars!
Movie Plot: When his team is offered membership in the Little League, Charlie Brown finds he must make a difficult moral decision.

Title: Elemental
Movie Plot: Follows Ember and Wade, in a city where fire-, water-, earth- and air-residents live together.

Title: The Mitchells vs. the Machines
Movie Plot: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse and suddenly become humanity's unlikeliest last hope.

Title: The Sea Beast
Movie Plot: When a young girl stows away on the ship of a legendary sea monster hunter, they launch an epic journey into uncharted waters - and make history to boot.

Title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem
Movie Plot: The Turtle brothers work to earn the love of New York City while facing down an army of mutants.

Title: Raya and the Last Dragon
Movie Plot: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.

Title: Guillermo del Toro's Pinocchio
Movie Plot: A father's wish magically brings a wooden boy to life in Italy, giving him a chance to care for the child.

Title: Orion and the Dark
Movie Plot: A boy with an active imagination faces his fears on an unforgettable journey through the night with his new friend: a giant, smiling creature named Dark.

Title: Leo
Movie Plot: A 74-year-old lizard named Leo and his turtle friend decide to escape from the terrarium of a Florida school classroom where they have been living for decades.

Title: The Grinch
Movie Plot: A grumpy Grinch plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

Title: The Grinch Grinches the Cat in the Hat
Movie Plot: The Grinch leaves home in a foul mood, looking for trouble. He runs into the Cat in the Hat and decides to make the cat's life unbearable.

Title: Frosty Returns
Movie Plot: The continuing exploits of the famous snowman as he goes up against a more powerful force which threatens all of Christmas.

Title: It's Grinch Night
Movie Plot: A strange wind blows into Whoville, making all the inhabitants stay indoors. They know the wind means the Grinch will be in a foul mood and out to do harm. However, young Eukariah decides to confront the Grinch.

Title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas!
Movie Plot: A hermit, known as the Grinch hates Christmas and is tired of the Whos of Who-ville celebrating it. This year, he plans to steal it from them. Features the illustrations from the book accompanied by narration.

Title: Rudolph and Frosty's Christmas in July
Movie Plot: The Winterbolt is trying to make North Pole his evil wonderland, and it is up to Frosty the Snowman, Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer and other icons to stop him.

Title: Legend of Frosty the Snowman
Movie Plot: Frosty the Snowman befriends a young boy in the town of Evergreen.

Title: Scrooge
Movie Plot: A musical retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about an old bitter miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

Title: Scrooge
Movie Plot: Ebenezer Scrooge is a mean old miser who wants nothing to do with Christmas. The Ghosts of Christmas Past, Present and Yet to Come visit Scrooge on Christmas Eve, taking him on a journey into the very spirit and magic of Christmas itself.

Title: A Christmas Carol
Movie Plot: An old bitter miser is given a chance for redemption when spirits visit him on Christmas Eve.

Title: Jack Frost
Movie Plot: The Groundhog tells the story of how, for once, Jack Frost became human, and helped a knight win his lady love.

Title: Muppet Treasure Island
Movie Plot: The Muppets set sail in search of treasure, with Jim Hawkins and Long John Silver.

Title: The Muppets
Movie Plot: A Muppet fanatic with some help from his 2 human compatriots must regroup the Muppet gang to stop an avaricious oil mogul from taking down one of their precious life-longing treasures.

Title: The Muppet Movie
Movie Plot: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

Title: A Miser Brothers' Christmas
Movie Plot: Santa Claus and the mischievous brothers Heat Miser and Snow Miser are the targets of yuletide treachery in the animated delight A Miser Brothers' Christmas.

Title: Holiday Affair
Movie Plot: A young widow is torn between a boring attorney and a romantic ne'er-do-well.

Title: Meet Me in St. Louis
Movie Plot: In the early 1900s, the life story of the Smith family in St. Louis, and their daughter's love for the boy next door.

Title: Little Women
Movie Plot: The four daughters of a New England family fight for happiness during and after the Civil War.

Title: Passengers
Movie Plot: A malfunction in a sleeping pod on a spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet wakes one passenger 90 years early.

Title: I Am Legend
Movie Plot: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

Title: The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause
Movie Plot: Santa, a.k.a. Scott Calvin, is faced with double-duty: how to keep his new family happy and how to stop Jack Frost from taking over Christmas.

Title: The Santa Clauses
Movie Plot: Scott Calvin is about to turn 65. Realizing that he can't be Santa forever, he sets out to find a suitable replacement Santa while preparing his family for a new life adventure south of the North Pole.

Title: Christmas with the Kranks
Movie Plot: With their daughter, Blair, away in Peru, Luther and Nora Krank decide to skip Christmas all together until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate it at the last minute.

Title: Jingle All the Way
Movie Plot: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

Title: Annihilation
Movie Plot: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

Title: District 9
Movie Plot: Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology.

Title: The Christmas Chronicles
Movie Plot: The story of sister and brother, Kate and Teddy Pierce, whose Christmas Eve plan to catch Santa Claus on camera turns into an unexpected journey that most kids could only dream about.

Title: Looper
Movie Plot: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.

Title: Get Out
Movie Plot: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

Title: Men
Movie Plot: A young woman goes on a solo vacation to the English countryside following the death of her ex-husband.

Title: Oblivion
Movie Plot: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

Title: I, Robot
Movie Plot: In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

Title: Taken
Movie Plot: Three families experience alien abductions over a period of five decades.

Title: Dune World
Movie Plot: A deep space crew takes a job on a mysterious remote planet. A crash landing strands them on the hostile surface. Soon they find out what creatures live there, and the hidden fate of the crew before them.

Title: Stargate: Atlantis
Movie Plot: An international team of scientists and military personnel discover a Stargate network in the Pegasus Galaxy and come face-to-face with a new, powerful enemy: The Wraith.

Title: Necktie
Movie Plot: 5 teens try to discover what happens when you die.

Title: Screamers
Movie Plot: A military commander stationed off planet during an interplanetary war travels through the devastated landscape to negotiate a peace treaty, but discovers that the primitive robots they built to kill enemy combatants have gained sentience.

Title: Appleseed Alpha
Movie Plot: A tough, cute woman and a cyborg arrive at a depopulated, post WW3 Times Sq. They leave the ruins of NYC with 2 on a secret mission.

Title: Rollerball
Movie Plot: In a corporate-controlled future, an ultra-violent sport known as Rollerball represents the world, and one of its powerful athletes is out to defy those who want him out of the game.

Title: The Holy Mountain
Movie Plot: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a messianic character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

Title: El Topo
Movie Plot: A mysterious black-clad gunfighter wanders a mystical Western landscape encountering multiple bizarre characters.

Title: The Dance of Reality
