Movie Plot: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Title: Naruto: Shippuden
Movie Plot: Naruto Uzumaki, is a loud, hyperactive, adolescent ninja who constantly searches for approval and recognition, as well as to become Hokage, who is acknowledged as the leader and strongest of all ninja in the village.

Title: Vinland Saga
Movie Plot: Following a tragedy, Thorfinn embarks on a journey with the man responsible for it to take his life in a duel as a true and honorable warrior to pay homage.

Title: Jujutsu Kaisen
Movie Plot: A boy swallows a cursed talisman - the finger of a demon - and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts and thus exorcise himself.

Title: Naruto
Movie Plot: Naruto Uzumaki, a mischievous adolescent ninja, struggles as he searches for recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the village's leader and strongest ninja.

Title: Death Note
Movie Plot: A high school student named Light Turner discovers a mysterious notebook that has the power to kill anyone whose name is written within its pages, and launches a secret crusade to rid the world of criminals.

Title: Death Note
Movie Plot: A battle between the world's two greatest minds begins when Light Yagami finds the Death Note, a notebook with the power to kill, and decides to rid the world of criminals.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu No Yaiba - To the Swordsmith Village
Movie Plot: Tanjiro needs to bring a definitive end to Upper Rank Six. After the dust settles, he goes with his sister Nezuko to the Swordsmith Village in search of a new sword.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Mt. Natagumo Arc
Movie Plot: Tanjiro teams up with Zenitsu and Inosuke to investigate missing person cases on the mountain Natagumo. They slowly begin to realize the entire mountain is being controlled by a family of Demon spider creatures.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Tsuzumi Mansion Arc
Movie Plot: Tanjiro ventures to the south-southeast where he encounters a cowardly young man named Zenitsu Agatsuma. He is a fellow survivor from Final Selection and his sparrow asks Tanjiro to help keep him in line.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Sibling's Bond
Movie Plot: Tanjiro finds his family massacred and the only survivor, his sister Nezuko Kamado, turned into a demon. However, to his surprise, Nezuko still shows signs of human emotions and thoughts.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu No Yaiba - To the Hashira Training
Movie Plot: Tanjiro undergoes rigorous training with the Stone Hashira, Himejima, in his quest to become a Hashira. Meanwhile, Muzan continues to search for Nezuko and Ubuyashiki.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Asakusa Arc
Movie Plot: Tanjiro ventures to Asakusa, Tokyo for his second mission with the Demon Slayer Corps.

Title: Spy x Family
Movie Plot: A spy on an undercover mission gets married and adopts a child as part of his cover. His wife and daughter have secrets of their own, and all three must strive to keep together.

Title: Hood Jujutsu Kaisen
Movie Plot: The Good Will event has begun as students from both jujitsu schools enter the playing area in a hunt to kill the most curses. Will Itadori our bright protagonist and his friends Fushiguro and Nobara be enough to face the challenges ahead?

Title: My Hero Academia
Movie Plot: A superhero-admiring boy enrolls in a prestigious hero academy and learns what it really means to be a hero, after the strongest superhero grants him his own powers.

Title: Horimiya: The Missing Pieces
Movie Plot: It followed the relationship between Hori and Miyamura, two high school kids slowly forming a bond and falling in love - but only so much manga can be adapted and put into a thirteen-episode series. "Horimiya: The Missing Pieces" is here to fix that: It goes back to the beginning of the original series and fills in the pieces of the original manga that were left out in the first adaptation. From silly moments to quiet ones, this is a chance to reconnect with your favorite characters and see what happened between the scenes of the original.

Title: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999
Movie Plot: After her boyfriend breaks up with her for another girl, Akane Kinoshita decides she is going to make him regret his decision. Unexpectedly, however, she meets a socially awkward gamer who might just solve all of her problems.

Title: Tomo-chan Is a Girl!
Movie Plot: Tomo is a tomboy who has been in love with her childhood friend Junichiro, and strives to make him see her as a romantic candidate.

Title: More Than a Married Couple, But Not Lovers.
Movie Plot: High school student Jiro Yakuin gets paired with Akari Watanabe, a gal who finds him repulsive at first, but they agree to attain enough points so that they can switch partners to the people they really like.

Title: Komi Can't Communicate
Movie Plot: An elite and aloof schoolgirl is in fact severely withdrawn and anxious about communicating with others. An ordinary schoolboy befriends her and helps her to open up and talk with people.

Title: My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU
Movie Plot: About an antisocial high school student named Hikigaya Hachiman with a distorted view on life and no friends or girlfriend. His life change when he was forced to enter the "Volunteer Service Club" by his teacher.

Title: Superman Returns
Movie Plot: Superman returns to Earth after spending five years in space examining his homeworld Krypton. But he finds things have changed while he was gone, and he must once again prove himself important to the world.

Title: Bates Motel
Movie Plot: A contemporary prequel to Psycho, giving a portrayal of how Norman Bates' psyche unravels through his teenage years, and how deeply intricate his relationship with his mother, Norma, truly is.

Title: The Naked Target
Movie Plot: A New York executive is handcuffed to a precious briefcase to which only his Spanish contact holds the key and of which many others are in hot pursuit.

Title: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten
Movie Plot: Mahiru is so beautiful that they call her "angel", Amane is an average boy who has never thought much about beauty, but everything changes when he sees Mahiru during a storm, and an incredible and unlikely relationship begins.

Title: Edge of Sanity
Movie Plot: When Henry Jekyll's experiments with cocaine have gotten out of control, he transforms into the hideous Jack Hyde. As Hyde he searches the London streets at night for his prey in whorehouses and opium dens. The police can't catch him, he has nothing to lose but his mind...—Mark J. Popp <mjpopp@cwave.com>

Title: The Ghost Writer
Movie Plot: Blocked novelist Anthony Strack is desperate enough to plot suicide. Before he completes the deed, he is visited by unearthly beings, whose presence helps him to write again.

Title: A Demon in My View
Movie Plot: A strangler known as the Kenbourne Killer has been murdering streetwalkers for 25 years. The police set out to track him down.

Title: In the Deep Woods
Movie Plot: A woman fears that the private detective she's been conversing with may be the killer who murdered her beloved friend and dumped her corpse in the forest.

Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
Movie Plot: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may be able to defeat him for good.

Title: The Green Elephant
Movie Plot: Two Russian prisoners are abused mentally and physically.

Title: Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare
Movie Plot: Dream-haunting Freddy Krueger returns once again to prowl the nightmares of Springwood's last surviving teenager, and of a woman whose personal connection to Krueger may mean his doom.

Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street: The Dream Child
Movie Plot: The pregnant Alice finds Freddy Krueger striking through the sleeping mind of her unborn child, hoping to be reborn into the real world.

Title: Sleepaway Camp II: Unhappy Campers
Movie Plot: Angela, supposedly reformed and living under an assumed surname, is working at a summer camp. However, when the campers start misbehaving, she soon reverts to her old ways.

Title: The 4th Man
Movie Plot: A man who has been having visions of an impending danger begins an affair with a woman who may lead him to his doom.

Title: Friday the 13th: The New Blood
Movie Plot: Jason Voorhees is accidentally freed from his watery prison by a telekinetic teenager. Now, only she can stop him.

Title: Pieces
Movie Plot: The co-eds of a Boston college campus are targeted by a mysterious killer who is creating a human jigsaw puzzle from their body parts.

Title: Sleepaway Camp III: Teenage Wasteland
Movie Plot: After murdering a young girl, Angela Baker assumes her identity and travels to Camp New Horizons, built on the grounds of the camp she terrorized the year before, and starts killing again.

Title: Prom Night
Movie Plot: At a high-school senior prom, a masked killer stalks four teenagers who were responsible for the accidental death of a classmate six years previously.

Title: Leatherface: Texas Chainsaw Massacre III
Movie Plot: A California couple and a survivalist encounter Leatherface and his family.

Title: Bates Motel: After Hours
Movie Plot: The cast of ''Bates Motel'' meets up after the show to discuss the show and talk about what happens behind the scenes.

Title: Chopping Mall
Movie Plot: A group of young shopping mall employees stay behind for a late night party in one of the stores. When the mall goes on lock-down before they can get out, the robot security system malfunctions, and goes on a killing spree.

Title: Blood Rage
Movie Plot: A boy kills a man and accuses his twin brother of the murder, and the innocent brother ends up institutionalized, while his psychotic twin goes free. 10 years later, the innocent twin escapes, which triggers his brother into killing again.

Title: C.H.U.D.
Movie Plot: A bizarre series of sudden disappearances on the streets of New York City seems to point toward something unsavory living in the sewers.

Title: Prom Night IV: Deliver Us from Evil
Movie Plot: Four students ditch their high school prom for a party at a summer home, unaware that a psychotic priest is on the loose, determined to punish sinners.

Title: Horror Express
Movie Plot: While on the Trans-Siberian Express, an anthropologist and his rival must contain the threat posed by the former's cargo: a prehistoric ape which is the host for a parasitic life-form.

Title: Single White Female
Movie Plot: A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.

Title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
Movie Plot: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

Title: Even Cowgirls Get the Blues
Movie Plot: Sissy Hankshaw (Uma Thurman) is born with enormous thumbs that help her hitchhiking through the U.S. from a young age. She becomes a model in advertising, and her New York agent, "the Countess" (Sir John Hurt), sends her to his ranch in California to shoot a commercial, set against the background of mating whooping cranes. There, she befriends Bonanza Jellybean (Rain Phoenix), one of the cowgirls at the beauty ranch. The cowgirls take command of the ranch from the Countess and drug the cranes with peyote. The Police besiege the ranch.—Pieter van Scherpenberg <mediavis@netland.nl>

Title: My Own Private River
Movie Plot: Footage from My Own Private Idaho (1991) is re-contextualized in James Franco's tribute to River Phoenix.

Title: Elephant
Movie Plot: Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent.

Title: Last Days
Movie Plot: A Seattle musician's life and career are reminiscent of those of Kurt Cobain.

Title: Urban Legend
Movie Plot: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

Title: Urban Legends: Final Cut
Movie Plot: A film school is the center of a fresh spate of killings based on urban legends.

Title: Back to 'Somewhere in Time'
Movie Plot: The cast and crew of Somewhere in Time (1980) looks back at the making of the movie in this documentary produced for the special features on the DVD Collector's Edition.

Title: Leprechaun Returns
Movie Plot: The Leprechaun returns once again, when a group of girls unwillingly awaken him after they tear down a cabin so that they can build a new sorority house.

Title: Cult of Chucky
Movie Plot: Chucky returns to terrorize his human victim, Nica. Meanwhile, the killer doll has some scores to settle with his old enemies, with the help of his former wife.

Title: Hello Mary Lou: Prom Night II
Movie Plot: Thirty years after her accidental death at her 1957 senior prom, the tortured spirit of prom queen Mary Lou Maloney returns to seek revenge.

Title: V/H/S/85
Movie Plot: Unveiled through a made-for-TV documentary, five tales of found footage horror emerge to take viewers on a terrifying journey into the grim underbelly of the 1980s.

Title: Ghosts of Goldfield
Movie Plot: A group of five led by Julie set up their filming equipment in the hotel of the derelict town of Goldfield, hoping to capture footage of the ghost of Elisabeth Walker, a maid tortured and killed in room 109. Troubled by visions, Julie discovers that a necklace, handed down to her from her grandmother, is somehow connecting her to this tragedy.—Anonymous

Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy's Revenge
Movie Plot: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by deceased child murderer Freddy Krueger, who is out to possess him in order to continue his reign of terror in the real world.

Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
Movie Plot: A psychiatrist familiar with knife-wielding dream demon Freddy Krueger helps teens at a mental hospital battle the killer who is invading their dreams.

Title: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
Movie Plot: After being announced dead and taken to a morgue, Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives, escapes from the hospital, and stalks a group of friends renting a house in the countryside near Crystal Lake.

Title: Friday the 13th Part 2
Movie Plot: Five years after the events of the first film, a summer camp next to the infamous Camp Crystal Lake is preparing to open, but the legend of Jason is weighing heavy on the proceedings.

Title: Friday the 13th: Part 3
Movie Plot: Jason Voorhees stalks a group of friends who have just arrived to spend the weekend at a cabin near Crystal Lake.

Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
Movie Plot: The spectre of a disfigured man haunts the children of the parents who murdered him, stalking and killing them in their dreams.

Title: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan
Movie Plot: Jason Voorhees is accidentally awakened from his watery grave and ends up stalking a ship full of graduating high-school students headed to Manhattan, New York.

Title: Friday the 13th: A New Beginning
Movie Plot: Still haunted by his past, Tommy Jarvis, who, as a child, killed Jason Voorhees, is sent to a secluded halfway house in the countryside, where the killing of a young man triggers a brutal series of murders in the area.

Title: Jason X
Movie Plot: Jason Voorhees is cryogenically frozen at the beginning of the 21st century, and is discovered in the 25th century and taken to space. He gets thawed, and begins stalking and killing the crew of the spaceship that's transporting him.

Title: Jason Goes to Hell
Movie Plot: Serial killer Jason Voorhees' supernatural origins are revealed.

Title: Bride of Chucky
Movie Plot: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.

Title: Child's Play 2
Movie Plot: While Andy's mother is admitted to a psychiatric hospital, the young boy is placed in foster care, and Chucky, determined to claim Andy's soul, is not far behind.

Title: Friday the 13th
Movie Plot: A group of young adults visit a boarded up campsite named Crystal Lake where they soon encounter the mysterious Jason Voorhees and his deadly intentions.

Title: Child's Play 3
Movie Plot: Chucky returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy who defeated him, and now a teenager living in a military academy.

Title: Child's Play
Movie Plot: A struggling single mother unknowingly gifts her son a doll imbued with a serial killer's consciousness.

Title: Child's Play
Movie Plot: A mother gives her 13-year-old son a toy doll for his birthday, unaware of its more sinister nature.

Title: Chucky
Movie Plot: After a vintage Chucky doll turns up at a suburban yard sale, an idyllic American town is thrown into chaos as a series of horrifying murders begin to expose the town's hypocrisies and secrets.

Title: Chucky: Friends Forever
Movie Plot: A cop tries to get the bottom of his co-workers death.

Title: Living with Chucky
Movie Plot: A film producer who grew up with Chucky the Killer Doll seeks out the other families surrounding The Killer Doll films to share their experiences working on the franchise and what it means.

Title: Black Widow
Movie Plot: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

Title: Captain Marvel
Movie Plot: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

Title: I Am Groot
Movie Plot: A series of shorts featuring the seedling Groot along with several new and unusual characters.

Title: Werewolf by Night
Movie Plot: Follows a lycanthrope superhero who fights evil using the abilities given to him by a curse brought on by his bloodline.

Title: Hawkeye
Movie Plot: Series based on the Marvel Comics superhero Hawkeye, centering on the adventures of Young Avenger, Kate Bishop, who took on the role after the original Avenger, Clint Barton.

Title: Obi-Wan Kenobi: A Jedi's Return
Movie Plot: A new documentary that showcases the making of the epic limited series. Features never-before-seen, behind-the-scenes footage, interviews and visits to the creature shop and props department.

Title: Moon Knight
Movie Plot: Steven Grant discovers he's been granted the powers of an Egyptian moon god. But he soon finds out that these newfound powers can be both a blessing and a curse to his troubled life.

Title: The Ugly American
Movie Plot: An ambitious American scholar becomes the ambassador to Sarkan, a southeast Asian country where civil war is brewing.

Title: The Appaloosa
Movie Plot: Man tries to recover a horse stolen from him by a Mexican bandit.

Title: The Adding Machine
Movie Plot: An accountant whose job is about to be taken over by a computer starts to re-examine his life and his priorities.

Title: Bedtime Story
Movie Plot: Two scam artists preying on women for their money clash in a Mediterranean hot spot. Will the cultured, high-class con artist come out on top, or will the rough small-change scammer rise to win the wager?

Title: The Young Lions
Movie Plot: The lives of three young men, a German and two Americans, during WWII.

Title: Morituri
Movie Plot: A war pacifist is blackmailed to pose as an SS officer and to disable the scuttling explosives on freighter carrying rubber cargo to be captured by the Allies.

Title: Charlie Chaplin Carnival
Movie Plot: Four Chaplin shorts from 1916: Behind the Screen, The Count, The Fireman, and The Vagabond, presented with music and sound effects.

Title: The Pawnshop
Movie Plot: Charlie competes with his fellow shop assistant. He is fired by the pawnbroker and rehired. He nearly destroys everything in the shop and himself. He helps capture a burglar. He destroys a client's clock while examining it in detail.

Title: The Vagabond
Movie Plot: Charlie, the emotional violinist, flees to a gipsy camp, only to find himself playing for an abducted girl. Soon, a unique birthmark will pave the way for an unexpected rescue and a marvellous new life. But, will she forget him so easily?

Title: The Floorwalker
Movie Plot: The Tramp is tricked into impersonating an embezzling floorwalker in a department store.

Title: The Rink
Movie Plot: After causing restaurant chaos at work, a bumbling waiter tears up the local roller rink with his skating.

Title: The Dead Pool
Movie Plot: Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder various San Francisco celebrities, with himself being one of the targets.

Title: Behind the Screen
Movie Plot: Charlie is an overworked labourer at a film studio who helps a young woman find work even while his coworkers strike against his tyrannical boss.

Title: Tightrope
Movie Plot: New Orleans single dad and cop Wes Block goes after a serial rapist-killer, but when he gets too close the hunter suddenly becomes the hunted.

Title: The Tramp
Movie Plot: The Little Fellow finds the girl of his dreams and work on a family farm.

Title: The Adventurer
Movie Plot: The Little Tramp escapes from prison; saves a girl and her mother from drowning; and creates havoc at a swank party.

Title: Deliverance
Movie Plot: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

Title: Maleficent
Movie Plot: A vengeful fairy is driven to curse an infant princess, only to discover that the child could be the one person who can restore peace to their troubled land.

Title: Cinderella
Movie Plot: When her father unexpectedly dies, young Ella finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and her scheming stepsisters. Never one to give up hope, Ella's fortunes begin to change after meeting a dashing stranger.

Title: Alice in Wonderland
Movie Plot: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

Title: The Jungle Book
Movie Plot: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

Title: Ralph Breaks the Internet
Movie Plot: Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph," Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.

Title: The Jungle Book 2
Movie Plot: Mowgli, missing the jungle and his old friends, runs away from the man village unaware of the danger he's in by going back to the wild.

Title: Frozen Fever
Movie Plot: On Anna's birthday, Elsa and Kristoff are determined to give her the best celebration ever, but Elsa's icy powers may put more than just the party at risk.

Title: The Lion Guard
Movie Plot: Kion, the son of Simba, leads his friends known as the Lion Guard to protect the Pride Lands.

Title: Lady and the Tramp
Movie Plot: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

Title: Aladdin and the King of Thieves
Movie Plot: The King of Thieves disrupts Aladdin and Jasmine's long-anticipated wedding, looking for an oracle that will lead him to an even bigger treasure. His true identity causes trouble for Aladdin.

Title: Brother Bear
Movie Plot: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

Title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
Movie Plot: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

Title: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
Movie Plot: When Jacob (Asa Butterfield) discovers clues to a mystery that stretches across time, he finds Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children. But the danger deepens after he gets to know the residents and learns about their special powers.

Title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
Movie Plot: Alice is appointed to save her beloved Mad Hatter from deadly grief by travelling back to the past, but this means fatally harming Time himself, the noble clockwork man with the device needed to save the Hatter's family from the Red Queen.

Title: Lilo & Stitch 2: Stitch Has a Glitch
Movie Plot: A malfunction threatens to destroy Stitch and his friendship with Lilo!

Title: Timon & Pumbaa
Movie Plot: The further misadventures of the lovable warthog Pumbaa and his meerkat buddy Timon from The Lion King (1994).

Title: Bambi
Movie Plot: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.

Title: A Genius, Two Partners and a Dupe
Movie Plot: Three rogues set out to rob $300,000 from an Indian-hating cavalry major.

Title: They Call Me Trinity
Movie Plot: A lazy, unorthodox gunfighter and his portly, horse-thieving brother defend a Mormon settlement from a land-grabbing Major, a Mexican bandit, and their henchmen.

Title: Trinity Is Still My Name
Movie Plot: Bambino tries to teach his brother Trinity how to become an outlaw, but the two wind up saving a pioneer family and breaking up an arms ring instead.

Title: Watch Out, We're Mad
Movie Plot: After a tied first place in a local stunt race, two drivers start a contest to decide which of them will own the prize, a dune buggy. But when a mobster destroys the car, they are determined to get it back.

Title: I'm for the Hippopotamus
Movie Plot: In Africa, 2 expat "brothers" are usually at each other's throats but now have a common enemy. Ormond's men are shooting or catching much of the wildlife for export as well as forcing the locals off their land. Lots of fun fights follow.

Title: All the Way Boys
Movie Plot: A bush-flying duo crash-land in the heart of the Peruvian jungle where an unscrupulous speculator controls a precious emerald source and an entire mining community. Can they right the wrongs, and in the process, manage to make a profit?

Title: Who Finds a Friend Finds a Treasure
Movie Plot: On a small pacific island, Alan and Charlie try to find a war treasure left behind by the Japanese army in World War II.

Title: Odds and Evens
Movie Plot: A Navy detective enlists his brother, a former gambler, to help him liquidate an illegal gaming house on a yacht near Miami.

Title: Crime Busters
Movie Plot: An attempted robbery turns to be an unexpected recruitment when two unemployed men mistakenly break into a police office instead of a store.

Title: Double Trouble
Movie Plot: A jazz musician and a stunt man are the spitting image of two millionaire brothers. They take the job to replace them in Rio de Janeiro when someone plans to assassinate them.

Title: Go for It
Movie Plot: Two men meet in a strange situation and end up being mistaken first for robbers, then for Secret Service agents.

Title: Django Strikes Again
Movie Plot: A monk returns to his former life as a gunfighter when his estranged daughter is kidnapped by a Hungarian slaver.

Title: Keoma
Movie Plot: A half-breed ex-Union gunfighter attempts to protect his plague-ridden hometown from being overridden by his racist half-brothers and a Confederate tyrant.

Title: Compañeros
Movie Plot: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.

Title: Django
Movie Plot: Follows Django, a gunslinger in the Wild West who is searching for his daughter who he believes escaped the murder of his family eight years ago.

Title: Day of Anger
Movie Plot: A scruffy garbage boy becomes the pupil of a famed gunfighter, and the stage for confrontation is set when the gunman overruns the boy's town through violence and corruption.

Title: Sodom and Gomorrah
Movie Plot: Sex, torture, and betrayal in Biblical Sodom and Gomorrah. Lot, leader of the Hebrews, believes that his people can co-exist with the Sodomites--a disastrous decision.

Title: Navajo Joe
Movie Plot: A Native American warrior seeks revenge on the gang of sadistic scalphunters-turned-bank robbers who massacred his tribe.

Title: Duel of the Titans
Movie Plot: Twin brothers revolt against tyranny in pre-Roman Italy and then come to a parting of the ways as they lead their people toward the founding of a new city.

Title: Any Number Can Play
Movie Plot: Gambling-house owner finds himself estranged from his wife and son.

Title: The Specialists
Movie Plot: A chain mail-clad gunfighter contends with a sheriff, a banker, a bandit, businessmen and hippies while searching for the money allegedly stolen by his lynched brother.

Title: Atlantis: The Lost Continent
Movie Plot: Welcome to Atlantis, where royal guardsmen wear uniforms that could easily be from the wardrobe of Ming the Merciless and some unfortunate slaves are turned into bovine-headed beasts.

Title: Freddy vs. Jason
Movie Plot: Freddy Krueger and Jason Voorhees return to terrorize the teenagers of Elm Street. Only this time, they're out to get each other, too.

Title: The Giant of Marathon
Movie Plot: A Greek soldier leads the fight against an invading Persian army.

Title: Hercules, Samson & Ulysses
Movie Plot: Two strongmen set out to hunt down a murderous sea monster. Their ship is wrecked and they end up in the Holy Land where Hercules is assumed to be Samson who is a wanted man. The two team up to survive.

Title: Atlas
Movie Plot: Evil king Praximedes convinces superhero Atlas to fight for him, but Atlas eventually sees the king's true nature and turns against him.

Title: Face to Face
Movie Plot: A history professor has a chance meeting with an infamous outlaw and eventually assumes leadership of his gang.

Title: Run, Man, Run
Movie Plot: A knife-wielding Mexican ne'er-do-well is tasked by a scholar with locating $3 million in revolutionary gold, and finds himself working and competing with various parties for it.

Title: The Grand Duel
Movie Plot: A grizzled ex-sheriff helps a man framed for murder to confront the powerful trio of brothers who want him dead.

Title: A Bullet for the General
Movie Plot: A band of Mexican gunrunners employed by a revolutionary General accept an American mercenary into their gang, unaware of his true intentions.

Title: Sabata
Movie Plot: A master gunfighter sides with a banjo-playing drifter and a Mexican tramp to foil the dignitaries of Daugherty, who want to use stolen army money to buy land that the railroad will cross.

Title: Mute Samurai
Movie Plot: A master swordsman, Kiichi Hogan, wanders Japan in search of the Spanish swordsman who murdered his parents and slashed his throat 18 years before. Renouncing any normal life the samurai has become the feared bounty hunter, "Devil" Hogan, the Mute Samurai.—Chung Mo

Title: I giorni del commissario Ambrosio
Movie Plot: A few days before Inspector Ambrosio's holiday, a bank robbery takes place opposite his house.

Title: Return of Sabata
Movie Plot: The citizens of Hobsonville hire Sabata to rid them of the McIntock clan, who are forcibly and unlawfully taxing them under the pretext of town development.

Title: Alien 3: Enhancement Pods
Movie Plot: These offer 29 segments. We find notes from Renny Harlin, Martin Asbury, Pat McClung, David Giler, Bob Ringwood, Ezra Swerdlow, Danny Webb, Paul McGann, Paul Lasaine, Michael Biehn, Charles S. Dutton, Peter Robb-King, Gregory M. Gerlich, Lance Henriksen, Richard Edlund, Sigourney Weaver, David Jones, Greg Cannom, Gary S. Gerlich, Vincent Ward, Elliot Goldenthal, Alien Resurrection cinematographer Darius Khondji and Alien Resurrection actor Ron Perlman. It examine Harlin's departure from the film, the initial concept of the wooden planet, shaved heads and bald caps, storyboards, Biehn's dissatisfaction with his character's demise, costumes, working with Fincher, Henriksen's return, some effects, audio work, and reactions to the film. We also find some footage from the set.

Title: Aliens: Deleted and Extended Scenes
Movie Plot: Deleted scenes from the 1986 film 'Aliens'.

Title: The Making of 'Alien 3'
Movie Plot: This made-for-TV documentary details the work that went into the production of Alien 3, David Fincher's 1992 continuation of the classic series about the battle between starship crewman Ripley and the killer alien species that just won't die. Science fiction fans are treated to a behind-the-scenes look at the making of this third installment of the Alien series, as well as to interviews with the director, cast members and special effects artists, who give their insights into the efforts that were needed to bring this project to completion.—Jean-Marc Rocher <rocher@fiberbit.net>

Title: Alien: Covenant - Phobos
Movie Plot: Computer program tests the feelings and reactions of the Covenant crew.

Title: The Peter Weyland Files: Happy Birthday, David
Movie Plot: An introduction to the 8th generation android, David, who explains what he thinks about and what makes him sad.

Title: The Peter Weyland Files: TED Conference, 2023
Movie Plot: A young Peter Weyland gives a darkly inspirational TED Talk.

Title: The Peter Weyland Files: Quiet Eye, Elizabeth Shaw
Movie Plot: A video call Shaw made to Weyland to introduce herself and explain her findings.

Title: The Peter Weyland Files: 'Prometheus' Transmission
Movie Plot: A collection of pre-mission interviews with the crew of the Prometheus spacecraft.

Title: AVP Redemption
Movie Plot: AvP Redemption is a live-action/CGI fan film from Alex Popov.

Title: Alien: Specimen
Movie Plot: During the night shift in a colony greenhouse, a botanist does her best to contain suspicious soil samples that have alarmed her sensitive lab dog.

Title: Alien: Harvest
Movie Plot: The surviving crew of a damaged space harvester has a motion sensor as their only navigation tool leading them to safety, while a creature in the shadows terrorizes them. However, the greatest threat might have been hiding in plain sight.

Title: Alien: Ore
Movie Plot: When her shift uncovers the death of a fellow miner under mysterious circumstances, a hard-working miner of a planet mining colony is forced to choose between escape or defying management orders and fight for the safety of her family.

Title: Predator World
Movie Plot: Offering only the finest amenities, the 'TITAN 1C' space-cruiser is considered the most luxurious star-liner ever built. However, a sudden meteor storm smashes into the hull, and a deadly biological alien life-form is let loose on the ship.

Title: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
Movie Plot: Following the events of 'Avengers: Endgame,' Sam Wilson/Falcon and Bucky Barnes/Winter Soldier team up in a global adventure that tests their abilities -- and their patience.

Title: Balthazar
Movie Plot: The story of a mistreated donkey and the people around him. A study on saintliness and a sister piece to Bresson's Mouchette.

Title: Predator Dark Ages
Movie Plot: Follows a group of war-torn Templar knights who are put to the test against a strange beast that stalks the lands of England. This battle is what Myths and Legends are made of. An independent fan film.

Title: Office Space
Movie Plot: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

Title: The Eighth Day
Movie Plot: An unusual and wonderful friendship develops between a busy but unhappy salesman and a resident of a mental asylum.

Title: The Brigade
Movie Plot: Bénédicte Meursault, a female firefighter, has just been transferred to a small fire brigade in the South of France. She is welcomed by Philippe, 45, the wise captain of the brigade. Soon after being introduced to the men, the young woman jumps into action. Unfortunately, while rescuing the victims of a terrible car crash, she does not find one of the injured who was ejected thirty meters away. Now the man is in hospital in a coma and he may die because of her. Completely upset, Bénédicte decides to resign but Philippe dissuades her from doing it.—Guy Bellinger

Title: The Brand New Testament
Movie Plot: Did you know that God is alive and lives in Brussels with his daughter?

Title: Daens
Movie Plot: In the 1890s, Father Adolf Daens goes to Aalst, a textile town where child labor is rife, pay and working conditions are horrible, the poor have no vote, and the Catholic church backs the petite bourgeoisie in oppressing workers. He writes a few columns for the Catholic paper, and soon workers are listening and the powerful are in an uproar. He's expelled from the Catholic party, so he starts the Christian Democrats and is elected to Parliament. After Rome disciplines him, he must choose between two callings, as priest and as champion of workers. In subplots, a courageous young woman falls in love with a socialist and survives a shop foreman's rape; children die; prelates play billiards.—<jhailey@hotmail.com>

Title: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
Movie Plot: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.

Title: La Dolce Vita
Movie Plot: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering tabloid journalist living in Rome.

Title: The Round-Up
Movie Plot: In Hungary, the national movement led by Kossuth has been crushed and the Austrian hegemony re-established, but partisans carry on with violent actions. In order to root out the guerilla, the army rounds up suspects and jails them in an isolated fort. The authorities do not have the identity of the guerilla leaders, who are supposed to be present among the prisoners. However, they know enough about some of the suspects to apply perfidious forms of coercion effectively.—Eduardo Casais <eduardo.casais@research.nokia.com>

Title: Red Psalm
Movie Plot: Set in the 1890s on the Hungarian plains, a group of farm workers go on strike in-which they face harsh reprisals and the reality of revolt, oppression, morality and violence.

Title: The Confrontation
Movie Plot: It is 1947; the Communist Party has just taken power in Hungary. In Jancsó's first color film, young students at a People's College have a debate with seminary students, but worry it will escalate into a fight.

Title: Silence and Cry
Movie Plot: Miklós Jancsó's Silence and Cry is set during a turbulent era of disquiet, fear, persecution and terror, which permeates every corner of post-WWI Hungarian society. In 1919, after just a few months of communist rule the Hungarian Republic of Councils falls victim to a nationalist counter-revolution. Admiral Horthy, leader of the nationalist far right movement, becomes the self-proclaimed regent of Hungary, and assumes power as the legal Head of State. Soldiers of the short-lived Hungarian Red Army are now on the run from relentless secret policemen and patrol units of the nationalist Royal Gendarme. If caught, ex-Red Army soldiers are executed without mercy or proper trial. István Cserzi, a former soldier of the Red Army has fled to the Great Hungarian Plains and has taken refuge on a farm, which is run by two sympathetic women. Due to the generosity of these women and a former childhood pal, who is now a commandant of the local Royal Gendarme outfit, István is safely hidden from the ever-prying eyes of the secret policemen, who relentlessly roam the countryside searching for ex-Red Army men and their sympathisers. However, upon discovering that the women are secretly poisoning the mother-in-law and the husband, the legal owners of the farm, István must make the most difficult decision of his life. As a personal war is waging within his own consciousness over morality and self-preservation, István must decide whether to remain silent about the women's devious secret and preserve his own life, or to report their heinous crime to the Royal Gendarme, which would also mean certain death for him.—21st Century DreamQuest Films Ltd

Title: My Way Home
Movie Plot: In the final days of WWII, a seventeen-year-old boy wanders the countryside. He is captured by Soviet troops, then released, then captured once more - after he has donned a German uniform for warmth - and imprisoned at a remote barracks, where he strikes up an unlikely friendship with a young Russian soldier. His attempts to return home form the crux of this wonderfully lyrical film, which displays all of the director's consistent themes: the psychological presence of landscape, the randomness of violence, the arbitrary nature of power.—© 2003 EIFF

Title: Bullitt
Movie Plot: A nonconformist San Francisco cop is determined to find the underworld kingpin who killed the witness under his protection.

Title: Branded to Kill
Movie Plot: After a botched assignment, a rice-fetishizing hitman finds himself in conflict with his organization, and one mysterious, dangerous fellow-hitman in particular.

Title: Electra, My Love
Movie Plot: It has been fifteen years since the death of her father, Agamemnon, and Elektra still burns with hatred for Aegisztosz, who conspired with Elektra's mother to kill him.

Title: Minnie and Moskowitz
Movie Plot: A museum curator falls in love with a crazy parking attendant.

Title: Better Than Fine
Movie Plot: When Oliver Pendley strays from the path of his highest good, the Universe quite literally steps in.

Title: Faces
Movie Plot: A middle-aged man leaves his wife for another woman. Shortly after, his ex-wife also begins a relationship with a younger partner. The film follows their struggles to find love amongst each other.

Title: Opening Night
Movie Plot: A renowned actress teeters on the edge of a breakdown as she counts down the days toward a big Broadway opening.

Title: Love Streams
Movie Plot: Two closely bound, emotionally wounded souls reunite after years apart.

Title: The Killing of a Chinese Bookie
Movie Plot: A proud strip club owner is forced to come to terms with himself as a man when his gambling addiction gets him in hot water with the mob, who offer him only one alternative.

Title: Shadows
Movie Plot: Cassavetes' jazz-scored improvisational film explores interracial friendships and relationships in Beat-Era (1950s) New York City.

Title: Gloria
Movie Plot: When a young boy's family is killed by the mob, their tough neighbor Gloria becomes his reluctant guardian. In possession of a book that the gangsters want, the pair go on the run in New York.

Title: A Woman Under the Influence
Movie Plot: Although wife and mother Mabel is loved by her husband Nick, her mental illness places a strain on the marriage.

Title: A Child Is Waiting
Movie Plot: Jean Hansen joins the staff at a state training institution for developmentally challenged children. When she disagrees with teaching methods used for a 12-year-old autistic boy, the principal does not believe her approach is the answer.

Title: Too Late Blues
Movie Plot: Ghost is an ideological musician who would rather play his blues in the park to the birds than compromise himself. However, when he meets and falls in love with beautiful singer Jess Polanski, she comes between him and his band members, and he leaves his dreams behind in search of fame.—David Gibson <djg6@ukc.ac.uk>

Title: The Devil's Eye
Movie Plot: Don Juan is sent from Hell to Earth with a mission - to seduce a virgin in order to spoil her pure wedding. The mission becomes crazy when Don Juan falls in love for the first time in centuries.

Title: Pocahontas
Movie Plot: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth century Virginia.

Title: Summer Interlude
Movie Plot: A lonely woman recalls her first love thirteen years prior during a brief summer vacation.

Title: Brink of Life
Movie Plot: Three women in a maternity ward reveal their lives and intimate thoughts to each other, where they face the choice of keeping their babies or offering them for adoption.

Title: Drowning by Numbers
Movie Plot: Three generations of women share the same problem--marriage woes--and want to put an end to it.

Title: The Draughtsman's Contract
Movie Plot: A young artist is commissioned by the wife of a wealthy landowner to make a series of drawings of the estate while her husband is away.

Title: The Belly of an Architect
Movie Plot: An architect supervising an exhibition starts to have mysterious stomach pains while his life slowly falls apart.

Title: The Pillow Book
Movie Plot: A woman with a body-writing fetish seeks to find a combined lover and calligrapher.

Title: A Zed & Two Noughts
Movie Plot: Twin zoologists lose their wives in a car accident and become obsessed with decomposing animals.

Title: Nightwatching
Movie Plot: An extravagant, exotic and moving look at Rembrandt's romantic and professional life, and the controversy he created by the identification of a murderer in the painting 'The Night Watch'.

Title: Prospero's Books
Movie Plot: The magician Prospero attempts to stop his daughter's affair with an enemy.

Title: The Baby of Mâcon
Movie Plot: Plagued with infertility, the inhabitants of Mâcon are naturally involved in the spectacle that is a masque about the miracle child born to a virgin mother.

Title: 8 ½ Women
Movie Plot: Following the death of a mother, a father and son open up their very own harem in their Genevan estate after watching 8½ (1963).

Title: Eisenstein in Guanajuato
Movie Plot: The venerated filmmaker Eisenstein is comparable in talent, insight and wisdom, with the likes of Shakespeare or Beethoven; there are few - if any - directors who can be elevated to such heights. On the back of his revolutionary film Battleship Potemkin, he was celebrated around the world, and invited to the US. Ultimately rejected by Hollywood and maliciously maligned by conservative Americans, Eisenstein traveled to Mexico in 1931 to consider a film privately funded by American pro-Communist sympathizers, headed by the American writer Upton Sinclair. Eisenstein's sensual Mexican experience appears to have been pivotal in his life and film career - a significant hinge between the early successes of Strike, Battleship Potemkin, and October, which made him a world-renowned figure, and his hesitant later career with Alexander Nevsky, Ivan the Terrible and The Boyar's Plot.—Peter Greenaway

Title: The Exterminating Angel
Movie Plot: The guests at an upper-class dinner party find themselves unable to leave.

Title: That Obscure Object of Desire
Movie Plot: Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen-year-old former chambermaid Conchita.

Title: Viridiana
Movie Plot: Viridiana, a young nun about to take her final vows, pays a visit to her widowed uncle at the request of her Mother Superior.

Title: The Phantom of Liberty
Movie Plot: A series of surreal sequences that critique morality and society in a stream of consciousness style.

Title: The Ship Sails On
Movie Plot: In 1914, a luxury ship leaves Italy in order to scatter the ashes of a famous opera singer. A lovable bumbling journalist chronicles the voyage and meets the singer's many eccentric friends and admirers.

Title: Diary of a Chambermaid
Movie Plot: A sophisticated and self-assured woman from Paris joins a middle-class rural estate as a maid and causes quite a stir among the variously uptight, perverse and violent inhabitants.

Title: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg
Movie Plot: A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

Title: A Touch of Fate
Movie Plot: One night in a small town in North Carolina, fate brings together three lives: an entertainment lawyer returning home to his dying mother after years in escape of his past, a woman trying to reclaim her supposed love, and a boy with a penchant for the sixth sense who struggles with the death of his father and overbearing love of his single mother. When the past and future suddenly bind these people together on a journey of need, forgiveness, and discovery, they realize they've gained something when they least expected it: love.—Courtney Williams

Title: Fever
Movie Plot: A struggling artist (Parker) is implicated in a string of macabre murders.

Title: Dead in the Water
Movie Plot: Charlie married into money. He's now a successful lawyer with a sexy young secretary/mistress and he wants out. A prenuptial rules out divorce. Is there such a thing as a perfect murder?

Title: The Cool Surface
Movie Plot: During a heatwave in a secluded L.A. suburb, an unhinged writer falls for his new neighbor, a gorgeous struggling actress. They form an intense erotic bond, but his psychosis and her ambition turn their relationship dangerously toxic.

Title: Jane Doe
Movie Plot: Jane Doe is the real name of arms manufacturer Cy-Kor's recently fired security password employee with top clearance, whose teenage son Michael is kidnapped. She obeys the bizarre instructions, including getting and learning to use a gun and downloading a secret file (after which her work post starts totally deleting), dumping both in a dumpster and waiting nearby, only to witness the company's CEO Churnings being shot by a sniper using an identical weapon. Michael is released, but the pair is now wanted for the murder and both are abducted by armed men, who bring them to a ranch. There they are welcomed by Michael's father, David Doe, who discloses to be an agent of the Defence Intelligence Agency (DIA), and so is Michael, who used her clearance as the whole thing is a sting for the kidnapping and murder's brain, Avery, so he will sell the enemy false data. Alas David's DIA-partner Kurt Simmons and their boss Phelps have a dirty agenda...—KGF Vissers

Title: Straight Talk
Movie Plot: A woman ditches her small-town life for big-city Chicago, where she becomes a sensation as a radio-show host.

Title: Brain Smasher... A Love Story
Movie Plot: Sam, a model, helps her botanist sister smuggle a red lotus to Oregon. A bunch of Chinese "ninja" monks want the lotus and try to get Sam so as to force an exchange. A bouncer helps Sam.

Title: Momentum
Movie Plot: Momentum explores the depths of the ocean and the boundaries of human potential. You will visit places where only submarines, whales and the elite few dare to go.

Title: Momentum
Movie Plot: It's summer break, Emma and her father are rehashing a painful previous year but it's time to move on, Tom's return to the small town won't help make matters easier. Emma is only sixteen and has her whole life ahead of her.

Title: Dead Girl
Movie Plot: Ari Rose, an unsuccessful actor, falls for a beautiful woman named Helen-Catherine but strangles her when she rejects him. Ari then takes the dead woman home, has sex with her corpse, and comes to believe that she is still alive.

Title: Since You've Been Gone
Movie Plot: The story of a 10th anniversary High School reunion, told through the eyes of a doctor who was humiliated on graduation day by being badly beaten up by a fellow graduate.

Title: Griekwastad
Movie Plot: In 2012, Deon Steenkamp was murdered along with his wife Christelle and their teenage daughter Marthella on their farm Naauwhoek. GRIEKWASTAD, based on the bestselling true-crime novel by Jacques Steenkamp, tells the tale of the search to find the truth about these murders, however difficult and upsetting it might be.

Title: The Perfect Wave
Movie Plot: When a surfer is pronounced dead after an accident, he's faced with a choice: remain in the eternal afterlife or return and share his experience with the world.

Title: Vaselinetjie
Movie Plot: Vaselinetjie, a white girl, is raised by her loving brown grandparents in a remote rural village. When the welfare finds out that she is not their biological grandchild, they send her to an orphanage in the faraway city of Johannesburg.

Title: Kite
Movie Plot: After her cop father is killed, a young woman tracks the murderer down with the help of his ex-partner.

Title: Love by Chance
Movie Plot: Claire's mother is Claire's secret matchmaker.

Title: Keeping Up with the Kandasamys
Movie Plot: Matriarchal rivals of neighboring families, whose young adult children become romantically involved - try despite their best efforts - to keep them apart with hilarious results.

Title: The Assassin Next Door
Movie Plot: A woman forced to work for the Russian Mafia as an assassin agrees to help her next-door neighbor kill her abusive husband.

Title: Stroomop
Movie Plot: A support group travels to the Orange River. A doctor, 2 moms, a daughter and a suicidal woman leave for their "veldskool" trip. Many trials, tribulations and truths are revealed as they go on this epic adventure.

Title: Christ Stopped at Eboli
Movie Plot: A doctor in Fascist Italy is exiled to a remote village for his political views.

Title: Salvatore Giuliano
Movie Plot: The unclear and complicated twists between governal powers, independentist party and Mafia in the Sicily of the '40s culminate with the death of Salvatore Giuliano.

Title: Many Wars Ago
Movie Plot: On the Italian/Austrian front during World War I, a disastrous Italian attack upon the Austrian positions leads to a mutiny among the Italian troops.

Title: Illustrious Corpses
Movie Plot: An investigation of the judges' assassinations reveals a political background.

Title: Fists in the Pocket
Movie Plot: A young man takes drastic measures to rid his dysfunctional family of its various afflictions.

Title: Meantime
Movie Plot: When one brother gets a job from their wealthy aunt, the other becomes increasingly jealous.

Title: The Moment of Truth
Movie Plot: Game show contestants are given a polygraph test and asked hard-hitting questions in front of a live audience in order to win a cash prize.

Title: Dillinger Is Dead
Movie Plot: A man decides to cook for himself, but finds the revolver of John Dillinger hidden in his kitchen instead.

Title: The Organizer
Movie Plot: A former high school teacher turned unionist tries to organize workers laboring with inhuman conditions at a late 19th Century textile factory.

Title: The Challenge
Movie Plot: Vito Polara is a young ambitious man from the slums of Naples, who wants to get as much power and money as possible. He decides to quit smuggling cigarettes and tries to take over the local fruit and vegetable distribution, which is considered more profitable. After challenging the rural crime boss of the local Camorra, Vito becomes part of his gang and soon his life changes. He moves to a new luxurious seaside apartment and plans to start a family with the beautiful Assunta. At their wedding party, however, and later on, he's about to see who the real boss is.—1felco

Title: Oedipus Rex
Movie Plot: Rescued from abandonment and raised by the King and Queen, Oedipus is still haunted by a prophecy--he'll murder his father and marry his mother.

Title: Hands Over the City
Movie Plot: Prior to a city council election, the collapse of a building leaves a land developer and his political backers defending themselves against a scandal.

Title: Ayan
Movie Plot: A young man's smuggling lifestyle takes a serious turn, when a fierce rival tries to eliminate him from the business.

Title: 7aum Arivu
Movie Plot: A genetic engineering student tries to revive the skills of a past legend and use them to save India from a deadly virus attack orchestrated by China.

Title: Singam
Movie Plot: Honest police officer Durai Singam locks horns with big-time extortionist Mayil Vaaganam.

Title: Kaakha Kaakha
Movie Plot: After a police team kills his brother, a drug-dealing gangster vows to kill the entire team and their respective families.

Title: Maattrraan
Movie Plot: Conjoined twins Vimalan and Akhilan involve themselves in a series of deaths involving their father's company. However, the truths that they initially uncover lead to a bigger conspiracy, one that spans across the globe.

Title: Sillunu Oru Kaadhal
Movie Plot: A happily married man faces an emotional conflict, when his past lover comes back into his life.

Title: Vaaranam Aayiram
Movie Plot: A father and son help each other through growing up, romance, tragedy, and adventure.

Title: Singam 2
Movie Plot: Tough cop Durai Singam performs an undercover operation and identifies some nefarious activities in the seas around the coastal town.
A scientist invents a time machine, which leads to a bitter battle between his evil twin brother and his son.

Title: Pithamagan
Movie Plot: Chittan, a social outcast, has grown up in a cemetery. A drug dealer finds him a job in a cannabis farm. In prison, he meets a conman, Shakti. This friendship transforms him from his stony existence.

Title: Summer Heat
Movie Plot: Roxy, a Depression-era farmer, feels alone and neglected by her husband, who works too much, and is drawn into an ill-advised affair with Jack, her day laborer.

Title: After Dark, My Sweet
Movie Plot: After he escapes from a mental hospital, a former boxer works for a widow. When she asks him to get involved in a kidnapping, he has second thoughts.

Title: Aadhavan
Movie Plot: Aadhavan, a sharpshooter, is hired by Dr Reddy to kill magistrate Subramaniam, who is set to uncover a list of culprits involved in an organ racket.

Title: Jade
Movie Plot: A bright assistant D.A. investigates a gruesome hatchet murder and hides a clue he found at the crime scene. Under professional threats and an attempt on his life, he goes on heartbroken because evidence point to the woman he still loves.

Title: A Step Toward Tomorrow
Movie Plot: A divorcee moves her family cross-country to take her paralyzed son to a pioneer neurosurgeon.

Title: Black Fox: Good Men and Bad
Movie Plot: A man seeks revenge on the bigot who shot his wife to death in 1860s Texas.

Title: 8 Uhr 28
Movie Plot: A married woman runs a successful gallery and falls for a man she met accidentally.

Title: Maamla Legal Hai
Movie Plot: Chaos collides with the letter of the law at District Court Patparganj, where quirky employees work to uphold justice but not without a few objections.

Title: Så jävla easy going
Movie Plot: While desperately trying to find ways to get her ADHD medication, 18-year-old Joanna is trying to figure out her newfound feelings towards her classmate Audrey, but also towards herself.

Title: Angus
Movie Plot: A miserable fat teenager secretly has a crush on the class beauty, ends up becoming the surprising participant to dance with her at a high school dance, meaning he's got to get his act together with the help of his best friend.

Title: Captain Miller
Movie Plot: A man leaves and turns against the British-led Indian military after witnessing atrocity.

Title: Joram
Movie Plot: A father is on the run with his little baby girl to escape the ghosts of his past and the forces that want him dead.

Title: Lantrani
Movie Plot: The different segments of small towns and rural worlds where people take absurd measures to survive.

Title: Poacher
Movie Plot: A group of Indian Forest Service officers, NGO workers, police constables and Good Samaritans risk their lives trying to track down the biggest elephant ivory poachers in the history of India and bring them to justice.

Title: Killer Soup
Movie Plot: Swathi dreams of owning a restaurant. But when murder derails her plan, she and her lover take an outrageous step - to replace him with her husband.

Title: The Kashmir Files
Movie Plot: A heart-wrenching tale that captures the pain, suffering, and struggle of the Kashmiri Pandit community in 1990 and leads Krishna, a young college student, to set out on a quest to uncover the truth.

Title: The Kerala Story Bangla
Movie Plot: It is crucial to recognize the significance of studying our scriptures and staying connected to our Sanatan (ancient) culture and roots.

Title: The Vaccine War
Movie Plot: Based on India's battle against Covid-19, and the efforts the medical department took to overcome the global crisis.

Title: 72 Hoorain
Movie Plot: These Fidayeens, bound by an unyielding faith, embark on a harrowing journey leading them to the celestial realms. Their ultimate goal is to meet the legendary 72 Virgins, known as the Hoorain.

Title: Don 2
Movie Plot: Don turns himself in and escapes with Vardhaan from prison, following which he recruits a team to steal currency printing plates from a bank in Berlin.

Title: Raees
Movie Plot: A bootlegger sets out to improve his community as a promising leader but falls in a political trap.

Title: Om Shanti Om
Movie Plot: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.

Title: My Name Is Khan
Movie Plot: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President of the United States seriously and embarks on a cross-country journey.

Title: Swades
Movie Plot: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

Title: Anweshippin Kandethum
Movie Plot: Revolves around two major crimes that shook kerala and the subsequent inquiry into the cases by sop.

Title: Main Atal Hoon
Movie Plot: Follows the extraordinary life and political journey of Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee, an iconic figure in Indian politics and delves into the multifaceted persona of Vajpayee Ji, capturing his essence as a poet, a gentleman, and a statesman.

Title: Shaitaan
Movie Plot: A timeless tale of battle between good and evil with a family embodying the forces of righteousness while a man symbolizes malevolence.

Title: Guntur Kaaram
Movie Plot: Years after his mother abandons him and remarries, a man demands answers when he's asked to sign a document denying he is her son as she runs for office.

Title: Dam999
Movie Plot: After many years two mariners return to homeland with the hope of a new beginning, little did they know about a disaster that would change their destiny.

Title: Bramayugam
Movie Plot: Thevan, a folk singer of the Paanan caste, has a fateful encounter when escaping slavery, leading to discover an ancient tradition altering his destiny.

Title: Showtime
Movie Plot: Features the power struggles and off-camera fights occurring in the backstage areas of Bollywood.

Title: Three of Us
Movie Plot: A delicate thread of emotions about love, loss, healing, awareness and liberation.

Title: Sajini Shinde Ka Viral Video
Movie Plot: When a school teacher goes missing after a risqué video of her is posted on the internet, a police officer is tasked with uncovering the truth behind her disappearance.

Title: Mast Mein Rehne Ka
Movie Plot: A man chooses an old widower's home for his first robbery, kicking off a set of events that have them both look at life in a new way and with new companions in the starkness of the city of Mumbai.

Title: Jaane Jaan
Movie Plot: A single mother and her daughter commit a crime and a neighbor helps them cover it up amid the police investigation.

Title: Kaala Paani
Movie Plot: When a mysterious illness descends upon the Andaman and Nicobar Islands, a desperate fight for survival collides with a race to find a cure.

Title: Chor Nikal Ke Bhaga
Movie Plot: A flight attendant and her business partner on a mission to steal diamonds and free themselves from the clutches of a loan shark.At 40,000 feet in the air, the heist goes horribly wrong and turns into a hostage situation.

Title: Khufiya
Movie Plot: Krishna Mehra is an operative at Indian spy agency known as R&AW. She is assigned to track down the mole selling India's defense secrets, while all along grappling with her dual identity as a spy and a lover.

Title: Kota Factory
Movie Plot: Dedicated to Shrimati SL Loney ji, Shri Irodov ji and Maanniya HC Verma ji, 'Kota Factory' is TVF's latest original. India's first 'Black and White' show highlights the problems present day IIT-JEE aspirants face in their day-to-day lives.

Title: The Freelancer
Movie Plot: Based on the book 'A Ticket To Syria', Avinash Kamath, an ex-cop turned mercenary, takes up the daunting task of rescuing Aliya, a newly married girl trapped in war-torn Syria against the backdrop of growing ISIS terrorism.

Title: The Legend of Hanuman
Movie Plot: When the power-hungry Ravan tore through the world to unleash evil, in his way stood a humble vaanar awoken to his divinity to become an immortal legend.

Title: Sandeep Bhaiya
Movie Plot: A tiffin service provider finds a mentor in a failed UPSC aspirant who inspires her to become an IFS.

Title: Thuppakki
Movie Plot: An army captain is on a mission to track down and destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command.

Title: Varisu
Movie Plot: Vijay Rajendran is a happy to-go lucky man. Things change when his father becomes terminally ill, and he is left to manage his business empire.

Title: Mersal
Movie Plot: A police officer arrests a doctor for crimes targeting medical professionals but later finds the real culprit in a tale of revenge, corruption and magic.

Title: Bigil
Movie Plot: Michael gives up his dream of becoming a footballer after his father's murder. However, a friend convinces him to coach a women's football team and turn his life around.

Title: Theri
Movie Plot: When his daughter's life is endangered by a local gang, Joseph Kuruvilla will do whatever it takes to stop them. However, at the same time, his dangerous past slowly resurfaces.

Title: Kaththi
Movie Plot: A case of mistaken identity embroils an escaped convict in a fight against a large corporation intent on seizing a village's land.

Title: Beast
Movie Plot: A jaded former intelligence agent is pulled back into action when an attack at a mall creates a tense hostage situation.

Title: Sarkar
Movie Plot: An NRI businessman learns his vote has been cast by someone else and decides to investigate the matter, eventually finding himself pitted against two corrupt politicians.

Title: Ghilli
Movie Plot: Velu, an aspiring kabaddi player, goes to Madurai to participate in a regional match, where he rescues Dhanalakshmi from Muthupandi, a powerful man keen on marrying the girl against her will.

Title: Yatra 2
Movie Plot: The life of the former Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh, the late YS Rajasekhara Reddy.

Title: Bubblegum
Movie Plot: Aadi and Jhanvi, from different backgrounds, struggle with doubts and challenges in their relationship, questioning if love can overcome their differences.

Title: Currency Nagar
Movie Plot: An abnormal discussion happens between a robber and cash. It narrates tales investigating human desires and cupidity while confronting the grimmest facts and nature of lucre.

Title: Chamak
Movie Plot: Kaala - an aspirational rapper from Canada who flees back to Punjab, learns about the mysterious murder of his father and iconic singer Taara Singh. The story unfolds the dark side of music industry's glamour, politics and more.

Title: Crakk: Jeetega... Toh Jiyegaa
Movie Plot: The journey of a man from the slums of Mumbai to the world of underground extreme sports.

Title: Article 370
Movie Plot: Article 370 is the story of 8 month pregnant Kashmiri girl Gul-e-Rana who's fallen prey to the worst communication blockade in the world's most embattled region, Kashmir, as she suffers in the misery of the curfew while waiting for her husband to return back home.—Shuja Uddin

Title: Dasvi
Movie Plot: Jailed under a tough cop, an uneducated politician decides to spend his time studying for high school, while his scheming wife has plans of her own.

Title: Laapataa Ladies
Movie Plot: The misadventures of two young brides who get lost from the same train. From mistaken identities to laugh-out-aloud escapades, the ensuing chaos guarantees laughter galore and heartwarming moments.

Title: TVF Pitchers
Movie Plot: A story of trials and tribulations of four young entrepreneurs who quit their day jobs in order to pursue their start up venture.

Title: Sacred Games
Movie Plot: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.

Title: Special OPS
Movie Plot: The story through the eyes of Himmat Singh is based on the inspiration was taken from Nineteen Years of nationally significant events, several espionage missions were undertaken by India in the last two decades.

Title: Rocket Boys
Movie Plot: The story of two extraordinary men, Dr. Homi Jehangir Bhabha and Dr. Vikram Ambalal Sarabhai, who created history while building India's future.

Title: Criminal Justice
Movie Plot: Sex, drugs and a gruesome murder. An edgy one night stand turns into a nightmare for Aditya, when he wakes up with blood on his hands. The evidence is stacked against him, but he doesn't remember the grisly crime. Is he guilty or not ?

Title: Breathe
Movie Plot: This series just asks one question - how far will you go to protect the one you love. Two desperate and driven men must engage in the ultimate cat and mouse game to save the one they love.

Title: Kohrra
Movie Plot: When a bridegroom is found dead days before his wedding, two police officers must unravel the troubling case as turbulence unfolds in their own lives and threatens to ruin the case.

Title: Adiyae
Movie Plot: When a depressed Jeeva gets into a freak accident, he wakes up to a bizarre utopian alternate reality, Living the most ideal life, Jeeva finds a purpose in life. But fate has other plans when he gets pulled back to the reality

Title: Scoop
Movie Plot: A journalist's life takes a 360 because of the very system that made her who she is. Will she fight or will she concede?

Title: Dahaad
Movie Plot: Sub-inspector Anjali Bhaati investigates a series of deaths where women are found in public bathrooms. The deaths first appear as suicides but as the investigation progresses, Bhaati realizes that there's a serial killer on the loose.

Title: Scam 2003 - The Telgi Story
Movie Plot: Born in Khanapur in Karnataka, Telgi became the mastermind behind one of the most ingenious schemes in Indian history that spread across multiple states and shook the entire country.

Title: Audition
Movie Plot: Two closely related episodes. Youths make problems for two local orchestras about to compete nationally, and in a talent competition a young girl gets stage fright, while another lies to her boss to compete.

Title: Visions of Eight
Movie Plot: Eight film artists from different countries are given carte blanche to make a collection of short documentaries on the 1972 Munich Summer Olympics, offering unexpected, original and often humorous perspectives.

Title: Intimate Lighting
Movie Plot: One of the most important films of the Czech New Wave 60s, it was ranked among the top ten domestic films of all time. In this original sad comedy set in a small town, two classmates meet each other for the first time in ten years. They are both musicians: one is a member of the regional symphony orchestra, while the other is a local music teacher who performs at funerals.—Fraghera

Title: A Report on the Party and Guests
Movie Plot: A small group of bourgeois guests head for a birthday party of a prominent figure. As they go through the woods and have a picnic, they are suddenly surrounded by a bunch of suspicious strangers.

Title: The Cremator
Movie Plot: Set in Central Europe during World War II, a demented cremator believes cremation relieves earthly suffering and sets out to save the world.

Title: SK Sir Ki Class
Movie Plot: It is often said that UPSC is not a race, but a marathon that prepares you for your life. Will Ashish succeed in winning the marathon of his life under the guidance of SK Sir and his lessons of patience, perseverance and dedication?

Title: NCR Days
Movie Plot: NCR Days depicts the life of a small town guy studying in a city that is completely contrasting to his perspectives in life.

Title: Dhindora
Movie Plot: It revolves around Bhuvan and his family's everyday lives, when an unexpected purchase leads to a series of events and depicts every common man's larger than life dreams.

Title: Rana Naidu
Movie Plot: In the complicated world of celebrities, Rana Naidu is the go-to problem-solver. When his father is released from prison, Rana grapples with family secrets and personal conflict and realizes that the only problem he can't fix is his own.

Title: Delhi Crime
Movie Plot: Based on the Nirbhaya case, Delhi Crime follows the Delhi Police investigation into the finding of the men who perpetrated this crime.

Title: Saas, Bahu Aur Flamingo
Movie Plot: Savitri, the matriarch of a massive cartel in the lawless Borderlands, opens up a battle for succession to find her heir in a murky world of drugs and violence.

Title: A Walk Worthwhile
Movie Plot: The young couple Uli and Vanilla want to split up, but lust and money get in their way.

Title: Larks on a String
Movie Plot: Set in the late 1940s, the film concerns the treatment of suspect "bourgeois elements", a professor, a saxophonist, and a milkman, who are put to work in a junkyard for rehabilitation.

Title: Diamonds of the Night
Movie Plot: Two Jewish boys escape from a train transporting them from one concentration camp to another. The film goes beyond the themes of war and anti-Nazism and concerns itself with man's struggle to preserve human dignity.

Title: All My Good Countrymen
Movie Plot: Various scenes in the life of a tight-knit community in Czechoslovakia exploring the human spirit in the backdrop of the political changes that they experience.

Title: Cutting it Short
Movie Plot: An evocation of the childhood memories of Bohumil Hrabal in his provincial town of Nymburk, dominated by the local brewery.

Title: My Sweet Little Village
Movie Plot: The life of a small village runs on its own.

Title: Daisies
Movie Plot: After realizing that all world is spoiled, Marie and Marie are committed to be spoiled themselves. They rip off older men, feast in lavish meals and do all kinds of mischief. But what is all this leading to?

Title: Black and White in Color
Movie Plot: During World War I, French colonists lost in African desert decide to attack their German neighbors.

Title: Valmont
Movie Plot: France before 1789: When a widow hears that her lover is to marry her cousin's daughter, she asks the playboy Valmont to take the girl's virginity. But first she bets him, with her body as prize, to seduce a virtuous, young, married woman.

Title: Ragtime
Movie Plot: A young black pianist becomes embroiled in the lives of an upper-class white family set among the racial tensions, infidelity, violence and other nostalgic events in early 1900s New York City.

Title: Hair
Movie Plot: Claude Bukowski leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly embraced into the hippie group of youngsters led by Berger, yet he's already been drafted. He soon falls in love with Sheila Franklin, a rich girl but still a rebel inside.

Title: Goya's Ghosts
Movie Plot: Painter Francisco Goya faces a scandal involving his muse, who is labeled a heretic by a monk.

Title: The People vs. Larry Flynt
Movie Plot: The story of controversial pornography publisher Larry Flynt, and how he became a defender of free speech.

Title: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers
Movie Plot: Six years after Michael Myers last terrorized Haddonfield, he returns there in pursuit of his niece, Jamie Lloyd, who has escaped with her newborn child, for which Michael and a mysterious cult have sinister plans.

Title: Halloween: Resurrection
Movie Plot: Three years after he last terrorized his sister, Michael Myers confronts her again, before traveling to Haddonfield to deal with the cast and crew of a reality show which is being broadcast from his old home.

Title: Halloween II
Movie Plot: Laurie Strode struggles to come to terms with her brother Michael's deadly return to Haddonfield, Illinois; meanwhile, Michael prepares for another reunion with his sister.

Title: Halloween Ends
Movie Plot: The saga of Michael Myers and Laurie Strode comes to a spine-chilling climax in the final installment of this trilogy.

Title: Kolya
Movie Plot: A confirmed bachelor is in for the surprise of his life when a get-rich-quick scheme backfires and leaves him with a pint-sized new roommate.

Title: This Land Is Mine
Movie Plot: A mild-mannered school teacher in a German-occupied town during World War II finds himself torn between collaboration and resistance.

Title: The Millennial Bee
Movie Plot: A historic mega-film, one family saga, three generations (1887 -1917) assimilated to the bee community in the hive. The queen bee serves as a big mother that symbolizes the family and national roots, the power and meaning of tradition and the return to it. The mosaic of the bricklaying Pichanda family's lives is made of love, hope, hard work, human understanding and also the tragedies of economic crisis, war and human malice. Dreams, symbols, and life in all its forms create a colored rainbow spanning from birth to death and from mystery to reality and back.—Anonymous

Title: Carriage to Vienna
Movie Plot: A WW2 story of a young Austrian soldier running from the Russian army and a woman whom he forces to come along in order to save his wounded mate.

Title: The Joke
Movie Plot: In the 1950's, Ludvik Jahn was expelled from the Communist Party and the University by his fellow students, because of a politically incorrect note he sent to his girlfriend. Fifteen years later, he tries to get his revenge by seducing Helena, the wife of one of his accusers.—Will Gilbert

Title: The Valley of the Bees
Movie Plot: Ondrej, a young boy who loves bees and bats, is introduced to his new mother, a woman much younger than his father. He brings her a basketful of flowers which she starts to throw in the air and then gives out a shriek, as she discovers several bats in the bottom of the bowl. In a rage, Ondrej's father picks the boy up and hurls him against the wall. As the boy lays on the ground paralyzed the father promises the Holy Virgin to dedicate the boy to her if she spares his life. Ondrej survives and is raised in a strict Knightly Order, where he is mentored by a devout monk, Armin. But one day, an extraordinary event makes him doubt the Order and remember where he came from.—poco loco, pethr

Title: The Color of Pomegranates
Movie Plot: The life of the Armenian poet Sayat-Nova, from childhood to death, his spiritual journey, artistic endeavors and inner conflicts within the cultural and historical context of Armenia, hailed as revolutionary by Mikhail Vartanov.

Title: The Devil's Trap
Movie Plot: A priest travels to investigate a miller suspected to be working with the devil.

Title: Witchhammer
Movie Plot: In the 1600s, an overzealous clergy hauls innocent women in front of tribunals, forces them to confess to imaginary witchery, and engages in brutal torture and persecution of their subjects.

Title: Memories of Underdevelopment
Movie Plot: A Cuban man cycles through his opinions and memories as the threat of foreign invasion intensifies and the rest of his family moves to Miami.

Title: Cinema16: British Short Films
Movie Plot: 16 short and student films by British directors

Title: The Dunkirk Spirit: Behind the Making of the Movie
Movie Plot: Nominated for eight Academy Awards including Best Picture and Best Director, Dunkirk is Christopher Nolan's sweeping, emotional epic. Dunkirk opens as hundreds of thousands of British and Allied troops are surrounded by enemy forces. Trapped on the beach with their backs to the sea and home almost within sight, they face an impossible situation as the enemy closes in. The story unfolds on land, sea and air.
