Movie Plot: A biography of sports legend Muhammad Ali, focusing on his triumphs and controversies between 1964 and 1974.

Title: Insurrection
Movie Plot: A series of interviews with the leaders of the Paris riots of May and June, 1968.

Title: Junior Bonner
Movie Plot: Ace Bonner returns to Arizona several years after he abandoned his family, Junior Bonner is a wild young man. Against the typical rodeo championship, family drama erupts.

Title: Cat People
Movie Plot: A woman who was orphaned from a young age finally reunites with her older brother. Matters start to go awry when she slowly discovers the true nature of her family.

Title: The Hidden
Movie Plot: A cop and an FBI agent race for answers after law abiding people suddenly become violent criminals.

Title: Wolfen
Movie Plot: A New York cop investigates a series of brutal deaths that resemble animal attacks.

Title: The Funhouse
Movie Plot: Four teenagers visit a local carnival for a night of innocent amusement, but soon discover that nothing there is innocent or amusing.

Title: Q: The Winged Serpent
Movie Plot: NYPD detectives Shepard and Powell are working on a bizarre case of a ritualistic Aztec murder. Meanwhile, something big is attacking people of New York and only greedy small time crook Jimmy Quinn knows where its lair is.

Title: Goodfellas 2
Movie Plot: Two gangsters meet and fall madly in love, and have a little bit of gay romance but their Italian brothers won't let that one slide so they all hit the gritty hop on the Fortnite and win some dubs

Title: Next of Kin
Movie Plot: In a rest home for elderly people, a daughter reads her mother's diary. Soon events that are mentioned in the mother's diary begin to happen to the daughter.

Title: The Lair of the White Worm
Movie Plot: When an archaeologist uncovers a strange skull in a foreign land, the residents of a nearby town begin to disappear, leading to further inexplicable occurrences.

Title: Blow Out
Movie Plot: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

Title: Sorcerer
Movie Plot: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous Latin American jungle.

Title: To Live and Die in L.A.
Movie Plot: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.

Title: Collateral
Movie Plot: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

Title: Hannibal Rising
Movie Plot: After the death of his parents during World War II, young Hannibal Lecter moves in with his beautiful aunt and begins plotting revenge on the barbarians responsible for his sister's death.

Title: A Prayer for the Dying
Movie Plot: Martin, an I.R.A. hitman, is seen by a Catholic priest while carrying out a hit. He grows a bond with the priest and his niece. But his past and his former employers put all their lives in danger.

Title: The Pope of Greenwich Village
Movie Plot: Two cousins unknowingly rob the mob and face the dangerous consequences.

Title: Johnny Handsome
Movie Plot: After being double crossed and thrown in jail, a deformed gangster gets a new face and rehabilitation, but his desire for revenge looms.

Title: Fall Time
Movie Plot: Three young men decide to plan a mock kidnapping, but everything goes wrong because a real bank robbery was already planned by two other guys.

Title: Barfly
Movie Plot: Based on the life of successful poet Charles Bukowski and his exploits in Hollywood during the 60s, 70s, and 80s.

Title: Francesco
Movie Plot: Docudrama about the life of St-Francis of Assisi.

Title: Diner
Movie Plot: A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.

Title: F.T.W.
Movie Plot: Frank T. Wells has just been released from prison after serving a term for manslaughter. Frank's a reasonably honest man and a good rodeo rider. When he meets up with Scarlett, a bank robber on the run, his whole life changes.—Rob Hartill

Title: Bullet
Movie Plot: Paroled after 8 years in prison, Bullet's picked up by his brother and a friend. Bullet assaults a drug dealer and two customers. Things escalate.

Title: Killshot
Movie Plot: Beautiful Carmen Colson and her ironworker husband Wayne are placed in the Federal Witness Protection program after witnessing an "incident". Thinking they are at last safe, they are targeted by an experienced hit man and a psychopathic young upstart killer. The ensuing struggle will test Carmen to the limit.

Title: The Last Outlaw
Movie Plot: Left for dead by his bank robbing gang, a marauder joins a posse to seek revenge.

Title: 52 Pick-Up
Movie Plot: A secret fling between a man and his mistress leads to blackmail and murder.

Title: Machete
Movie Plot: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

Title: Kinjite: Forbidden Subjects
Movie Plot: A brutal Los Angeles police Lt. is determined to bust up an organization that forces underage girls into prostitution.

Title: Unforgettable
Movie Plot: A Seattle medical examiner uses an experimental memory transference drug to unravel the mystery surrounding his Wife's brutal murder.

Title: Malone
Movie Plot: An ex-C.I.A. hit man running from his past finds just how difficult it is to retire when he runs across a small town controlled by mercenaries and a family that's resisting their control.

Title: Mortal Thoughts
Movie Plot: Two detectives interrogate a hairdresser on two homicides she may or may not have been involved in.

Title: The Morning After
Movie Plot: A washed up, alcoholic actress who is prone to blackouts wakes up next to a murdered man. Did she kill him and, if not, is she in danger?

Title: Best Seller
Movie Plot: A hitman approaches a writer to help him create his next best seller, but the violent world he was a part of has other plans.

Title: Unlawful Entry
Movie Plot: A burglar holds a knife to Karen's throat while her husband does nothing. The couple ends up befriending the cop that comes. The friendship ends when the cop beats up the culprit. Karen isn't ready to end it. Things get ugly with the cop.

Title: Cohen and Tate
Movie Plot: When a little boy witnesses a mob hit, he is kidnapped by two professional assassins who are not what they seem.

Title: Beautiful Blue Eyes
Movie Plot: A retired cop seeks revenge against an elderly man he's convinced is the Nazi who slaughtered his family during WW2.

Title: Johnny Skidmarks
Movie Plot: Johnny "Skidmark" Scardino is a free-lance crime-scene photographer and part-time blackmailer. When his associates begin to turn up murdered, he has a very short time to discover the killer before it is his turn.

Title: Cop
Movie Plot: An obsessive, insubordinate homicide cop is convinced a serial killer is loose in the Hollywood area and disobeys orders in order to catch him.

Title: Girls Nite Out
Movie Plot: At a remote Ohio college, a killer dressed in the school's bear mascot suit stalks several young women participating in an all-night scavenger hunt.

Title: The Dorm That Dripped Blood
Movie Plot: Four college students are stalked by an unknown assailant while staying on campus over the Christmas holidays to help clear out a dormitory which is to be demolished.

Title: Graduation Day
Movie Plot: A masked killer begins murdering students on the school track team after a track runner dies upon completion of a 30 second 200-meter race.

Title: Final Exam
Movie Plot: A psycho killer shows up on college campus to slash up pretty co-eds and dumb jocks.

Title: The Prowler
Movie Plot: An unknown killer, clad in World War II U.S. Army fatigues, stalks a small California town, bent on reliving a 35 year-old double murder by focusing on a group of college kids holding an annual graduation dance.

Title: The Final Terror
Movie Plot: A group of rangers go camping on unfamiliar forest grounds. All's well until the group members start getting killed by a cunning killer in the woods.

Title: Death Valley
Movie Plot: A divorced mother, her young son and her new boyfriend set out on a road trip through Death Valley and run afoul of a local serial killer.

Title: The Mutilator
Movie Plot: A college student, who accidentally killed his mother as a child, decides to take his friends to his father's fishing cabin during fall break, not knowing that his crazed father is stalking the place.

Title: Nightmare
Movie Plot: A mental patient embarks on a murder spree upon escaping from an institution.

Title: The Initiation
Movie Plot: An amnesiac sorority member who has been plagued by a recurring nightmare is stalked alongside other coeds by a killer in a deserted department store where they are completing a hazing ritual.

Title: Absurd
Movie Plot: A priest-doctor chasing a man with supernatural regenerative abilities, who has recently escaped from a medical lab, reaches a small town where the mutant goes on a killing spree.

Title: Miami Vice
Movie Plot: -Resplendent with authentic 1980s music, fashion, and vibe, "Miami Vice" follows two undercover detectives and their extended team through the mean streets of Miami, Florida.

Title: S.W.A.T.
Movie Plot: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

Title: The Kingdom
Movie Plot: A team of U.S. government agents are sent to investigate the bombing of an American facility in the Middle East.

Title: Wiseguy
Movie Plot: Vincent Terranova is an agent with the Organized Crime Bureau infiltrating dangerous criminal organizations, struggling to remain true to himself while becoming close to the criminal leaders he is sworn to bring down.

Title: The Recruit
Movie Plot: A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.

Title: The Professionals
Movie Plot: Bodie and Doyle, senior agents of the British intelligence service CI5 (Criminal Intelligence 5), and their handler George Cowley fight terrorism and similar high-level crimes.

Title: Luck
Movie Plot: A television series centered around characters who are tied to the same horse-racing track.

Title: Mercedes 'Lucky Star'
Movie Plot: Mercedes released a trailer for a new thriller called "Lucky Star," which stars Benicio del Toro, in British movie theaters and on television. The 2½ minute trailer, Directed by Michael Mann centers on a gambler named "Mr. H" who bets and wins at casinos and in the stock market, which garners the attention of shadowy government agents. Scenes depict del Toro being chased by helicopters, escaping pursuers on LA freeways. There's just one catch: Although Mann has optioned the story rights, "Lucky Star" isn't a real movie. lead by its new ad agency Campbell Doyle Dye, Mercedes is mimicking BMW's recent leap into entertainment by hiring Hollywood heavyweights to promote its vehicles. Del Toro's co-star is Mercedes' sexy new silver 500 SL convertible sports car.—Dutch Merrick

Title: The Final Programme
Movie Plot: A trio of scientists plan to create a self-replicating, immortal, hermaphrodite using the Final Programme developed by a dead, Nobel Prize-winning scientist.

Title: Bang the Drum Slowly
Movie Plot: The story of the friendship between a worldly-wise star pitcher and a half-wit catcher as they cope with the catcher's terminal illness through a baseball season.

Title: Buddy Buddy
Movie Plot: During a high-profile Mafia testimony case in California's Riverside County, a hired killer checks into a hotel room near the courthouse, while his depressed next-door neighbor wants to commit suicide over marital problems.

Title: Brazil
Movie Plot: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.

Title: City of Lost Children
Movie Plot: City of Lost Children is a near future thriller set in a refugee camp for kids in the UK. We follow Dami and Azra as they negotiate the chaos of the camp, desperately trying to find a home for Dami before Azra is deported the next day.

Title: Dark City
Movie Plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from.

Title: Les enfants de la cité perdue
Movie Plot: A fantastic movie where the strong helps the weak. A surreal story filled with the stylish costumes of Jean Paul Gaultier, where a man is tortured by being unable to dream. Mad scientists abound but in the end the good and innocent triumphs over evil.

Title: Deux escargots s'en vont
Movie Plot: Based on a poem of Jacques Prévert.

Title: Foutaises
Movie Plot: A 9 minute comedy starring Dominique Pinon (Delicatessen). Featuring muted colors with a sepia black and white, Pinon takes the viewer through various examples of what he "likes and dislikes". The music is by Carlos D'Alessio and Special Thanks is given to Claudie Ossard.—Anonymous

Title: Casanova
Movie Plot: 18th century Venetian Giacomo Casanova escapes from prison and flees to France.

Title: Man Bites Dog
Movie Plot: A film crew follows a ruthless thief and heartless killer as he goes about his daily routine. But complications set in when the film crew lose their objectivity and begin lending a hand.

Title: Run Lola Run
Movie Plot: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

Title: Delicacy
Movie Plot: A French woman mourning over the death of her husband three years prior is courted by a Swedish co-worker.

Title: Made in Caro
Movie Plot: Short films, clips and commercials made by Marc Caro when he was working at his movie 'Cité des Enfants Perdues' (1995).

Title: Hunting and Gathering
Movie Plot: When Camille (Audrey Tautou) falls ill, she is forced to live with Philibert and Franck (Guillaume Canet). A moving trio story.

Title: The Valet
Movie Plot: A porter and a top-model have to pretend to be a couple in order to salvage a CEO's marriage.

Title: Chinese Puzzle
Movie Plot: A 40-year-old father's life is complicated when the mother of his two children moves to New York. Since he can't bear them growing up far away from him, he decides to move there as well.

Title: Beautiful Lies
Movie Plot: A hairdresser forwards a passionate love letter to her mother.

Title: Russian Dolls
Movie Plot: Five years after their summer together in Barcelona, Xavier, William, Wendy, Martine and Isabelle reunite.

Title: Coco Before Chanel
Movie Plot: The story of Coco Chanel's rise from obscure beginnings to the heights of the fashion world.

Title: Heartbreaker
Movie Plot: Alex and his sister run a business designed to break up relationships. They are hired by a rich man to break up the wedding of his daughter. The only problem is that they only have one week to do so.

Title: The Spanish Apartment
Movie Plot: A strait-laced French student moves into an apartment in Barcelona with a cast of six other characters from all over Europe. Together, they speak the international language of love and friendship.

Title: He Loves Me, He Loves Me Not
Movie Plot: A young woman who is in love with a married doctor becomes dangerous when her attempts to persuade him to leave his wife are unsuccessful. However, when things are seen from his point of view, the real situation becomes clear.

Title: Looop
Movie Plot: An android, half-man, half-machine, moves ahead in the setting of a baroque cathedral. As though hypnotized by a stroboscopic impulse, the android begins an adventure in a maze of corridors, footbridges and spiral staircases. Its interminable ascension to the light will make it discover the eternal return.

Title: The Chorus
Movie Plot: Pierre, a successful orchestra conductor, returns home when his mother dies. He stumbles upon an old diary and recollects the childhood school memories and his music teacher Clement Mathieu.

Title: Rust and Bone
Movie Plot: Put in charge of his young son, Alain leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Alain's bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.

Title: Little White Lies
Movie Plot: A near-fatal accident leaves one friend in the hospital while the rest go on their annual vacation. But their secrets and personal grief threaten to drive them apart.

Title: La belle époque
Movie Plot: Victor, a disillusioned 60-something whose marriage is on the rocks, opts to relive the week of his life when, 40 years earlier, he met his true love through a company that allows customers to return to the time period of their choosing.

Title: Jeux d'enfants
Movie Plot: Julien, 8, is confronted with his mother's cancer, while Sophie has to face the xenophobia of other schoolchildren. Soon they become inseparable and invent a game: "cape or not cap? " (able or unable ?).

Title: What's in a Name?
Movie Plot: Vincent is about to become a father. At a meeting with childhood friends he announces the name for his future son. The scandalous name ignites a discussion which surfaces unpleasant matters from the past of the group.

Title: Polisse
Movie Plot: A journalist covering police assigned to a juvenile division enters into an affair with one of her subjects.

Title: Taxi to the Dark Side
Movie Plot: Alex Gibney exposes the haunting details of the USA's torture and interrogation practices during the War in Afghanistan.

Title: Frida
Movie Plot: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.

Title: The Queen
Movie Plot: After the death of Princess Diana, Queen Elizabeth II struggles with her reaction to a sequence of events nobody could have predicted.

Title: Two Days, One Night
Movie Plot: Liège, Belgium. Sandra is a factory worker who discovers that her workmates have opted for a EUR1,000 bonus in exchange for her dismissal. She has only a weekend to convince her colleagues to give up their bonuses in order to keep her job.

Title: Born Into Brothels: Calcutta's Red Light Kids
Movie Plot: Two documentary filmmakers chronicle their time in Sonagchi, Calcutta and the relationships they developed with children of prostitutes who work the city's notorious red light district.

Title: The Iron Lady
Movie Plot: An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene.

Title: The Reader
Movie Plot: Post-WWII Germany: Nearly a decade after his affair with an older woman came to a mysterious end, law student Michael Berg re-encounters his former lover as she defends herself in a war-crime trial.

Title: Precious
Movie Plot: In New York City's Harlem circa 1987, an overweight, abused, illiterate teen who is pregnant with her second child is invited to enroll in an alternative school in hopes that she can re-route her life in a better direction.

Title: Chanel No. 5: Train de Nuit
Movie Plot: Commercial for Chanel No. 5 perfume.

Title: Liam
Movie Plot: A family falls into poverty during the Depression.

Title: The Grifters
Movie Plot: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend, both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

Title: Dangerous Liaisons
Movie Plot: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

Title: In America
Movie Plot: A family of Irish immigrants adjust to life on the mean streets of Hell's Kitchen while also grieving the death of a child.

Title: Triste à mourir
Movie Plot: A young girl named Caro (Audrey Tautou) goes through various villages looking for her friend Nath

Title: The Magdalene Sisters
Movie Plot: Three young Irish women struggle to maintain their spirits while they endure dehumanizing abuse as inmates of a Magdalene Sisters Asylum.

Title: Philomena
Movie Plot: A world-weary political journalist picks up the story of a woman's search for her son, who was taken away from her decades ago after she became pregnant and was forced to live in a convent.

Title: This Is Us
Movie Plot: A heartwarming and emotional story about a unique set of triplets, their struggles, and their wonderful parents.

Title: God Is Great and I'm Not
Movie Plot: Michèle, 20 years old, feels terrible after having broken up with her boyfriend. She meets Francois, who's a veterinarian and Jewish. Michèle decides to convert to Judaism because she has to believe in something, if not in someone.

Title: Silent Night
Movie Plot: In a cabin on a World War II front, a German mom with a young son mediates a truce between three German and three American soldiers so they can all celebrate Christmas Eve 1944 together.

Title: Days of Glory
Movie Plot: During World War II, four North African men enlist in the French army to liberate that country from German oppression, and to fight French discrimination.

Title: Land of Mine
Movie Plot: In post-World War II Denmark, a group of young German POWs are forced to clear a beach of thousands of land mines under the watch of a Danish Sergeant who slowly learns to appreciate their plight.

Title: Black Book
Movie Plot: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.

Title: Joyeux Noel
Movie Plot: When a romantic painting of a Christmas market captures the imagination of copy editor Lea, she is sent to France with pragmatic reporter Mark to uncover the mystery behind the artist.

Title: Outside the Law
Movie Plot: A drama about the Algerian struggle for independence from France after WWII.

Title: The Red Baron
Movie Plot: German biopic loosely based on the World War I fighter ace Manfred Von Richthofen, nicknamed the Red Baron by friend and foe alike.

Title: Christmas in Connecticut
Movie Plot: A food writer who has lied about being the perfect housewife must try to cover her deception when her boss and a returning war hero invite themselves to her home for a traditional family Christmas.

Title: Passchendaele
Movie Plot: The lives of a troubled veteran, his nurse girlfriend and a naive boy intersect first in Alberta and then in Belgium during the bloody World War I battle of Passchendaele.

Title: Welcome to the Sticks
Movie Plot: A French public servant from Provence is banished to the far North. Strongly prejudiced against this cold and inhospitable place, he leaves his family behind to relocate temporarily there, with the firm intent to quickly come back.

Title: Girlfriend's Day
Movie Plot: Ray Wentworth, a now down-on-his-luck romance-card writer, decides to recapture the feelings that once made him the greatest with the creation of a new holiday: Girlfriend's Day.

Title: Office Invasion
Movie Plot: Three best friends band together to defend their valuable mining company from monstrous aliens looking to plunder and exterminate.

Title: Jung_E
Movie Plot: On an uninhabitable 22nd-century Earth, the outcome of a civil war hinges on cloning the brain of an elite soldier to create a robot mercenary.

Title: Gold Brick
Movie Plot: Determined to even the scales and profit from his thankless job, a factory worker schemes to traffic luxury perfumes from under his employer's nose.

Title: Les têtes de l'emploi
Movie Plot: Stéphane, Cathy and Thierry are the best employees of the Employment Agency of their city. But their results are so good that the agency will have to close because of a lack of unemployed. The three colleagues then have the crazy idea of creating unemployment to save their job.—OzzyPsycko

Title: Satan Met a Lady
Movie Plot: A double-crossing woman, the two-timing P.I. she hired, the corpulent "empress of crime", and a gentleman thief are all after a legendary priceless eighth-century ram's horn.

Title: Spiderhead
Movie Plot: In the near future, convicts are offered the chance to volunteer as medical subjects to shorten their sentence. One such subject for a new drug capable of generating feelings of love begins questioning the reality of his emotions.

Title: The Little Giant
Movie Plot: When Prohibition ends, a beer baron sees the writing on the wall, quits the rackets, and tries to break into California society.

Title: Bombshell
Movie Plot: A glamorous film star rebels against the studio, her pushy press agent and a family of hangers-on.

Title: The Maltese Falcon: One Magnificent Bird
Movie Plot: An appreciation and the story of the "making of" THE MALTESE FALCON.

Title: Red-Headed Woman
Movie Plot: Lillian (Jean Harlow) relentlessly attempts to seduce a married man (Chester Morris).

Title: Blonde Crazy
Movie Plot: The adventures of an egoistic con man and his glamorous accomplice.

Title: Evelyn Prentice
Movie Plot: The neglected wife of a high profile attorney dallies with a unscrupulous womanizer and finds herself involved in blackmail and murder.

Title: The Big Shot
Movie Plot: Fearing life in prison for a fourth offense, convict Duke Berne pulls out of an armored car robbery, planned by his crooked lawyer, but he is framed for the robbery anyway.

Title: What Price Hollywood?
Movie Plot: The career of a waitress takes off when she meets an amiable drunken Hollywood director.

Title: Three on a Match
Movie Plot: Although Vivian Revere is seemingly the most successful of a trio of reunited schoolmates, she throws it away by descending into a life of debauchery and drugs.

Title: Employees' Entrance
Movie Plot: A working girl is menaced by her tyrannical employer.

Title: The Big Sleep
Movie Plot: Grizzled American private detective in England investigates a complicated case of blackmail turned murder involving a rich but honest elderly general, his two loose socialite daughters, a pornographer and a gangster.

Title: High Noon
Movie Plot: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at "high noon" when the gang leader, an outlaw he "sent up" years ago, arrives on the noon train.

Title: The African Queen
Movie Plot: After the events of The African Queen (1951), Charlie and Rose are recaptured by the Germans and forced to tug one of their big cannons that could bring the Nazis victory against the local Allied forces.

Title: Legal Eagles
Movie Plot: A New York district attorney works and flirts with his adversary and her kooky artist client, who is on trial for a murder she didn't commit.

Title: Hanover Street
Movie Plot: Margaret is a nurse in England during WW2, and married to a secret agent. Things get complicated when she falls for David, an American pilot.

Title: Getting Straight
Movie Plot: A Vietnam vet and former social radical is conflicted by his desire to become a teacher and his sympathy with anti-establishment student protests.

Title: More American Graffiti
Movie Plot: Told in four different New Year's Eves in the mid 1960s, John, Terry, Debbie, Steve and Laurie deal with adulthood, the Vietnam war, peace rallies, and relationships.

Title: The Frisco Kid
Movie Plot: A Polish rabbi wanders through the Old West on his way to lead a synagogue in San Francisco. On the way, he is nearly burned at the stake by Native Americans and almost killed by outlaws.

Title: Force 10 from Navarone
Movie Plot: During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.

Title: Dynasty
Movie Plot: The story of a pioneer family in the early 1800s that seeks its fortunes on the Ohio frontier.

Title: Nanny and the Professor
Movie Plot: A remarkable young English nanny takes over the household of a widowed professor and his three children.

Title: The Great Waldo Pepper
Movie Plot: After WW1, an ex-pilot takes up barn-storming and chance-meets a former German ace fighter pilot with whom he co-stars in Hollywood war movies depicting aerial dog-fights.

Title: The Possessed
Movie Plot: A former priest, now an exorcist, battles the Satanic forces that are threatening the students at a girls school.

Title: Pink Cadillac
Movie Plot: Skip tracer Tommy looks for bail-jumper Lou Ann. Her crime is marrying Roy, who left counterfeit money in their mobile home and got her arrested. She leaves Roy in his pink Cadillac full of money. His psycho friends want their money back.

Title: Any Which Way You Can
Movie Plot: A trucker turned prize fighter, his brother and their pet orangutan have a series of misadventures involving the mob, corrupt cops, motorcycle gangs and pretty dames.

Title: Firefox
Movie Plot: A pilot is sent into the Soviet Union on a mission to steal a prototype jet fighter that can be partially controlled by a neuralink.

Title: White Hunter Black Heart
Movie Plot: A thinly fictionalized account of a legendary movie director, whose desire to hunt down an animal turns into a grim situation with his movie crew in Africa.

Title: Warlock
Movie Plot: A warlock flees from the 17th to the 20th century, with a witch-hunter in hot pursuit.

Title: Into the Night
Movie Plot: After discovering that his wife is cheating on him, an insomniac aerospace engineer accidentally meets, and tries to help, a beautiful model on the run from some extremely dangerous people.

Title: Body Snatchers
Movie Plot: A teenage girl and her father discover alien clones are replacing humans on a remote U.S. military base in Alabama.

Title: Waxwork
Movie Plot: A wax museum owner uses his horror exhibits to unleash evil on the world.

Title: Thinner
Movie Plot: An obese attorney is cursed by a gypsy to rapidly and uncontrollably lose weight.

Title: Dust Devil
Movie Plot: A woman on the run from her abusive husband encounters a mysterious hitch-hiker.

Title: Vampires
Movie Plot: Recovering from an ambush that killed his entire team, a vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to walk in sunlight.

Title: Someone Behind the Door
Movie Plot: A neurosurgeon with a cheating wife takes an amnesiac into his home and conditions him to believe that the cheating wife is his own and to take the "appropriate" action.

Title: Slasher
Movie Plot: A documentary on a stereotypically shady used car salesman, one who convinces customers to buy vehicles that others have deemed unfit for sale.

Title: Susan's Plan
Movie Plot: Susan wants her reprehensible ex-husband dead and, in several bungled attempts by henchmen, tries to accomplish the deed. First her boyfriend hires two dim-witted hitmen. Then she hires a former biker boyfriend to smother him in the hospital where he is recuperating from the first attempt. Then Zane's former wife figures out what is going on and wants a part of the action.—John Sacksteder <jsackste@bellsouth.net>

Title: Vamp
Movie Plot: Two fraternity pledges travel to a sleazy bar in search of a stripper for their college friends, unaware it is occupied by vampires.

Title: Zapped Again!
Movie Plot: A new student moves into school, making enemies with the affluent societies and joining the Science Club.

Title: Wild Things: Diamonds in the Rough
Movie Plot: Two young women will stop at nothing for one to gain a $4 million inheritance of two priceless diamonds, while two detectives try to thwart their plans, but find complications abound.

Title: Mischief
Movie Plot: Guided by James Dean, the eternal symbol of youthful rebellion, a gawky high school student obsessed with the hottest girl in class takes a crash course in teenage coolness from his motorcycle-rebel neighbor.

Title: Screwballs
Movie Plot: Frolicking youth comedy about zany high school students set in the 1960s.

Title: Bachelor Party
Movie Plot: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

Title: Up the Creek
Movie Plot: Bob McGraw is in his 12th year of college, goofing his way through life, until he has to win a river rafting race with three college buddies.

Title: Loverboy
Movie Plot: Randy is still unfocused after 2 years in college. When his dad refuses to keep paying his tuition, he gets a job delivering pizzas. Several alluring cougars pay him $200 for pizza delivery and "services rendered." As for their husbands.

Title: The Last American Virgin
Movie Plot: Pizza delivery boy Gary, loudmouth David and hunky Rick are three high school students out to lose their virginity any way they can. Gary falls for transfer student Karen, who gets involved with Rick.

Title: My Tutor
Movie Plot: A rich father hires a tutor for his son. The son is a horny teenager and the tutor is a gorgeous blonde. Complications ensue.

Title: Private School
Movie Plot: Chris from a girls' boarding school loves Jim from a nearby boys' boarding school. Jordan also wants Jim and plays dirty. Jim and two friends visit the girls' school posing as girls.

Title: Tarzan the Ape Man
Movie Plot: While on an African expedition with her father, Jane Parker meets Tarzan, and the two become fascinated by each other.

Title: About Schmidt
Movie Plot: A recently retired man embarks on a journey to his estranged daughter's wedding, only to discover more about himself and life than he ever expected.

Title: Johnny Be Good
Movie Plot: Johnny's the top high-school football player and many colleges want him. His girlfriend, coach and best friend want him in the college, serving themselves most.

Title: Blood and Wine
Movie Plot: A man who has failed as a father and husband commits a heist to make money for his fledging business, but things become complicated when his wife interferes.

Title: Man Trouble
Movie Plot: A sleazy but affable guard dog trainer is blackmailed to steal a manuscript for a tell-all book from one of his clients.

Title: Get Shorty
Movie Plot: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

Title: Stealing Home
Movie Plot: Ex-baseball player Billy comes home to receive his childhood darling's ashes.

Title: Heat
Movie Plot: Las Vegas is the backdrop for all the torrid action of heat, as Burt Reynolds plays the soft-hearted bodyguard who's out to protect his friends.

Title: The Pledge
Movie Plot: A retiring police detective pledges to catch the killer of a young child.

Title: Attack Force Z
Movie Plot: A group of Australian commandos launch a secret mission against Japanese forces in World War II.

Title: No Man's Land
Movie Plot: A rookie cop goes undercover and infiltrates a car thief ring.

Title: Cold Heaven
Movie Plot: An adulterous woman's faith in God is tested when her husband dies and miraculously comes back to life.

Title: Mesmerized
Movie Plot: An orphaned New Zealand girl married to an older, wealthy businessman learns to deal with his strange sexual desires.

Title: Love at Large
Movie Plot: Vampish miss Dolan hires hardboiled P.I. Harry Dobbs to tail her shady boyfriend. Harry realizes that the man leads a double life but then his client disappears. Harry teams up with his own tail, P.I. Stella Wynkowski, to clear things up.

Title: Nell
Movie Plot: In a remote woodland cabin, a small-town doctor discovers Nell - a beautiful young hermit-woman with many secrets.

Title: Siesta
Movie Plot: An American skydiver wakes up in the middle of nowhere in Spain and must recount the last five agonizing days to figure out how she got there.

Title: O'Hara's Wife
Movie Plot: A mourning workaholic's deceased wife comes back to haunt him, but in a benevolent way, trying to get him to change his dreary attorney life into a life where he has a relationship with his children and is happier with himself.

Title: Pearl
Movie Plot: In 1918, a young woman on the brink of madness pursues stardom in a desperate attempt to escape the drudgery, isolation, and lovelessness of life on her parents' farm.

Title: X
Movie Plot: In 1979, a group of young filmmakers set out to make an adult film in rural Texas, but when their reclusive, elderly hosts catch them in the act, the cast find themselves fighting for their lives.

Title: A Night in the Life of Jimmy Reardon
Movie Plot: A charming womanizer must find a way to get $80 to elope to Hawaii with his one true love, or else go to his father's chosen business school.

Title: Just One of the Guys
Movie Plot: Terry feels discriminated against when the summer jobs at the Sun Tribune go to two guys. She decides to do something about it. She dresses like a guy and gets a haircut. Will students at the other high school notice? Girls notice "him".

Title: Remote Control
Movie Plot: A trio of contestants answer questions and compete in games related to TV and pop culture.

Title: Date with an Angel
Movie Plot: An aspiring composer discovers a broken-winged, beautiful angel in his swimming pool. When everyone finds out, he must deal with his jealous fiancé, his future father-in-law, and his friends who have a business plan.

Title: Fast Getaway
Movie Plot: A lighthearted tale about a gang of bank robbers who fall out and split up. The brains of the gang is a boy who, with his father, successfully continue their crime spree. Annoyed at this, Lilly and her loyal and stupid companion, decide to kidnap the boy, Nelson, and force him to work for them.—Rob Hartill

Title: Disorderlies
Movie Plot: Three bumbling orderlies are hired to take care of an old rich man. Humorous mayhem follows.

Title: Lucas
Movie Plot: A socially inept fourteen-year-old experiences heartbreak for the first time when his two best friends - Cappie, an older-brother figure, and Maggie, the new girl with whom he is in love - fall for each other.

Title: Dream a Little Dream
Movie Plot: An accident puts the consciousness of an elderly dream researcher into the body of a bratty teenager. The problem? The kid prefers dreamworld limbo to real life.

Title: Dance 'Til Dawn
Movie Plot: Will prom night live up to the high school seniors' expectations? Will they have the right date? Can they avoid their parents?

Title: License to Drive
Movie Plot: A teen decides to go for a night on the town with his friends despite flunking his driver's test.

Title: Ruthless People
Movie Plot: A couple cheated by a vile businessman kidnaps his wife in retaliation, not knowing that their enemy is delighted that they did.

Title: To Die, to Sleep
Movie Plot: Two teen-agers besieged by the ubiquitous dangers of alcohol, violence, greed and misguided passion, unknowingly help each other find value in life and in themselves in this poignant tale of saved youth.

Title: Rogue Trader
Movie Plot: The story of Nick Leeson, an ambitious investment broker who singlehandedly bankrupted one of the oldest and most important banks in Britain.

Title: The Statement
Movie Plot: Tale of a former Nazi executioner who becomes a target of hitmen and police investigators.

Title: In Country
Movie Plot: A young girl whose father died in the Vietnam War becomes determined to find out more about him and his experiences.

Title: F.I.S.T.
Movie Plot: A rebellious Cleveland warehouse worker rises through the ranks of a trucking industry union to become union president but his organized crime links cause his eventual downfall.

Title: The Portrait
Movie Plot: After a long absence, artist Margaret Church returns to the home of her aging parents, Gardner and Fanny Church, to finish a portrait of them, only to find that they have sold the family home and are preparing to move. While coming to grips with the loss of her childhood home and the memories it held, Margaret must deal with many issues ranging from her father's frequent and disturbing memory lapses, to her feelings of isolation from her parents. Fanny and Gardner are totally devoted to each other and absorbed in their love and life together, making their daughter feel left out. While struggling to get her parents to sit still long enough so that she can paint their portrait, Margaret thinks they don't take her or her painting seriously. A conversation with her father makes her finally come to the realization that her parents love her and appreciate her painting career, and that they can't and won't change at their ages. Returning to New York for her premier art showing with the finished portrait, Margaret realizes that she will be a much happier person if she accepts her parents as they are.—E.W. DesMarais <jlongst@aol.com>

Title: Throw Momma from the Train
Movie Plot: A bitter ex-husband wants his former spouse dead. A put-upon momma's boy wants his mother dead. Who will pull it off?

Title: Renaissance Man
Movie Plot: A failed businessman is hired by the army to teach a group of underachieving recruits in order to help them pass basic training.

Title: Rough Cut
Movie Plot: Two sophisticated jewel thieves join forces to steal $30 million in uncut jewels. Despite a continuous exchange of quips they eventually become romantically involved.

Title: Dinner with Friends
Movie Plot: Two married couples have their twelve-year bond of friendship put to the test when one couple reveals that they are splitting up.

Title: A Soldier's Story
Movie Plot: An African-American officer investigates a murder in a racially charged situation in World War II.

Title: The Money Pit
Movie Plot: A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

Title: Agnes of God
Movie Plot: When a naive novice nun is discovered with a dead newborn in her convent quarters, a court-appointed psychiatrist investigates her case.

Title: The 'Burbs
Movie Plot: An overstressed suburbanite and his neighbors are convinced that the new family on the block is part of a murderous Satanic cult.

Title: The Man with One Red Shoe
Movie Plot: A man picked randomly out of a crowd is made the target of CIA survelliance and pursuit.

Title: Turner & Hooch
Movie Plot: A detective must adopt a rambunctious dog in order to help him find a killer.

Title: Splash
Movie Plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid he briefly encountered as a boy and falls in love with her without knowing her secret.

Title: Volunteers
Movie Plot: 1962, after Yale graduation, womanizing Lawrence flees a gambling debt that his rich dad won't pay. He takes his roomie's place as Peace Corps Volunteer in Thai Golden Triangle with 2 other PCVs. Will he survive 2 years?

Title: Dragnet
Movie Plot: Sgt. Joe Friday and his partners methodically investigate crimes in Los Angeles.

Title: Dragnet 1967
Movie Plot: Police Detective Sgt. Joe Friday and his partners investigate crimes in Los Angeles.

Title: Joe Versus the Volcano
Movie Plot: When a hypochondriac learns that he is dying, he accepts an offer to throw himself in a volcano at a tropical island, and along the way there, learns to truly live.

Title: Spies Like Us
Movie Plot: Two bumbling government employees think they are U.S. spies, only to discover that they are actually decoys for Nuclear War.

Title: Nothing in Common
Movie Plot: A successful advertising executive finds his freewheeling life crashing to a halt when his parents end their longtime marriage.

Title: Mr. Sunshine
Movie Plot: Ben Donovan manages The Sunshine Centre, a second-rate sports arena in San Diego.

Title: Go On
Movie Plot: Pressured by his boss to join a support group because he can't move forward after his wife's death, an irreverent sportscaster finds connection with the extremely varied members.

Title: Man with a Plan
Movie Plot: A dad finds out that parenting is harder than he thought after his wife goes back to work and he's left at home to take care of the kids.

Title: The Odd Couple
Movie Plot: Two men, a neat freak and a slob separated from their wives, have to live together despite their differences.

Title: The Kennedys After Camelot
Movie Plot: Portrays the life of the former First Lady of the United States, Jacqueline Kennedy in the aftermath of the assassination of her husband, President John Fitzgerald Kennedy, as she becomes Jackie O. in life after Camelot.

Title: Kevin Can Wait
Movie Plot: A retired police officer is on a fresh career path as he rises to the challenge of being a newly single dad. His kids are grateful to him for making sure they're okay, but decide it's time for him to get out of the house, so they turn to Vanessa (Leah Remini), his former police partner, for help.

Title: Superior Donuts
Movie Plot: Sympathetic old-school doughnut-shop owner Arthur, his spunky young employee and aspiring artist Franco, and their friends and patrons keep the shop going in a changing culturally-mixed inner-city Chicago neighborhood.

Title: Happy Together
Movie Plot: Claire and Jake's married life is mired in routine, but when megastar Cooper shows up at their door, they get dragged into his life of fame.

Title: Dr. Ken
Movie Plot: A frustrated doctor juggles his career, marriage, and family.

Title: Three to Tango
Movie Plot: A rich businessman's assumption that his new colleague is gay leads him to ask the man to keep an eye on his mistress. However, the man is not gay--and he begins to fall for the woman himself.

Title: The Odd Couple
Movie Plot: A New Yorker newly separated from his wife moves in with his best friend, a divorced sportswriter, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.

Title: Studio 60 on the Sunset Strip
Movie Plot: A behind-the-scenes look at a fictional sketch-comedy television show.

Title: The Rebel
Movie Plot: Javid is a seventeen-year-old youngster, who has lost his parents years ago and has nobody except his half-sister Atefeh and his love Abra. Javid's life changes after meeting Bahman and his wife Tala.

Title: Mortal Wound
Movie Plot: Story of drama, love, and crime among relatives all connected through a huge holding company.

Title: Grassland
Movie Plot: The truth carries a heavy burden, whether it is said that it sets off a storm, or it remains in the heart that disturbs man. Between telling the truth and revealing a secret or being silent and expedient, one is preferable to the other.

Title: Sound and Fury
Movie Plot: Khosrow is a famous married singer involved with a troublesome affair and consequences of fame.

Title: The Painting Pool
Movie Plot: Maryam (Negar Javaherian) and Reza (Shahab Hosseini) are different from other people, it's not just a simple difference, but a very big difference. They must try to prove to others they have solved the big difference with the miracle of love ...—Persian Star

Title: Barareh Nights
Movie Plot: Set in late 40s in Iran. When a politically exiled man (Ansari) meets strange rural people with weird actions and accents in a village called Barareh.

Title: When the Moon Was Full
Movie Plot: In the market Abdolhamid meets Faezeh and falls in love with her. They get marry and begin their life. But after a while Faezeh becomes aware of Abdolhamid's family in Sistan and Baluchestan province and that they are doing illegals. Faezeh decides to escape with her husband to Pakistan but there they meet Abdolhamid's brother Abdolmalek Rigi who is a terrorist.—Ibrahim

Title: No Men Allowed
Movie Plot: This movie is about a strict girls high school whose faculties are all female. After the maternity leave of a chemistry teacher, the principal has to bent the rules for the presence of a male teacher in the girls high school.

Title: Lantouri
Movie Plot: A Girl, Maryam, is attacked with Acid by Pasha, a young man who is madly in love with her.

Title: Al imbrator
Movie Plot: A remake of "scarface",tells the turbulant world of drug dealing,damaged personal relationships,and the rise and the fall of a drug lord.

Title: ScarfFace
Movie Plot: ScarfFace takes us on an in-depth journey through the sub-culture of competitive eating, lifting the veil on the Major League Eating corporation and the untold story behind the epic rivalry between Joey Chestnut and Takeru Kobayashi.

Title: Once Upon a Time in Iran
Movie Plot: It is the story of a family on the first of September 1941, which undergoes changes during the occupation of Iran by the Allies.

Title: Capital
Movie Plot: The story of life of Naghi Ma'mouli, his wife Homa Sa'adat, their children Sara and Nika, his Alzheimer's father Panjali, his cousin Arastou, his sister Fahimeh, his sister's husband Behboud, his nieces Behtash and Behboud and his friend Rahmat. Their face different problems in each seasons.

Title: I'm Not Angry!
Movie Plot: I'm not Angry. is the story of Navid, a starred and expelled university student who - while trying to provide the least requirements of a normal life -, tries not to get angry when he is faced with the immoralities prevalent in the society, and does all he can not to lose his love, Setareh.

Title: Jeyran
Movie Plot: In the Qajar era 1852, The king of Persia, Naser al-Din Shah Qajar, falls in love with Jeyran, who loves Siavash.

Title: 'G' Men
Movie Plot: James Cagney helped jump-start the gangster genre as The Public Enemy. Outcries against movies that glorified underworld criminals put Cagney on the side of the law in 'G' Men.

Title: The Petrified Forest
Movie Plot: A waitress, a hobo and a bank robber get mixed up at a lonely diner in the desert.

Title: Smart Money
Movie Plot: A Greek barber has uncommon skills in playing poker and soon rises in the seedy world of illegal gambling, but pretty blondes remain his Achilles' heel.

Title: Footlight Parade
Movie Plot: Chester Kent struggles against time, romance, and a rival's spy to produce spectacular live "prologues" for movie houses.

Title: Angels with Filthy Souls
Movie Plot: The making of this fictional film from 'Home Alone' is discussed with crew members.

Title: Dead End
Movie Plot: The lives of a young man, a young woman, an infamous gangster, and a group of street kids converge one day in a volatile New York City slum.

Title: Gold Diggers of 1933
Movie Plot: A wealthy composer rescues unemployed Broadway performers with a new play, but insists on remaining anonymous.

Title: Shanghai Express
Movie Plot: A notorious woman rides a train through a dangerous situation with a British captain she loved.

Title: 42nd Street
Movie Plot: When the leading lady of a Broadway musical breaks her ankle, she is replaced by a young unknown actress, who becomes the star of the show.

Title: Tabu: A Story of the South Seas
Movie Plot: On the South Pacific island of Bora Bora, a young couple's love is threatened when the tribal chief declares the girl a sacred virgin.

Title: Make Way for Tomorrow
Movie Plot: An elderly couple are forced to live hundreds of miles apart when they lose their house and none of their five children will take both parents in.

Title: Fury
Movie Plot: When a wrongly-accused prisoner barely survives a lynch-mob attack and is presumed dead, he vindictively decides to fake his death and frame the mob for his supposed murder.

Title: Virasat
Movie Plot: After completing his studies in London, England, Shakti Thakur returns home to India in a small town where his family resides. Accompanying him is his leggy girlfriend, Anita, who he is in love with and wants to marry, much to the disapproval of his family. After a few days, Shakti starts to feel that nothing much has changed in this part of India and longs to return, as he is unable to bear the animosity between the townspeople, in general, and in particular between his Zamindar dad, Raja Thakur, and rival Zamindar Birju, none other than Raja's crippled brother. When Anita leaves the town to meet her parents elsewhere in India, Shakti too wants to follow her, but his plans change suddenly when his father passes away, and the region is ravaged by unprecedented natural calamities. Following the funeral he decides to stay on to look after the family estate and business temporarily, and that is when he meets local town belle, Gehna, who has given her heart to him years ago, hopes to marry him, with approval from his very own family. Anita returns to find that nothing is the same anymore, and that her role may be reduced to that of a mistress, she must now make a choice to either return back home, or fight and win back Shakti's love.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Captain Blood
Movie Plot: After treating a Monmouth rebel against King James II in 1680s England, a young Irish doctor is exiled as a slave to Jamaica where he captures a Spanish galleon and becomes the most feared pirate of the Caribbean.

Title: The Wife of an Important Man
Movie Plot: When Mona marries the seemingly decent police officer Hisham, she finds out there is more into him than what he shows to the people.

Title: Aatank Hi Aatank
Movie Plot: A farmer moves to the city with his wife and kids, he gets together with another man and runs a faction of gangsters. Years later, he becomes so unrivaled, that his opposition plans to execute him to get him out of their way.

Title: Agneepath
Movie Plot: A young boy's quest for revenge leads him to become a gangster as an adult, and with each day he becomes more and more like his enemies. Can he find vengeance and redemption?

Title: Carlito's Way: Deleted Scenes
Movie Plot: Deleted scenes from the 1993 film, 'Carlito's Way'.

Title: Design for Living
Movie Plot: A woman cannot decide between two men who love her, and the trio agree to try living together in a platonic friendly relationship.

Title: Ninotchka
Movie Plot: A stern Soviet woman sent to Paris to supervise the sale of jewels seized from Russian nobles finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

Title: Terminal Velocity
Movie Plot: A maverick skydiver and a former KGB agent team up to stop the Russian mafia from stealing gold.

Title: Bluebeard's Eighth Wife
Movie Plot: After learning her multi-millionaire fiancé has already been married seven times, the daughter of a penniless marquis decides to tame him.

Title: The Lady Eve
Movie Plot: A trio of classy card sharks targets a socially awkward brewery heir, until one of them falls in love with him.

Title: One Hour with You
Movie Plot: An unhappily married couple try to come between a happy one.

Title: The Smiling Lieutenant
Movie Plot: An amorous lieutenant is forced to marry a socially awkward princess, though he tries to keep his violin-playing girlfriend on the side.

Title: Heaven Can Wait
Movie Plot: An old roué arrives in Hades to review his life with Satan, who will rule on his eligibility to enter the Underworld.

Title: The Shop Around the Corner
Movie Plot: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

Title: Sullivan's Travels
Movie Plot: Hollywood director John L. Sullivan sets out to experience life as a homeless person in order to gain relevant life experience for his next movie.

Title: The Divorcee
Movie Plot: When a woman discovers that her husband has been unfaithful to her, she decides to respond to his infidelities in kind.

Title: Safe in Hell
Movie Plot: After accidentally killing the man who raped her and forced her into prostitution, a New Orleans woman flees to a Caribbean island. While she awaits her fiancé, the vicious local police chief sets his sights on her.

Title: Dishonored
Movie Plot: The Austrian Secret Service sends its most seductive agent to spy on the Russians.

Title: Svengali
Movie Plot: Through hypnotism and telepathic mind control, a sinister music maestro controls the singing voice, but not the heart, of the woman he loves.

Title: The Furies
Movie Plot: A firebrand heiress clashes with her tyrannical father, a cattle rancher who fancies himself a Napoleon, but their relationship turns ugly only when he finds himself a new woman.

Title: Daughter of the Dragon
Movie Plot: Princess Ling Moy, a young and beautiful Chinese aristocrat lives next door, unbeknownst to her, to Dr. Fu Manchu, a brilliant but twisted genius who is out to rule the world. She is involved with Ah Kee, a handsome young man, who also unbeknownst to her, is a secret agent out to thwart the heinous plots of Fu Manchu. As it turns out, Fu is not only her next-door neighbor, he is also, (unbeknownst to her), her father. When she finds out, will she take her father's part and fight the men out to get Fu, or will she become a brave heroine and save the world even if it is from the devious doings of her own Dad? Yes, it's dated, and there isn't nearly enough of Warner Oland in it; but it moves along well, has a lot of action, Wong and Hayakawa were fine actors, and if you're a Charley Chan fan, it's worth it to how much, if any, of Fu Oland used when creating Charley Chan.—Jim Knoppow

Title: The Cheat
Movie Plot: Woman in debt makes an impulsive investment which doesn't go her way.

Title: Back Street
Movie Plot: A woman's love for and devotion to a married man results in her being relegated to the "back streets" of his life.

Title: Eight Hours of Terror
Movie Plot: The plot concerns a passenger train which is stalled when a typhoon wrecks the tracks. The commuters are offloaded onto a shuttle bus, which is then taken over by a pair of sadistic gangsters.

Title: Baby Face
Movie Plot: A young woman, sexually exploited all her life, decides to turn the tables and exploit the hapless men at a big city bank by gleefully seducing her way to the top.

Title: Ace in the Hole
Movie Plot: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

Title: King Kong
Movie Plot: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

Title: They Drive by Night
Movie Plot: When one of two truck-driving brothers loses an arm, they both join a transport company where the other is falsely charged as an accessory in the murder of the owner.

Title: Bride of Frankenstein
Movie Plot: Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Baron Henry Frankenstein, goaded by an even madder scientist, builds his monster a mate.

Title: The Wolf Man
Movie Plot: Larry Talbot returns to his father's castle in Wales and meets a beautiful woman. One fateful night, Talbot escorts her to a local carnival where they meet a mysterious gypsy fortune teller.

Title: The Invisible Man
Movie Plot: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

Title: Duck Soup
Movie Plot: Rufus T. Firefly is named the dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of his wealthy backer Mrs. Teasdale, contending with two inept spies who can't seem to keep straight which side they're on.

Title: Marathon Man
Movie Plot: After the shocking murder of his older brother, a New York history student finds himself inexplicably hounded by shadowy government agents on the trail of a Nazi war criminal who is trying to retrieve smuggled diamonds.

Title: Freaks
Movie Plot: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of side-show performers, but his deformed friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.

Title: Three Days of the Condor
Movie Plot: A bookish CIA researcher in Manhattan finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

Title: Midnight Cowboy
Movie Plot: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.

Title: All the President's Men Revisited
Movie Plot: Looks back at Watergate, the original game changer of America politics. How has Watergate changed the Presidency? What effect has the scandal had on our political leaders? And has hope and optimism forever been replaced in our national dialogue by doubt and cynicism? 2013 marks 40 years since 1973 - Watergate's most pivotal year. Reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein doggedly investigated the scandal exposing the long, twisted trail of cover-ups and lies.—Discovery

Title: Annie Hall
Movie Plot: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.

Title: Easy Rider
Movie Plot: Two bikers head from L.A. to New Orleans through the open country and desert lands, and along the way they meet a man who bridges a counter-culture gap of which they had been unaware.

Title: Straw Dogs
Movie Plot: A young American and his English wife come to rural England and face increasingly vicious local harassment.

Title: The Searchers
Movie Plot: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a years-long journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches after the rest of his brother's family is massacred in a raid on their Texas farm.

Title: Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia
Movie Plot: An American barroom pianist and his prostitute girlfriend go on a trip through the Mexican underworld to collect the bounty on the head of a dead gigolo.

Title: The Getaway
Movie Plot: A recently-released ex-con and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes awry.

Title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
Movie Plot: A senator returns to a Western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

Title: Rio Bravo
Movie Plot: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Title: Down in the Valley
Movie Plot: Set in the present-day San Fernando Valley, the project revolves around a delusional man who believes he's a cowboy and the relationship that he starts with a rebellious young woman.

Title: Death of a Gunfighter
Movie Plot: A Texas town's council fires the town's old-fashioned marshal who refuses to resign, thus leading to violence from both sides.

Title: The Hired Hand
Movie Plot: Harry returns home to his wife and farm after drifting with his friend Arch and has to make a difficult decision regarding his loyalties.

Title: Zombie Holocaust
Movie Plot: An expedition in the East Indies, encounters not only the cannibals they were looking for, but also an evil scientist and his zombie army.

Title: From Noon Till Three
Movie Plot: After spending 3 unforgettable hours with an outlaw, a beautiful young widow turns her story into a worldwide famous book.

Title: Jacknife
Movie Plot: Two Vietnam vets search for the strength to face up to their horrific war experiences, but their friendship begins to splinter when one becomes romantically involved with the other's sister.

Title: Trackdown
Movie Plot: A Montana rancher (Jim Mitchum) comes to Los Angeles, searching for his runaway sister (Karen Lamm), who has become entangled in a world of crime, drugs, and prostitution.

Title: Seminole
Movie Plot: A cavalry lieutenant recounts his efforts to make peace with the Seminole Indian tribe, under an evil major.

Title: Strange Bargain
Movie Plot: In order to cash-in a life insurance policy, a failing business owner asks one of his employees, who has financial woes of his own, to aid him in disguising his suicide into a robbery-murder.

Title: The Three Outlaws
Movie Plot: Butch Cassidy, Sundance Kid and Bill Carver rob a train and go to Mexico to start a legitimate business but a Pinkerton man trails them and Mexican bandits want the trio's capital.

Title: Sharky's Machine
Movie Plot: Tom Sharky is demoted to vice after a bust goes terribly wrong. He and his team stumble across a mob murder tied to prostitution and government.

Title: The Duel
Movie Plot: A Texas Ranger investigates a series of unexplained deaths in a town called Helena.

Title: In the Heat of the Night
Movie Plot: A black Philadelphia police detective is mistakenly suspected of a local murder while passing through a racially hostile Mississippi town, and after being cleared is reluctantly asked by the police chief to investigate the case.

Title: The Verdict
Movie Plot: An outcast, alcoholic Boston lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

Title: Bonnie & Clyde
Movie Plot: Bonnie Parker and Clyde Barrow, an infamous American robbery team, were responsible for a 21-month crime spree from 1932. They robbed gas stations, restaurants, and small-town banks, chiefly operating in Texas, Oklahoma, and other states

Title: Anatomy of a Murder
Movie Plot: An upstate Michigan lawyer defends a soldier who claims he killed an innkeeper due to temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?

Title: Hud
Movie Plot: Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.

Title: Ordinary People
Movie Plot: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father and the guilt-ridden younger son.

Title: French Connection II
Movie Plot: "Popeye" Doyle travels to Marseille to find Alain Charnier, the drug smuggler who eluded him in New York.

Title: The French Connection 3
Movie Plot: NYPD Detective Popeye Doyle investigates the death of a local prostitute which soon leads him and his partner into a web of international intrigue and foreign assassins.

Title: Papillon
Movie Plot: Wrongfully convicted for murder, Henri Charriere forms an unlikely relationship with fellow inmate and quirky convicted counterfeiter, Louis Dega, in an attempt to escape from the notorious penal colony on Devil's Island.

Title: The Magnificent Seven
Movie Plot: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.

Title: Guns of the Magnificent Seven
Movie Plot: Gunslinger Chris Adams is hired by a Mexican revolutionary to organize the rescue of his cause's leader from a brutal Army prison.

Title: The Dirty Dozen
Movie Plot: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

Title: Canaan
Movie Plot: Mina has decided to leave her older husband Morteza after ten years of marriage. Next Monday will be her divorce date, which means her first step towards her goal; immigration. However, the arrival of her older sister, Azar, together with the illness of her mother in law is causing her trouble. To her surprise, meanwhile, she finds out she is pregnant.—p.a

Title: Low Heights
Movie Plot: A domestic Iranian flight is taken hostage by a man Ghasem who is a refugee of war and has financial problems. He will go any distance for his family and wants to find a better place for living.

Title: Set Me Free
Movie Plot: Hatef and Hatem are two brothers from a famous family that get involved in a complicated romantic situation, the exit of which may lead them to strange borders of love and hate.

Title: Actor
Movie Plot: Ali and Morteza, two talented theater actors who live in an abandoned theater enter complex adventures to achieve their dreams.

Title: Subtraction
Movie Plot: A married couple believe they meet their doppelgängers in Tehran.

Title: Conjugal Visit
Movie Plot: A girl named Parvaneh who owns a shop in the suburbs of Tehran and has a poor family whose father is in prison. Farhad, who is his father's ally, is in touch with Parvaneh for his father's work from time to time and is interested in her.

Title: Wednesday, May 9
Movie Plot: A not wealthy man publishes an ad which says near 25000$ will be donated to a needy person. His past makes whom to choose a super hard decision.

Title: Beyond the Wall
Movie Plot: The life of a blind man starts to fall apart when a wandering woman enters his life.

Title: Titi
Movie Plot: A physicist who's about to prove a thesis about the end of the world, meets a wired surrogate mother who wants to deserve humanity and makes a room of her own.

Title: Under the Skin of the City
Movie Plot: A valuable visual commentary on modern society, 'Under The Skin Of The City' follows one Iranian family in their eternal struggle to stay afloat financially and emotionally. Touba works hard at a textile factory to make ends meet during the day, returning in the evening to face the trials and tribulations of her family: her pregnant daughter who frequently suffers at the hands of her abusive husband, a son embroiled in radical politics, and another son who hopes to escape to Japan. In their fight for self-determination and independence, Touba and her family come to represent the plight of the working class in modern day Tehran.—IMVBox.com

Title: Trial on the Street
Movie Plot: Just a few hours to his wedding, Amir, a lad from the south of Tehran, receives a call from his closest friend Habib who insist on meeting him to speak about an urgent issue. He rushes to Habib's works place and there listens to Habib's devastating claim that his future wife is not the sexually innocent girl he believed. In a mixture of rage and bafflement, he takes the bride to the wedding place and then departs to reveal the truth about her past. At the same time, a guy named Nekooyi, the owner of a broken company gets stabbed by his friend who seems to have an affair with his wife, Nasim. To get to the airport and leave the country they take a taxi, driven by nobody but the guy sought by Amir...—Ramin S. Khanjani

Title: M like Mother
Movie Plot: What appears to be a grand love story turns sour when parents-to-be discover that their unborn child will likely be born with serious birth defects, as a result of the mother's exposure to chemical weapons during the Iran-Iraq war. The father does not want to have a disabled child, but the mother insists on going through with the pregnancy.—Anonymous

Title: The Cycle
Movie Plot: Ali and his father go from their poor neighborhood in the outskirts of the city to a hospital so that Ali's father can be treated for his sickness. However since they have no money, Ali starts to work for Dr. Sameri who deals in blood.

Title: Mom's Guest
Movie Plot: A mother of a poor family, has guests coming over, yet doesn't know how to get the dinner party altogether with limited resources.

Title: The Music Man
Movie Plot: Not being able to work because of the religious country's prejudice against music, a talented Santour player has to deal with poverty, addiction and the absence of his ex-wife.

Title: Crazy Rook
Movie Plot: A group of people who met on social media are forced to work together when one of them commits a crime which if not solved, will concern all of them.

Title: Hush! Girls Don't Scream
Movie Plot: Shirin is supposed to get married in a couple of hours, but she unexpectedly murders a man. The cause of the crime, rooted in her nightmarish childhood, unravels gradually and the real question emerges: Who is the REAL criminal?

Title: Bomb: A Love Story
Movie Plot: The film is based on the Tehran's Bombardment conditions in 1988.

Title: Saint Petersburg
Movie Plot: A newly released prisoner and an ostensibly rich youth become aware of the place of the Russian Tsar's long lost treasure by a twist of fate.

Title: The Expendables
Movie Plot: A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.

Title: Leily Is with Me
Movie Plot: During the war with Iraq, an absurd set of events has an Iranian documentary cinematographer seemingly unable to get out of a dangerous project documenting the war.

Title: Loving Pablo
Movie Plot: A journalist strikes up a romantic relationship with notorious drug lord Pablo Escobar.

Title: Pain and Glory
Movie Plot: A film director reflects on the choices he's made in life as the past and present come crashing down around him.

Title: Julieta
Movie Plot: After a casual encounter, a brokenhearted woman decides to confront her life and the most important events involving her estranged daughter.

Title: The Expendables 2
Movie Plot: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.

Title: RED
Movie Plot: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last-ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.

Title: Ransom
Movie Plot: Multi-millionaire Tom Mullen's son is kidnapped, but after initially agreeing to pay the ransom Mullen then decides to use the ransom money as a bounty.

Title: Conspiracy Theory
Movie Plot: A taxi driver with a penchant for conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of these theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

Title: The Last Boy Scout
Movie Plot: A private detective's protected female witness is murdered, prompting him and the victim's boyfriend to investigate the crime that leads to a corrupt politician and a crooked football team owner.

Title: Beverly Hills Cop II
Movie Plot: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogomil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.

Title: Maverick
Movie Plot: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

Title: RED 2
Movie Plot: Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

Title: Lethal Weapon
Movie Plot: A slightly unhinged cop is partnered with a veteran detective trying to maintain a low stress level in his life.

Title: Beverly Hills Cop
Movie Plot: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

Title: Con Air
Movie Plot: Newly-paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner-transport plane when the passengers seize control.

Title: Face/Off
Movie Plot: To foil a terrorist plot, FBI agent Sean Archer assumes the identity of the criminal Castor Troy who murdered his son through facial transplant surgery, but the crook wakes up prematurely and vows revenge.

Title: Armageddon
Movie Plot: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas will impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a misfit team of deep-core drillers to save the planet.

Title: Gone in 60 Seconds
Movie Plot: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

Title: National Treasure
Movie Plot: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

Title: Air Force One
Movie Plot: Communist radicals hijack Air Force One with the U.S. President and his family on board. The Vice President negotiates from Washington D.C., while the President, a veteran, fights to rescue the hostages on board.

Title: Enemy of the State
Movie Plot: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

Title: Point Break
Movie Plot: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

Title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
Movie Plot: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

Title: The Fugitive
Movie Plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

Title: True Lies
Movie Plot: A bored linguistics professor discovers after 17 years that her tech salesman husband is secretly a top international spy. Now she has a use for her martial arts workouts and endless supply of languages.

Title: Rambo: Last Blood
Movie Plot: Rambo must confront his past and unearth his ruthless combat skills to exact revenge in a final mission.

Title: Payback
Movie Plot: After a successful heist, Porter is left for dead. Once he recovers, he seeks vengeance and wants his share of the money.

Title: The Cabinet of Caligari
Movie Plot: When young Jane Lindstorm's (Glynis Johns) car breaks down, she makes her way to a somewhat frightening-looking mansion for help. Once there, however, her problems go from bad worse.

Title: The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari
Movie Plot: When the annual fair comes to town, murder, madness and mayhem creep in its shadows. Dr. Caligari, a mysterious hypnotist, appears to control every move of his bizarre, clairvoyant sleepwalker, but does he?

Title: An Andalusian Dog
Movie Plot: Luis Buñuel and Salvador Dalí present 16 minutes of bizarre, surreal imagery.

Title: The Great Train Robbery
Movie Plot: A group of bandits stage a brazen train hold-up, only to find a determined posse hot on their heels.

Title: Aguirre, the Wrath of God
Movie Plot: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

Title: Fitzcarraldo
Movie Plot: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.

Title: Woyzeck
Movie Plot: Franz Woyzeck is a hapless, hopeless soldier, alone and powerless in society, assaulted from all sides by forces he can not control.

Title: The Enigma of Kaspar Hauser
Movie Plot: A young man named Kaspar Hauser suddenly appears in Nuremberg in 1828, barely able to talk or walk, and bearing a strange note.

Title: Cobra Verde
Movie Plot: During the 1800s, paroled Brazilian bandit Cobra Verde is sent to West Africa with a few troops to man an old Portuguese fort and to convince the local African ruler to resume the slave trade with Brazil.

Title: Vampire in Venice
Movie Plot: Professor Paris Catalano visits Venice, to investigate the last known appearance of the famous vampire Nosferatu during the carnival of 1786.

Title: Possession
Movie Plot: A woman starts exhibiting increasingly disturbing behavior after asking her husband for a divorce. Suspicions of infidelity soon give way to something much more sinister.

Title: Horror of Dracula
Movie Plot: When Jonathan Harker rouses the ire of Count Dracula for accepting a job at the vampire's castle under false pretenses, his friend Dr. Van Helsing pursues the predatory villain.

Title: Repulsion
Movie Plot: A sex-repulsed woman who disapproves of her sister's boyfriend sinks into depression and has horrific visions of rape and violence.

Title: Cliffhanger
Movie Plot: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

Title: Tango & Cash
Movie Plot: Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a pair of mismatched LAPD officers must put their differences aside to get even with the brutal crime baron who sent them to rot in a maximum-security prison.

Title: Son of Frankenstein
Movie Plot: Returning to the ancestral castle long after the death of the monster, the son of Dr. Frankenstein meets a mad shepherd who is hiding the comatose creature. To clear the family name, he revives the creature and tries to rehabilitate him.

Title: The Mummy
