Movie Plot: A resurrected Egyptian mummy searches Cairo for the girl he believes to be his long-lost princess.

Title: Creature from the Black Lagoon
Movie Plot: A strange prehistoric beast lurks in the depths of the Amazonian jungle. A group of scientists try to capture the animal and bring it back to civilization for study.

Title: Frankenstein
Movie Plot: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

Title: Frankenstein Meets the Wolf Man
Movie Plot: The resurrected Wolf Man, seeking a cure for his malady, enlists the aid of a mad scientist, who claims he will not only rid the Wolf Man of his nocturnal metamorphosis, but also revive the frozen body of Frankenstein's inhuman creation.

Title: The Ghost of Frankenstein
Movie Plot: Dr. Frankenstein's plans to replace the brain of his monster are hijacked by his scheming and malevolent assistant Ygor.

Title: Man with a Movie Camera
Movie Plot: A man travels around a city with a camera slung over his shoulder, documenting urban life with dazzling invention.

Title: October (Ten Days that Shook the World)
Movie Plot: A large-scale view on the events of 1917 in Russia, when the monarchy was overthrown.

Title: Strike
Movie Plot: A group of oppressed factory workers go on strike in pre-revolutionary Russia.

Title: Ivan the Terrible, Part I
Movie Plot: During the early part of his reign, Ivan the Terrible faces betrayal from the aristocracy and even his closest friends as he seeks to unite the Russian people.

Title: Alexander Nevsky
Movie Plot: The story of how a great Russian prince led a ragtag army to battle an invading force of Teutonic Knights.

Title: The Last Laugh
Movie Plot: An aging doorman is forced to face the scorn of his friends, neighbors and society after being fired from his prestigious job at a luxurious hotel.

Title: Drácula
Movie Plot: Centuries-old vampire Dracula preys upon the innocent Eva and her friends.

Title: Nosferatu Re-Animated
Movie Plot: Nosferatu. The greatest horror film ever made. A masterpiece that inspired many film makers and animators. This animated film re-make pays homage to the German 1922 film, with a contemporary animation style, and an updated sound track.

Title: Dracula's Daughter
Movie Plot: When Countess Marya Zaleska appears in London, mysterious events occur that lead Dr. Von Helsing to believe that the Countess must be a vampire.

Title: Red Scream Nosferatu
Movie Plot: Red Scream Nosferatu is an edgy, blood-drenched revisioning of the classic original vampire film. When Jonothan Harker travels to the castle of Count Orlok on business he instead becomes a prisoner of the Count and the plaything of the Count's three vampire brides. When Orlok abandons the castle to make Jonothan's wife Mina his new love, the three brides seek to transform Jonothan into their new master through a ritual of torture and blood. Fusing elements of the original film and the original Dracula novel with a steampunk aesthetic Red Scream Nosferatu pays respectful homage to the original film while infusing new blood into this classic vampire tale.—David R Williams

Title: Nosferatu: The First Vampire
Movie Plot: The horror classic, Nosferatu, remastered with a soundtrack by Type-O Negative and hosted by David Carradine.

Title: The Astronomer's Dream; or, the Man in the Moon
Movie Plot: An astronomer falls asleep and has a strange dream involving a fairy queen and the Moon.

Title: The Arrival of a Train
Movie Plot: A train arrives at La Ciotat station.

Title: Leaving the Factory
Movie Plot: Workers leaving the Lumière factory for lunch in Lyon, France in 1895; a place of great photographic innovation and one of the birth places of cinema.

Title: L'homme à la tête en caoutchouc
Movie Plot: A chemist carries out a bizarre experiment with his own head.

Title: À la conquête du pôle
Movie Plot: Aboard the futuristic flying machine of his own invention, Professor Mabouloff and his team of intercultural explorers set off on yet another impossible expedition to North Pole's vast landscapes. What wonders await the bold adventurers?

Title: Wings
Movie Plot: Two young men, one rich, one middle class, who are in love with the same woman, become fighter pilots in World War I.

Title: The Waterer Watered
Movie Plot: An impudent child plays a prank on a gardener innocently watering his plants.

Title: Four Heads Are Better Than One
Movie Plot: Much to our amazement, an elegant and masterful illusionist detaches his own head effortlessly from his shoulders for a once-in-a-lifetime performance.

Title: Dawn of the Dead
Movie Plot: During an escalating zombie epidemic, two Philadelphia SWAT team members, a traffic reporter and his TV executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

Title: The Rules of the Game
Movie Plot: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

Title: The Crowd
Movie Plot: The life of a man and woman together in a large, impersonal metropolis through their hopes, struggles, and downfalls.

Title: Day of the Dead
Movie Plot: As the world is overrun by zombies, a group of scientists and military personnel sheltering in an underground bunker in Florida must decide on how they should deal with the undead horde.

Title: The Return of the Living Dead
Movie Plot: When two bumbling employees at a medical supply warehouse accidentally release a deadly gas into the air, the vapors cause the dead to rise again as zombies.

Title: Land of the Dead
Movie Plot: The living dead have taken over the world, and the last humans live in a walled city to protect themselves as they come to grips with the situation.

Title: Night of the Living Dead
Movie Plot: When the unburied dead return to life and seek human victims, seven refugees shelter in a house in the Pennsylvanian countryside.

Title: Diary of the Dead
Movie Plot: A group of young film students run into real-life zombies while filming a horror movie of their own.

Title: Dawn of the Dead
Movie Plot: A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.

Title: Mechanic: Resurrection
Movie Plot: Bishop's most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life in order to make him complete three impossible assassinations and make them look like accidents.

Title: Homefront
Movie Plot: A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.

Title: Survival of the Dead
Movie Plot: On an island off the coast of North America, local residents simultaneously fight a zombie epidemic while hoping for a cure to return their un-dead relatives back to their human state.

Title: The Mechanic
Movie Plot: An elite hitman teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.

Title: Guy Ritchie's the Covenant
Movie Plot: During the war in Afghanistan, a local interpreter risks his own life to carry an injured sergeant across miles of grueling terrain.

Title: Parker
Movie Plot: A thief with a unique code of professional ethics is double-crossed by his crew and left for dead. Assuming a new disguise and forming an unlikely alliance with a woman on the inside, he looks to hijack the score of the crew's latest heist.

Title: The Beekeeper
Movie Plot: One man's brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after he is revealed to be a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organization known as "Beekeepers".

Title: Plane
Movie Plot: A pilot finds himself caught in a war zone after he's forced to land his commercial aircraft during a terrible storm.

Title: Swept Away
Movie Plot: A snooty socialite is stranded on a Mediterranean island with a communist sailor.

Title: Redemption
Movie Plot: A damaged ex-special forces soldier navigating London's criminal underworld seizes an opportunity to assume another man's identity.

Title: Wild Card
Movie Plot: When a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal skills and a gambling problem gets in trouble with the mob, he has one last play...and it's all or nothing.

Title: Blitz
Movie Plot: A tough cop is dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers.

Title: The Follow
Movie Plot: The Driver is now spying on a celebrity's wife suspected of adultery.

Title: Chosen
Movie Plot: The Driver is carrying an East Asian child who has been chosen for a strange rite. He must drive him through the city to get to a monk's house, while eluding several cars out to get the child.

Title: Ticker
Movie Plot: The Driver finds himself in a dangerous, yet highly political situation; this time being pursued by a helicopter gunship while carrying a passenger with a suitcase, the contents of which will decide the fate of a nation.

Title: Beat the Devil
Movie Plot: Decades ago, the legendary James Brown sold his soul to the devil for fame and fortune. Now he wishes to renegotiate. Hired to take Mr. Brown to a rendezvous with the devil, the driver soon finds himself entangled in fiendish plans.

Title: Powder Keg
Movie Plot: January 13, 2001. Times war photographer Harvey Jacobs is wounded while witnessing a massacre at Nuevo Colon by terrorists. In a desperate effort, the United Nations sends a vehicle to get him out, a BMW driven by the mysterious Driver.

Title: Ambush
Movie Plot: A mysterious BMW driver must protect an eccentric old foreigner from criminals.

Title: Hostage
Movie Plot: The driver races to locate a kidnapped victim locked in the trunk of an abandoned car somewhere on the water's edge. Linked to her only by cell phone, the driver narrows in on her location in a desperate race against time and tide.

Title: The Escape
Movie Plot: In this homage to the 15th anniversary of the original series of BMW short films, The Driver is hired to deliver a living human clone.

Title: The Hard Case
Movie Plot: About four East End lads raising money to enter a card game.

Title: Warcraft
Movie Plot: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.

Title: King Arthur
Movie Plot: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

Title: Baabul
Movie Plot: When his only son dies in an accident, Balraaj urges his depressed daughter-in-law to marry a man who has long loved her in silence.

Title: Masoom
Movie Plot: A happy family goes through turbulent times because of a big mistake by one of the family members.

Title: King Uncle
Movie Plot: When a runaway orphan ends up at the house of a cruel millionaire, she decides to alter his perception of the world.

Title: Mother India
Movie Plot: In this melodrama, a poverty-stricken woman raises her sons through many trials and tribulations. But no matter the struggles, she always sticks to her own moral code.

Title: Chaalbaaz
Movie Plot: Twins separated at infancy are brought up differently. One weak, one strong. One day, they end up at each others house. Their life is not the same anymore.

Title: The Golem
Movie Plot: In 16th-century Prague, a rabbi creates the Golem - a giant creature made of clay. Using sorcery, he brings the creature to life in order to protect the Jews of Prague from persecution.

Title: Tartuffe
Movie Plot: A young man shows his millionaire grandfather a film based on Molière's Tartuffe, in order to expose the old man's hypocritical governess who covets his own inheritance.

Title: Häxan
Movie Plot: Fictionalized documentary showing the evolution of witchcraft, from its pagan roots to its confusion with hysteria in Eastern Europe.

Title: Destiny
Movie Plot: When a woman's fiancé disappears, Death gives her three chances to save him from his fate.

Title: City Girl
Movie Plot: A Chicago waitress falls in love with a Minnesota farmer, and decides to face a life in the country.

Title: The Phantom Carriage
Movie Plot: On New Year's Eve, the driver of a ghostly carriage forces a drunken man to reflect on his selfish, wasted life.

Title: Jug Jugg Jeeyo
Movie Plot: Two couples from different generations confront their issues after marriage.

Title: Pandora's Box
Movie Plot: The rise and inevitable fall of an amoral but naive young woman whose insouciant eroticism inspires lust and violence in those around her.

Title: Sharmaji Namkeen
Movie Plot: A light-hearted coming-of-age story of a lovable 60-year-old-man.

Title: Mere Brother Ki Dulhan
Movie Plot: A quirky rom-com where Kush finds the ideal Indian bride Dimple for his brother Luv and a series of comical and unpredictable events follow.

Title: Barzakh
Movie Plot: Family drama unfolds as a reclusive resort owner invites his estranged children to his third and final wedding, but the locals believe his bride-to-be is a long-dead woman.

Title: Hi Nanna
Movie Plot: A single father begins to narrate the story of the missing mother to his child and nothing remains the same.

Title: Gulmohar
Movie Plot: Follows the final four days of the Batra family living in their 31-year-old family home as they move to a new city.

Title: Zara Hatke Zara Bachke
Movie Plot: Kapil and Somya are a happily married couple from Indore who live in a joint family and decide to get a divorce one fine day. Things don't go as planned as their family gets to know of it, and thus begins a comedy of errors.

Title: Goodbye
Movie Plot: A heartwarming story of the Bhalla family that depicts their journey of grief and self-discovery after they suffer the loss of their loved one.

Title: The Great Indian Family
Movie Plot: Ved Vyas Tripathi, aka Bhajan Kumar, is a devout Hindu man who faces an identity crisis and a personal dilemma when he discovers he is actually a Muslim by birth.

Title: Mujhse Dosti Karoge!
Movie Plot: Meet Raj, Pooja and Tina - 3 best friends thrown into a situation that time, letters, love and separation have created for them.

Title: Ta Ra Rum Pum
Movie Plot: Ace car racer RV and his wife have the world at their feet. But he has an accident and his world is turned upside down. Can he reclaim his lost glory?

Title: Silsila
Movie Plot: SILSILA is a love story, thwarted by society's demands, which reappears as adultery but can it survive in the face of society?

Title: Return of Hanuman
Movie Plot: A young boy, Minku, ridiculed by his friends, begs the gods to send him down to Earth, and his wish is granted.

Title: Waqt: The Race Against Time
Movie Plot: Ishwar Chandra Thakur is living the good life, content with his loving wife Sumitra and son Adiya. There is but one thing which gradually comes to annoy Ishwar: his son's laziness and dependency on his father.

Title: Aamdani Atthanni Kharcha Rupaiya
Movie Plot: In order to make ends meet, three women steps out from their houses for earning. However, this irks their jobless husbands who can go to extreme lengths to stop them.

Title: I Am Kalam
Movie Plot: An impoverished boy forms an unlikely and unstable friendship with the lonely son of a nobleman.

Title: Khichdi: The Movie
Movie Plot: In order to immortalize his love, a groom decides to create conflict between his and his to-be bride's families.

Title: Bawarchi
Movie Plot: A dysfunctional middle-class family is transformed due to the influence of their new multi-talented household servant - but he might be too good to be true.

Title: Now You See Me
Movie Plot: An F.B.I. Agent and an Interpol Detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances, and reward their audiences with the money.

Title: Ocean's Eleven
Movie Plot: Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

Title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
Movie Plot: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

Title: Skyfall
Movie Plot: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

Title: Ocean's Thirteen
Movie Plot: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.

Title: Makdee
Movie Plot: In a small North Indian village, Legend has it that a 100 years-old witch lives in an abandoned mansion on the village outskirts, and any person who goes inside is turned into an animal. In the same village a clever, naughty girl named Chunni (Shweta Prasad) lives with her widowed father, grandmother and her identical twin Munni, who is just the exact opposite of Chunni in mannerisms. But one day, Chunni's prank causes Munni enters the witch's mansion and the witch turns her into a hen. Chunni strikes a deal with Makdee (Shabana Azmi) that she will present Makdee with 100 hens in exchange for Munni in human form. How she manages this task forms the crux of the rest of this fun-filled children's movie.—Soumitra

Title: Ocean's Twelve
Movie Plot: Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's Eleven (2001).

Title: Son Pari
Movie Plot: A motherless child finds hope and care in a fairy.

Title: Lawless
Movie Plot: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a trio of bootlegging brothers are threatened by a new special deputy and other authorities angling for a cut of their profits.

Title: Locke
Movie Plot: Ivan Locke, a dedicated family man and successful construction manager, receives a phone call on the eve of the biggest challenge of his career that sets in motion a series of events that threaten his carefully cultivated existence.

Title: Green Street Hooligans
Movie Plot: A wrongfully expelled Harvard undergrad moves to London, where he is introduced to the violent underworld of football hooliganism.

Title: Capone
Movie Plot: After a 10 year stint, former bootlegger and notorious criminal Al Capone starts to show signs of dementia, forcing him to face the demons of his violent past.

Title: Taboo
Movie Plot: Adventurer James Keziah Delaney returns to London during the War of 1812 to rebuild his late father's shipping empire. However, both the government and his biggest competitor want his inheritance at any cost--even murder.

Title: The Drop
Movie Plot: Bob Saginowski finds himself at the center of a robbery gone awry and entwined in an investigation that digs deeply into the neighborhood's past where friends, families, and foes all work together to make a living--no matter the cost.

Title: Kick-Ass
Movie Plot: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

Title: Viva La Madness
Movie Plot: A drug dealer trying to get out of the criminal world is roped back into it.

Title: The King's Man
Movie Plot: In the early years of the 20th century, the Kingsman agency is formed to stand against a cabal plotting a war to wipe out millions.

Title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
Movie Plot: After the Kingsman's headquarters is destroyed and the world is held hostage, an allied spy organization in the United States is discovered. These two elite secret agencies must band together to defeat a common enemy.

Title: Paathshaala
Movie Plot: A new English school-teacher also teaches music but ends up leading both teachers and students to revolt against the school management.

Title: Titanic
Movie Plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Title: Nike: Awaken the Phantom
Movie Plot: A mysterious soccer player becomes, through word of mouth, an urban legend of terrifying proportions.

Title: Notting Hill
Movie Plot: A set of circumstances makes Anna Scott, a famous actress, fall in love with William Thacker, owner of a bookstore in Notting Hill. But the paparazzi's fascination with her complicates their bond.

Title: Columbia Winter
Movie Plot: An advertisement for clothing line called Columbia Winter.

Title: Charlie St. Cloud
Movie Plot: After Charlie survives a car crash that kills his younger brother, he is given the gift of seeing the spirits of his brother and others who he has lost, and must use his powers to save the woman he loves from impending disaster.

Title: The Way We Were
Movie Plot: During post-WWII McCarthyism, a diametrically opposed couple come together only to find out that genuine friendship and physical attraction is not enough to overcome fundamental societal beliefs.

Title: Making the Grade
Movie Plot: Two female students are both madly in love with their hot teacher, Mr. Slattery (Hugh Jackman). When it comes time to taking a final exam that will determine if the students pass the class, a drastic move by one of the two students results in an interesting plot twist.—Corey Smith

Title: Save Ralph
Movie Plot: Ralph, a bunny being interviewed for a documentary, goes through his daily routine as a "tester" in a lab.

Title: Erskineville Kings
Movie Plot: Barky, 25, lost soul, left home two years ago to escape his abusive father leaving behind everything in the world that was important to him; now that his father's dead, he thinks it's safe to come home.

Title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
Movie Plot: The legendary tale of a barber who returns from wrongful imprisonment to 1840s London, bent on revenge for the rape and death of his wife, and resumes his trade while forming a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett.

Title: Moulin Rouge!
Movie Plot: A poor Bohemian poet in 1890s Paris falls for a beautiful courtesan and nightclub star coveted by a jealous duke.

Title: Les Misérables
Movie Plot: Television adaptation of Victor Hugo's classic novel, which follows Jean Valjean as he evades capture by the unyielding Inspector Javert. Set against a backdrop of post-Napoleonic France as unrest begins to grip the city of Paris once more.

Title: Les Misérables
Movie Plot: Valjean, a former criminal, has atoned for his past and now finds himself in the midst of the French Revolution, avoiding a law-obsessed policeman hell-bent on capturing him.

Title: Oklahoma!
Movie Plot: Cowboy Curly McClain tries to win the heart of a girl in a singing and dancing extravaganza.

Title: Rocket Man
Movie Plot: A recently widowed Welsh man struggles to build a rocket to launch his wife's ashes into space.

Title: Eddie the Eagle
Movie Plot: The story of Eddie Edwards, the notoriously tenacious British underdog ski jumper who charmed the world at the 1988 Winter Olympics.

Title: Elvis
Movie Plot: The life of American music icon Elvis Presley, from his childhood to becoming a rock and movie star in the 1950s while maintaining a complex relationship with his manager, Colonel Tom Parker.

Title: Little Match Girl
Movie Plot: Scandinavia, 1846. A poor young girl forced to sell matchsticks desperately lights one match to survive the winter night. She is drawn into a dream world where the flames of fire give her hope for a better life, while the cold creeps closer. Based on H.C. Andersen's short story.

Title: Florence Foster Jenkins
Movie Plot: The story of Florence Foster Jenkins, a New York heiress who dreamed of becoming an opera singer, despite having a terrible singing voice.

Title: The Snowman
Movie Plot: Detective Harry Hole investigates the disappearance of a woman whose scarf is found wrapped around an ominous-looking snowman.

Title: Vi
Movie Plot: This is a story of IDA and KRISTER. It's about a relationship that goes to hell. They are both crazy in love but manage to strangle the supply of oxygen and adapt to each other in a way that will lead to catastrophic consequences.

Title: The Vatican
Movie Plot: Explores the relationships and rivalries, in addition to the mysteries and miracles behind the Catholic church.

Title: Doctor Sleep
Movie Plot: Years following the events of The Shining (1980), a now-adult Dan Torrance must protect a young girl with similar powers from a cult known as The True Knot, who prey on children with powers to remain immortal.

Title: Life: Astronaut Diaries
Movie Plot: The characters share a few brief (visually pixelated and compressed) thoughts.

Title: The Red Tent
Movie Plot: The story of the twelve tribes of Israel is told through the eyes of Jacob's only daughter, Dinah.

Title: Pitch Perfect 3
Movie Plot: Following their win at the world championship, the now separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices.

Title: The Girl on the Train
Movie Plot: A divorcee becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation that promises to send shockwaves throughout her life.

Title: Ocean's Eight
Movie Plot: Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's annual Met Gala.

Title: Miss Congeniality
Movie Plot: An F.B.I. Agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.

Title: Pitch Perfect: Bumper in Berlin
Movie Plot: Bumper moves to Germany to revive his music career after one of his songs becomes big in Berlin.

Title: Saturday Night Fever
Movie Plot: Anxious about his future after high school, a 19-year-old Italian-American from Brooklyn tries to escape the harsh reality of his bleak family life by dominating the dance floor at the local disco.

Title: Grease 2
Movie Plot: A British student at a 1960s American high school must prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

Title: Pretty Woman
Movie Plot: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

Title: The Breakfast Club
Movie Plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a great deal more in common than they thought.

Title: A Star Is Born
Movie Plot: A has-been rock star falls in love with a young, up-and-coming songstress.

Title: Bridget Jones's Diary
Movie Plot: Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.

Title: A Star Is Born
Movie Plot: A film star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career on a downward spiral.

Title: A Star Is Born
Movie Plot: A young woman comes to Hollywood with dreams of stardom, and achieves them only with the help of an alcoholic leading man whose best days are behind him.

Title: The Hangover
Movie Plot: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

Title: Mamma Mia! I Have a Dream
Movie Plot: A talent or reality search for the next Sophie and Sky in the Westend musical Mamma Mia. Six boys or six girls will compete for the roles - singing, dancing, and acting challenges, inspired by the movies or musical.

Title: The Great Gatsby
Movie Plot: A Midwesterner becomes fascinated with his nouveau riche neighbor, who obsesses over his lost love.

Title: Tribhanga
Movie Plot: The lives of three women spanning the late 1980s to present day and underscores the value of family in everyday life.

Title: Peranbu
Movie Plot: A single father tries to raise his daughter, who has cerebral palsy, even as she is beginning to wake up to her sexuality.

Title: #Home
Movie Plot: Oliver Twist (Indrans) wants to be tech-savvy and become a better companion to his two sons, who spend more time on their phones than with their loved ones.

Title: We Are Family
Movie Plot: A divorced mother of three children runs a happy household - until her former husband brings his new career-oriented girlfriend into the picture.

Title: Aao Wish Karein
Movie Plot: Smitten by a 22-year old woman, a 12-year old boy's wish to be older comes true.

Title: Ghar Ki Murgi
Movie Plot: Seema a devoted house wife whose day starts early morning by making her children ready to school.preparing her husband's Tiffin and taking care of her in laws and doing all household cores.In her spare time in afternoon she runs her beauty parlor in house.Seema is fed of as she slogs daily in the house and nobody cares her.Her family gets concerned who will take care of their house when she decides that she wants a break to travel alone to Goa for a month.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Title: Tick Tick Boom
Movie Plot: A bittersweet multi-plot story about how life doesn't always work out the way you planned. Pelle is in love with Dagmar and really wants to reveal this to her, but his drunken dad keeps getting in the way. Rasmus can't accept that his newborn son is seriously ill and ends up distancing himself from his wife in order to try to hold on to the hope. Aksel wants to get back together with his ex-wife and is using his daughter as a go-between until the day when his ex-wife suddenly brings home a new boyfriend.—Tick Tick Boom

Title: Rent: Filmed Live on Broadway
Movie Plot: Set in New York City's gritty East Village, the revolutionary rock opera RENT tells the story of a group of bohemians struggling to live and pay their rent. "Measuring their lives in love," these starving artists strive for success and acceptance while enduring the obstacles of poverty, illness and the AIDS epidemic.—Anonymous

Title: Rent: Live
Movie Plot: The story of several friends in New York City facing financial poverty, homophobia, AIDS, and, of course, rent.

Title: Tick Tock Boom Clap
Movie Plot: Sometimes life leaves you hanging.

Title: Fist Fight
Movie Plot: When one school teacher unwittingly causes another teacher's dismissal, he is challenged to an after-school fight.

Title: The Tick
Movie Plot: In a world where superheroes have been real for decades, an accountant with no superpowers comes to realize his city is owned by a super villain. As he struggles to uncover this conspiracy, he falls in league with a strange blue superhero.

Title: West Side Story
Movie Plot: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

Title: The Babadook
Movie Plot: A single mother and her child fall into a deep well of paranoia when an eerie children's book titled "Mister Babadook" manifests in their home.

Title: The Eyes of Tammy Faye
Movie Plot: An intimate look at the extraordinary rise, fall and redemption of televangelist Tammy Faye Bakker.

Title: Belfast
Movie Plot: A young boy and his working-class Belfast family experience the tumultuous late 1960s.

Title: Nightmare Alley
Movie Plot: A grifter working his way up from low-ranking carnival worker to lauded psychic medium matches wits with a psychologist bent on exposing him.

Title: All Quiet on the Western Front
Movie Plot: A young German soldier's terrifying experiences and distress on the western front during World War I.

Title: Emancipation
Movie Plot: A runaway slave forges through the swamps of Louisiana on a tortuous journey to escape plantation owners that nearly killed him.

Title: Chicago
Movie Plot: Two death-row murderesses develop a fierce rivalry while competing for publicity, celebrity, and a sleazy lawyer's attention.

Title: Across the Universe
Movie Plot: The music of The Beatles and the Vietnam War form the backdrop for the romance between an upper-class American girl and a poor Liverpudlian artist.

Title: The Phantom of the Opera
Movie Plot: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured and murderous musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opéra House.

Title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
Movie Plot: A newly-engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must seek shelter at the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-n-Furter.

Title: Carmen
Movie Plot: Benjamin Millepied's complete reimagining of CARMEN tells a story through an experimental dreamscape featuring an original score and songs.

Title: Dos Veces Tú
Movie Plot: Tania and Daniela exchange husbands during a wedding just for fun, but a fatal accident will create new, strange relationships.

Title: Bed Rest
Movie Plot: A pregnant woman on bed rest begins to wonder if her house is haunted or it's all in her head.

Title: El Hotel
Movie Plot: In a city with little water, the chaotic life of Alexandra 30, and her adorable daughter Maria 9, takes a turn with the death of her father who inherits a little hotel on the beach. In the Caribbean they begin a life of responsibilities, work, new friendships and struggle with the corrupt.

Title: Tanto amor
Movie Plot: The greatest love to be born, within secrets, lies and murder.

Title: About him & her
Movie Plot: Crossed phone lines in 1989 lead to a life changing conversation between two strangers, who eventually meet in an unusual way.

Title: Sacudete Las Penas
Movie Plot: González, un preso con una larga condena, cuenta la historia de Pepe Frituras, el bailarín más famoso de la ciudad de México que en una noche de juerga, perdería su libertad, terminando en el Palacio de Lecumberri, el penal más peligroso del país.

Title: Story Ave
Movie Plot: Follows a teenage graffiti artist who ran away from home and holds up an unwary MTA worker in a robbery gone right that would change their lives forever.

Title: Pretty Red Dress
Movie Plot: Follows a South London family and how one red dress is the center of their lives.

Title: The Starling Girl
Movie Plot: 17-year-old Jem Starling struggles with her place within her Christian fundamentalist community. But everything changes when her magnetic youth pastor Owen returns to their church.

Title: Boy A
Movie Plot: The story of a young Jack, newly released from serving a prison sentence for a violent crime he committed as a child.

Title: Keep Breathing
Movie Plot: When a small plane crashes in the middle of the Canadian wilderness, a lone woman must battle the elements and odds to survive.

Title: Breathe
Movie Plot: The inspiring true love story of Robin and Diana Cavendish, an adventurous couple who refuse to give up in the face of a devastating disease.

Title: National Theatre Live: Angels in America Part Two: Perestroika
Movie Plot: America in the mid-1980s. In the midst of the AIDS crisis and a conservative Reagan administration, New Yorkers grapple with life and death, love and sex, heaven and hell.

Title: Under the Silver Lake
Movie Plot: Sam, a disenchanted young man, finds a mysterious woman swimming in his apartment's pool one night. The next morning, she disappears. Sam sets off across LA to find her, and along the way he uncovers a conspiracy far more bizarre.

Title: Do Revenge
Movie Plot: Drea and Eleanor agree to go after one another's bullies.

Title: Spree
Movie Plot: Thirsty for a following, Kurt Kunkle is a rideshare driver who has figured out a deadly plan to go viral.

Title: Not Okay
Movie Plot: An ambitious young woman finds followers and fame when she poses as the survivor of a deadly attack, but she soon learns that online notoriety comes with a terrible price.

Title: Angels in America: Part I - Millennium Approaches
Movie Plot: The National Theatre's live theatrical production of Tony Kushner's play 'Angels in America' about New Yorkers grappling with the AIDS crisis during the mid-1980s.

Title: Presence
Movie Plot: Showcases a suburban house inhabited by a mysterious entity.

Title: A Real Pain
Movie Plot: Mismatched cousins David and Benji reunite for a tour through Poland to honor their beloved grandmother. The adventure takes a turn when the odd-couple's old tensions resurface against the backdrop of their family history.

Title: Ghostlight
Movie Plot: When a construction worker unexpectedly joins a local theater's production of Romeo and Juliet, the drama onstage starts to mirror his own life.

Title: Winner
Movie Plot: Follows Winner (Jones), a brilliant young misfit from Texas who finds her morals challenged while serving in the U.S. Air Force and working as an NSA contractor.

Title: It's What's Inside
Movie Plot: A pre-wedding party descends into an existential nightmare when an estranged friend shows up with a mysterious suitcase.

Title: Your Monster
Movie Plot: Nothing is going right for Laura. Sick and brokenhearted, she moves back home and finds that the terrifying monster who inhabited her closet as a kid is still alive and well -- and wants to talk about life.

Title: Rob Peace
Movie Plot: The story of an inner-city Newark kid who attends Yale yet ultimately succumbs to harsh economic realities and the demons of his past.

Title: Love Me
Movie Plot: A love story between a satellite and a buoy.

Title: I Saw the TV Glow
Movie Plot: Two teenagers bond over their love of a supernatural TV show, but it is mysteriously cancelled.

Title: Freaky Tales
Movie Plot: Four interconnected stories set in 1987 Oakland, CA. will tell about the love of music, movies, people, places and memories beyond our knowable universe.

Title: Heathers: The Musical
Movie Plot: Veronica Sawyer does her best to survive her senior year while navigating the beautiful but cruel Heathers, the new to school Jason "J.D." Dean, and the constant pressure to fit in with everyone else.

Title: The Four Corners of Nowhere
Movie Plot: Duncan, a philosophical nomad hitchhiking across America, grabs a ride to Ann Arbor, Michigan from Toad - a performance artist and purple leisure slacks enthusiast from the suburbs. Toad has recently left his home town to begin a new life in Ann Arbor where his co-dependent, folk-singing sister Jenny lives with her verbally abusive fiancé, a law student named Calvin. Jenny currently sees a suicidal therapist four times a week and armed with her acoustic guitar, drives away patrons from a local coffee house where she slings cappuccinos with her best friend Squeeze. Squeeze is a closet genius whose easy-going outlook and unconditional support keep her live-in boyfriend Hank from the brink. Hank is a painter who can't paint because he spends his time baking delicious pastries and practicing for the Oprah Winfrey Show. In Ann Arbor, the civilians listen to Julian, a sociopathic dee-jay whose frustration and lingering optimism goad him to find the truth by cutting through blind idealism, pop culture, and politically correct bumper stickers. Once in Ann Arbor, Duncan encounters these and other eccentric characters, and through his simple outlook and curiosity, he changes their lives forever.—Julian Rad <jcnrad@aol.com>

Title: Sincerely, Me from Dear Evan Hansen
Movie Plot: A cinematic music-video cover of "Sincerely, Me" from "Dear Evan Hansen": Jared and Evan make up fake emails after Connor's death to convince Connor's parents that Evan and Connor were friends.

Title: Everybody's Talking About Jamie
Movie Plot: Feature film adaptation of the musical about a teenager from Sheffield, England who wants to be a drag queen.

Title: The Woman in the Window
Movie Plot: An agoraphobic woman living alone in New York begins spying on her new neighbors; only to witness a disturbing act of violence.

Title: Justin Bieber: Our World
Movie Plot: Lead-up to Justin Bieber's first full concert in three years and his New Year's Eve show in 2020 on the rooftop of the Beverly Hilton.

Title: Justin Bieber: Seasons
Movie Plot: An intimate look at Justin Bieber's life and music making process.

Title: Justin Bieber: Next Chapter
Movie Plot: Chronicles the making of Justin Bieber's latest album

Title: Despite the Falling Snow
Movie Plot: In Cold War Moscow, a female spy steals secrets from an idealistic politician - and falls in love with him.

Title: One Direction: This Is Us
Movie Plot: A look at Niall, Zayn, Liam, Louis, and Harry's meteoric rise to fame, from their humble hometown beginnings and competing on the X-Factor, to conquering the world and performing at London's famed O2 Arena.

Title: Justin Bieber: All Around the World
Movie Plot: The special will feature music performances and documentary footage as Justin Bieber embarks on his tour in support of his album Believe.

Title: Justin Bieber: Rise to Fame
Movie Plot: With millions of fans screaming his name across the planet, Justin has become the music world's hottest property and teen heartthrob phenomenon. Featuring performance clips of hits such as "Baby", and interviews with members of the Bieber camp and Justin himself!—Anonymous

Title: Part of Me
Movie Plot: A look at the life, career and music of singer Katy Perry as we follow her on the California Dreams World Tour.

Title: The LXD: The Secrets of the Ra
Movie Plot: True heroes reveal themselves as forces of good and evil go head-to-head towards an explosive showdown. This season, dance goes evil.

Title: The LXD: Rise of the Drifts
Movie Plot: Every adventure has a beginning. From visionary creator Jon M. Chu (Step Up 3D), the epic journey continues in its third volume, THE LXD: RISE OF THE DRIFTS. As the prophecy unravels, the LXD must confront the ghosts of its past and draw strength from its origins. With unity and training, our young heroes begin to rebuild their confidence to face an enemy with two faces. Sensing weakness, the Dark Doctor and Organization X find common ground to forge a deadly alliance that seeks to destroy the LXD once and for all. Secrets will be revealed. Promises will be broken. And armies will rise. Experience the global phenomenon in its explosive third season as our heroes and villains fight for the future

Title: One Direction: Where We Are - The Concert Film
Movie Plot: From X Factor to the San Siro Stadium in Milano, One Direction hit the world with success. See them perform live in the San Siro Stadium and watch 15 minutes of exclusive footage never seen before. The boys are back.

Title: The Runaways
Movie Plot: A coming-of-age biographical film about the 1970s teenage all-girl rock band The Runaways. The relationship between band members Cherie Currie and Joan Jett is also explored.

Title: This Is It
Movie Plot: A compilation of interviews, rehearsals, and backstage footage of Michael Jackson as he prepared for his series of sold-out shows in London.

Title: The LXD: The Uprising Begins
Movie Plot: Join seemingly ordinary people who discover they have extraordinary powers in a groundbreaking mythology about hope, greed, love and the force that moves us all.

Title: The L Word
Movie Plot: Follows the lives and loves of a small, close-knit group of lesbian women living in Los Angeles as well as the friends and family members that either support or loathe them.

Title: My Days of Mercy
Movie Plot: The daughter of a man on death row falls in love with a woman on the opposing side of her family's political cause.

Title: Hightown
Movie Plot: Set in the world of beautiful but bleak Cape Cod, one woman's journey to sobriety is overshadowed by a murder investigation dragging her into its fold.

Title: Saving Face
Movie Plot: A gay Chinese-American and her traditionalist mother are reluctant to go public with secret loves that clash against cultural expectations.

Title: Lip Service
Movie Plot: Sex, lies and true love in modern Scotland. Following the lives and loves of a group of twenty-something lesbians living in Glasgow.

Title: Sweetbitter
Movie Plot: A young woman learns how crazy it is to work in a restaurant.

Title: A League of Their Own
Movie Plot: Comedy series about the WWII All-American professional women's baseball league.

Title: Trinkets
Movie Plot: An unexpected friendship forms when three teenage girls meet in Shoplifters Anonymous.

Title: Little Birds
Movie Plot: TV adaptation of Anais Nin's infamous collection of erotic short stories.

Title: High School
Movie Plot: A story about twins who struggle to find their own identities, and their journeys of self-discovery so closely mimics each other's. During a time 90s grunge and rave culture, the twin sisters grow up down the hall from one another.

Title: Paisan
Movie Plot: American military personnel interact warily with a variety of Italian locals over a year and a half in the push north during the Italian Campaign of WWII as German forces make their retreat.

Title: Journey to Italy
Movie Plot: An unhappily married couple attempts to find direction and insight while vacationing in Naples.

Title: Stromboli
Movie Plot: Karin, a young woman from the Baltic countries, marries fisherman Antonio to escape from a prison camp. But she cannot get used to the tough life in Antonio's volcano-threatened village, Stromboli.

Title: Amarcord
Movie Plot: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

Title: I Vitelloni
Movie Plot: A character study of five young men at crucial turning points in their lives in a small town in Italy.

Title: The Grand Illusion
Movie Plot: During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are eventually sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress.

Title: The Swindle
Movie Plot: A trio of con-men led by a lonesome swindler must deal with their job and family pressures.

Title: Juliet of the Spirits
Movie Plot: Visions, memories, and mysticism all help a 40-something woman to find the strength to leave her cheating husband.

Title: The White Sheik
Movie Plot: During a day of their honeymoon, newlyweds are separated by the city's lust and the desires it produces.

Title: Roma
Movie Plot: A fluid, unconnected and sometimes chaotic procession of scenes detailing the various people and events of life in Italy's capital, most of it based on director Federico Fellini's life.

Title: The Children Are Watching Us
Movie Plot: Four-year-old Pricò becomes the subject of emotional folly by his capricious parents and negligent relatives.

Title: The Garden of the Finzi-Continis
Movie Plot: The story of the Finzi-Continis, a noble family of Ferrara, during the Jewish persecution in Italy's 1930s.

Title: La Terra Trema
Movie Plot: In rural Sicily, the fishermen live at the mercy of the greedy wholesalers. One family risks everything to buy their own boat and operate independently.

Title: Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow
Movie Plot: Stories about three very different women and the men they attract.

Title: Two Women
Movie Plot: In the Italy of WWII, a widow and her lonely daughter seek for distance between them and the horrors of war.

Title: Obsession
Movie Plot: Gino, a drifter, begins an affair with inn-owner Giovanna, and they plan to get rid of her older husband.

Title: The Boom
Movie Plot: During the economic boom of Italy a man tries desperately to maintain a high standard of living for his family.

Title: A Garibaldian in the Convent
Movie Plot: An old woman's poignant reminiscence of her youth in a convent school: the happy moments, the sad ones and the tragic love for a Garibaldian.

Title: Bellissima
Movie Plot: A woman from the lower class desperately tries to get her daughter into the movies.

Title: The Roof
Movie Plot: A married couple learns that it is possible to build an illegal house in the outskirts of Rome, as long as it is erected in one single night and has a roof.

Title: A Brief Vacation
Movie Plot: Clara, diagnosed with tuberculosis, is treated in a sanatorium in the Alps where she can finally take a break from her miserable life.

Title: Hello Elephant
Movie Plot: Vittorio De Sica is a teacher struggling to take care of his family and always dreaming that Parliament will increase the salaries for teachers and life will become easier for his wife, Maria Mereander, and kids. An Indian prince (Sabu) visits Italy, is assisted by the teacher, and gives De Sica a baby elephant as a reward. This upsets the landlord, Nando Bruno, the other tenants and the neighborhood . He takes the elephant away but, like Lassie, it comes home.—Les Adams <longhorn1939@suddenlink.net>

Title: The Leopard
Movie Plot: The Prince of Salina, a noble aristocrat of impeccable integrity, tries to preserve his family and class amid the tumultuous social upheavals of 1860s Sicily.

Title: Marriage Italian Style
Movie Plot: Wealthy businessman Domenico and penniless prostitute Filumena share a large part of their lives in post-WWII Italy.

Title: White Nights
Movie Plot: A humble clerk courts a woman who awaits her lover's return night after night.

Title: Purple Noon
Movie Plot: Tom Ripley is a talented mimic, moocher, forger and all-around criminal improviser; but there's more to Tom Ripley than even he can guess.

Title: L'Eclisse
Movie Plot: A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.

Title: Death in Venice
Movie Plot: While recovering in Venice, sickly composer Gustav von Aschenbach becomes dangerously fixated with teenager Tadzio.

Title: Senso
Movie Plot: An Italian Countess is allied with Nationalists during the Italian-Austrian war of unification. However, she risks betraying their cause when she falls in love with an Austrian lieutenant.

Title: The Red Circle
Movie Plot: After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.

Title: The Samurai
Movie Plot: After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

Title: La Notte
Movie Plot: A day in the life of an unfaithful married couple and their steadily deteriorating relationship.

Title: Europe '51
Movie Plot: A wealthy woman becomes obsessed with humanitarianism when her young son dies after committing suicide.

Title: The Flowers of St. Francis
Movie Plot: A series of vignettes depicting the lives of the original Franciscan monks, including their leader and the bumbling Ginepro.

Title: Love
Movie Plot: In part one, a heartbroken woman talks to her ex-lover on the phone. In part two, a pregnant woman believes she is carrying the child of Saint Joseph.

Title: The Machine to Kill Bad People
Movie Plot: A photographer in a small fishing village is visited by a man who claims to be Saint Andrea. The Saint gives him a special camera device to solve the village's ills - by taking a photograph of an existing picture, the photo subject dies.

Title: Desire
Movie Plot: Paola, a Rome call girl, returns home to her village in an attempt to go straight. Rejected by her father, blackmailed by a former lover, and lusted after by her brother-in-law, she turns to her beloved sister for support.

Title: Red Desert
Movie Plot: In an industrial area, unstable Giuliana attempts to cope with life by starting an affair with a co-worker at the plant her husband manages.

Title: Blow-Up
Movie Plot: A fashion photographer unknowingly captures a death on film after following two lovers in a park.

Title: The Passenger
Movie Plot: Unable to find the war he's been asked to cover, a frustrated war correspondent takes the risky path of co-opting the identity of a dead arms-deal acquaintance.

Title: The Girlfriends
Movie Plot: A young woman returns to her hometown of Turin to set up a new fashion salon and gets involved with a troubled woman and her three wealthy friends.

Title: Il Grido
Movie Plot: A man wanders aimlessly away from his town, away from the woman he loves, emotionally and socially inactive.

Title: Cops and Robbers
Movie Plot: Esposito is a thief who cons tourists in Rome. Officer Bottoni manages to catch him and starts persecuting him. When Esposito manages to flee, Bottoni's superiors inform him that he'll lose his job if he can't catch Esposito.

Title: The Your Name Here Story
Movie Plot: A parody of promotional industrial films, purporting to be usable by any corporation, in which the laboratory at "Your Name Here" company fills many of humanity's major needs by developing "Your Product Here".

Title: Boy on a Dolphin
Movie Plot: A woman finds a treasure and is torn between two men: one who wants to sell it and one who wants to gift it to Greece.

Title: Doctor, Beware
Movie Plot: Teresa, a young orphan, falls in love with Pietro, a health inspector. She will try to bring order to his reckless life full of debts and lies.

Title: The Sign of Venus
Movie Plot: Agnese has many men who woo her and lives with her cousin Cesira Franca Valeri, who has the opposite problem with men and wishes she would also have men woo her.

Title: Pickpocket
Movie Plot: Michel passes the time by picking pockets, careful to never be caught despite being watched by the police. His friend Jacques may suspect, while both men may have their eyes on Jeanne, the pretty neighbor of Michel's ailing mother.

Title: Diary of a Country Priest
Movie Plot: A young priest taking over the parish at Ambricourt tries to fulfill his duties even as he fights a mysterious stomach ailment.

Title: Sherman's March
Movie Plot: Documentary filmmaker Ross McElwee sets out to make a movie about Union General Sherman's March to the Sea towards the end of the American Civil War, but keeps getting sidetracked by his own love life.

Title: The Trial of Joan of Arc
Movie Plot: A Joan of Arc's trial reconstruction concerning her imprisonment, interrogation and final execution at the hands of the English. Filmed in a spare, low-key fashion.

Title: L'Argent
Movie Plot: A counterfeit bill that starts off as a schoolboy prank leads to incarceration and violence.

Title: Mouchette
Movie Plot: A young girl living in the French countryside suffers constant indignities at the hand of alcoholism and her fellow man.

Title: The Ladies of the Bois de Boulogne
Movie Plot: A society lady engineers a marriage between her lover and a cabaret dancer who is essentially a prostitute.

Title: The Beguiled
Movie Plot: While recuperating in a Confederate girls' boarding school, a Union soldier cons his way into each of the lonely women's hearts, causing them to turn on each other, and eventually, on him.

Title: Kelly's Heroes
Movie Plot: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

Title: Every Which Way But Loose
Movie Plot: The San Fernando Valley adventures of trucker turned prize-fighter Philo Beddoe and his pet orangutan Clyde.

Title: Iruvar
Movie Plot: A struggling actor and a writer-politician become friends as young men and rise to great heights in cinema and politics respectively. But when both become contenders for the top political post in the state, a rift develops between them.

Title: The Eiger Sanction
Movie Plot: Classical art professor and collector Dr. Jonathan Hemlock, who doubles as a professional assassin, is coerced out of retirement to avenge the murder of an old friend.

Title: Aaranya Kaandam
Movie Plot: A mob boss must deal with a disgruntled mistress and a vanishing bag of cocaine.

Title: Aadukalam
Movie Plot: Falling in love with Irene as well as refusing to obey his boss Pettaikaran in a rooster fight complicates Karuppu's life.

Title: Jigarthanda
Movie Plot: An aspiring director targets a ruthless gangster because he wants to make a violent gangster film. His discreet attempts to research the gangster fail miserably. Finally when he gets caught snooping, things hit the fan.

Title: Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kaanom
Movie Plot: A young man forgets a few years of his life, even as he is about to get married.

Title: The Crow's Egg
Movie Plot: Two slum kids yearn to taste a pizza after being enticed by the pizza shop that has opened near their locality. What happens when they manage to find the money to buy one?

Title: ATM Bhabhi
Movie Plot: A caring young woman earns admiration during a lockdown for her charitable acts, drawing suitors hoping to win her heart or gain her wealth. Will true love or greed prevail?

Title: Shattered
Movie Plot: A rich divorcee Chris falls in love with a mysterious woman Sky where Chris, ex-wife and his child eventually gets trapped and a desperate fight for survival will most likely ensue.

Title: Courageous
Movie Plot: When a tragedy strikes close to home, four police officers struggle with their faith and their roles as husbands and fathers. Together they make a decision that will change all of their lives.

Title: Special 26
Movie Plot: A gang of con-men rob prominent rich businessmen and politicians by posing as C.B.I and income tax officers.

Title: Masaan
Movie Plot: Along India's Ganges River, four people face prejudice, a strict moral code and a punishing caste system as they confront personal tragedies.

Title: Let the Right One In
Movie Plot: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

Title: Ek Hasina Thi
Movie Plot: A woman falls for a charming and mysterious businessman. The whirlwind romance turns sour when she is framed for his underworld crimes. Now, finally out of prison she is ready for sweet revenge.

Title: Manorama: Six Feet Under
Movie Plot: Manorama, wife of an irrigation minister, tasks Satyaveer to find if her husband is cheating. As Satyaveer starts investigating, he gets trapped in a web of lies and must uncover the entire truth.

Title: Khosla Ka Ghosla!
Movie Plot: A Delhi-based retired middle-class man tries half-heartedly to get his land back from a swindling property dealer with the help of his sons and their friends.

Title: Omkara
Movie Plot: A politically-minded enforcer's misguided trust in his lieutenant leads him to suspect his wife of infidelity in this adaptation of Shakespeare's 'Othello'.

Title: Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!
Movie Plot: Lovinder Singh, a thief now in custody and facing trial, reflects on his life of crime while the press reflect on how he managed to get away with so much before being arrested.

Title: Agent Vinod
Movie Plot: A series of seemingly unconnected events across the world leads to Agent Vinod undertaking a globe-trotting mission to discover why his colleague was murdered.

Title: Maqbool
Movie Plot: The intrigue of the Shakespearean tragedy 'Macbeth' is transposed to the Mumbai underworld.

Title: No Smoking
Movie Plot: A heavily addicted smoker is unprepared for the true price he must pay when he asks a guru's help to kick the habit.

Title: Ugly
Movie Plot: The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.

Title: Company
Movie Plot: A small-time gangster named Chandu teams up with Malik, a low-level enforcer for a criminal syndicate. Together they eliminate all their enemies, becoming the most feared gangsters in Mumbai.

Title: The Villain
Movie Plot: When his wife becomes the latest victim of a serial killer, Guru blurs the line between good and evil in his pursuit of revenge.

Title: Vicky Donor
Movie Plot: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

Title: Table No. 21
Movie Plot: A couple is drawn into a game show with a whooping winning prize. However the game turns into more than a survival for them with no escape.

Title: Jolly LLB 2
Movie Plot: Jolly is a clumsy lawyer who is faced with representing the most critical court case of his career.

Title: Thammudu
Movie Plot: An aimless student is banished from his home by his father. When his brother, a boxing champion, gets injured, the student must step up and take his brother's place.

Title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
Movie Plot: A girl from Ambala, Kavya Pratap Singh, is about to be married. When she visits Delhi to shop for her 'dhai lakh ka Ghagra, she meets Humpty Sharma, a carefree Delhiite, and falls in love with him.

Title: Magadheera
Movie Plot: A warrior gets reincarnated 400 years later, after trying to save the princess and the kingdom, who also dies along with him. He then sets back again to fight against all odds and win back his love.

Title: I
Movie Plot: A deformed hunchback kidnaps a bride on the day of her marriage and holds her hostage while his connection to her and his targets is revealed in a series of flashbacks that unfold as he starts seeking revenge.

Title: Maryada Ramanna
Movie Plot: A man returns to his parents' village to claim his land. Along the way, he befriends a charming young woman. Unbeknownst to him, her family has a long-standing feud with his family.

Title: The Addams Family
Movie Plot: The misadventures of a blissfully macabre but extremely loving family.

Title: Tom Sawyer
Movie Plot: The classic Mark Twain tale of a young boy and his friends on the Mississippi River. Tom and his pals Huckleberry Finn and Joe Harper have numerous adventures, including running away to be pirates and, being believed drowned, attending their own funeral. The boys also witness a murder and Tom and his friend Becky Thatcher are pursued by the vengeful murderer.—Jim Beaver <jumblejim@prodigy.net>

Title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
Movie Plot: When a cartoon rabbit is accused of murder, he enlists the help of a burnt out private investigator to prove his innocence.

Title: The Batman: Deleted Arkham Scene
Movie Plot: In a deleted scene from The Batman (2022), Batman consults an old acquaintance and Arkham inmate about The Riddler's crime spree.

Title: Look Who's Talking Too
Movie Plot: This time, a new baby is on the way, and it's a girl. Wrapped together with the standard conflict between mother and father, Mikey engages in a bit of sibling rivalry with his new sister.

Title: Antz
Movie Plot: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

Title: The Journey of Natty Gann
Movie Plot: In the 1930s, a tomboy runs away from her guardian to join her single father who is 2,000 miles away, where he has found work.

Title: Xiong mao hui jia lu
Movie Plot: High in the mountains of the China, a ten-year-old mute orphan boy, Lu, rescues a lost panda cub separated from its mother. As Lu struggles to return the cub to its mother-and protect it from trappers-the two form a unique connection.

Title: Old Dogs
Movie Plot: Two friends and business partners find their lives turned upside-down when strange circumstances lead them to be the temporary guardians of 7-year-old twins.

Title: Camp Nowhere
Movie Plot: A group of junior high kids don't want to go to summer camps chosen by their parents. They make their own adult-free camp and "hire" an ex drama teacher to help.

Title: I'll Be Home for Christmas
Movie Plot: A college student faces an impossible journey when he is left stranded in the desert, thousands of miles from home, with no money and only a few days left until Christmas.

Title: Dinosaur
Movie Plot: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sanctuary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

Title: George of the Jungle
Movie Plot: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.

Title: Cheaper by the Dozen
Movie Plot: With his wife on a book tour, Tom Baker finds his life turned upside down when he agrees to care for his twelve children while simultaneously also coaching his new football team.

Title: Flubber
Movie Plot: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

Title: Corpse Bride
Movie Plot: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

Title: Coraline
Movie Plot: Wandering her rambling old house in her boring new town, an 11-year-old Coraline discovers a hidden door to a strangely idealized version of her life. In order to stay in the fantasy, she must make a frighteningly real sacrifice.

Title: Frankenweenie
Movie Plot: When a boy's beloved dog passes away suddenly, he attempts to bring the animal back to life through a powerful science experiment.

Title: The Nightmare Before Christmas in Concert
Movie Plot: A concert presentation of the Tim Burton/Danny Elfman classic animated film, as interpreted by some of Broadway's ghoulishly talented artists. The proceeds collected will benefit The Actors Fund and Lymphoma Research Foundation.

Title: Monster House
Movie Plot: Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.

Title: ParaNorman
Movie Plot: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.

Title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
Movie Plot: Charlie, a young boy from an impoverished family, and four other kids win a tour of an amazing chocolate factory run by an imaginative chocolatier, Willy Wonka, and his staff of Oompa-Loompas.

Title: The Voyeurs
Movie Plot: Pippa and Thomas move into their dream apartment, but notice that their windows look directly into the apartment opposite. This will set in motion a chain of events that will lead to disaster.

Title: Americana
Movie Plot: The lives of local outsiders and outcasts violently intertwine when a rare Lakota Ghost shirt falls onto the black market in a small South Dakota town.

Title: James and the Giant Peach
Movie Plot: An orphan who lives with his two cruel aunts befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.

Title: Joy Ride
Movie Plot: Follows four Asian American friends as they bond and discover the truth of what it means to know and love who you are, while they travel through China in search of one of their birth mothers.

Title: Master Gardener
Movie Plot: A meticulous horticulturist is devoted to tending the grounds of a beautiful estate and pandering to his employer, the wealthy dowager.

Title: Gan
Movie Plot: A lowly divorcee is tricked into becoming the mistress of a despised moneylender but soon falls in love with a student.

Title: The Beasts
Movie Plot: An expatriate French couple operate an organic farm in the Spanish countryside but clash with villagers.

Title: Clementine
Movie Plot: Reeling from a one-sided breakup, heartbroken Karen breaks into her ex's lake house. There, she strikes up a complicated relationship with provocative younger woman Lana.

Title: La civil
Movie Plot: Story of Cielo, a mother whose teenage daughter is kidnapped in Northern Mexico. When the authorities offer no support in the search, Cielo takes matters into her own hands and transforms from housewife into a vengeful militant.

Title: Kandahar
Movie Plot: A CIA operative and his translator flee from special forces in Afghanistan after exposing a covert mission.

Title: Hypnotic
Movie Plot: A detective investigates a mystery involving his missing daughter and a secret government program.

Title: To Catch a Killer
Movie Plot: "To Catch a Killer" tells the true gruesome story of John Wayne Gacy - a good friend and helpful neighbour, a great child entertainer, a respectful businessman, and a violent serial killer who raped and murdered over 30 young boys.—Jaromir Krol <jaromirk@kr.onet.pl>

Title: Boston Strangler
Movie Plot: Loretta McLaughlin was the reporter who first connected the murders and broke the story of the Boston Strangler. She and Jean Cole challenged the sexism of the early 1960s to report on the city's most notorious serial killer.

Title: Robots
Movie Plot: Charles is a womanizer while Elaine is a gold digger. The duo learn humanity when forced to team up and pursue robot doubles of themselves.

Title: Marlowe
Movie Plot: In late 1930s Bay City, a brooding, down on his luck detective is hired to find the ex-lover of a glamorous heiress.

Title: A Good Person
Movie Plot: Follows Allison, whose life falls apart following her involvement in a fatal accident.

Title: The Lehman Trilogy
Movie Plot: The story of Lehman Brothers, from their beginnings as cotton brokers before the Civil War to the company's involvement in the financial crisis of 2008.

Title: All the Old Knives
Movie Plot: Veteran CIA agent Henry is reunited in Vienna with his former colleague and lover Celia.

Title: Let Him Go
Movie Plot: A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson.

Title: Land
Movie Plot: Edee, in the aftermath of an unfathomable event, finds herself unable to stay connected to the world and retreats to the wilds of the Rockies. After a local hunter brings her back from the brink of death, she must find a way to live again.

Title: Weekend Rebels
Movie Plot: Mirco's family is advised to go to a special school for Jason, his autistic son. He makes a pact to make every effort to stay in school if Mirco helps him find a favorite football club.

Title: Crisis
Movie Plot: Centers on an idealistic Secret Service agent who finds himself at the center of an international crisis on his first day on the job. In his search for the truth, he will have to cross moral and legal lines as he navigates the highest levels of power and corruption.—NBC

Title: Luther: The Fallen Sun
Movie Plot: Brilliant but disgraced detective John Luther breaks out of prison to hunt down a sadistic serial killer who is terrorising London.

Title: Last Seen Alive
Movie Plot: Will's soon-to-be ex-wife mysteriously vanishes at a gas station. He delves into the town's criminal underbelly while running from the authorities in a race against time to find her.

Title: Narvik: Hitler's First Defeat
Movie Plot: April 1940. The eyes of the world are on Narvik, a small town in northern Norway, source of the iron ore needed for Hitler's war machinery. Through two months of fierce winter warfare, Hitler is dealt his first defeat.

Title: The Independent
Movie Plot: A young journalist discovers a conspiracy involving a U.S. Presidential candidate that could change the election and the fate of the country.

Title: A Place Among the Dead
Movie Plot: A Place Among The Dead is a genre-bending, elevated-horror film, which explores the repercussions of growing up under the sway of narcissism and psychological abuse.

Title: Only the Animals
Movie Plot: A woman disappeared. After a snowstorm, her car is discovered on a road to a small remote village. While the police don't know where to start, five people are linked to the disappearance. Each one with his or her own secret.

Title: Revoir Paris
Movie Plot: Three months after surviving a terrorist attack in a bistro, Mia is still traumatized and unable to recall the events of that night. In an effort to move forward, she investigates her memories and retraces her steps.

Title: Full Time
Movie Plot: Just when Julie finally gets an interview for a job that will let her raise her children better, she runs into a national transportation strike.

Title: Monica, O My Darling
Movie Plot: A slick robotics expert joins a murderous plot after a passionate affair takes a sudden turn, but nothing not even death , is what it seems to be.

Title: With a Friend Like Harry...
Movie Plot: Harry knew Michel in high school; they meet again by accident, Harry inserts himself in Michel's life... and things take a sinister turn.

Title: November
Movie Plot: 5 days into the heart of the French anti-terrorism services during the hunt for suspects after the 13/11/2015 attacks in Paris.

Title: Cairo Conspiracy
Movie Plot: Adam, the son of a fisherman, is offered the privilege to study at the Al-Azhar University in Cairo, the center of power of Sunni Islam. Adam becomes a pawn in the conflict between Egypt's religious and political elites.

Title: The Innocent
Movie Plot: When Abel learns that his mother is about to marry a man in prison, he freaks out. With the help of his best friend, he will do whatever it takes to protect her. But meeting his new stepfather may well offer him a new perspective.

Title: All Your Faces
Movie Plot: Victims of violent crime and perpetrators meet up in a restorative justice group in order to have a dialogue and heal from their trauma.

Title: Black Box
Movie Plot: A young and talented black box analyst is on a mission to solve the reason behind the deadly crash of a brand new aircraft.

Title: Navalny
Movie Plot: Follows the man who survived an assassination attempt by poisoning with a lethal nerve agent in August 2020. During his months-long recovery he makes shocking discoveries about the attempt on his life and decides to return home.

Title: The Whale
Movie Plot: A reclusive, morbidly obese English teacher attempts to reconnect with his estranged teenage daughter.

Title: Till
Movie Plot: In 1955, after Emmett Till is murdered in a brutal lynching, his mother vows to expose the racism behind the attack while working to have those involved brought to justice.

Title: Stories We Tell
Movie Plot: A film that excavates layers of myth and memory to find the elusive truth at the core of a family of storytellers.

Title: The Women on the 6th Floor
Movie Plot: In 1960s Paris, a conservative couple's lives are turned upside down by a group of Spanish maids that live in the same building.

Title: A Man in a Hurry
Movie Plot: A high-profile businessman has let his personal life lapse in favor of corporate success. When he suffers a serious stroke, he finds himself stripped back to zero and learns to rebuild his life with help from his family and a therapist.

Title: Samba
Movie Plot: Senegalese Samba has worked 10 years in France. He's arrested and befriends the woman helping him with legal matters as volunteer after a burnout at work. He's released after being told to leave France. Chemistry?

Title: The Translators
Movie Plot: Nine translators hired to translate the eagerly-awaited final book of a bestselling trilogy are confined in a luxurious bunker. The dream job becomes a nightmare when the first 10 pages of the top-secret manuscript appear online.

Title: Yôkihi
Movie Plot: In 8th-century China, the Emperor is grieving over the death of his wife. The Yang family wants to provide the Emperor with a consort so that they may consolidate their influence over the court. General An Lushan finds a close relative working in their kitchen whom they groom to present to the Emperor. The Emperor falls in love with her and she becomes the Princess Yang Kwei-fei. The Yangs are then appointed important ministers, though An Lushan is not given the court position he covets. The ministers misuse their power so much that there is a popular revolt against all the Yangs, fueled by An Lushan.—Will Gilbert and Brian McInnis

Title: Bicycling with Molière
Movie Plot: Two actors. One play. Can the differences between the two egocentric men be put aside for the sake of friendship and theatre?

Title: Enough Said
Movie Plot: A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.

Title: Psycho Raman
Movie Plot: Ramanna, a maniac murderer, finds a soulmate in Raghavan, a policeman, who inspects his murder cases. He tries to make Raghavan realize how they both are similar.

Title: Marie-Francine
Movie Plot: A woman at the age of 50 moves back in with her parent after her husband leaves her for a younger woman.

Title: The Other Woman
Movie Plot: A man fantasizes about his best friend's new girlfriend. He is willing to throw caution to the wind to fulfill his wildest dreams.

Title: I Care a Lot
Movie Plot: A crooked legal guardian who drains the savings of her elderly wards meets her match when a woman she tries to swindle turns out to be more than she first appears.

Title: The World to Come
Movie Plot: Somewhere along the mid-19th century American East Coast frontier, two neighboring couples battle hardship and isolation, witnessed by a splendid yet testing landscape, challenging them both physically and psychologically.

Title: Uncle Frank
Movie Plot: In 1973, when Frank Bledsoe and his 18-year-old niece Beth take a road trip from Manhattan to Creekville, South Carolina, for the family patriarch's funeral, they're unexpectedly joined by Frank's lover, Walid.

Title: Italian Studies
Movie Plot: A writer loses her memory. Adrift in NYC, she connects with a group of teenagers - in conversations both real and imagined - and searches for a way home.

Title: Hillbilly Elegy
Movie Plot: An urgent phone call pulls a Yale Law student back to his Ohio hometown, where he reflects on three generations of family history and his own future.

Title: Being the Ricardos
Movie Plot: Follows Lucy and Desi as they face a crisis that could end their careers--and another that could end their marriage.

Title: Don't Worry, He Won't Get Far on Foot
Movie Plot: On the rocky path to sobriety after a life-changing accident, John Callahan discovers the healing power of art, willing his injured hands into drawing hilarious, often controversial cartoons, which bring him a new lease on life.

Title: Air
Movie Plot: Follows the history of sports marketing executive Sonny Vaccaro, and how he led Nike in its pursuit of the greatest athlete in the history of basketball, Michael Jordan.

Title: The Way Back
Movie Plot: Jack Cunningham was a high school basketball phenom who walked away from the game, forfeiting his future. Years later, when he reluctantly accepts a coaching job at his alma mater, he may get one last shot at redemption.

Title: Suburbicon
Movie Plot: As a 1950s suburban community self-destructs, a home invasion has sinister consequences for one seemingly normal family.

When terrorists try to seize control of a Berlin-Paris flight, a soft-spoken American co-pilot struggles to save the lives of the passengers and crew while forging a surprising connection with one of the hijackers.

Title: Unscripted
Movie Plot: Three young actors try to make it big in Hollywood.

Title: Welcome Back Future
Movie Plot: Our world is going through challenging times, and we are all called upon to take action for a better, brighter future. Leonardo DiCaprio invites viewers to embrace new electric and sustainable mobility, becoming drivers for change.

Title: The Good House
Movie Plot: Life for New England realtor Hildy Good begins to unravel when she hooks up with an old high school flame. Based on Ann Leary's 'The Good House.'

Title: Mothers' Instinct
Movie Plot: Alice and Celine live a traditional lifestyle with successful husbands and sons of the same age. Life's perfect harmony is suddenly shattered after a tragic accident. Guilt, suspicion and paranoia combine to unravel their sisterly bond.

Title: Bulgari: Unexpected Wonders
Movie Plot: The advertising is meant to be an invitation to the appreciation of simple things as even the ordinary can turn out to be extraordinary.

Title: Clash by Night
Movie Plot: Mae Doyle comes back to her hometown a cynical woman. Her brother Joe fears that his love, fish cannery worker Peggy, may wind up like Mae. Mae marries Jerry and has a baby; she is happy but restless, drawn to Jerry's friend Earl.

Title: How to Marry a Millionaire
Movie Plot: Motherly Mike, ditzy but sexy Loco, and sensible Greta move to the big city to find themselves wealthy men to turn into husbands. After the first year Greta gets married with Gwen the new roommate in this syndicated series.

Title: Don't Bother to Knock
Movie Plot: After being dumped by his girlfriend, an airline pilot pursues a babysitter in his hotel and gradually realizes she's dangerous.

Title: A Place in the Sun
Movie Plot: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

Title: Love Nest
Movie Plot: Two married New Yorkers purchase an old, run-down building full of colorful tenants.

Title: The Fuzzy Pink Nightgown
Movie Plot: When a movie star is kidnapped, everyone thinks it's a publicity stunt. It's not.

Title: The Tall Men
