Movie Plot: Yury Aleksandrovich Dud is a Russian sports journalist, who also runs an unrelated YouTube channel "vDud" where he interviews famous figures from CIS region.

Title: A Man from Boulevard des Capucines
Movie Plot: Mr Jonny First arrives to the Wild West to present the art of the Cinematograph.

Title: Furious
Movie Plot: In the 13th century, an amnesiac soldier vows to get his revenge on the Mongol army that ransacked his village.

Title: Amanat
Movie Plot: The love story of the son of Imam Shamil Jamalutdin and Lisa Olenina against the backdrop of the dramatic events of the military history of Russia in the first half of the 19th century.

Title: Yentl
Movie Plot: A Jewish girl disguises herself as a boy to enter religious training.

Title: The Mirror Has Two Faces
Movie Plot: A shy, middle-aged professor enters into a romantic but non-physical relationship with an unlucky-in-love colleague.

Title: Nuts
Movie Plot: A high-class call girl accused of murder fights for the right to stand trial rather than be declared mentally incompetent.

Title: The Main Event
Movie Plot: A bankrupt entrepreneur attempts to recoup some of her losses by getting a washed-out boxer she picked up as a tax loss back into the ring - an idea her protégé isn't fond of.

Title: Funny Girl
Movie Plot: The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s. We see her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld girl, subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.

Title: For Pete's Sake
Movie Plot: A housewife tries to finance her cab-driving husband's education.

Title: Funny Lady
Movie Plot: Story of singer Fanny Brice's stormy relationship with showman Billy Rose.

Title: On a Clear Day You Can See Forever
Movie Plot: A troubled young woman who visits a psychotherapist to help her quit smoking undergoes hypnosis and finds herself reliving a tragic Victorian romance from a past life.

Title: Light Sleeper
Movie Plot: A drug dealer reconsiders his profession when his boss plans to go straight and an old flame reappears.

Title: Hardcore
Movie Plot: A religious businessman has to venture into the seedy California underworld in a desperate search for his runaway teenage daughter.

Title: Auto Focus
Movie Plot: The life of TV star Bob Crane and his strange friendship with electronics expert John Henry Carpenter.

Title: Blue Collar
Movie Plot: When three automotive factory workers who're struggling financially try to steal from their own labor union, they discover corruption, and reluctantly decide to use this information for blackmail.

Title: First Reformed
Movie Plot: A minister of a small congregation in upstate New York grapples with mounting despair brought on by tragedy, worldly concerns and a tormented past.

Title: American Gigolo
Movie Plot: A Los Angeles escort is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

Title: Hello, Dolly!
Movie Plot: Matchmaker Dolly Levi travels to Yonkers to find a partner for "half-a-millionaire" Horace Vandergelder, convincing his niece, his niece's intended, and his two clerks to travel to New York City along the way.

Title: The Owl and the Pussycat
Movie Plot: A stuffy author enters into an explosive relationship with his neighbor, a foul-mouthed, freewheeling prostitute.

Title: The Comfort of Strangers
Movie Plot: A couple retreat to Venice to work on their relationship, but an encounter with a stranger leads them into a world of intrigue - where their darkest desires are in reach.

Title: Dark
Movie Plot: A government agent must track down and kill a terrorist before he loses his full memory from dementia.

Title: Adam Resurrected
Movie Plot: In the aftermath of World War II, a former circus entertainer who was spared from the gas chamber becomes the ringleader at an asylum for Holocaust survivors.

Title: The Walker
Movie Plot: An escort who caters to Washington, D.C.'s society ladies becomes involved in a murder case.

Title: A Killer Paradox
Movie Plot: When one accidental killing leads to another, an ordinary young man finds himself stuck in an endless cat-and-mouse chase with a shrewd detective.

Title: Ninja Kamui
Movie Plot: Former ninja Joe Higan is ambushed by assassins who seek bloody revenge on him and his family for their betrayal, after escaping his clan and fleeing into rural America.

Title: Yu Yu Hakusho
Movie Plot: A teenager dies while saving a young kid and is given a chance to be resurrected, provided he works for the Spirit World as an investigator of supernatural crimes with his newly-given powers.

Title: Code 8: Part II
Movie Plot: Follows a girl fighting to get justice for her slain brother by corrupt police officers. She enlists the help of an ex-con and his former partner, they face a highly regarded and well protected police sergeant who doesn't want to be.

Title: The Brothers Sun
Movie Plot: Charles Sun, a Taipei gangster who's settled into his life as a ruthless killer, must go to L.A. to protect his mother and younger brother after his father is shot by a mysterious assassin.

Title: My Name Is Loh Kiwan
Movie Plot: After defecting from North Korea, Loh Kiwan struggles to obtain refugee status in Belgium, where he encounters a dejected woman who has lost all hope.

Title: A Shop for Killers
Movie Plot: An action drama in which a niece who lost her parents and grew up in the hands of an uncle who runs a shopping mall, faces a new truth after her uncle's sudden death.

Title: Tom Clancy's Jack Ryan
Movie Plot: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.

Title: House
Movie Plot: Using a crack team of doctors and his wits, an antisocial maverick doctor specializing in diagnostic medicine does whatever it takes to solve puzzling cases that come his way.

Title: Suits
Movie Plot: On the run from a drug deal gone bad, brilliant college dropout Mike Ross finds himself working with Harvey Specter, one of New York City's best lawyers.

Title: Supernatural
Movie Plot: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Title: Young Sheldon
Movie Plot: Meet a child genius named Sheldon Cooper (already seen as an adult in The Big Bang Theory (2007)) and his family. Some unique challenges face Sheldon, who is socially impaired.

Title: Ghosts
Movie Plot: A young couple, Sam and Jay, inherit a haunted mansion and, unaware of their invisible housemates, plan to turn it into a B&B. Their lives become much more complicated after a fall causes Sam to see the ghosts. Based on the UK series.

Title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
Movie Plot: Five friends with big egos and small brains are the proprietors of an Irish pub in Philadelphia.

Title: The Rookie
Movie Plot: Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. As their oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from those who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

Title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
Movie Plot: Comedy series following the exploits of Det. Jake Peralta and his diverse, lovable colleagues as they police the NYPD's 99th Precinct.

Title: Banshee Origins
Movie Plot: Fresh out of prison after 15 years, a master thief assumes the identity of a dead sheriff in Banshee, PA. After tracking down the woman he loves they try to avoid detection from her father; a Ukrainian mobster looking to kill them for double crossing him.

Title: Sons of Anarchy
Movie Plot: A biker struggles to balance being a father and being involved in an outlaw motorcycle club.

Title: The Punisher
Movie Plot: After his revenge on those who murdered his family, aimless Marine veteran Frank Castle finds a new meaning in life as a vigilante known as "The Punisher".

Title: The Shield
Movie Plot: Drama series following the lives and cases of dirty cop Vic Mackey and the corrupt LAPD unit under his command.

Title: Prison Break
Movie Plot: A structural engineer installs himself in a prison he helped design, in order to save his falsely accused brother from a death sentence by breaking themselves out from the inside.

Title: Ozark
Movie Plot: A financial advisor drags his family from Chicago to the Missouri Ozarks, where he must launder money to appease a drug boss.

Title: Dexter
Movie Plot: He's smart. He's lovable. He's Dexter Morgan, America's favorite serial killer, who spends his days solving crimes and nights committing them.

Title: Mr. Robot
Movie Plot: Elliot, a brilliant but unstable cyber-security engineer and vigilante hacker, becomes a key figure in a complex game of global chaos when he and his shadowy allies try to take down the corrupt corporation his company is paid to protect.

Title: Daredevil
Movie Plot: A blind lawyer by day, vigilante by night. Matt Murdock fights the crime of New York as Daredevil.

Title: Spartacus
Movie Plot: The life of Spartacus, the gladiator who lead a rebellion against the Romans. From his time as an ally of the Romans, to his betrayal and becoming a gladiator, to the rebellion he leads and its ultimate outcome.

Title: Death and Other Details
Movie Plot: Detective Rufus Cotesworth and his protégé, Imogene, dig for the truth on a Mediterranean ocean liner where everyone is hiding something.

Title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
Movie Plot: Larry David stars as an over-the-top version of himself in this comedy series that shows how seemingly trivial details of day-to-day life can precipitate a catastrophic chain of events.

Title: Marco Polo
Movie Plot: In a world replete with greed, betrayal, sexual intrigue and rivalry, "Marco Polo" is based on the famed explorer's adventures in Kublai Khan's court in 13th century Mongolia.

Title: Defiance
Movie Plot: Life in the city of Defiance, in a near future after the arrival of different alien lifeforms to Earth.

Title: The Fall
Movie Plot: A seemingly cold but very passionate policewoman goes head to head with a seemingly passionate father who is in fact a cold serial killer in this procedural out of Belfast. The only thing they share is their common complexity.

Title: Vsauce3: Into the Badlands
Movie Plot: Jake Roper of Vsauce3, and AMC's Into the Badlands have teamed up to present a webseries about the science behind video game combat.

Title: The Shannara Chronicles
Movie Plot: Series of adventures, war, and evil that occur throughout the history of the Four Lands.

Title: The Strain
Movie Plot: A mysterious viral outbreak with hallmarks of an ancient and evil strain of vampirism ravages the city of New York.

Title: Iron Fist
Movie Plot: A young man is bestowed with incredible martial arts skills and a mystical force known as the Iron Fist.

Title: Wu Assassins
Movie Plot: A warrior chosen as the latest and last Wu Assassin must search for the powers of an ancient triad and restore balance in San Francisco's Chinatown.

Title: The Gifted
Movie Plot: In a world where mutated humans are treated with distrust and fear, an institute for mutants battles to achieve peaceful co-existence with humanity.

Title: 12 Monkeys
Movie Plot: Follows the journey of a time traveler from the post-apocalyptic future who appears in present day on a mission to locate and eradicate the source of a deadly plague that will nearly destroy the human race.
The Duttons face a new set of challenges in the early 20th century, including the rise of Western expansion, Prohibition, and the Great Depression.

Title: Black Sails
Movie Plot: Follows Captain Flint and his pirates twenty years prior to Robert Louis Stevenson's classic novel "Treasure Island."

The post-Civil war generation of the Dutton family travels to Texas, and joins a wagon train undertaking the arduous journey west to Oregon, before settling in Montana to establish what would eventually become the Yellowstone Ranch.

Title: Dabangg 2
Movie Plot: Chulbul Pandey invites a fresh trouble when he kills the brother of a notorious politician and the former swears to wreak havoc in his life.

Title: Venom
Movie Plot: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.

Title: Ready
Movie Plot: Set in Thailand and India, a case of mistaken identity leads to love, and a man and his family concoct a grand scheme to win over the hearts of a woman and her greedy, conniving uncles.

Title: Bang Bang
Movie Plot: A young bank receptionist gets mixed up with Rajveer Nanda, a man who has a mysterious background.

Title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
Movie Plot: While recovering from an assassination attempt four days before his coronation, a stern prince is replaced by a romantic lookalike.

Title: Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S.
Movie Plot: Mothra and her fairies return to Japan to warn mankind that they must return Kiryu to the sea, for the dead must not be disturbed. However Godzilla has survived to menace Japan leaving Kiryu as the nation's only defense.

Title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla II
Movie Plot: The United Nations assembles the ultimate weapon to defeat Godzilla, while scientists discover a fresh pteranodon egg on a remote Japanese island.

Title: Godzilla vs. King Ghidorah
Movie Plot: Time travelers use Godzilla in their scheme to destroy Japan to prevent the country's future economic reign.

Title: Godzilla vs. Megaguirus
Movie Plot: Japan creates an artificial black hole device to trap Godzilla forever, but a test of the device creates new foes for Godzilla, car-sized dragonflies called meganula and their queen, Megaguirus.

Title: Godzilla vs. SpaceGodzilla
Movie Plot: Godzilla is threatened by two new forces: Mogera - another UN built machine; and Space Godzilla - a beast spawned from Godzilla's particles in space.

Title: Godzilla and Mothra: The Battle for Earth
Movie Plot: Japan is caught in the middle of a three way battle between Godzilla, the divine Mothra, and her dark counterpart Battra.

Title: Mud
Movie Plot: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.

Title: Hostiles
Movie Plot: In 1892, a legendary Army Captain reluctantly agrees to escort a Cheyenne chief and his family through dangerous territory.

Title: 3:10 to Yuma
Movie Plot: Broke small-time rancher Dan Evans is hired by the stagecoach line to put big-time captured outlaw leader Ben Wade on the 3:10 train to Yuma but Wade's gang tries to free him.

Title: Godzilla: City on the Edge of Battle
Movie Plot: Humanity's desperate battle to reclaim the Earth from Godzilla continues. The key to defeating the King of the Monsters may be Mechagodzilla, a robotic weapon thought to have been lost nearly 20,000 years ago.

Title: Godzilla: The Planet Eater
Movie Plot: Humanity, their alien allies, and Godzilla all enter their endgame as the powerful destructive entity known as Ghidorah arrives on Earth.

Title: Godzilla Singular Point
Movie Plot: Brought together by a mysterious song, a grad student and an engineer lead the fight against an unimaginable force that may spell doom for the world.

Title: Joy
Movie Plot: Joy is the story of the title character, who rose to become founder and matriarch of a powerful family business dynasty.

Title: Serena
Movie Plot: In Depression-era North Carolina, the future of George Pemberton's timber empire becomes complicated when he marries Serena.

Title: Shooter
Movie Plot: A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after hearing of a plot to kill the President. After being-double crossed for the attempt and on the run, he sets out for the real killer and the truth.

Title: Inside Man
Movie Plot: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

Title: Flight
Movie Plot: Troubling questions arise after airline pilot Whip Whitaker makes a miracle landing after a mid-air catastrophe.

Title: Black Mass
Movie Plot: The true story of Whitey Bulger, the brother of a state senator and the most infamous violent criminal in the history of South Boston, who became an FBI informant to take down a Mafia family invading his turf.

Title: Sleepy Hollow
Movie Plot: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people; the culprit is legendary apparition The Headless Horseman.

Title: Juno
Movie Plot: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes a selfless decision regarding the unborn child.

Title: War Dogs
Movie Plot: Loosely based on the true story of two young men, David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli, who won a three hundred million dollar contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan.

Title: The Cruise
Movie Plot: Timothy "Speed" Levitch, an eccentric New York City tour bus guide, takes tourists around the island of Manhattan and shares an archive of beautifully distorted information about the city.

Title: Invasion of Astro-Monster
Movie Plot: Astronauts investigate Planet X and encounter the Xiliens, who ask Earth's people to help save their world from "Monster Zero". As one astronaut forms a romance with a mysterious woman, he uncovers the Xilien's true intentions.

Title: Ebirah, Horror of the Deep
Movie Plot: A young man searching for his brother steals a boat that shipwrecks on Letchi island, where terrorists have enslaved the Infant Island natives. Discovering Godzilla asleep, he and some others decide to awaken him to liberate the natives.

Title: Destroy All Monsters
Movie Plot: At the end of the 20th century, all of Earth's monsters have been safely rounded up and sent to Monsterland for scientific study. Chaos erupts when a race of she-aliens known as the Kilaaks unleashes the monsters on the world.

Title: King Kong vs. Godzilla
Movie Plot: A UN reporter broadcasts a report on the appearance of a prehistoric monster that emerges from hibernation while a pharmaceutical company seeks publicity with a monster of their own. (US Version)

Title: Mothra
Movie Plot: An expedition to Infant Island discovers a native population and tiny twin fairy priestesses of the island's mythical deity. Named Mothra, she sets out to rescue her fairies after they are kidnapped by an exploitative businessman.

Title: Touch
Movie Plot: At the discovery of his ability to work miracles, Juvenal becomes a media sensation, but now he's prone to those who want to exploit him.

Title: Godzilla 1985
Movie Plot: Thirty years after the original monster's rampage, a new Godzilla emerges and attacks Japan.

Title: Godzilla
Movie Plot: Godzilla's initial 1957 French theatrical debut resulted in an entirely different version of the film altogether, combining Toho's original Gojira with elements of the re-edited US release with Raymond Burr.

Title: Godzilla
Movie Plot: In 1977, the film was purchased and colorized by Luigi Cozzi in a terrible way of an old negative print. When American reporter Steve Martin investigates a series of mysterious disasters off the coast of Japan, he comes face to face with an ancient creature so powerful and so terrifying, it can reduce Tokyo to a smoldering graveyard. Nuclear weapon testing resurrected this relic from the Jurassic age, and now it's rampaging across Japan. At night, Godzilla wades through Tokyo leaving death and destruction in his wake, disappearing into Tokyo Bay when his rage subsides. Conventional weapons are useless against him; but renowned scientist Dr. Serizawa has discovered a weapon that could destroy all life in the bay - including Godzilla. But which disaster is worse, Godzilla's fury, of the death of Tokyo Bay?

Title: Rodan
Movie Plot: A mining engineer investigates the death of his fellow coworkers and discovers prehistoric nymphs emerging from the mines. As he heads deeper into the mines, he makes a more horrifying discovery in the form a prehistoric flying creature.

Title: Imaginary
Movie Plot: A woman returns to her childhood home to discover that the imaginary friend she left behind is very real and unhappy that she abandoned him.

Title: Deadpool
Movie Plot: Deadpool is hired and smitten by the enigmatically psychotic Typhoid Mary. But who is his target?

Title: Twister
Movie Plot: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

Title: Twister
Movie Plot: Delusional and spoiled Maureen and her eccentric brother Howdy decide to track down and meet their estranged mother, all while the drama of dysfunctional relationships, disastrous weather conditions and a dark family secret ensue.
A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.

Title: Godzilla: The Series
Movie Plot: In this direct sequel to the 1998 Godzilla movie, Dr. Nico Tatopoulos leads a team, known as H.E.A.T, to battle giant monsters with the help of Godzilla's only living offspring.

Title: San Andreas
Movie Plot: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

Title: Skyscraper
Movie Plot: A security expert must infiltrate a burning skyscraper, 225 stories above ground, when his family is trapped inside by criminals.

Title: Central Intelligence
Movie Plot: After he reconnects with an awkward pal from high school through Facebook, a mild-mannered accountant is lured into the world of international espionage.

Title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
Movie Plot: Lawman Luke Hobbs and outcast Deckard Shaw form an unlikely alliance when a cyber-genetically enhanced villain threatens the future of humanity.

Title: Red Notice
Movie Plot: An Interpol agent successfully tracks down the world's most wanted art thief with help from a rival thief. But nothing is as it seems as a series of double-crosses ensues.

Title: How Can I Help You
Movie Plot: In an attempt to overcome her incessant guilt complex, a young woman goes a step too far.

Title: Rampage: Deleted Scenes
Movie Plot: Deleted scenes from the movie 'Rampage'.

Title: SisterS
Movie Plot: It follows two women, one from Canada and the other from Ireland, who discover they are half-sisters. They embark on a road trip to find their alcoholic father.

Title: Class of '07
Movie Plot: When an apocalyptic tidal wave hits during the ten-year reunion of an all-girls high school, a group of women must find a way to survive on the island peak of their high school campus.

Title: Based on a True Story
Movie Plot: A realtor, a former tennis star, and a plumber seize a unique opportunity to capitalize on America's obsession with true crime.

Title: Deadloch
Movie Plot: A feminist noir comedy set against a bucolic backdrop with a rising body count.

Title: Tiny Beautiful Things
Movie Plot: Follows a woman who reluctantly becomes Dear Sugar; an anonymous and revered advice columnist, even when her own life is falling apart.

Title: Bupkis
Movie Plot: Follows Pete Davidson's life, combining grounded storytelling with some absurd elements from the worldview for which Davidson is well known.

Title: Lucky Hank
Movie Plot: An English department chairman at an underfunded college, Professor Hank Devereaux toes the line between midlife crisis and full-blown meltdown, navigating the offbeat chaos in his personal and professional life.

Title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
Movie Plot: Jake Pentecost, son of Stacker Pentecost, reunites with Mako Mori to lead a new generation of Jaeger pilots, including rival Lambert and 15-year-old hacker Amara, against a new Kaiju threat.

Title: Chappie
Movie Plot: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.

Title: Elysium
Movie Plot: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

Title: Death in Paradise
Movie Plot: A Detective Inspector is transferred from London to the Caribbean island of Saint-Marie to investigate and solve complex murders.

Title: Doctor Who
Movie Plot: The time lord known as the Doctor travels through space and time with his companions, having incredible adventures and facing dangerous enemies.

Title: Doctor Who
Movie Plot: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and his companions from planet Earth.

Title: Winter's Bone
Movie Plot: An unflinching Ozark Mountain girl hacks through dangerous social terrain as she hunts down her drug-dealing father while trying to keep her family intact.

Title: Leave No Trace
Movie Plot: The Boy Scouts Of America reached a $2.7 billion agreement over sex abuse claims, the largest such settlement in history.

Title: Stray Dog
Movie Plot: A contemplative portrait of Ron 'Stray Dog' Hall: biker, Vietnam Vet, and lover of small dogs.

Title: Down to the Bone
Movie Plot: A woman stuck in a stale marriage struggles to raise her children and manage her secret drug habit. But when winter comes to her small town, her balancing act begins to come crashing down.

Title: Galveston
Movie Plot: After escaping a set up, a dying hitman returns to his hometown of Galveston where he plans his revenge.

Title: Zokkomon
Movie Plot: An orphan is abused and abandoned, believed to be dead, and upon his return is first feared as a ghost, and then projected as a superhero.

Title: The Messenger
Movie Plot: An American soldier struggles with an ethical dilemma when he becomes involved with a widow of a fallen officer.

Title: Faro
Movie Plot: The police are pursuing a man wanted for murder. If the man is arrested his daughter will be placed in foster care. To stay free they escape into the wilderness. Faro refers to a Portuguese city that the father once visited.

Title: The Sparks Brothers
Movie Plot: A musical odyssey through five weird and wonderful decades with Ron and Russell Mael celebrating the inspiring legacy of Sparks.

Title: Last Night in Soho: Deleted Scenes
Movie Plot: Deleted scenes cut from the film, 'Last Night in Soho'.

Title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
Movie Plot: A national manhunt is ordered for a rebellious kid and his foster uncle who go missing in the wild New Zealand bush.

Title: What We Do in the Shadows
Movie Plot: Viago, Deacon, and Vladislav are vampires who are struggling with the mundane aspects of modern life, like paying rent, keeping up with the chore wheel, trying to get into nightclubs, and overcoming flatmate conflicts.

Title: Boy
Movie Plot: Boy, an 11-year-old child and devout Michael Jackson fan who lives on the east coast of New Zealand in 1984, gets a chance to know his absentee criminal father, who has returned to find a bag of money he buried years ago.

Title: Love My Way
Movie Plot: A story about a group of thirty-somethings dealing with the ups and downs of life.

Title: The Secret Life of Us
Movie Plot: This TV show is about the life of some young adults and living in a Family block at St. Kida in Melbourne, Australia and as each of them confront the life typical situations: search work, love, Sex and success but everyone are very friends each other.—dinoarreagaec

Title: Looking for Alibrandi
Movie Plot: At seventeen Josie Alibrandi is about to enter her final year as a scholarship student at an exclusive Catholic College. It's the year her life is turned upside down and changed forever.

Title: Offspring
Movie Plot: The story of the impossible loves of 30-something obstetrician Nina Proudman and her fabulously messy family.

Title: Tangle
Movie Plot: A story of two generations of two families colliding, connecting, sometimes at cross purposes as they navigate their way around the maze of love, sex, money and politics.

Title: Wonderland
Movie Plot: The lives of the residents living in a city apartment block in Sydney.

Title: The Time of Our Lives
Movie Plot: The lives of family and friends who go through a variety of ups and downs.

Title: Bump
Movie Plot: An unexpected pregnancy complicates the lives of two families. The series centers around Oly, an ambitious and high-achieving teenage girl who has a surprise baby.

Title: Puberty Blues
Movie Plot: Teen best friends Debbie and Sue grow up and find love and freedom on the beaches of Sydney's Sutherland Shire during the tumultuous 1970s.

Title: SeaChange
Movie Plot: A big city lawyer is prompted to undergo a 'seachange' with her children and becomes the magistrate at the small coastal town of Pearl Bay, where the family comes to love its people and the quality time with each other.

Title: Underbelly
Movie Plot: Each season of this multi-award-winning television series takes you through a 13-episode run in the rise and fall of real-life Australian underworld figures as told from both sides of the law.

Title: No Activity
Movie Plot: Follows the peripheral players in a major sting operation. The day-to-day realities of cops and criminals are brought to life by some of Australia's best comic actors.

Title: Harmonica
Movie Plot: Set on the sun-drenched southern coast of Iran, "Harmonica" begins as a young boy receives a musical present from abroad. Fascinated and envious, his friends make him the leader of the pack, as they compete for the privilege of holding the harmonica or even blowing a few notes. No one is more obsessed than Amiroo, gentle and heavy-set, who seems willing to do anything to get close to the harmonica and its owner.—Anonymous

Title: Princess of Rome
Movie Plot: Princess of Rome, Mellika, granddaughter of Great Caesar. The story talks about her move from Byzantium in the 9th century, to avoid her marriage with Krytos, and brings her to Baghdad to become the mother of Imam Mahdi, the Savior.

Title: A Mother's Love
Movie Plot: Mehdi is an orphan who lost his father in a car accident and his mother too passed away in giving birth to her second child. He thinks that Mrs. Fahimy who is a social worker is very look like his mother and insisting that she should be his mother but she is refusing.—Ibrahim

Title: Bridge to Terabithia
Movie Plot: A preteen's life turns upside down when he befriends the new girl in school and they imagine a whole new fantasy world to escape reality.

Title: Majid Delbandam
Movie Plot: The story of this series is about a long-handled doll named "Majid" who creates a beautiful and humorous story with his sweets in each episode.

Title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
Movie Plot: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

Title: A Girl of the Limberlost
Movie Plot: A teenage girl living in 1908 rural Indiana attends high school despite her mother's fierce opposition of her life, the friendship of a free-spirted older woman helps her stick to her goals.

Title: Soul Surfer
Movie Plot: Bethany Hamilton, a professional surfer, loses her left arm in a shark attack. Unwilling to pay attention to the gravity of her situation, Bethany decides to get back into the ocean and surf again.

Title: The Dreamer of Oz
Movie Plot: The film is the biography of Frank Baum, the children's book author and creator of the fantasy world Oz.

Title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
Movie Plot: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the depths of space by the magical board game they are playing.

Title: Because of Winn-Dixie
Movie Plot: A mischievous dog befriends a lonely young girl in a new town and helps her make new friends.

Title: Little Manhattan
Movie Plot: A 10-year-old boy and an 11-year-old girl find love in New York City.

Title: Chaotic
Movie Plot: A group of friends find a portal to Perim, another worldly dimension, where Chaotic, a popular card game, is real.

Title: Miracle Dogs
Movie Plot: The film is based on the inspirational story of Annie, a dog who battles and beats cancer.

Title: Baduk
Movie Plot: Baduk is the name of the child who works in smuggling, due to poverty he and his sister separated, the sister will work as a maid, he keeps trying to reach his sister in vain, finally he escaped from Iran because he thinks that his sister left Iran, he discovered later on that she is still in Iran.—Ammar Malas

Title: Thief of Dolls
Movie Plot: Leila and Bahram's mother wants to get a loan to buy a house for her children to live in. But the villain old lady sends her son Ganjo to steal the money. The children decide to sell their dolls to gather the money for buying a house again but Ganjo this time steals the dolls too. They go after Ganjo chasing him to his house but he trapped them. The dolls hurry to save the children and the police is coming too.—Ibrahim

Title: Shekarestan Aroosaki
Movie Plot: Sugarland puppet show takes place in an old and imaginary city. The stories are taken from folk tales, proverbs and old Iranian and Eastern stories.

Title: Party
Movie Plot: There is a wedding hall next to Mr. Tahmasb's new house, to which he has recently moved. So new puppet characters, most of whom are the staff of this wedding hall, are added to his life and figure out interesting events.

Title: Lineman
Movie Plot: When artist draws a magic line, it takes on a life of its own, becoming a silhouette of a living hot-tempered person. This "Mr. Line" wants more things drawn so he can enjoy himself, but the artist loves having fun on Mr. Line's account.

Title: The Elephant King
Movie Plot: After being humiliated by others, "Shadfil" goes through ups and downs in so many adventures to finally win everyone's heart and become the real elephant king.

Title: My Dear Bootham
Movie Plot: When a kid named Pannu finds a lantern in a cave, he opens it when he gets home and it releases the King of all Genies named Karkimuki. The genie helps the little boy with his problems of everyday life.

Title: Trigger
Movie Plot: A Son tries to save his father who was an ex-cop from tight spot caused by a tragic incident of kidnap.

Title: Oh My Dog
Movie Plot: Young Arjun rescues a blind Siberian Husky puppy and decides to train him for a competition with his father and grandfather.

Title: Our Girl
Movie Plot: Drama following the extraordinary adventures of female medics in the British Army.

Title: Oruthee
Movie Plot: The life of a bold middle-class woman who is a boat conductor. She must face shocking events and she fights to survive the trauma, but things take a deadly turn.

Title: Coronation Street: Out of Africa
Movie Plot: Chesney and the squad go on a lads holiday to Africa. Once there Kirk says, "Chez mate you're an absolute ledge!" And they go off and have themselves a cheeky African Nandos. Meanwhile Kirk's lass Fiz gets lost in a monastery and goes mental.

Title: Drunk History: UK
Movie Plot: UK comedians relate their favourite historical stories while drunk.

Title: Coronation Street: Tram Crash
Movie Plot: The 50th anniversary live episode. The tram crashes into the viaduct, the Kabin, and the Bistro. Several people are hurt and there are deaths.

Title: Hollyoaks
Movie Plot: Hollyoaks takes a look at the lives, loves, and careers of a group of teenage friends and their families as they graduate through GCSEs, A-Levels, and College into the world of work.

Title: Coronation Street: Compilations
Movie Plot: This series looks back at nearly 60 years of ground-breaking storylines of Coronation Street that made headlines and captured the public's imagination.

Title: I'm a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!
Movie Plot: British reality series presented by Ant and Dec in which 12 celebrities are abandoned in the Australian jungle. In order to earn food, they must perform Bushtucker Trials which challenge them physically and mentally.

Title: Birds of a Feather
Movie Plot: Comedy series following the lives of sisters Tracey and Sharon who are left to fend for themselves after their husbands are arrested for armed robbery.

Title: Taggart
Movie Plot: The Maryhill CID investigates gruesome murders against the bleak backdrop of the city of Glasgow.

Title: London's Burning
Movie Plot: The lives of firefighters at Blackwall Fire Station.

Title: Have I Got News for You
Movie Plot: Long-running satirical news quiz featuring regular team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton. Originally chaired by Angus Deayton, the series has adopted "guest hosts" since 2002.

Title: Heartbeat
Movie Plot: The 1960s lives and adventures of the police constabulary, medical staff, and residents of Ashfordly and Aidensfield.

Title: A Touch of Frost
Movie Plot: DI Jack Frost is an unconventional policeman with sympathy for the underdog and an instinct for moral justice. Sloppy, disorganized, and disrespectful, he attracts trouble like a magnet.

Title: The Two Ronnies
Movie Plot: This long-running BBC comedy show consisted of sketches and humourous musical routines.

Title: Bergerac
Movie Plot: Recovering alcoholic and divorced father of a young daughter, DS Jim Bergerac is a true maverick who prefers doing things his own way, and consequently doesn't always carry out his investigations the way his boss would like.

Title: EastEnders: E20
Movie Plot: Following four teenagers who crash into Albert Square, as their lives intertwine with drama, excitement and heartbreak.

Title: EastEnders: Secrets from the Square
Movie Plot: When EastEnders halted production due to COVID19 , this series was made to fill the gap while the cast and crew returned to filming new episodes. Stacey Dooley presents with some of Walford's biggest names as guests.

Title: Gogglebox
Movie Plot: Some of Britain's most opinionated and avid TV viewers comment freely on the best and worst television shows of the past week, from the comfort of their sofas.

Title: Ant & Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway
Movie Plot: A game show hosted by Ant and Dec filled with stunts, sketches, and special guest appearances.

Title: The Chase
Movie Plot: A fast-paced game show where contestants must compete against 'The Chasers,' the show's eccentric and pompous know-it-all characters, in a variety of questions in order to win money by answering more of them correctly than the Chasers.

Title: Emmerdale: The Dingles - For Richer for Poorer
Movie Plot: What would happen if the Dingles won 50 million pounds in the lottery? What would happen if Zak bought a beer instead of the ticket? How would it affect their lives either way. Thus "For Richer, For Poorer".

Title: Emmerdale Family Trees
Movie Plot: Narrated by Gaynor Faye, Emmerdale Family Trees takes a look back at the different generations of three of the soap's most-loved families: The Tates, The Sugdens and The Dingles. Through a mixture of archive footage, voice over and first-hand accounts of cast members past and present, we delve deep into the history of, and most memorable on-screen moments from, some of the most iconic Emmerdale families.

Title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
Movie Plot: This series focuses on the NYPD's Major Case Squad, a force of detectives who investigate high-profile cases, while also showing parts of the crime from the perpetrator's point of view.

Title: Law & Order: Trial by Jury
Movie Plot: The series showed the workings of the judicial system, beginning with the arraignment, and continuing through the lawyers process of building a case, investigating leads, and preparing witnesses and defendants for trial.

Title: Law & Order: LA
Movie Plot: Los Angeles police detectives investigate crimes and district attorneys prosecute the offenders.

Title: Neighbours
Movie Plot: Australian soap opera exploring the lives and relationships of the residents of Ramsay Street in a suburb of Melbourne called Erinsborough.

Title: Law & Order
Movie Plot: New York's finest police detectives and prosecutors fight to make the city a safer place. With integrity as the guiding force from investigation to verdict, the teams weigh every perspective in their commitment to finding justice.

Title: Law & Order Toronto: Criminal Intent
Movie Plot: Follows a squad of elite investigators who investigate corruption and high-level criminality in the Greater Toronto Area.

Title: Ready Player One
Movie Plot: When the creator of a virtual reality called the OASIS dies, he makes a posthumous challenge to all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune and control of his world.

Title: Conviction
Movie Plot: ADA Alexandra Cabot from "Law & Order: Special Victims Unit" returns as the bureau chief for the group of young ADAs. According to Dick Wolf, "'Conviction' will be a 'charactercedural,' we will be dealing extensively with characters' back stories and personal lives."—Anonymous

Title: Law & Order: Organized Crime
Movie Plot: Elliot Stabler returns to the NYPD to battle organized crime after a devastating personal loss.

Title: Murphy's Law
Movie Plot: As a maverick cop with a dark past, DS Tommy Murphy fails a psychiatric assessment but is given one last chance by his boss and given a dangerous undercover assignment.

Title: The Last Detective
Movie Plot: "Dangerous" Davies always gets the cases no one else wants, and no one notices when he eventually succeeds. But his old-fashioned decency and dogged determination have won him legions of loyal fans.

Title: Kojak
Movie Plot: A bald, lollipop sucking police detective with a fiery righteous attitude battles crime in his city.

Title: Kavanagh QC
Movie Plot: A crusty barrister oversees difficult criminal cases while dealing with the demands of his family life.

Title: Hill Street Blues
Movie Plot: The lives and work of the staff of an inner city police precinct.

Title: Homerun
Movie Plot: A young boy accidentally loses his sister's school shoes. To avoid trouble at school and with their parents, they decide to secretly share his shoes.

Title: Dallas
Movie Plot: J.R. Ewing, a Texas oil baron, uses manipulation and blackmail to achieve his ambitions, both business and personal. He often comes into conflict with his brother Bobby, his arch-enemy Cliff Barnes and his long-suffering wife Sue Ellen.

Title: Simon & Simon
Movie Plot: Two brothers of disparate tastes and manners run a private detective agency.

Title: Cagney & Lacey: The Return
Movie Plot: Cagney, now a Lieutenant, re-teams with Lacey, who has left the force, to search for a cache of missing firearms.

Title: Holby City
Movie Plot: The everyday lives, professional and personal, of the doctors, nurses and patients who find themselves, for various reasons, in the wards of the frenetic cardiac unit of Holby City General Hospital.

Title: Casualty 1909
Movie Plot: Available records and diaries of nurses, doctors, and patients of the London hospital are put to life in this compelling series about the historic London Hospital.

Title: Casualty 24/7
Movie Plot: Documentary series filmed inside the casualty department of a hospital in Barnsley, South Yorkshire following the staff, volunteers and patients.

Title: Waterloo Road
Movie Plot: Contemporary drama series set in a challenging, diverse British secondary school.

Title: One Foot in the Grave
Movie Plot: Victor Meldrew is a retiree who attracts bad luck. If he's not driving his long suffering wife Margaret crazy with his constant moaning, he's fighting with neighbours.

Title: The 15:17 to Paris
Movie Plot: Three courageous young Americans prevent a terrorist attack on a train bound for Paris.

Title: Invictus
Movie Plot: Nelson Mandela, in his first term as President of South Africa, initiates a unique venture to unite the Apartheid-torn land: enlist the national rugby team on a mission to win the 1995 Rugby World Cup.

Title: Dark Waters
Movie Plot: A corporate defense attorney takes on an environmental lawsuit against a chemical company that exposes a lengthy history of pollution.

Title: Just Mercy
Movie Plot: World-renowned civil rights defense attorney Bryan Stevenson works to free a wrongly condemned death row prisoner.

Title: Jersey Boys
Movie Plot: The story of four young men from the wrong side of the tracks in New Jersey who came together to form the iconic 1960s rock group The Four Seasons.

Title: The Founder
Movie Plot: The story of Ray Kroc, a salesman who turned two brothers' innovative fast food eatery, McDonald's, into the biggest restaurant business in the world, with a combination of ambition, persistence, and ruthlessness.

Title: The Da Vinci Code
Movie Plot: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

Title: Deepwater Horizon
Movie Plot: A dramatization of the disaster in April 2010, when the offshore drilling rig called the Deepwater Horizon exploded, resulting in the worst oil spill in American history.

Title: The Bridges of Madison County
Movie Plot: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.

Title: Outbreak
Movie Plot: Army doctors struggle to find a cure for a deadly virus spreading throughout a California town that was brought to America by an African monkey.

Title: The Flaxton Boys
Movie Plot: Four generations of boys have various adventures at Flaxton Hall in Yorkshire, beginning with Jonathan and his friend Archie in 1854.

Title: Draft Day
Movie Plot: At the NFL Draft, General Manager Sonny Weaver has the opportunity to rebuild his team when he trades for the number one pick. He must decide what he's willing to sacrifice on a life-changing day for a few hundred young men with NFL dreams.

Title: We Are Marshall
Movie Plot: When a plane crash claims the lives of members of the Marshall University football team and some of its fans, the team's new coach and his surviving players try to keep the football program alive.
In 1947, Jackie Robinson becomes the first African-American to play in Major League Baseball in the modern era when he was signed by the Brooklyn Dodgers and faces considerable racism in the process.

Title: When the Cat Comes
Movie Plot: People arrive in a small village with a strange cat wearing glasses. When someone takes them off, he can color people, according to their nature and mood. Adults consider him dangerous; children love him.

Title: The Recorder Exam
Movie Plot: Nine-year-old Eunhee anxiously prepares for her recorder examination as she struggles with a difficult family.

Title: Girl Asleep
Movie Plot: The world is closing in on Greta Driscoll. On the cusp of turning fifteen she can't bear to leave her childhood, it contains all the things that give her comfort in this incomprehensible new world.

Title: Yuki's Sun
Movie Plot: The Story centers around a child name Yuki, a 10-year old orphan who's being adopted by a family.

Title: Bienvenidos
Movie Plot: An amazing innovation reaches a tiny school lost in the heart of the Peruvian Andes and revolutionizes the lives of the whole community: the internet. It brings the world to their doorstep, but even more importantly, it offers the world the chance to finally discover what's happening in the remote village of Ingatambo.—Anonymous

Title: Mommo
Movie Plot: A brother and sister are split up after their mother dies, their father remarries, and their new stepmother rejects them.

Title: Lipstick
Movie Plot: Sophia and Oliver are two little siblings who enjoy playing at their grandma's place while she sleeps. However, their games get interrupted when Oliver realizes that grandma is not moving anymore. Sophia and Oliver encounter death for the first time and have to deal with it on their own.—Anonymous

Title: The Son
Movie Plot: Django is an eleven-year-old gypsy boy who lives with his family in an abandoned trailer near a train railway. Every morning his father jumps onto the train to hitch a free ride into town to look for food and earn money. In the mornings and evenings the father prepares his son to tackle the hardships of the life that are necessary to keep the family alive.

Title: It's Not Me, I Swear!
Movie Plot: During the summer of 1968, Leon, a 10-year-old boy, navigates the hardships of young love, his lunatic mother's whims, and his urges to vandalize the house of his neighbors.

Title: And I Will Rise If Only to Hold You Down
Movie Plot: This short narrative chronicles an evening with a family on the verge of dissolve. AIWRIOTHYD is a darkly humorous story about slow jams, bad magic and coming closer.

Title: Gayby Baby
Movie Plot: GAYBY BABY follows the lives of four kids - Gus, Ebony, Matt and Graham - whose parents all happen to be gay. As they each wrestle with personal change, the outside world wrestles with the issue of marriage equality, and whether or not kids of same-sex families are at risk.

Title: I Won't Love You
Movie Plot: In an idyllic working class community, 13 year old Anka grows up, going through stages of adolescence, dreaming, first love and gossiping with girlfriends. Roughly disturbed by the shame and disgrace of alcoholism - leaves unwashable stains upon the community, that tries to cope with abuse and depression, and the system (including school teachers) who try to avoid the subject. This story was aimed at parents, to give them morally an insight into what happens when a young girl has to deal with the disgrace of an alcoholic father and a mentally instable mother. Very well acted by Grazyna Michalska as Anka. [translated from Polish by ALIPTES]—The Allure of Nymphets.com

Title: Tin Toy
Movie Plot: A one-man-band tin toy tries to escape a destructive baby.

Title: Red Balloon
Movie Plot: The drama tells the story of the relative deprivation we all suffer, the thirst of our stomach aches, and our struggles to soothe our thirsts.

Title: Race to Witch Mountain
Movie Plot: A Las Vegas cabbie enlists the help of a U.F.O. expert to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.

Title: Oink
Movie Plot: A nine-year-old girl gets a pig named Oink as a gift from her grandfather.

Title: Entre Deux Soeurs
Movie Plot: In their world, two sisters make one. The older one gives the younger one a hand, and together they did everything. When the younger one is able to move around without her big sister one day, it becomes clear what inclusion can lead to.

Title: Riceboy Sleeps
Movie Plot: Set in the 90s, a Korean single mother raises her young son in the suburbs of Canada determined to provide a better life for him than the one she left behind.

Title: Little Nicholas - Happy as Can Be
Movie Plot: Young Nicolas lives a childhood full of joy and learning in between camaraderie, arguments, fights, punishments, pranks and games.

Title: Ernest and Celestine: A Trip to Gibberitia
Movie Plot: Ernest and Célestine return to Ernest's country to have his broken violin repaired. They discover that music is banned throughout the country. They will attempt to right this injustice in order to bring joy back to bear country.

Title: Titina
Movie Plot: Embark on the extraordinary polar adventure.

Title: Breezy
Movie Plot: A young girl runs away from home and meets a grouchy older man who reluctantly takes her in. Eventually they develop a romantic and affectionate relationship.

Title: About Time
Movie Plot: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

Title: Veetla Vishesham
Movie Plot: While Elango struggles to accept the news of his middle-aged mother's pregnancy, the situation jeopardises his relationship with his girlfriend, Sowmya, and his parents face social ridicule.

Title: The Fault in Our Stars
Movie Plot: Hazel and Gus are teenagers who meet at a cancer support group and fall in love. They both share the same acerbic wit and a love of books, especially "An Imperial Affliction", so they embark on a journey to visit an author in Amsterdam.

Title: Me Before You
Movie Plot: A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of.

Title: Blue Jasmine
Movie Plot: A New York socialite, deeply troubled and in denial, arrives in San Francisco to impose upon her sister. She looks like a million dollars but isn't bringing money, peace or love.

Title: Match Point
Movie Plot: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

Title: Lost in Translation
Movie Plot: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

Title: Café Society
Movie Plot: In the 1930s, a Bronx native moves to Hollywood and falls in love with a young woman who is seeing a married man.

Title: Paris, Texas
Movie Plot: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

Title: Bernie
Movie Plot: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp.

Title: Me and Orson Welles
Movie Plot: In 1937, a teenager is cast in the Mercury Theatre production of "Julius Caesar", directed by a young Orson Welles.

Title: Fast Food Nation
Movie Plot: An examination of the health risks involved in the fast food industry as well as its environmental and social consequences.

Title: Another Day at the Office
Movie Plot: A day in the life of Richard Linklater, taking in a conference call with some young studio executives and a session with a psychologist.

Title: It's Impossible to Learn to Plow by Reading Books
Movie Plot: A nameless young character goes into travels to the country, meeting some acquaintances and strangers as well, having banal conversations, dedicating his existence into daily mundane activities. Richard Linklater presents an unconventional narrative, barely composed of dialogue and consisting in observing life and actions.—Rodrigo Amaro

Title: Live from Shiva's Dance Floor
Movie Plot: The imcomparable Speed Levitch waxes philosophical about New York City, the Twin Towers, and Buffalo.

Title: Two Days in New York
Movie Plot: Manhattan couple Marion and Mingus, who each have children from prior relationships, find their comfortable family dynamic jostled by a visit from Marion's relatives.

Title: Notting Hill Anxiety Festival
Movie Plot: A fairytale portrait of a beautiful young woman who appears to have everything, yet is contemplating leaving this world behind.

Title: Lolo
Movie Plot: Violette, a 40-year old workaholic with a career in the fashion industry falls for a provincial computer geek, Jean-Rene, while on a spa retreat with her best friend.

Title: My Zoe
Movie Plot: A divorced mother looks to protect her daughter after an unexpected tragedy.

Title: Looking for Jimmy
Movie Plot: Al, a French living in Los Angeles, organized a barbecue for the birthday party of her friend V., whose party is filmed. As Jimmy, Al's boyfriend, does not come and left no news, Al and V. go looking for him.

Title: On the Verge
Movie Plot: Four women--a chef, a single mom, an heiress, and a job seeker--dig into love and work, with a generous side of midlife crises, in pre-pandemic LA.

Title: Skylab
Movie Plot: In July 1979, during the Summer holidays, in a house somewhere in Brittany, a whole family (parents, uncles, aunts, cousins and other relatives) are gathered to celebrate Granny Amandine's sixty-seventh birthday. Albertine, who was ten years old at the time, vividly recounts this brief but life-changing experience.—Guy Bellinger

Title: Johnny Mnemonic
Movie Plot: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

Title: You Can Count on Me
Movie Plot: A single mother's life is thrown into turmoil after her struggling, rarely seen younger brother returns to town.

Title: Margaret
Movie Plot: A young woman witnesses a bus accident, and is caught up in the aftermath, where the question of whether or not it was intentional affects many people's lives.

Title: God's Own Country
Movie Plot: Spring. Yorkshire. Young farmer Johnny Saxby numbs his daily frustrations with binge drinking and casual sex, until the arrival of a Romanian migrant worker for lambing season ignites an intense relationship that sets Johnny on a new path.

Title: Home and Away
Movie Plot: This show chronicles the lives, loves, happiness, and heartbreaks of the residents of Summer Bay, a small coastal town jon the upper Northern Beaches of Sydney, New South Wales, Australia.

Title: Brokeback Mountain
Movie Plot: A tragic and secretive romance ensues over many years after two men meet while herding sheep on Brokeback Mountain in this opera based on Annie Proulx's short story and its subsequent Oscar-winning film adaptation.

Title: Free Fall
Movie Plot: A soon-to-be-father policeman falls for a gay fellow officer and his life starts falling apart.

Title: Tears in the Rain
Movie Plot: Casey's mother's dying wish was to deliver a letter to an English lord who Casey knows nothing about. While fulfilling her duty, Casey meets the Lord's son, who immediately falls for the American visitor.

Title: Phenomenon Blade Runner
Movie Plot: In 1982 a film came to the cinema that is set in the near future of Los Angeles in 2019 and itself changed the future of cinema as it is one of the most influential science fiction films ever and achieved cult status among cinema buffs around the world. This success was not foreseeable at first, because at the time of its release the film was a flop at the box office. The world of the Blade Runner is oppressively topical today. In his cult film, Ridley Scott conjures up a cold, rain-lashed, neon-glowing big city moloch who plunges into a social, economic and environmental dystopia. Today problems such as climate change, surveillance, overpowering corporations and artificial intelligence are more present than ever and the streets are populated with homeless people between high-rise buildings. Since Fritz Lang's "Metropolis", there has not been a science fiction film that, thanks to its production design and special effects, has developed such a visual impact as "Blade Runner". All the more astonishing were the commercial failure and the press disaster that the film experienced when it opened in theaters. How the film nevertheless managed to become one of the most influential science fiction films of all time, this documentary tells viewers using behind-the-scenes material from various sets, photos, original locations in Los Angeles and illuminating interviewees with those involved in the unforgettable Film production.

Title: Slice of Life
Movie Plot: Story about a low-life drug dealer who tries to turn his life around, but finds himself at the mercy of fate when he encounters a cop with an agenda of his own.

Title: Dangerous Days: Making Blade Runner
Movie Plot: The definitive three-and-a-half hour documentary about the troubled creation and enduring legacy of the science fiction classic Blade Runner (1982), culled from 80 interviews and hours of never-before-seen outtakes and lost footage.

Title: Law & Order True Crime
Movie Plot: Behind the murders of a Hollywood movie executive and his former beauty queen wife by their sons.

Title: Alien: Alone
Movie Plot: An abandoned crew member aboard a derelict chemical hauler is trying to keep her ship and herself alive. After discovering hidden cargo, she risks it all to power up the broken ship in search of human life.

Title: Blade Runner 2049: To Be Human: - Casting Blade Runner 2049
Movie Plot: A behind the scenes look at the casting of Blade Runner 2049 originally produced for the home entertainment release.

Title: Ghost in the Shell SAC_2045
Movie Plot: Hired as a mercenary unit, the former members of Japan's elite Section 9 are faced with the sudden appearance of "Post-Human," a being with tremendous intelligence and physical capabilities.

Title: Ghost in the Shell: SAC_2045 - Sustainable War
Movie Plot: In the year 2045, cybernetic mercenary Motoko Kusanagi returns to Section 9 to face a dangerous new threat: the posthumans. A feature-length recut of the first season of Ghost in the Shell: SAC_2045.

Title: Ghost in the Shell Arise: Alternative Architecture
Movie Plot: A recompilation of the 4 original Ghost in the Shell: Arise movies plus 2 episodes that tie in the story with Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie (2015).

Title: Candy
Movie Plot: Set in contemporary London CANDY follows the story of Joe, a teenage suburban boy, who meets and instantly falls in love with a seemingly innocent young girl from his home town who now lives in London. As their impromptu encounter continues, Joe realizes her situation is much darker then he could have imagined. CANDY explores themes of love, addiction and the responsibilities linked to a loss of innocence as it follows Joe's journey and examines what lengths he is willing to go to rescue CANDY.—Anonymous

Title: Corazón
Movie Plot: Elena Ramirez (Ana De Armas) is a disadvantaged prostitute who learns that she has a life threatening medical condition, and must make attempts to earn a visa in order to gain access to the necessary treatment.

Title: Wasp
Movie Plot: A struggling single mother is determined not to let her four young children be an obstacle in the pursuit of starting a relationship with an old acquaintance.

Title: The Goodbye Place
Movie Plot: An abused child is offered escape by some mysterious strangers who may or may not know where missing children genuinely disappear to.

Title: Kung Fury
Movie Plot: In 1985, Kung Fury, the toughest martial artist cop in Miami, goes back in time to kill the worst criminal of all time - Kung Führer, a.k.a. Adolf Hitler.

Title: The Letter Room
Movie Plot: When a corrections officer is transferred to the letter room, he soon finds himself enmeshed in a prisoner's deeply private life.

Title: The Captain
Movie Plot: A man wakes up with a hangover, only to discover the consequences of his actions.

Title: Tender Mercies
Movie Plot: A broken-down, middle-aged country singer gets a new wife, reaches out to his long-lost daughter, and tries to put his troubled life back together.

Title: The Florida Project
Movie Plot: Set over one summer, the film follows precocious six-year-old Moonee as she courts mischief and adventure with her ragtag playmates and bonds with her rebellious but caring mother, all while living in the shadows of Walt Disney World.

Title: Crazy Heart
Movie Plot: A faded country music musician is forced to reassess his dysfunctional life during a doomed romance that also inspires him.

Title: Love in the Afternoon
Movie Plot: A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him with the wife of a client.

Title: Sabrina
Movie Plot: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

Title: Stalag 17
Movie Plot: After two Americans are killed while escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

Title: The Fortune Cookie
Movie Plot: A crooked lawyer persuades his brother-in-law to feign a serious injury.

Title: Avanti!
Movie Plot: A successful businessman goes to Italy to arrange for the return of his tycoon father's body--and discovers that Dad died with his long-time mistress.

Title: One, Two, Three
Movie Plot: In West Berlin during the Cold War, a Coca-Cola executive is given the task of taking care of his boss' socialite daughter.

Title: Kiss Me, Stupid
Movie Plot: Jealous piano teacher Orville Spooner sends his beautiful wife, Zelda, away for the night while he tries to sell a song to famous nightclub singer Dino, who is stranded in town.

Title: The Front Page
Movie Plot: A ruthless editor tries to get his top reporter to cover one more crime story before retirement.

Title: The Spirit of St. Louis
Movie Plot: Charles 'Slim' Lindbergh struggles to finance and design an airplane that will make his New York to Paris flight the first solo transatlantic crossing.

Title: A Foreign Affair
Movie Plot: In occupied Berlin, an army captain is torn between an ex-Nazi café singer and the U.S. congresswoman investigating her.

Title: Suburbia
Movie Plot: When household tensions and a sense of worthlessness overcome Evan, he finds escape when he clings with the orphans of a throw-away society.

Title: The House of Yes
Movie Plot: A mentally unbalanced young woman - who is convinced she is Jackie Kennedy - flies into a murderous rage when her brother returns home to reveal he is engaged.

Title: The Daytrippers
Movie Plot: When she discovers a love letter written to her husband by an unknown paramour, the distraught Eliza turns to her tight-knit Long Island family for advice.

Title: Clockwatchers
Movie Plot: The relationship between four female temps all working for the same credit company is threatened with the arrival of a new hire, who lands a permanent position one of the women was vying for.

Title: Personal Velocity
Movie Plot: Three women's escapes from their afflicted lives. Each struggles to flee from the men who confine their personal freedom.

Title: Henry Fool
Movie Plot: An introverted garbageman writes his thoughts in a notebook after Henry Fool, writer and ex-con, rents the basement and gives him a notebook and the idea. He writes poetry and Henry helps him along.

Title: Party Girl
Movie Plot: A 20-something, irresponsible party girl is bailed out of jail by her librarian godmother. To repay the loan, she starts working at the library and gradually turns her life around.

Title: The Anniversary Party
Movie Plot: Love is complex and relationships deteriorate.

Title: Set It Up
Movie Plot: Two corporate executive assistants hatch a plan to match-make their two bosses.

Title: The Bad Guys
Movie Plot: During a fleeting return trip to his childhood home, a budding filmmaker is confronted by the now-grown ensemble of his old hometown friends - none of whom are aware that he intends to make his fortune off the shared childhood trauma that splintered them apart all those years ago. During an alcohol-fueled weekend of reminiscence and regret, the eccentric 20-somethings open old wounds, make new mistakes, and realize that the consequences of youth can follow you into adulthood.—Romark Entertainment

Title: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
Movie Plot: A loving mom becomes compelled to reconnect with her creative passions after years of sacrificing herself for her family. Her leap of faith takes her on an epic adventure that jump-starts her life and leads to her triumphant rediscovery.

Title: Hit Man
Movie Plot: A professor moonlighting as a hit man of sorts for his city police department, descends into dangerous, dubious territory when he finds himself attracted to a woman who enlists his services.

Title: Bad News Bears
Movie Plot: A grizzled little league coach tries to turn his team of misfits into champs.

Title: Inning by Inning: A Portrait of a Coach
Movie Plot: A profile of University of Texas baseball coach Augie Garrido, the winningest coach in NCAA history.

Title: Edtv
Movie Plot: A video store clerk agrees to have his life filmed by a camera crew for a television show.

Title: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
Movie Plot: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia, where they are enlisted to once again help ward off an evil king and restore the rightful heir to the land's throne, Prince Caspian.

Title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
Movie Plot: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to Narnia with their cousin Eustace where they meet up with Prince Caspian for a trip across the sea aboard the royal ship The Dawn Treader. Along the way they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors before reaching the edge of the world.

Title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
Movie Plot: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs and rock n' roll.

Title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
Movie Plot: A popular high school student, admired by his peers, decides to take a day off from school and goes to extreme lengths to pull it off, to the chagrin of his Dean, who'll do anything to stop him.

Title: Clerks
Movie Plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

Title: Almost Famous
Movie Plot: A high-school boy in the early 1970s is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

Title: To Rome with Love
Movie Plot: The lives of some visitors and residents of Rome and the romances, adventures and predicaments they get into.

Title: Napoleon Dynamite
Movie Plot: A listless and alienated teenager decides to help his new friend win the class presidency in their small western high school, while he must deal with his bizarre family life back home.

Title: Dazed and Confused
Movie Plot: A man goes to a bar but runs into trouble when his brother is shot

Title: Sixteen Candles
Movie Plot: A girl's "sweet" sixteenth birthday is anything but special: her family forgets about it, and she suffers from every embarrassment possible.

Title: Mallrats
Movie Plot: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

Title: Superbad
Movie Plot: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

Title: Home Alone 3
Movie Plot: Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car.

Title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
Movie Plot: Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.

Title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
Movie Plot: Larry spans the globe, uniting favorite and new characters while embarking on an epic quest to save the magic before it's gone forever.

Title: Jumanji
Movie Plot: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades - and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

Title: The Karate Kid
Movie Plot: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.

Title: Prada: Candy
Movie Plot: Candy is a modern chic french woman. She meets Julius and Gene, who are best friends, and cannot choose between them when both of them are fighting over her love.

Title: Shark
Movie Plot: His first girlfriend was hit by a car. His second girlfriend fell off a cliff. His wife has come prepared.

Title: A Rose Reborn
Movie Plot: A brilliant young inventor and CEO has an opportunity to sell his world changing invention to a mysterious Chinese billionaire. But the two don't have typical business meetings.

Title: The Water Diary
Movie Plot: A story through a child's eyes about living through a drought.

Title: The Wonderful Story of Henry Sugar
Movie Plot: Chronicles a variety of stories, but the main one follows Henry Sugar, who is able to see through objects and predict the future with the help of a book he stole.

Title: SoftBank Commercial
Movie Plot: Inspired by Jacques Tati this is an ad for Japanese cell phones.

Title: Paul, Apostle of Christ
Movie Plot: Luke risks his life to visit Paul, who is captive in a Roman prison under Nero's rule. Together, they struggle against a determined emperor and the frailties of the human spirit to live out the Gospel and spread the message to the world.

Title: A.D. The Bible Continues
Movie Plot: Follows the book of ACTS. Shows the complete message of Christ and the transformation of Saul to Paul and how the high priest of Judea does not believe in what has taken place after the Crucifixion of Christ.

Title: The Passion of the Christ
Movie Plot: Depicts the final twelve hours in the life of Jesus of Nazareth, on the day of his crucifixion in Jerusalem.

Title: The Bible
Movie Plot: A religious dramatic miniseries about God's creation and physical landmark events leading up to the Crucifixion and Resurrection of Jesus Christ.

Title: Son of God
Movie Plot: The life story of Jesus is told from his humble birth through his teachings, crucifixion and ultimate resurrection.

Title: Risen
Movie Plot: Disaster unfolds when a meteor strikes a small town, turning the environment uninhabitable and killing everything in the surrounding area.

Title: The Case for Christ
Movie Plot: An investigative journalist and self-proclaimed atheist sets out to disprove the existence of God after his wife becomes a Christian.

Title: God's Not Dead
Movie Plot: College philosophy professor Mr. Radisson's curriculum is challenged by his new student, Josh, who believes God exists.

Title: War Room
Movie Plot: A seemingly perfect family looks to fix their problems with the help of Miss Clara, an older, wiser woman.

Title: St. Paul
Movie Plot: Biblical epic from the book of Acts and Paul's epistles covering the conversion of Saul of Tarsus and his ministry to the Gentiles now known as Paul. Pursued by fellow Jew Reuben, who wishes him dead, Paul takes the Gospel of Jesus throughout the known world to Rome.—<jeff007@one.net.au>

Title: The Gospel of John
Movie Plot: The story of Jesus' life as told by the apostle John, narrated by Christopher Plummer.

Title: Fireproof
Movie Plot: In an attempt to save his marriage, a firefighter uses a 40-day experiment known as "The Love Dare."

Title: Robin Hood
Movie Plot: In twelfth-century England, Robin Longstride and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.

Title: All the Money in the World
Movie Plot: The story of the kidnapping of 16-year-old John Paul Getty III and the desperate attempt by his devoted mother to convince his billionaire grandfather Jean Paul Getty to pay the ransom.

Title: Alexander
Movie Plot: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest army leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.

Title: 1492: Conquest of Paradise
Movie Plot: Christopher Columbus' discovery of the Americas and the effect this has on the indigenous people.

Title: Exodus
Movie Plot: The State of Israel is created in 1948, resulting in war with its Arab neighbors.

Title: The Counselor
Movie Plot: A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.

Title: Wrath of the Titans
Movie Plot: Perseus braves the treacherous underworld to rescue his father, Zeus, captured by his son, Ares, and brother Hades who unleash the ancient Titans upon the world.

Title: Exodus
Movie Plot: When a VHS-tape proves the existence of a rumored doorway to paradise, a young man abandons his decaying hometown in pursuit of the door to salvation, evading vengeful pursuers along the way.

Title: Clash of the Titans
Movie Plot: Perseus, a demigod and the son of Zeus, battles the minions of Hades and the Underworld in order to stop them from conquering Olympus and Earth.

Title: 47 Ronin
Movie Plot: A band of samurai sets out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.

Title: The Legend of Tarzan
Movie Plot: Tarzan, having acclimated to life in London, is called back to his former home in the jungle to investigate the activities at a mining encampment.

Title: Pompei
Movie Plot: Victor and his little brother scrape by through the thieving of artifacts as part of a community of vagrant children.

Title: Jack the Giant Slayer
Movie Plot: The ancient war between humans and a race of giants is reignited when Jack, a young farmhand fighting for a kingdom and the love of a princess, opens a gateway between the two worlds.

Title: The Three Musketeers
Movie Plot: The hot-headed young D'Artagnan along with three former legendary but now down-on-their-luck Musketeers must unite and defeat a beautiful double agent and her villainous employer from seizing the French throne and engulfing Europe in war.

Title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
Movie Plot: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna.

Title: The Eagle of the Ninth
Movie Plot: In Britannia in 130, a young Roman officer named Marcus Flavius Aquila and his freed slave Esca search for the Ninth Legion's gold eagle standard, which vanished with the legion 13 years earlier.

Title: Solomon Kane
Movie Plot: A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil.

Title: Ironclad
Movie Plot: In thirteenth-century England, a Knights Templar and a few of the Barons men fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John.

Title: The Last Legion
Movie Plot: As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.

Title: Black Death
Movie Plot: Set during the time of the first outbreak of bubonic plague in England, a young monk is given the task of learning the truth about reports of people being brought back to life in a small village.

Title: Outlander
Movie Plot: During the reign of the Vikings, Kainan, a man from a far-off world, crash lands on Earth, bringing with him an alien predator known as the Moorwen. Though both man and monster are seeking revenge for violence committed against them, Kainan leads the alliance to kill the Moorwen by fusing his advanced technology with the Viking's Iron Age weaponry.

Title: The 13th Warrior
Movie Plot: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled in a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

Title: Seventh Son
Movie Plot: When Mother Malkin, the queen of evil witches, escapes the pit she was imprisoned in by professional monster hunter Spook decades ago and kills his apprentice, he recruits young Tom, the seventh son of the seventh son, to help him.

Title: Beacon 23
Movie Plot: A man living in the 23rd Century works at a remote "lighthouse" in space that serves as a beacon to help passing ships.

Title: The Pillars of the Earth
Movie Plot: Set against a backdrop of war, religious strife and power struggles which tears lives and families apart.

Title: In the Name of Ben Hur
