Movie Plot: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

Title: Road Hard
Movie Plot: Following an expensive divorce and the cancellation of his TV show, a stand-up comic is forced to go back on the road to provide for his daughter.

Title: Le Mans: Racing Is Everything
Movie Plot: Limited series follows the participants of France's 24-hour car race that takes place annually in Le Mans.

Title: Villeneuve Pironi
Movie Plot: Villeneuve Pironi tells the astonishing story of Canadian Formula 1 legend Gilles Villeneuve and French star Didier Pironi, two fearless Ferrari Formula 1 drivers, forever torn apart by a historic and hugely controversial moment in time.

Title: Weekend of a Champion
Movie Plot: Filmmaker Roman Polanski spends a weekend with world champion driver Jackie Stewart as he attempts to win the 1971 Monaco Grand Prix, offering an extraordinarily rare glimpse into the life of a gifted athlete at the height of his powers.

Title: Fukrey Returns
Movie Plot: Just out of jail, a don is ready to get back at the four friends who conned her.

Title: Fukrey 3
Movie Plot: The friends facing disastrously funny situations together and having each other's backs through the trenches to make it out of a new mess this time.

Title: Dream Girl
Movie Plot: Rom-com Movie, directed by Raaj Shaandilyaa, stars Ayushmann Khurrana who plays a 'dream girl'. In every love story, there is always one trying to win the heart of the other, who could be the 'dream girl'.

Title: Atithi Tum Kab Jaoge?
Movie Plot: A couple's married life is turned upside down when a distant relative overstays in their home.

Title: Go Goa Gone
Movie Plot: A group of friends, just looking to have a good time in a rave party on a remote island in Goa, find out that the island is infested with Zombies.

Title: Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety
Movie Plot: Titu is going to marry a perfect woman named Sweety. Titu's best-friend Sonu doubts Sweety's character and tries to break the marriage while Sweety tries to do opposite and which leads to war between Bromance and Romance.

Title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama
Movie Plot: Nishant starts dating Charu while his roommates Rajat and Vikrant already have girlfriends in Neha and Rhea respectively. Trouble starts when the guys feel that their girlfriends are dominating them.

Title: Dhol
Movie Plot: Four lazy friends try to woo a rich girl, in order to live a wealthy lifestyle. Their plan, however goes horribly wrong after they get embroiled with a notorious criminal.

Title: Jolly LLB
Movie Plot: Wanting to earn fame and fortune, a small time lawyer files a PIL for an infamous hit-and-run, and thus learns what it really is like to be a lawyer.

Title: Golmaal 3
Movie Plot: In Goa, Pritam meets his love Geeta after many years. They decide to get married but the feud between their respective children creates tension in their marriage.

Title: A Lesson in Love
Movie Plot: After a 15-year marriage, the spouses are going to divorce, but suddenly find out that their feelings have not vanished yet.

Title: Dreams
Movie Plot: Two different women - a young photo model and her boss - dream about a happy life with beloved men. Their dreams are as different as they are.

Title: To Joy
Movie Plot: Two violinists playing in the same orchestra fall in love and get married, but they can't get along.

Title: Dragons: Dawn of the Dragon Racers
Movie Plot: Hiccup and all his friends from the dragon academy fight about who really invented Dragon Racing.

Title: Dragons: Gift of the Night Fury
Movie Plot: Hiccup and Toothless discover an island of never-before-seen dragons.

Title: Book of Dragons
Movie Plot: Hiccup and his friends explore and add to their primary reference about dragons.

Title: Legend of the Boneknapper Dragon
Movie Plot: Hiccup and the gang join Gobber on a quest to find a legendary boneclad Dragon.

Title: Dreamworks How to Train Your Dragon Legends
Movie Plot: Prepare for high-flying adventures with Hiccup, Toothless and the rest of the Dragon Trainers. Meet new dragons, learn the secrets of the legendary Boneknapper and see what is in store for the holidays on the festive island of Berk.

Title: Secrets of Women
Movie Plot: The four wives of four brothers share stories of their marriages as they each wait for their husbands in a small, secluded cottage.

Title: The Penguins of Madagascar
Movie Plot: The daily adventures of penguins living in New York's Central Park Zoo.

Title: Megamind
Movie Plot: Evil genius Megamind finally defeats his do-gooder nemesis, Metro Man, but is left without a purpose in a superhero-free world.

Title: Finding Jesus
Movie Plot: Two friends, Muggles and Joy, spread faith and hope in a number of isolated encounters which reinforce basic biblical values.

Title: What's Up: Balloon to the Rescue!
Movie Plot: A group of scientists try to be airlifted via hot air balloon attached to a house.

Title: The Little Panda Fighter
Movie Plot: A giant panda sets his heart on becoming a professional dancer.

Title: Little Bee
Movie Plot: When a war threatens a beehive, peace may come from unexpected places. A honey-maker wants to fight, and a soldier wants to make honey. What happens when these bees decide to follow their hearts instead of the rules?

Title: Tappy Toes
Movie Plot: Raised by two brown flappers, Pingo discovers the power of tapping shoes. A tap a day keeps those goofy walruses away!

Title: Finding Jesus 2
Movie Plot: Join faith-fueled friends, Muggles and Joy, as they visit the beautiful Finding Jesus Bay, a place where Christian stories are told night and day. Guided by the sea's best storyteller, Professor Shark, they hear all about the endless kindness and boundless love of their Creator. Then, together - along with children everywhere - they go forth to spread His word, and make their world a better place. Finding Jesus will help kids learn about the Bible in a whole new and fascinating way.

Title: Bug Bites: An Ant's Life
Movie Plot: Thang, Rose and Didi help the young Queen Jo build a new ant hill while avoiding the sinister geckos and keeping Sal Caterpillar out of trouble.

Title: The Autobots
Movie Plot: Three cars with sentient artificial intelligence for the ultimate interaction with humans. In a world where people normally drive cars, three plucky cars will go on an adventure and find that what truly drives humankind is friendship.

Title: Chop Kick Panda
Movie Plot: A fat lazy Panda named Zibo dreams of becoming a master of martial arts, but is stuck as a mere cleaner for a dojo. Little does he know that an evil tiger has plans to take over the kingdom, and he must stop him.

Title: Cool Cat Finds a Gun
Movie Plot: Cool Cat and his friends find a gun, and Cool Cat shows kids what to do if they find a weapon or if they see someone at school with one. The 'Snitching' issue is also addressed.

Title: Burn-E
Movie Plot: If BURN-E (a welding robot) had known how much trouble he'd be caused by WALL-E's pursuit of EVE, then he'd have taken the day off.

Title: Spider's Web: A Pig's Tale
Movie Plot: Walter Pembroke III is a pampered pig who enjoys free food, a posh pen, and a flattering entry in the exclusive Barnyard Social Registry. Walt's best friend is Tiffany, a tough-talking spider who gets little respect and few handouts. But it is not the disapproval of Walt's snobby pals that is driving this pair of unlikely friends apart. It is Walt's expanding web of lies. When a pie disappears, Walt blames UFO's. When a bowl breaks, it's the ghost's fault. When homework goes missing, well, the dog was involved. Now Walt has fallen under the spell of Noiman Ja Rahr, a sneaky snake who schemes to take Walt to the corrupt Viperwood. Can the spider convince the pig that lying doesn't pay, or will Walt end up trapped in a frightening world where no one can be trusted? And nothing is as it seems.—Michael Schelp

Title: Leo the Lion
Movie Plot: Leo is a young vegetarian lion who has trouble fitting in, so he leaves the jungle to go on a quest to find himself.

Title: Lifted
Movie Plot: A teenage alien is trying to abduct a sleeping human, but doesn't know which switch to use.

Title: Presto
Movie Plot: A stage magician's rabbit gets into a magical onstage brawl against his neglectful guardian with two magic hats.

Title: Day & Night
Movie Plot: Day encounters Night, a stranger of distinctly darker moods. But their suspicions soon turn to curiosity, and they are delighted to find the joys of their budding friendship.

Title: Toy Story Toons: Small Fry
Movie Plot: A fast food restaurant mini variant of Buzz forcibly switches places with the real Buzz and his friends have to deal with the obnoxious impostor.

Title: One Man Band
Movie Plot: Two buskers engage in a petty feud over a child's donation.

Title: Wizards
Movie Plot: The third installment of DreamWork's 'Tales of Arcadia' trilogy. The gang ends up in the past and must make sure that everything happens the way it should.

Title: 3Below: Tales of Arcadia
Movie Plot: A pair of teenage royals and their bodyguard escape from their home planet and try to blend in on Earth.

Title: Cavalcade
Movie Plot: A portrayal of the triumphs and tragedies of two English families, the upper-crust Marryots and the working-class Bridgeses, from 1899 to 1933.

Title: The Broadway Melody
Movie Plot: A pair of sisters from the vaudeville circuit try to make it big time on Broadway, but matters of the heart complicate the attempt.

Title: Meet John Doe
Movie Plot: A penniless drifter is recruited by an ambitious columnist to impersonate a non-existent person who said he'd be committing suicide as a protest, and a social movement begins.

Title: Sergeant York
Movie Plot: A Tennessee farmer and marksman is drafted in World War I, and struggles with his pacifist inclinations before becoming one of the most celebrated war heroes.

Title: Lost Horizon
Movie Plot: When a revered diplomat's plane is diverted and crashes in the peaks of Tibet, he and the other survivors are guided to an isolated monastery at Shangri-La, where they wrestle with the invitation to stay.

Title: The Awful Truth
Movie Plot: A married couple file an amicable divorce, but find it harder to let go of each other than they initially thought.

Title: Lady for a Day
Movie Plot: A gangster tries to make Apple Annie, the Times Square apple seller, a lady for a day.

Title: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
Movie Plot: Longfellow Deeds is a small town guy who is editor of the local newspaper. He unexpectedly inherits a fortune and a corporation, bringing his simple, honest ways to the cynical big city.

Title: My Man Godfrey
Movie Plot: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

Title: Dodsworth
Movie Plot: A retired auto manufacturer and his wife take a long-planned European vacation only to find that they want very different things from life.

Title: Marty
Movie Plot: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

Title: Only Angels Have Wings
Movie Plot: At a remote South American trading port, the manager of an air-freight company is forced to risk his pilots' lives in order to win an important contract as a traveling American showgirl stops in town.

Title: Tom Jones
Movie Plot: The romantic and chivalrous adventures of adopted bastard Tom Jones in 18th-century England.

Title: Baaghi 3
Movie Plot: A man embarks on a bloody rampage to save his kidnapped brother.

Title: Far Cry
Movie Plot: An ex-special forces soldier turned boatman is hired by a journalist to investigate a top-secret military base on a nearby island.

Title: Feardotcom
Movie Plot: A New York City detective investigates mysterious deaths occurring 48 hours after users log onto a site named feardotcom.

Title: Hercules in New York
Movie Plot: Hercules is sent to Earth where he finds true love and starts a promising career in the bodybuilder business.

Title: Anaconda
Movie Plot: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who forces them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

Title: Deep Blue Sea 2
Movie Plot: A brilliant billionaire creates five genetically altered bull sharks, which proceed to wreak havoc for a group of scientists on an isolated research facility.

Title: The Shallows
Movie Plot: A mere 200 yards from shore, surfer Nancy is attacked by a great white shark, with her short journey to safety becoming the ultimate contest of wills.

Title: Deep Blue Sea 3
Movie Plot: Studying the effects of climate change off the coast of Mozambique, a marine biologist and her team confront three genetically enhanced bull sharks. Now, a new bloodbath is waiting to happen in the name of science. Will humans never learn?

Title: Snakes on a Plane
Movie Plot: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly venomous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

Title: Crawl
Movie Plot: A young woman, while attempting to save her father during a category 5 hurricane, finds herself trapped in a flooding house and must fight for her life against alligators.

Title: Tremors
Movie Plot: Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.

Title: Hollow Man
Movie Plot: A brilliant scientist's discovery renders him invisible, but transforms him into an omnipotent, dangerous megalomaniac.

Title: 47 Meters Down
Movie Plot: Two sisters vacationing in Mexico are trapped in a shark cage at the bottom of the ocean. With less than an hour of oxygen left and great white sharks circling nearby, they must fight to survive.

Title: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
Movie Plot: A scientific expedition sets out for Borneo to seek a flower called the Blood Orchid, which could grant longer life. Meanwhile, they run afoul of snakes and each other.

Title: Winning: The Racing Life of Paul Newman
Movie Plot: A documentary chronicling the 35 year car racing career of Paul Newman. The documentary showcases Newman's racing life as both a prolific driver and owner.

Title: Cosmic Sin
Movie Plot: Seven rogue soldiers launch a preemptive strike against a newly discovered alien civilization in the hopes of ending an interstellar war before it starts.

Title: Daniel the Wizard
Movie Plot: Evil assassins want to kill Daniel Kublbock, the third runner up for the German Idols.

Title: Glitter
Movie Plot: A sentimental journey to the colorful Poland of the seventies, showing independent women who live by their own rules and tackle social taboos head-on.

Title: Hobgoblins
Movie Plot: A young security guard must track down diminutive aliens who kill people even as they make their fantasies come true.

Title: BloodRayne
Movie Plot: In the eighteenth century, a vampire escapes from the freak show, in which she once participated, and teams up with a group of vampire slayers to kill the man who raped her mother.

Title: Troll 2
Movie Plot: A vacationing family discovers that the entire town they're visiting is inhabited by goblins, disguised as humans, who plan to eat them.

Title: Turks in Space
Movie Plot: A family of Turks try to adapt to life in a new solar system.

Title: The Human Centipede III (Final Sequence)
Movie Plot: Taking inspiration from The Human Centipede films, the warden of a notorious and troubled prison looks to create a 500-person human centipede as a solution to his problems.

Title: Gigli
Movie Plot: Larry Gigli is assigned by a crime boss to kidnap the brother of a prominent district attorney. A beautiful woman known only as Ricki is sent to stay with him to make sure he doesn't mess up the job.

Title: Lake Placid 2
Movie Plot: Man-eating crocodiles return to the lake, as two males and one aggressive female crocodile protecting their nest, wreak havoc on the locals.

Title: Going Overboard
Movie Plot: A struggling young comedian takes a menial job on a cruise ship hoping for his big chance to make it in the world of cruise-ship comedy.

Title: Arachnophobia
Movie Plot: A new species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to a small California town in a coffin and starts to breed, leaving a trail of deaths that puzzle and terrify the young doctor newly arrived in town with his family.

Title: Lake Placid: The Final Chapter
Movie Plot: Black Lake is now a crocodile sanctuary, surrounded by an electric fence. When the fence is left open, a high-school bus unknowingly enters the park. It's up to Reba and the Sheriff to save the kids from becoming crocodile food.

Title: Rogue
Movie Plot: An American journalist on assignment in the Australian outback encounters a man-eating crocodile while trapped on a rapidly flooding mud island.

Title: Night of the Demons
Movie Plot: A group of kids go to a Halloween party, only to have to face down a group of demons.

Title: Demons
Movie Plot: A group of random people are invited to a screening of a mysterious movie, only to find themselves trapped in the theater with ravenous demons.

Title: Night of the Demons III
Movie Plot: A group of delinquents accidentally shoot a police officer. To avoid arrest, they hide out in an abandoned house, unaware it is haunted.

Title: Lake Placid: Legacy
Movie Plot: A group of urban explorers venture to a quiet lake in upstate Maine that is home to a deadly and forgotten secret. Unfortunately for them, they quickly discover they're not alone and encounter a deadly threat that can kill them all.

Title: Night of the Creeps
Movie Plot: Alien brain parasites, entering humans through the mouth, turn their host into a killing zombie. Some teenagers start to fight against them.

Title: Pumpkinhead
Movie Plot: After a tragic accident, a man conjures up a towering, vengeful demon called Pumpkinhead to destroy a group of unsuspecting teenagers.

Title: Demons 2
Movie Plot: A group of tenants and visitors are trapped in a 10-story high-rise apartment building infested with demons who proceed to hunt the dwindling humans down.

Title: There Was a Father
Movie Plot: A schoolteacher struggles to raise his son Ryohei by himself, having neither money nor future prospects.

Title: Swallowed
Movie Plot: Follows two best friends on their final night together, with a nightmare of drugs, bugs, and horrific intimacy.

Title: The Brothers and Sisters of the Toda Family
Movie Plot: When the patriarch of the Toda family suddenly dies, his widow discovers that he has left her with nothing but debt and married children who are unwilling to support her--except for her most thoughtful son, just returned from China.

Title: Penguins of Madagascar
Movie Plot: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private join forces with undercover organization The North Wind to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine from destroying the world as we know it.

Title: A Hen in the Wind
Movie Plot: A man returns from World War II to find his desperate wife had resorted to one night of prostitution to pay for their son's hospital bills.

Title: Madly Madagascar
Movie Plot: The characters from the animated Madagascar franchise, Alex, Melman, Marty and Gloria celebrate love in this Valentine special.

Title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
Movie Plot: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

Title: Shrek Forever After
Movie Plot: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpelstiltskin rules supreme.

Title: Munekata kyôdai
Movie Plot: Setsuko is unhappily married to Mimura, an engineer with no job and a drinking habit. She's always been in love with Hiroshi, but he left for France years ago without proposing. Now he is back and Mariko (Setsuko's sister) tries to reunite them, although secretly she loves him too.

Title: A Story of Floating Weeds
Movie Plot: A kabuki actor's mistress hatches a jealous plot to bring down her lover's son.

Title: Passing Fancy
Movie Plot: Two Tokyo co-workers come across a destitute young lady in search of a place to live.

Title: Tokyo Chorus
Movie Plot: A married Tokyo man faces unemployment after standing up for an older colleague.

Title: Where Now Are the Dreams of Youth?
Movie Plot: When a young man inherits his father's lucrative business, he cheats the system to set up three of his college friends with jobs.

Title: An Inn in Tokyo
Movie Plot: Unemployed Kihachi and his two sons struggle to make ends meet. But that doesn't keep Kihachi from wooing single mother Otaka.

Title: Dragnet Girl
Movie Plot: A gangster tries to find redemption with the inadvertent help of an innocent shop girl and his jealous girlfriend will do anything to keep him.

Title: Sahara Heat
Movie Plot: Photographer Lea visits her hubby Alfredo, who works on an oil rig in Morocco. Wherever she goes, she's given eerie dirty looks. She gives in to a couple of men, but then falls for thuggish bar owner Le Serpent and his bar boy.

Title: Shukujo wa nani o wasureta ka
Movie Plot: An affluent medical professor, Komiya, and his bossy wife, Tokio, are to look after Setsuko, their high-spirited niece from Osaka. Setsuko is a liberated woman who does what she wants, including smoking, even though she is a minor. On Saturday, the professor does not feel like going to his weekend golf game, but his wife packs him off anyway. So he leaves his bag at the apartment of his student Okada, and goes to a bar with a friend. Setsuko traces him there, and insists that he take her to a geisha house. When she gets rather tipsy, the professor calls Okada to take her home, while he sleeps at Okada's. The wife becomes suspicious of Setsuko when she sees Okada bringing her home, and also of her husband when she discovers that he did not go golfing.—Will Gilbert

Title: Tuesday, After Christmas
Movie Plot: Paul Hanganu loves two women. Adriana his wife and the mother of their daughter, the woman with whom he's shared the thrills of the past ten years, and Raluca the woman who has made him redefine himself. He has to leave one of them before Christmas.

Title: A Corsican Summer
Movie Plot: Cross-section of life in a Corsican village where tradition is revered, observing the locals throughout one summer.

Title: The Awakening of Gabriella
Movie Plot: After leaving her small-town lover, an innocent beauty named Gabriella hits Hollywood with plans to enter a daring and exciting new chapter in her life.

Title: Inside Club Wild Side
Movie Plot: Arriving in LA, Joe befriends an actress who moonlights as a sex worker in an exclusive club. Promises of fame and fortune cloud their judgement as manipulative people try to tear them apart.

Title: Embrace the Darkness
Movie Plot: Vampires descend upon Los Angeles in search of victims to join their cult.

Title: Life of a Gigolo
Movie Plot: When Danielle decides to do a story on the life of a sex worker to please her boss and lover Peter, she meets Gage a professional gigolo. She quickly becomes interested in his work and starts to see a change in herself and her life.

Title: Secrets of a Chambermaid
Movie Plot: After a rich woman dies, her friends and relatives meet at her mansion to await the reading of her will. Over the evening, many of them hook up and have a passionate night together, including the maid. But someone's watching them.

Title: Hindsight
Movie Plot: Things heat up when a promising young actor begins an affair with a glamorous model in order to advance his career.

Title: Blaise Pascal
Movie Plot: Blaise Pascal struggles to understand the natural world around him, in addition to an inner quest for religious faith.

Title: Ulysses
Movie Plot: A movie adaptation of Homer's second epic, that depicts Ulysses' efforts to return to his home after the end of ten years of war.

Title: The Taking of Power by Louis XIV
Movie Plot: After the death of Cardinal Mazarin, young king Louis XIV decides to assert his power to control the aristocracy.

Title: Socrates
Movie Plot: After his mother's sudden death, Socrates, a 15-year-old living on the margins of São Paulo's coast, must survive on his own while coming to terms with his grief.

Title: Cartesius
Movie Plot: This made for television film chronicles the illustrious life of French philosopher René Descartes (1596-1650)

Title: The Widower
Movie Plot: A mediocre businessman who's married to a much more successful businesswoman relies heavily on her financial support for his bad business ideas, and to pay off his mounting debt, but both of them have had enough of each other.

Title: Fires on the Plain
Movie Plot: In the closing days of WWII, remnants of the Japanese army in Leyte are abandoned by their command and face certain death by starvation.

Title: Acts of the Apostles
Movie Plot: The spread of Christianity, according to Luke's account, 30 years after the death of Jesus: Peter's community, its trials and martyrs; Paul's travels, after his conversion, to Antioch and Rome.

Title: Half Light
Movie Plot: Rachel Carlson, a successful novelist moves to a small Scottish village to move on with her life after the death of her son. Strange things start to happen when she is haunted by ghosts and real life terror.

Title: Hideaway
Movie Plot: Hatch gets a special resuscitative medicine after "dying" in a car accident. His wife and daughter only get minor injuries. He gets strange nightmares such as killing a teen girl. Is it just dreams?

Title: Wisdom
Movie Plot: Unable to find work after a past felony, graduate John Wisdom and his girlfriend embark on a cross-country bank-robbing spree in order to aid American farmers.

Title: The Juror
Movie Plot: A juror in a Mafia trial is forced to convince the other jurors to vote not guilty by an obsessive mob enforcer.

Title: Yours to Keep
Movie Plot: Follows the life of John Taylor, a young man with Down Syndrome, from graduating high school, his dream of being a disc jockey, to landing a major movie role.

Title: Too Scared to Scream
Movie Plot: A killer is brutally attacking several tenants that live in a high rise apartment building in New York City.

Title: No Mercy
Movie Plot: A Chicago detective, seeking to avenge his partner's death, travels to New Orleans, where he unexpectedly becomes involved in a cat and mouse game of survival.

Title: 976-EVIL
Movie Plot: People who dial 976-EVIL receive supernatural powers and turn into satanic killers. When Spike dialed 976-EVIL, he knew it was an expensive toll call, but he didn't know that he'd have to pay for it with his soul.

Title: No Small Affair
Movie Plot: 16-year-old Charles loves to photograph. A cute girl's photo ends up in his camera. He later sees the older Laura singing in a bar. He takes many more photos of her and ends seeing her again, wishing to help her career.

Title: Fighting Back
Movie Plot: A Philadelphia shop owner forms a civilian patrol to stop neighborhood crime. The patrol's actions are seen as racially discriminatory, leading to escalating conflict.

Title: Simpatico
Movie Plot: After scams at horse races and making lots of money, 3 young people split. 20 years later, one of them, a drunk, creates chaos with photos from back then.

Title: Samaritan Girl
Movie Plot: Jae-Young is an amateur prostitute who sleeps with men while her best friend Yeo-Jin "manages" her, fixing dates, taking care of the money and making sure the coast is clear. When Jae-Young falls in love with one of those man she suppresses her feelings towards him in respect of her friend who's jealous.

Title: The Bow
Movie Plot: On a fishing boat at sea, a 60-year old man has been raising a girl since she was a baby. It is agreed that they will get married on her 17th birthday, and she is 16 now. They live a quiet and secluded life, renting the boat to day fishermen and practicing strange divination rites. Their life changes when a teenage student comes aboard...

Title: Bad Guy
Movie Plot: An unfeeling gangster seeks to ruin the life of a young girl who rejected him. He forces her into prostitution and spies on her regularly, then he soon begins to fall for her.

Title: Time
Movie Plot: To save her relationship, a woman puts herself through extensive plastic surgery.

Title: Departures
Movie Plot: Soon after buying an expensive cello, Daigo learns that his orchestra is disbanding. He moves back to his hometown with his wife, where he answers an ad for what Daigo thinks is a travel agency but is, in actuality, a mortuary.

Title: The Net
Movie Plot: A North Korean fisherman breaks his boat engine by accident and drifts down to South Korea. After enduring brutal investigations in the South, he eventually gets sent back to North Korea.

Title: Address Unknown
Movie Plot: Romances end in blood and the frail hopes of individuals are torn apart in a vile karmic continuity of colonialism, civil war and occupation. After surviving Japanese colonization, Korea became the first war zone of the Cold War. The legacy of war remains today in this divided country.

Title: Heart of Glass
Movie Plot: The foreman of a small village glassworks dies without revealing the secret to the famous "Ruby Glass".

Title: Land of Silence and Darkness
Movie Plot: Through examining Fini Straubinger, an old woman who has been deaf and blind since adolescence, and her work on behalf of other deaf and blind people, this film shows how the deaf and blind struggle to understand and accept a world from which they are almost wholly isolated.—Erik Gregersen <erik@astro.as.utexas.edu>

Title: Fata Morgana
Movie Plot: Footage shot in and around the Sahara Desert, accompanied only by a spoken creation myth and the songs of Leonard Cohen.

Title: Even Dwarfs Started Small
Movie Plot: A group of dwarfs at a correctional facility erupt in anarchy.

Title: The Great Ecstasy of Woodcarver Steiner
Movie Plot: A study of the psychology of a champion ski-jumper, whose full-time occupation is carpentry.

Title: Signs of Life
Movie Plot: Three wounded soldiers are removed from battle and given the task of looking after a fortress in a small coastal town. However, the pressures of isolation begin to take their toll on the men.

Title: There Will Be No Leave Today
Movie Plot: Soldiers undertake the perilous task of removing a stockpile of World War II bombshells discovered during roadworks under the ground of a small village.

Title: The Killers
Movie Plot: Two men besiege a lunch bar looking for a third man they must kill.

Title: The Steamroller and the Violin
Movie Plot: Seven-year-old Sasha practices violin every day to satisfy the ambition of his parents. Already withdrawn as a result of his routines, Sasha quickly regains confidence when he accidentally meets and befriends worker Sergei, who works on a steamroller in their upscale Moscow neighborhood.—ivan-kraus

Title: Andrey Tarkovsky. A Cinema Prayer
Movie Plot: The documentary recounts Tarkovsky's life and work, letting the director tell the story himself, as he shares with us his memories, his view of art and his reflections on the destiny of the artist and the meaning of human existence.

Title: American Pie
Movie Plot: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

Title: Zona
Movie Plot: The brutal realities of prison life in Russia are unflinchingly portrayed as an American tourist (Warren) is incarcerated despite his innocence.

Title: Boris Godunov
Movie Plot: This is the Andrei Tarkovsky production of the famous Pushkin/Mussorgsky opera, performed in 1990 at the Mariinsky Theatre in St. Petersburg, Russia, conducted by Valery Gergiev.

Title: Solaris
Movie Plot: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

Title: Solaris
Movie Plot: Kris Kelvin joins the space station orbiting the planet Solaris, only to find its two crew members plagued by "phantoms," creations of Solaris. Kelvin is soon confronted with his own phantom, taking the shape of his dead wife Hari.

Title: The Turin Horse
Movie Plot: A rural farmer is forced to confront the mortality of his faithful horse.

Title: The Cranes Are Flying
Movie Plot: Veronica plans a rendezvous with her lover, Boris, at the bank of river, only for him to be drafted into World War II shortly thereafter.

Title: Bleach
Movie Plot: A man goes through extreme measures to attempt to stop the ghosts of the girls he murdered in a snuff film from haunting while trying to keep the authorities off his back as well.

Title: 5th Borough
Movie Plot: Nikos daughter is diagnosed with a brain tumor. He needs money. Lots of it. On Staten Island, your options are limited. But you can always count on Family.

Title: Attraction to Paris
Movie Plot: A college girl, studying abroad in Europe, stumbles upon a murder in progress, orchestrated by a terror cell, putting her life in danger as the main witness.

Title: Art of the Dead
Movie Plot: A collection of paintings unleash horror on an unsuspecting family corrupted by the seven deadly sins of greed, envy, gluttony, lust, sloth, pride, and wrath.

Title: Sally Floss: Digital Detective
Movie Plot: In response to the financial crisis set forth by COVID-19, a shy teenager starts an internet-based detective agency to save her family home. She solves mysteries through digital footprints, virtual interviews, a brilliant mind, and an inherited intuition she never knew she had.—Kate Queen

Title: A Royal Christmas Ball
Movie Plot: A bachelor king tries to reconnect with his old college sweetheart.

Title: The Wrong Cheerleader Coach
Movie Plot: Jon and his daughter Hanna are delighted when the head coach, Ms Burke, invites Hanna to join the cheer squad. But when the new assistant coach, Devan, turns out to have an unhealthy interest in Jon, the duo's delight soon turns to fear.

Title: Mummy Dearest
Movie Plot: A mother recently confined to a wheelchair moves into her daughter's home, but suggestions that the house is haunted and strange behavior by her daughter's boyfriend send her on a journey into madness.

Title: Canadian Bacon
Movie Plot: The U.S. President, low in the opinion polls, gets talked into raising his popularity by trying to start a cold war against Canada.

Title: Zeroville
Movie Plot: A young ex-communicated seminarian, Ike "Vikar" Jerome, arrives in Los Angeles on the same August day in 1969 that a crazed hippie ''family'' led by Charles Manson commits five savage murders.

Title: Kill Me Now
Movie Plot: A group of small-town teens looking to drink a ton of beer in peace at a remote cabin in the woods find their party nearly ruined when they're stalked by the deranged Driller Killer in this horror/comedy featuring Michael Swaim.

Title: The Roads Not Taken
Movie Plot: A day in the life of Leo and his daughter, Molly, as he floats through alternate lives he could have lived, leading Molly to wrestle with her own path as she considers her future.

Title: The Glorias
Movie Plot: The story of feminist icon Gloria Steinem's itinerant childhood and its influence on her life as a writer, activist and organizer for women's rights worldwide.

Title: Amor maman
Movie Plot: Roland is forty years old. Solitary and a bit lunar, he thinks he will discover one morning that he is the hidden son of Arielle Dombasle. He decides to go to meet his mother who will reject him, run away from him, then little by little get attached to him.—Anonymous.

Title: Clean and Sober
Movie Plot: A hustling drug addict checks himself into rehabilitation to escape trouble with the law and realizes that it's exactly what he needs.

Title: Summer Rental
Movie Plot: An overworked air-traffic controller takes his family on a beach vacation but is soon beset by series of mishaps.

Title: Teen Spirit
Movie Plot: A shy teenager dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. She enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition. A spin on the Cinderella story.

Title: Countess Dracula
Movie Plot: In 17th-century Hungary, elderly widow Countess Elisabeth Nádasdy maintains her misleading youthful appearance by bathing in the blood of virgins regularly supplied to her by faithful servant Captain Dobi.

Title: Diamond Heist
Movie Plot: After witnessing a murder, a hapless pair of misfits escape their own near death experience by posing as male strippers - only to find themselves neck deep in even bigger trouble.

Title: Cheech and Chong's Next Movie
Movie Plot: Cheech and Chong live in a decrepit old house and drive their neighbour crazy with their loud music, weed smoking and general anarchy and slacker view on life. Then Chong meets Cheech's Texan cousin Red and things kick up a notch.

Title: Senior Skip Day
Movie Plot: The plan for these high-school seniors with a major case of senioritis: a Senior Skip Day bash, with supermodels, stripteases, a gigantic gravity bong, a healthy dose of alcohol, and one PO'd principal looking to kill the collective buzz.

Title: Love Shack
Movie Plot: A dysfunctional family of adult film stars reunites for a memorial porn shoot following the death of legendary producer Mo Saltzman. Along the way, the film's hapless director must contend with dueling divas, bickering couples, emotionally-scarred tag-team brothers, and a dominatrix with low self-esteem. Given its all-star cast and lofty pedigree, the film should be the greatest porno of all time.—Anonymous

Title: Knots
Movie Plot: In this male-centric take on contemporary relationships, three guy friends look for love and commitment. One of them gets seduced by a vamp who ends up stealing his wife away from him.

Title: Live Nude Comedy
Movie Plot: A series that mixes stand-up comedy with burlesque dancers and sketches to make a hysterical, sexy variety show.

Title: The Barnes Brothers
Movie Plot: Ricky T. & Jerry Barnes decide it's time an American won the Boston Marathon instead of another Kenyan so they head to Beantown to rectify the situation.

Title: Silent Partner
Movie Plot: Gordon Patrick (Nick Moran), a young CIA analyst is assigned to investigate the mysterious death of a major Russian political figure.

Title: Locked Down
Movie Plot: Danny, a respected cop, is setup after an investigation goes wrong. While laying low in his new jail cell, Danny is forced to get involved in the inmates underground cage fighting circuit. With the help of Irving, a former mixed martial arts champion, Danny devises a scheme to bring justice and innocence to his family's name, if he can get out of the cage alive.—Anonymous

Title: Spring Break 24/7
Movie Plot: Line up for a body shot! This is the ultimate SPRING BREAK experience. From Vegas to Cabo to South Padre Island, experience Hummer rides, booze cruises, and tequila slides, join Nikki Ziering on this 24/7 tour of Spring Break.

Title: The Old Man
Movie Plot: A retired CIA agent is hunted by both the agency he once worked for and his own nightmares, when an unknown man suddenly visits him after nearly three decades.

Title: American Heart
Movie Plot: An ex-convict is tracked down by his estranged teenage son, and the pair try to build a relationship and life together in Seattle.

Title: The Giver: To See Beyond
Movie Plot: It is about nothing less than awakening to reclaim our humanity free of dogma. It is also an exquisite and brave call for each of us to break through the program we are being fed by those who have been programmed themselves many generations deep. It is a masterful work.—aryedirects

Title: Scenes of the Crime
Movie Plot: A young man about to get married earns extra cash by driving a local mobster, but things go awry when the mobster is killed by a rival crime boss.

Title: Bad Times at the El Royale
Movie Plot: 1969. Four strangers check in at the El Royale Hotel. The hotel is deserted, staffed by a single desk clerk. Some of the new guests' reasons for being there are less than innocent and some are not who they appear to be.

Title: Out of Exile
Movie Plot: After a botched armored car robbery, a recently paroled thief tries to balance his life and mend a troubled family as a determined FBI agent hunts down him and his crew.

Title: Pablo
Movie Plot: A blend of documentary and animation tributing the life and work of legendary film-title designer Pablo Ferro.
9, the film is a collective feature film written by Stéphane E. Roy and directed by nine renowned Quebec filmmakers who each offer their own vision of incommunicability.

Title: Noche de Chicas
Movie Plot: It is a friendship story of five friends who in 1992 suffered a disagreement. Lola reappears in their lives, especially in Tess's, who was her best friend at the time. But she wouldn't do it alone, but with a huge problem in her backpack.

Title: The Open Road
Movie Plot: A man embarks on a road trip with his girlfriend and estranged baseball legend dad.

Title: Clairevoyant
Movie Plot: A Los Angeles socialite and so-called wellness practitioner seeks to overcome her life of luxury and achieve nirvana after hiring a film crew to document a more authentic journey along the path of enlightenment.

Title: American Bistro
Movie Plot: A heartfelt adventure about a milquetoast accountant, Medor, whose perfect life is ruined when he discovers his wife having an affair with his boss. Having lost everything, he finds refuge in his estranged, deadbeat nephew and together, they chase his old, forgotten dream: opening a restaurant.

Title: Bonded
Movie Plot: Doctor Reeve and his group of friends, while on their annual friend's trip discover they're being stalked by a psychologically disturbed patient from Reeve's past.

Title: Death Count
Movie Plot: Strangers awaken in individual holding cells with no memory of how they arrived. They realize if they don't acquire enough online "likes" in a timely manner, they'll die horribly at the hands of a sinister executioner.

Title: Incubus
Movie Plot: Twenty years ago an artist made a deal with a mysterious woman. In return for a successful life he would give his unborn daughter to her. Now with his daughter Lucy an adult, the strange woman has come to collect.

Title: The Incubus
Movie Plot: A small town's doctor takes matters into his own hands after a series of gruesome and bizarre rape crimes perplex the clueless authorities.

Title: Incubus
Movie Plot: On a strange island inhabited by demons and spirits, a man battles the forces of evil.

Title: The Incubus
Movie Plot: How does a town of 500 people just disappear? Marnie Rose, the niece of the town's church pastor is plagued with a life of abuse and neglect for all of the nineteen years she has resided in the small town of Spoon River with her best friends as her only saving grace. Things begin to change however, when new neighbors move in just down the street and Spoon River University accepts a very mysterious new student. People in the neighborhood start to feel different all of a sudden. People are getting sick with a mysterious disease and Marnie finds herself getting more and more distracted by Raphael. Will Marnie hear the bell that doth toll for her, or will these beautifully dangerous spirits finish their unfinished business?—Shayne Leighton

Title: Incubus
Movie Plot: Trapped on a boat, a woman is haunted by fear itself.

Title: Unnatural Causes
Movie Plot: Matt and Julia aren't having the greatest relationship on earth. They've got a successful advertising agency but Matt suspects his wife of having an affair and is getting so obsessed with this thought that he's actually asked his co-worker Trevor Jones to have her followed. Trevor, who wants to become partner in the company, does as requested and when he brings pictures to Matt that show Julia talking with another man, Matt goes berserk and wants Julia dead. When word of Julia's death little later spreads, Matt gets remorse and kills himself. But Julia isn't dead and it seems that Matt's suicide might actually have been a murder...—Anonymous

Title: Ouija House
Movie Plot: A girl takes her friends to a house with a dark past for a research project. They unwittingly summon an evil entity with plans of its own who makes the house part of its sinister game.

Title: I Am Not a Hipster
Movie Plot: Based in San Diego's indie music and art scene, exploring what it means to be creative in the face of tragedy.

Title: Bartholomew's Song
Movie Plot: In a society strict with repetition, Bartholomew's discovery of a music box leads to him embarking on a small journey to break the system.

Title: Same Old
Movie Plot: One bad night for a New York City delivery driver.

Title: Drakmar: A Vassal's Journey
Movie Plot: A coming of age saga about a 14-year old boy whose life alternates between the medieval fantasy kingdom of Adria and the real world trials of a challenging adolescence.

Title: Closing Dynasty
Movie Plot: On a school day, seven-year-old Queenie hustles and schemes ways to make money on the streets of New York City.

Title: Beautiful Girl
Movie Plot: Odessa is a beautiful girl addicted to the attention and money as an adult film star. William, a lonely mechanic, has a crush on her, and she indulges his fantasy and leads him on. Thinking he can help her find a normal life, he befriends her drug fueled bodyguard, Angry Jack, to get close to her.

Title: Concrete Blondes
Movie Plot: A wild, party-night out leads three twenty-something women to stumble on a suitcase with 3 million dollars in cash.

Title: Quit
Movie Plot: A couple head to a cabin in Joshua Tree for 4 days to quit smoking. As their nicotine withdrawal kicks in, they find themselves at odds with who they are and who they want to become.

Title: Last Call
Movie Plot: After a business deal with the mob goes down in flames, a realtor enlists his sexpot girlfriend to help him get revenge.

Title: The Edge of Seventeen
Movie Plot: High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.

Title: Fifty Pills
Movie Plot: Unless Darren can survive New York's largest drug mogul, write a paper on Dante's "Inferno," escape three thugs chasing the wrong guy and sell fifty pills of ecstasy to make his tuition payment, he'll never date the girl of his dreams.

Title: Hot Tamale
Movie Plot: A road trip to Los Angeles inadvertently leads a young man from Wyoming into a wild maze of psychotic hit-men, racy women, jewel thieves and a salsa band.

Title: Ruby Sparks
Movie Plot: A novelist struggling with writer's block finds romance in a most unusual way: by creating a female character he thinks will love him, then willing her into existence.

Title: The Way Way Back
Movie Plot: Shy 14-year-old Duncan goes on summer vacation with his mother, her overbearing boyfriend, and her boyfriend's daughter. Having a rough time fitting in, Duncan finds an unexpected friend in Owen, manager of the Water Wizz water park.

Title: Begin Again
Movie Plot: A chance encounter between a down-and-out music business executive, and a young singer songwriter new to Manhattan, turns into a promising collaboration between the two talents.

Title: Last Call
Movie Plot: A real estate developer returns to his old Philly neighborhood and must decide to raze or resurrect the family bar.

Title: Paper Towns
Movie Plot: After an all-night adventure, Quentin's lifelong crush, Margo, disappears, leaving behind clues that Quentin and his friends follow on the journey of a lifetime.

Title: Two Night Stand
Movie Plot: A snowstorm forces two people who made an online connection to unwillingly extend their one-night stand as the blizzard goes through the night.

Title: The First Time
Movie Plot: A shy senior and a down-to-earth junior fall in love over one weekend.

Title: That Awkward Moment
Movie Plot: Three best friends find themselves where we've all been - at that confusing moment in every dating relationship when you have to decide "So...where is this going?"

Title: The Zookeeper's Wife
Movie Plot: Keepers of the Warsaw Zoo, Antonina and Jan Zabinski, must save hundreds of people and animals during the Nazi invasion in WWII Poland.

Title: Basmati Blues
Movie Plot: A brilliant scientist is plucked out of the company lab and sent to India to sell the genetically modified rice she created - which she doesn't realize will destroy the farmers she thinks she's helping.

Title: Stuck in Love.
Movie Plot: An acclaimed writer, his ex-wife, and their teenaged children come to terms with the complexities of love in all its forms over the course of one tumultuous year.

Title: Fathers & Daughters
Movie Plot: A Pulitzer-winning writer grapples with being a widower and father after a mental breakdown; 27 years later, his grown daughter struggles to forge her own connections.

Title: To the Bone
Movie Plot: A young woman, dealing with anorexia, meets an unconventional doctor who challenges her to face her condition and embrace life.

Title: The Peanut Butter Falcon
Movie Plot: Zak, a man with down syndrome, runs away from a residential nursing home to pursue his dream of becoming a wrestler. Later, he meets with an outlaw who becomes his friend and coach.

Title: Submarine
Movie Plot: 15-year-old Oliver Tate has two objectives: to lose his virginity before his next birthday, and to extinguish the flame between his mother and an ex-lover who has resurfaced in her life.

Title: Adventureland
Movie Plot: In the summer of 1987, a college graduate takes a 'nowhere' job at his local amusement park, only to find it's the perfect course to get him prepared for the real world.

Title: The Big Sick
Movie Plot: Pakistan-born comedian Kumail Nanjiani and grad student Emily Gardner fall in love but struggle as their cultures clash. When Emily contracts a mysterious illness, Kumail finds himself forced to face her feisty parents, his family's expectations, and his true feelings.

Title: The Art of Getting By
Movie Plot: George, a lonely and fatalistic teen who has made it all the way to his senior year without ever having done a real day of work, is befriended by Sally, a popular but complicated girl who recognizes in him a kindred spirit.

Title: What If
Movie Plot: Wallace, who is burned out from a string of failed relationships, forms an instant bond with Chantry, who lives with her longtime boyfriend. Together, they puzzle out what it means if your best friend is also the love of your life.

Title: Mid90s
Movie Plot: Follows Stevie, a thirteen-year-old in 1990s-era Los Angeles who spends his summer navigating between his troubled home life and a group of new friends that he meets at a Motor Avenue skate shop.

Title: Booksmart
Movie Plot: On the eve of their high-school graduation, two academic superstars and best friends realize they should have worked less and played more. Determined not to fall short of their peers, the girls try to cram four years of fun into one night.
Life is hard for an 8½-year-old director.

Title: Bo Burnham: Inside
Movie Plot: A musical comedy special shot and performed by Bo Burnham, alone, over the course of a very unusual year.

Title: The Farewell
Movie Plot: A Chinese family discovers their grandmother has only a short while left to live and decide to keep her in the dark, scheduling a wedding to gather before she dies.

Title: Bo Burnham: Make Happy
Movie Plot: Bo Burnham tackles life, death, sexuality, hypocrisy, mental illness and Pringles cans in his dazzling new stand-up special.

Title: Good Time
Movie Plot: After a botched bank robbery lands his younger brother in prison, Connie Nikas embarks on a twisted odyssey through New York City's underworld to get his brother Nick out of jail.

Title: 20th Century Women
Movie Plot: The story of a teenage boy, his mother, and two other women who help raise him among the love and freedom of Southern California of 1979.

Title: Bo Burnham: what.
Movie Plot: A musical stand-up comedy show by Bo Burnham, the famous internet musician.

Title: The Road
Movie Plot: In a dangerous post-apocalyptic world, an ailing father defends his son as they slowly travel to the sea.

Title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
Movie Plot: When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he ever imagined.

Title: A History of Violence
Movie Plot: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core.

Title: Once
Movie Plot: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

Title: Far from Men
Movie Plot: Algeria, 1954. Two very different men thrown together by a world in turmoil are forced to flee across the Atlas mountains. Daru, the reclusive teacher, has to escort Mohamed, a villager accused of murder.

Title: Captain Fantastic
Movie Plot: A three-part chronicle of the life and times of Sunil Chhetri - India's talismanic football captain, and one of the world's all-time top ten international goalscorers.

Title: Flora and Son
Movie Plot: A single mom at war with her son is trying to find a hobby for him. One day, she rescues a guitar from a dumpster.

Title: Troubled Times
Movie Plot: Set in 1982 during one of the toughest periods in Irish history, Eoghan, a 17-year-old Irish Catholic kid inadvertently meets a visiting English Protestant girl on a day that will change their lives forever. Based on true events.

Title: Zonad
Movie Plot: When the Cassidy family finds a red leather clad man passed out on their living room floor, they assume he's an alien. Zonad is more than happy to oblige.

Title: The Touch
Movie Plot: A Swedish housewife begins an adulterous affair with a foreign archaeologist. But he is an emotionally scarred man, a Holocaust survivor; consequently, their relationship will be painfully difficult.

Title: The Rite
Movie Plot: A theatre troupe is called to court because of obscene performance material and an interrogation ensues, which causes them to expose their neuroses and inner psychological torments.

Title: The New Mutants
Movie Plot: Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.

Title: Face to Face
Movie Plot: Two psychiatrists have their marriage tested when one suffers a mental breakdown.

Title: King George VI: The Man Behind the King's Speech
Movie Plot: King's Speech is the definitive story of the man who overcame his own failings for the sake of his nation. When his older brother, Edward VIII abdicates the throne to marry Wallis Simpson, nervous-mannered successor George "Bertie" VI is plagued with shyness and a speech impediment when speaking to his subjects. It is the true story of an introvert and humble man whom events and circumstances made him become an inspiration for the British nation during their war with Hitler's Germany.—Vision Films [us}

Title: The Real King's Speech
Movie Plot: The story of King George VI of Britain and his struggles with his speech impediment and the unexpected responsibilities of the throne.

Title: Cobra
Movie Plot: A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far-reaching plans.

Title: The Greatest Movies You've Never Seen
Movie Plot: A short Documentary where two hosts discuss and review 4 films they feel are underrated. The Changeling (1980), Black Christmas (1974), The NeverEnding Story (1984) and The Wizard (1989)

Title: Empty
Movie Plot: A teen struggling with a breakup turns to his friends and music for support while he tries to move on.

Title: The Rocky Legacy
Movie Plot: Hosted by Dolph Lundgren with comments from several cast and crew members listed above, this short piece serves up a quick and lightweight overview of the Rocky and Creed films with plenty of film clips, favorite moments, production stories, and comments about the films' legacy and impact as a whole.

Title: The Gold Teapot
Movie Plot: A man picks up a mysterious Gold Teapot in a creepy abandoned house and unknowingly unleashes a Zombie takeover.

Title: Attack of the Corn Zombies
Movie Plot: In 1969, contaminated corn causes a zombie outbreak in a small Midwest town. Isolated and surrounded, a group struggles to survive the hordes to live another day.

Title: Return to Labyrinth
Movie Plot: The Goblin King known as Jareth returns to Sarah's home to once again force her to solve a Labyrinth in order to save her baby brother Toby from becoming a Goblin.

Title: A Laugh in the Dark
Movie Plot: Young Tommy has been having Nightmares about a clown named Marty. Marty is trying to warn Tommy about a much more sinister clown that is coming for Tommy, and not just in his dreams.

Title: Halloween: Payback
Movie Plot: A group of kids from Haddonfield encounter Michael Myers on Halloween. With help from Dr. Loomis, the kids do their best to to try and stay alive.

Title: Jim Jack and Duff Go to White Castle
Movie Plot: Three best friends take a trip to the oldest living American fast food chain, White Castle.

Title: Snake Fiction
Movie Plot: A parody that crosses "Pulp Fiction" and "Snakes on a Plane"

Title: Michael Myers for President
Movie Plot: Michael Myers has decided to put down the knife for good and run for President. A short comedy satire film done in the style of a ridiculously propagandist political ad.

Title: Halloween 3
Movie Plot: A group of kids discover that Michael Myers is still alive and try and find Dr. Loomis before it's too late

Title: The How-To Guy
Movie Plot: The How-to Guy knows how to do everything. He is a phenomenal teacher of all things, from walking up stairs, to opening doors, you name it. One day the How-To Guy meets a moron who doesn't know how to eat food. Can the How-To Guy Help him?

Title: Detroit
Movie Plot: Fact-based drama set during the 1967 Detroit riots in which a group of rogue police officers respond to a complaint with retribution rather than justice on their minds.

Title: Silent Night, Deadly Night VI: The Last Holiday
Movie Plot: A teen is stalked and attacked by a deranged man in a Santa suit on Christmas Eve

Title: New Fears Eve
Movie Plot: Follows three best friends who involuntarily prepare for Hooper Industries' annual New Year's Eve party, which turns deadly when a murderer sets his sights on them.

Title: Reloaded 2
Movie Plot: In a dystopian future where criminals take over, detective Jimmy Cloud gets a deadly case around a kidnapping carried out by a brutal crime syndicate.

Title: Death Maker
Movie Plot: A deranged boy kills other neighborhood boys in gruesome ways with no apparent motive.

Title: Lost in the Cornfield
Movie Plot: Eugene spots a scarecrow at his neighbors.

Title: Spiders
Movie Plot: Disco Steve encounters an odd barn as an ancient evil is released.

Title: Fishing
Movie Plot: A fisherman finds a secret spot and tries his luck to catch the big one.

Title: Young Guns
Movie Plot: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

Title: Christmas Criminals
Movie Plot: After two teenagers destroy a woman's Christmas decorations, she catches them and beats them up.

Title: All the Right Moves
Movie Plot: An ambitious young football star is trapped in a dying mill town--unless his gridiron skills can win him a way out.

Title: The Firm
Movie Plot: Defense Attorney Mitch McDeere is targeted for execution by the Chicago Mob in retaliation for bringing down a profitable Mob-operated Memphis law firm ten years earlier.

Title: The Pelican Brief
Movie Plot: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

Title: The Outsiders
Movie Plot: In a small Oklahoma town in 1964, the rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, heats up when one gang member accidentally kills a member of the other.

Title: Taps
Movie Plot: Military cadets take extreme measures to ensure the future of their academy when its existence is threatened by local condo developers.

Title: Stauffenberg
Movie Plot: In 1944, in fear of a complete German defeat in the World War II, a group of high command officers plot an attempt against Hitler, and one of the leaders of the conspiracy, Stauffenberg (Sebastian Koch), goes to a meeting with the Fuhrer in charge of exploding the place. However, Hitler survives and the officers are executed. This unsuccessful operation was called "Valkyrie Operation", and this realistic movie discloses this true event.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

Title: American Made
Movie Plot: The story of Barry Seal, an American pilot who became a drug-runner for the CIA in the 1980s in a clandestine operation that would be exposed as the Iran-Contra Affair.

Title: Mandela
Movie Plot: A local barber's fate turns overnight when he becomes the single deciding vote in the village elections.

Title: Jersey
Movie Plot: A cricketer who quits cricket decides to revive his career at the age of 36 for his sons dream and prove his ability.

Title: Salvador
Movie Plot: A burnt-out photojournalist becomes involved in a Central American revolution.

Title: Arjun Reddy
Movie Plot: Arjun Reddy, a short-tempered house surgeon, gets used to drugs and drinks when his girlfriend is forced to marry another person.

Title: Mahanati
Movie Plot: Biography of Savitri, an actress from South India movie industry, who ruled the industry for two decades during 50s and 60s.

Title: Nixon
Movie Plot: A biographical story of former U.S. President Richard Nixon, from his days as a young boy, to his eventual Presidency, which ended in shame.

Title: Talk Radio
Movie Plot: A rude, contemptuous talk show host becomes overwhelmed by the hatred that surrounds his program just before it goes national.

Title: U Turn
Movie Plot: A man heading to Vegas to pay off his gambling debt before the Russian mafia kills him is forced to stop in an Arizona town where everything that can go wrong does go wrong.

Title: Comandante
Movie Plot: Documentary on the director's meeting with Castro.

Title: South of the Border
Movie Plot: A road trip across five countries to explore the social and political movements as well as the mainstream media's misperception of South America while interviewing seven of its elected presidents.

Title: The Doors
Movie Plot: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

Title: W.
Movie Plot: A chronicle of the life and Presidency of George W. Bush.

Title: Wall Street
Movie Plot: An impatient young stockbroker is willing to do anything to get to the top, including trading on illegal inside information taken through a ruthless, greedy corporate raider who takes the youth under his wing.
Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.

Title: Nuclear Now
Movie Plot: An investigation into the possibility of addressing climate change with a move away from fossil fuels to nuclear power.

Title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass
Movie Plot: Declassified files related to President Kennedy's assassination in a far larger context, aiming to shine more light on what really happened in 1963.

Title: Thirteen Days
Movie Plot: In October 1962, the Kennedy administration struggles to contain the Cuban Missile Crisis.

Title: Raazi
Movie Plot: A Kashmiri woman agrees to marry a Pakistani army officer in order to spy on Pakistan during the Indo-Pakistan War of 1971.

Title: Aneethi
Movie Plot: A food delivery guy, finds himself captivated by Subbu's (Dushara) charm. However, their lives take a tumultuous turn when a series of unexpected events unfold, plunging them into a chaotic world

Title: Highway
Movie Plot: Right before her wedding, a young woman finds herself abducted and held for ransom. As the initial days pass, she begins to develop a strange bond with her kidnapper.

Title: Assassin(s)
Movie Plot: Old professional killer Wagner seeks someone to teach what he knows as long as he is already dying, and he chooses Max, young and passionless thief to be his successor.—Anonymous

Title: Rebellion
Movie Plot: Dissidents in a French overseas territory attack a police station and take hostages.

Title: The Million Dollar Hotel
Movie Plot: Tragi-comic, romantic whodunnit set in a run down hotel which plays host to mentally ill people too poor to afford medical insurance.

Title: The Lower Depths
Movie Plot: A charismatic thief makes friends with a bankrupt baron who comes to live in the thief's slum. Meanwhile the thief seeks the love of a young woman, who is held emotionally captive by her slumlord family.

Title: Love in the Afternoon
Movie Plot: Though he has an adoring wife, a bourgeois man is still tempted to pursue other women.

Title: Antonieta
Movie Plot: Anna uncovers an incident involving a young Mexican woman, Antonieta, while doing research for a book on women's suicides in the XXth century. In 1931, in the Notre Dame Cathedral in Paris, Antonieta shot herself through the heart.

Title: Mystery Train
Movie Plot: Three stories are connected by a Memphis hotel and the spirit of Elvis Presley.

Title: The Day and the Hour
Movie Plot: In Nazi-occupied France during WWII, a French woman helps two downed Allied airmen to evade capture by the Germans and make their way into neutral Spain.

Title: Fierrot le pou
Movie Plot: A young man shoots hoops in an empty gym. He misses constantly. At the other end of the court, a young woman arrives and starts warming up. She rarely misses. He's white, she's black. From time to time, she glances at him and smiles. He's fully aware of her presence and of his lack of talent. Is there any way he can impress her? His imagination takes over.—<jhailey@hotmail.com>

Title: Graduate First
Movie Plot: A study of a group of young working class people in a French village, who are embarking upon adult life. The film follows the choices and decisions made for their futures.

Title: Free Zone
Movie Plot: Two women embark on a road trip after they are brought together by circumstance. Rebecca (Portman) flees her hotel after a fight with her mother-in-law (Maura) and hails a taxi driven by Hanna (Lazlo).

Title: Assassins...
Movie Plot: An assassin. A pupil. A lesson.

Title: Ee Nagaraniki Emaindi
Movie Plot: The story is based on four childhood friends who go on a trip to Goa. Each have their own dream careers, and collaborate to make a short film.

Title: Thoovanathumbikal
Movie Plot: Jayakrishnan falls in love with two girls, Radha and Clara, and fights his confusion about whom he should marry and spend his life with.

Title: Spadikam
Movie Plot: A small-town criminal constantly clashes with his strict school headmaster father at the expense of their family lives.

Title: The Mire
Movie Plot: In an early-'80s Polish town, a prostitute and a youth leader are found killed, but the police's handling of the case makes two journalists suspicious.

Title: The Mire
Movie Plot: A man finds himself stuck between the murk and the mire, guarded by an armed man with no way of escape. Only to find himself questioning which is the dream?

Title: American Conspiracy: The Octopus Murders
Movie Plot: Follows journalist Danny Casolaro's mysterious death while probing an alleged conspiracy called "The Octopus" linking spy software theft, unsolved murders and major 20th-century scandals.

Title: Poulia sto valto
Movie Plot: The part women played in Resistance during the German occupation 1941-1944. Focuses not in historical description, but the revelation -through memories, experiences or/and psychological trauma- of an attitude supposed to be only of men.

Title: Successful Alcoholics
Movie Plot: A couple that are very successful in their jobs and at the same time have a drinking problem try to manage their love life, their social life and their jobs.

Title: Wrong Side of the Tracks
Movie Plot: When his teenage granddaughter falls victim to the drug dealers overtaking his neighborhood, a fed-up war veteran takes matters into his own hands.

Title: Millennium After the Millennium
Movie Plot: Millennium after the Millennium is a new documentary focused on Chris Carter's landmark television series Millennium. Set twenty years after the show ended, we look back at what makes Millennium so enduring to fans and critics alike.

Title: Wrong Side of the Tracks
Movie Plot: 2 young women looking for a weekend of fun get more than they bargained for on the 'Wrong Side of The Tracks'.

Title: The Millennium Bug
Movie Plot: When the Haskin family seeks refuge from Y2K hysteria in the isolated forests of the Sierra Diablos mountains, madness and terror find them there. Abducted by a vicious hillbilly clan, the Haskins fight for survival, but neither they nor the hillbilly Crawfords can comprehend the monstrous nightmare about to erupt from the bowels of the earth.—Anonymous

Title: The Beat That My Heart Skipped
Movie Plot: Will Thomas still lead a life of crime and cruelty, just like his thuggish father, or will he pursue his dream of becoming a pianist?

Title: Dheepan
Movie Plot: Dheepan is a Sri Lankan Tamil warrior who flees to France and ends up working as a caretaker outside Paris.

Title: Read My Lips
Movie Plot: She is almost deaf and he lip-reads. He is an ex-convict. She wants to help him. He thinks no one can help except himself.

Title: The White Ribbon
Movie Plot: Strange events happen in a small village in the north of Germany during the years before World War I, which seem to be ritual punishment. Who is responsible?

Title: Caché
Movie Plot: A married couple is terrorized by a series of surveillance videotapes left on their front porch.

Title: The Diving Bell and the Butterfly
Movie Plot: The true story of Elle editor Jean-Dominique Bauby who suffers a stroke and has to live with an almost totally paralyzed body; only his left eye isn't paralyzed.

Title: Paris, 13th District
Movie Plot: Émilie meets Camille who is attracted to Nora, who crosses paths with Amber. Three girls and a boy - they're friends, sometimes lovers and often both.

Title: Mommy
Movie Plot: A widowed single mother, raising her violent son alone, finds new hope when a mysterious neighbor inserts herself into their household.

Title: Day of Wrath
Movie Plot: The young wife of an aging priest falls in love with his son amidst the horror of a merciless witch hunt in 17th-century Denmark.

Title: Gertrud
Movie Plot: In the elegant world of artists and musicians, Gertrud ends her marriage to Gustav and takes a lover, the composer Erland Jansson.

Title: Ordet
Movie Plot: A drama about mental disease, faith, and doubt.

Title: Vampyr
Movie Plot: A drifter obsessed with the supernatural stumbles upon an inn where a severely ill adolescent girl is slowly becoming a vampire.

Title: Arya 2
Movie Plot: Two childhood friends grow up differently to fall in love with the same woman.

Title: Julayi
Movie Plot: After helping the police foil a violent heist, a sharp minded young man must evade the criminal mastermind whose plans he has thwarted.

Title: Happy
Movie Plot: An orphan working as a Pizza delivery boy and the daughter of a caste-based politician are forced to get married in an unforeseen situation.

Title: Thevar Magan
Movie Plot: The urbane son of a village chieftain struggles between his personal aspirations and those of his family.

Title: Indian
Movie Plot: A veteran freedom fighter enraged with the rising crime and corruption in the society murders all the wrong doers one by one using an ancient martial arts technique.

Title: Trial of a Murder
Movie Plot: In a Courtroom trial the Judge recognizes his Ex-Girlfriend as an accused for killing her husband but as the case unfolds, it starts to reveal the real culprit.

Title: Ramayana: The Legend of Prince Rama
Movie Plot: An anime adaptation of the Hindu epic the Ramayana, where Lord Ram combats the wicked king Ravana.

Title: Thalapathi
Movie Plot: An orphan named Surya raised in a slum befriends a good crime boss named Devaraj and works for him. Their existence is threatened when a new honest district collector arrives.

Title: Gol Maal
Movie Plot: A man's simple lie to secure his job escalates into more complex lies when his orthodox boss gets suspicious.

Title: Polladhavan
Movie Plot: A contemporary action drama revolving around a young man's love for his bike, including the trials and travails he is forced to undergo when it goes missing.

Title: Mudhalvan
Movie Plot: A man accepts a challenge to act as the Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu for one day only, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.

Title: Maanaadu
Movie Plot: On the day of a public conference by the state's Chief Minister, his bodyguard and a police officer are stuck in a time loop.

Title: Thiruchitrambalam
Movie Plot: Thiruchitrambalam lives with his father and grandfather. He blames the former for the loss of his mother and sister and is not on good terms with the latter. Meanwhile, his love life is not so successful.

Title: Naane Varuven
Movie Plot: Prabhu an average suburban man for whom his family is everything. His life is turned upside down when his daughter Satya is possessed by the ghost of a little boy.

Title: Gabbar Singh
Movie Plot: Inspired by a movie character in Sholay, Venkataratnam, a policeman, calls himself Gabbar Singh. He's postedin a village where an area thug wants to join politics and also lures his stepbrother to hitch him.

Title: Doctor
Movie Plot: When his fiancee's niece is kidnapped, a stoic army doctor and his motley team launch a rescue operation in which they need both wit and their wits.

Title: Tiger Nageswara Rao
Movie Plot: A legendary real-life robber of Stuartpuram, Andhra Pradesh called Tiger Nageswara Rao in the 1970s, who was noted for his ingenious ways of evading the police and prison.

Title: Attarintiki Daredi
Movie Plot: The scion of a powerful family is tasked with retrieving an estranged family member.

Title: Jalsa
Movie Plot: Sanjay, a young man, joins an extremist group after having had a troublesome childhood. A policeman decides to guide him towards a far better path and in doing so, his daughter falls crazy with Sanjay.

Title: Chithha
Movie Plot: A man is raising his niece like his own daughter, and everything appears normal in their life until the little girl goes missing.

Title: Parking
Movie Plot: An elderly man and a youngster who are tenants sharing two different floors of an individual house fight over a parking space.

Title: Kannur Squad
Movie Plot: The gripping saga of a police officer and his team, their challenging journey to nab a criminal gang across the country. Further, it shows how he leads his team towards triumph, amidst professional uncertainties in this gripping drama.

Title: Por Thozhil
Movie Plot: A bright but faint-hearted rookie cop has to overcome his fears in order to succeed in his first case which sees him partnered with a reclusive senior officer to catch a serial killer on the loose.

Title: Maaveeran
Movie Plot: A cowardly cartoonist starts being 'controlled' by a cartoon action figure, and takes on a corrupt politician.

Title: Viduthalai: Part 1
Movie Plot: A police officer is recruited to capture the leader of a separatist group.

Title: Neru
Movie Plot: Sara, a blind sculptor, seeks justice after suffering trauma. She contends with the legal system and her own resilience to find resolution.

Title: Mark Antony
Movie Plot: Two gangsters, Mark and Antony acquire a mobile phone that has the ability to time travel.

Title: Mahabharat
Movie Plot: The mother of all wars, the epitome of all rivalries, the cauldron of emotions, insecurities, jealousies, and power play - Mahabharat.

Title: Trust Issues
Movie Plot: Watch how Shivam a.k.a Swagger Sharma juggles between three women he is dating, one of them being his childhood love. Dealing with all of them, managing their expectations and navigating through the chaos when all three women come face to face - one can only imagine the madness it brings in Shivam's life.

Title: Luv Kush
Movie Plot: After getting exiled by Lord Rama, Devi Sita gives birth to two sons Lava and Kusa. Under Sage Valmiki's guidance, the boys set out to preach the Ramayana in Ayodhya but a shocking truth awaits them there.

Title: The Nun II
Movie Plot: 1956 - France. A priest is murdered. An evil is spreading. The sequel to the worldwide smash hit follows Sister Irene as she once again comes face-to-face with Valak, the demon nun.

Title: Shri Krishna
Movie Plot: When evil takes over the world, Lord Vishnu incarnates into the world as Shri Krishna for the protection of the righteous and the destruction of the wicked.

Title: The Pope's Exorcist
Movie Plot: Follow Gabriele Amorth, the Vatican's leading exorcist, as he investigates the possession of a child and uncovers a conspiracy the Vatican has tried to keep secret.

Title: Insidious: The Red Door
Movie Plot: The Lamberts must go deeper into The Further than ever before to put their demons to rest once and for all.

Title: In My Country
Movie Plot: A journalist and a poetess meet during the hearings of South African Truth and Reconciliation Commission.

Title: Two Nudes Bathing
Movie Plot: An anonymous painting from the Fontainebleau School hangs in the Louvre. The mysterious pose whereby two young women sit in a bath, one holding the nipple of the other between finger and thumb, has baffled all the experts.

Title: The Tiger's Tail
Movie Plot: After a chance encounter, a Dubliner stalked by a murderous facsimile of himself.

Title: Beyond Rangoon
Movie Plot: Laura is trying to pick up the pieces of her life after the murder of her husband and son, and goes on vacation with her sister to Burma. After losing her passport at a political rally, she is left on her own for a few days, during which time she falls in with students fighting for democracy. She and their leader, U Aung Ko, travel through Burma, whilst witnessing many bloody acts of repression by the dictatorship, in an attempt to escape to Thailand. Based on a true story.—James Hastie <jdh1000@cus.cam.ac.uk>

Title: The Emerald Forest
Movie Plot: After the son of engineer Bill Markham is abducted by an aboriginal tribe on the edge of the rain forest, the engineer spends the next 10 years searching for him.

Title: Wagner
Movie Plot: A huge panorama of Richard Wagner's life and work, from before the 1848 revolution, through his exile in Switzerland, his rescue by the besotted King Ludwig II of Bavaria, to the final triumph at Bayreuth. Richard Wagner's radical musical and political ideas, his German nationalism, and even his anti-Semitism are set in the context of his life and times.—Adrian Thorpe <acthorpe@epic.net>

Title: Saw X
Movie Plot: A sick and desperate John travels to Mexico for a risky and experimental medical procedure in hopes of a miracle cure for his cancer only to discover the entire operation is a scam to defraud the most vulnerable.

Title: Absolution
Movie Plot: Two boys try to drive a strict priest mad with their confessed sins at a boarding school in England.

Title: Five Nights at Freddy's
