Movie Plot: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.

Title: The Mask of Zorro
Movie Plot: A young thief seeking revenge for his brother's death is trained by the once-great, aging Zorro, who is pursuing his own vengeance.

Title: Stargate
Movie Plot: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

Title: First Knight
Movie Plot: Lancelot falls in love with Guinevere, who is due to be married to King Arthur. Meanwhile, a violent warlord tries to seize power from Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table.

Title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
Movie Plot: A spoof of Robin Hood in general, and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991) in particular.

Title: Robin Hood
Movie Plot: The Swashbuckling legend of Robin Hood unfolds in the 12th century when the mighty Normans ruled England with an iron fist.

Title: Boy Kills World
Movie Plot: A dystopian fever dream action film that follows Boy, a deaf person with a vibrant imagination. When his family is murdered, he is trained by a mysterious shaman to repress his childish imagination and become an instrument of death.

Title: Música
Movie Plot: A coming-of-age love story that follows an aspiring creator with synesthesia, who must come to terms with an uncertain future, while navigating the pressures of love, family, and his Brazilian culture in Newark, New Jersey.

Title: Nights in Rodanthe
Movie Plot: A doctor, who is travelling to see his estranged son, sparks with an unhappily married woman at a North Carolina inn.

Title: For Love of the Game
Movie Plot: After 19 years of playing the game he's loved his whole life, Detroit Tigers pitcher Billy Chapel has to decide if he's going to risk everything and put everything out there.

Title: Dragonfly
Movie Plot: A grieving doctor is being contacted by his deceased wife through his patients' near death experiences.

Title: The War
Movie Plot: A Vietnam veteran helps his kids battle over a tree house while recovering from his traumatic war experience.

Title: The Upside of Anger
Movie Plot: When her husband unexpectedly disappears, a sharp-witted suburban wife and her daughters juggle their mom's romantic dilemmas and family dynamics.

Title: Revenge
Movie Plot: A retired US Navy pilot comes to Mexico, where he falls in love with the wife of a powerful businessman. The consequences will be cruel and unforeseen.

Title: Tombstone
Movie Plot: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Title: Appaloosa
Movie Plot: Two friends hired to police a small town that is suffering under the rule of a rancher find their job complicated by the arrival of a young widow.

Title: Hatfields & McCoys
Movie Plot: Dramatization of the bitter blood feud between the two families on the West Virginia/Kentucky border in the years after the Civil War.

Title: Swing Vote
Movie Plot: In a remarkable turn-of-events, the result of the presidential election comes down to one man's vote.

Title: Bull Durham
Movie Plot: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

Title: Chasing Dreams
Movie Plot: A young man (David G. Brown) is bogged down by his family, farm and school life, but after the baseball coach convinces him to play, he finds a bit of comfort in the sport and ends up excelling in it

Title: Witness
Movie Plot: While protecting an Amish boy - who is the sole witness to a brutal murder - and his mother, a detective is forced to seek refuge within their community when his own life is threatened.

Title: Presumed Innocent
Movie Plot: As a lawyer investigates the murder of a colleague, he finds himself more connected to the crime than anyone else.

Title: An Officer and a Gentleman
Movie Plot: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.

Title: Soldier
Movie Plot: A soldier trained from birth is deemed obsolete and dumped on a waste planet where he is reluctantly taken in by a community of defenseless, stranded wayfarers.

Title: Dark Blue
Movie Plot: A robbery homicide investigation triggers a series of events that will cause a corrupt LAPD officer to question his tactics.

Title: Executive Decision
Movie Plot: When terrorists seize control of an airliner, an intelligence analyst accompanies a commando unit for a midair boarding operation.

Title: Mr. Brooks
Movie Plot: A well-respected businessman is sometimes controlled by his murder and mayhem-loving alter ego.

Title: Captain Ron
Movie Plot: A Chicagoan inherits an old yacht. He, his wife, daughter and son fly to a Caribbean island and hire a dubious Captain Ron to sail them on an adventure to Miami.

Title: Backdraft
Movie Plot: Two feuding siblings carrying on a heroic family tradition as Chicago firefighters. But when a puzzling series of arson attacks is reported, they are forced to set aside their differences to solve the mystery surrounding these crimes.

Title: Minority Report
Movie Plot: 10 years after the end of Precrime in Washington DC one of the three PreCogs attempts to lead a normal life while still suffering from visions of the future. Will they be able to hold it together or mentally breakdown and give up?

Title: Blue Sky
Movie Plot: Carly moves with her military husband and their two daughters to an isolated army base, only to quickly become part of a cover-up involving nuclear bomb tests.

Title: Gôsuto
Movie Plot: A man tries to solve his lover's murder by communicating with her spirit through the help of a medium.

Title: Pyaar Ka Saaya
Movie Plot: Uncredited remake of "Ghost". Dead man's spirit, unable to bear separation from his wife, communicates to her through a wacky medium.

Title: Indecent Proposal
Movie Plot: A billionaire offers $1,000,000 to a young married couple for one night with the wife.

Title: Bodyguard
Movie Plot: Troubled war veteran turned Police Officer David Budd is assigned to the Metropolitan Police's Specialist Protection Branch.

Title: The Bodyguard
Movie Plot: Amidst betrayal, a by-the-book contractor takes on the role of protecting a beautiful, yet not-so-easy-to-get-along with famous influencer. The same woman he was hired to kill.

Title: Citadel
Movie Plot: Global spy agency Citadel has fallen, and its agents' memories were wiped clean. Now the powerful syndicate, Manticore, is rising in the void. Can the Citadel agents recollect their past and summon the strength to fight back?

Title: The Night Agent
Movie Plot: Low-level FBI agent Peter Sutherland works in the basement of the White House manning a phone that never rings - until the night it does, propelling him into a conspiracy that leads all the way to the Oval Office.

Title: Dirty Dancing
Movie Plot: A continuation of the movie of the same name where Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with camp dance instructor Johnny Castle.

Title: Footloose
Movie Plot: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

Title: Dirty Dancing: Havana Nights
Movie Plot: High school senior Katey moves to Havana in November 1958, when her dad gets a promotion at Ford. She meets a local waiter, who introduces her to sensual Cuban music/dance. They enter a big dance contest for the prize when he gets fired.

Title: Basic Instinct
Movie Plot: A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.

Title: Sleeping with the Enemy
Movie Plot: A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.

Title: Disclosure
Movie Plot: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

Title: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
Movie Plot: After her sex offender husband gets caught in the act and kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against one of her husband's victims and the woman's family.

Title: The War of the Roses
Movie Plot: A married couple tries everything to drive each other out of the house in a vicious divorce battle.

Title: Unfaithful
Movie Plot: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Movie Plot: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 1980s thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Title: Liar Liar
Movie Plot: A pathological liar-lawyer finds his career turned upside down when he inexplicably cannot physically lie for 24 whole hours.

Title: Mrs. Doubtfire
Movie Plot: A struggling voice actor dresses up as a nanny to be close to his children after his wife is determined to divorce him.

Title: Dumb and Dumber
Movie Plot: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen to return it.

Title: Bruce Almighty
Movie Plot: A whiny news reporter is given the chance to step into God's shoes.

Title: Meet the Parents
Movie Plot: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

Title: 50 First Dates
Movie Plot: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams until discovering she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.

Title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
Movie Plot: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

Title: Drushyam 2
Movie Plot: Secrets from the past are brought to light due to an unexpected turn of events. Can Rambabu save his family this time?

Title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2
Movie Plot: When strangers Reet and Ruhan cross paths, their journey leads to an abandoned mansion and a dreaded spirit that has been trapped for 18 years.

Title: Stree
Movie Plot: In the small town of Chanderi, the menfolk live in fear of an evil spirit named "Stree" who abducts men in the night. Based on the urban legend of "Nale Ba" that went viral in Karnataka in the 1990s.

Title: The Bride Wore Black
Movie Plot: Julie Kohler is prevented from suicide by her mother. She leaves the town. She will track down, charm and kill five men who do not know her. What is her goal? What is her purpose?

Title: Confidentially Yours
Movie Plot: After he's implicated in several murders, a real estate agent hides out from the cops while his intrepid secretary does some private investigating of her own to locate the killer.

Title: A Gorgeous Girl Like Me
Movie Plot: Young sociologist Stanislas Previne is preparing a thesis on criminal women. He meets Camille Bliss in prison to interview her. Camille is accused of murdering her husband Clovis and her lover Arthur She tells Stanislas about her life and her love affairs..—Yepok

Title: The Man Who Loved Women
Movie Plot: Bertrand Morane's burial is attended by all the women the forty-year-old engineer loved. We then flash back to Bertrand's life and love affairs, told by himself while writing an autobiographical novel. A film about romantic relationships, the need to charm, and the literary creation.—Yepok and Brian McInnis

Title: The Woman Next Door
Movie Plot: Two ex-lovers wind up living next door to each other with their respective spouses. Forbidden passions ensue.

Title: Welcome Back
Movie Plot: A pair of reformed gangsters try to find a husband for their newly discovered sister, but complications arise due to mistaken identities.

Title: Garam Masala
Movie Plot: A rib tickling tale of two flirts who constantly flirt with women despite one of them being engaged. Chaos ensues when the fiancé finds out that her to-be groom is cheating on her.

Title: Hungama
Movie Plot: The story of a bunch of misfits whose misconception about each others backgrounds end up in a series of chaotic, yet comic outcomes.

Title: The Fiancés of the Bridge Mac Donald
Movie Plot: A subtitle warns, "Beware of dark sunglasses." Anna and her lover, whose looks in bowler and bow tie are reminiscent of a young Buster Keaton, kiss chastely on a bridge overlooking the Seine. He dons sunglasses and waves as she runs down a stairway to the river's edge, then watches in horror as she's knocked flat and loaded into the back of a hearse. In vain, he gives chase. Disconsolate, he buys a large funeral wreath and a handkerchief from sympathetic vendors. He removes the glasses to wipe his eyes and realizes they are the cause of all his woe. He replays the farewell without the glasses.—<jhailey@hotmail.com>

Title: The Wild Child
Movie Plot: In a French forest in 1798, a child is found who cannot walk, speak, read or write. A doctor becomes interested in the child and patiently attempts to civilize him.

Title: Pattanapravesam
Movie Plot: CID Officers Ramdas and Vijayan go to Kerala to find the murderer of a police officer. While doing so, they face a dangerous crime syndicate that deals in drug trafficking.

Title: Chithram
Movie Plot: A woman hires a stranger to pose as her husband because she doesn't want her ailing father to know that her fiance broke their engagement.

Title: Sandesham
Movie Plot: A satire on contemporary Kerala politics where brothers turn local leaders of rival parties, leading to distress for their aged and once-proud parents.

Title: Yoddha
Movie Plot: Fate brings a young man from rural Kerala to be the protector of a young Lama in Nepal, who is being chased by a dangerous cult.

Title: Ramji Rao Speaking
Movie Plot: Three unemployed men struggle to earn a living and decide to get involved in a kidnapping scheme to make quick money.

Title: In Harihar Nagar
Movie Plot: Four young men are enamored by Maya, their next-door neighbor. However, she is in town to investigate the mysterious circumstances surrounding the death of her brother.

Title: Thanmathra
Movie Plot: Will an unexpected turn of events change Rameshan's life forever and prevent him from witnessing his dream where his son becomes a reputable IAS Officer?

Title: The Green Room
Movie Plot: A French little town, at the end of the twenties. Julien Davenne is a journalist whose wife Julie died a decade ago. He gathered in the green room all Julie's objects. When a fire destroys the room, he renovates a little chapel and devotes it to Julie and his other dead persons.—Yepok

Title: Small Change
Movie Plot: The lives of a motherless boy, who is just starting to get interested in women, and his physically abused friend, who lives in poverty, are mixed with more or less innocent childhood experiences and challenges of a number of children.

Title: Charlie
Movie Plot: A young, nonconforming woman named Tessa gets entangled in a cat-and-mouse chase in the by-lanes of Kerala, hunting for a mysterious artist who previously lived in her apartment.

Title: Ustad Hotel
Movie Plot: Faisi wants to go to UK to become a professional chef but circumstances force him to assist his grandfather in a small restaurant in Kozhikode city, changing his outlook on life forever.

Title: Maheshinte Prathikaaram
Movie Plot: Mahesh, a studio photographer and studio owner gets into a fight and loses. He ends up taking revenge which leads to certain realizations in his life.

Title: Ohm Shanthi Oshaana
Movie Plot: A spirited young girl would stop at nothing to get the first love of her life, even if it takes seven years and several heartbreaks.

Title: Hridayam
Movie Plot: The emotional journey of Arun, his carefree bachelor days in engineering college, and how he matures through various phases of life.

Title: Malik
Movie Plot: A past ridden with crime, death and pain is recounted to Freddy, a juvenile criminal, who has been assigned to eliminate his estranged uncle Sulaiman, an aging patriarch, while behind bars.

Title: Godfather
Movie Plot: Since Anjooran hates women, his sons remain unmarried. However, everything changes when his youngest son, Ramabhadran, falls in love with Malu, whose grandmother is their family's biggest enemy.

Title: Kaalapani
Movie Plot: Govardhan, a doctor by profession, is wrongly accused of bombing a train and is jailed by the British in Cellular Jail, also known as Kala Pani, in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands. He witnesses the sufferings of hundreds of Indian prisoners there.

Title: A Northern Story of Valor
Movie Plot: The film offers an alternative version of the fight between two legendary Chekavars from Chanthu's perspective.

Title: Mathu Vadalara
Movie Plot: Simha is a courier delivery boy who gets peanuts as salary despite putting in a lot of hard work. As Babu gets frustrated with his job, his friend and roommate Satya shows him how to get 'tips' from the greedy customer. Babu is reluctant, but tries to pull it off and his very first attempt goes awry. He is now left in a deep mess and needs to clean it up as soon as possible. But little does he know that what awaits on the other side.—ritvik-c

Title: Thondi Muthalum Driksakshiyum
Movie Plot: Prasad and Sreeja enter wedlock and move to a new place to continue the rest of their lives. Unfortunate events begin to take place after Prasad, a small-time thief, robs Sreeja's gold chain during a bus journey.

Title: Jana Gana Mana
Movie Plot: As a college professor's brutal murder sparks student unrest, a cop launches an investigation while a lawyer seeks justice in the the courtroom.
A disaster film set during the 2018 Kerala Floods where people from all walks of life faced catastrophic consequences and put in collective efforts to survive the calamity.

Title: Pranchiyettan and the Saint
Movie Plot: Pranchiyettan is a successful businessman who often has talks with an imaginary St. Francis of Assisi. The story deals with how he goes about changing his embarrassing image to making a name for himself using wealth and contacts.

Title: Athadu
Movie Plot: A gunman for hire is framed for murder, and assumes a dead man's identity while hiding from the police.

Title: Take Off
Movie Plot: In 2014, a group of Malayali nurses was captured when terrorists took over the city of Tikrit in Iraq. This movie recounts the ordeal suffered by the nurses following their capture.

Title: Sudani from Nigeria
Movie Plot: Story of an African football player and a local football club manager from Malappuram, Kerala.

Title: Dasharatham
Movie Plot: Rajeev, an orphan eccentric millionaire, has his own strange taste towards everything. With less knowledge about family relationships, he struggles hard to achieve his aim to become a father without marrying.

Title: Premam
Movie Plot: Vikram falls in love with three women at different stages of his life which changes him as a person until he finally meets the love of his life.

Title: Masculine Feminine
Movie Plot: A romance between young Parisians, shown through a series of vignettes.

Title: The Little Soldier
Movie Plot: During the Algerian War, a man and woman from opposing sides fall in love with one another.

Title: Weekend
Movie Plot: A surreal tale of a married couple going on a road trip to visit the wife's parents with the intention of killing them for the inheritance.

Title: Guru
Movie Plot: Situations turn a man who believes in secularism into an extremist. He plots to bomb a monastery where the survivors of a riot take refuge.

Title: The Conformist
Movie Plot: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.

Title: Le Mépris
Movie Plot: An endless video loop of a very short sequence from Godard's "Contempt" (1963) shows a close-up of actress Brigitte Bardot sitting in a car, repeatedly saying: "Forget what I told you, Paul. Pretend that I never said anything".

Title: ...And God Created Woman
Movie Plot: In sunny St. Tropez, a young woman loves one brother but marries the other.

Title: A Married Woman
Movie Plot: A superifical woman finds conflict choosing between her abusive husband and her vain lover.

Title: Made in U.S.A
Movie Plot: In the near future, leftist writer Paula goes from Paris to the French town of Atlantic-Cité when she learns of the death of a former colleague and lover, Richard P. Is she there to investigate? On the surface, faces are beautiful, colors bright, clothes trendy. Beneath, little is clear: some talk to Paula as if she's Alice in Wonderland, corpses pile up, and ideological struggles insert themselves. A murder victim's nephew and a political party's hired hands hover around Paula. Is obscuring things her goal or is it life that's obscure?—<jhailey@hotmail.com>

Title: The Chinese
Movie Plot: A small group of French students are studying Mao, trying to find out their position in the world and how to change the world to a Maoistic community using terrorism.—Stephan Eichenberg <eichenbe@fak-cbg.tu-muenchen.de>

Title: The Carabineers
Movie Plot: During a war in an imaginary country, unscrupulous soldiers recruit poor farmers with promises of an easy and happy life. Two of these farmers write to their wives of their exploits.

Title: Le Bonheur
Movie Plot: François, a young carpenter, lives a happy, uncomplicated life with his wife Thérèse and their two small children. One day he meets Emilie, a clerk in the local post office.

Title: Vagabond
Movie Plot: A young woman's body is found frozen in a ditch. Through flashbacks and interviews, we see the events that led to her inevitable death.

Title: La Pointe Courte
Movie Plot: Follow the story of a couple who goes to a small French fishing village to try to solve the problems of their deteriorating marriage.

Title: The Beaches of Agnès
Movie Plot: Agnès Varda explores her memories, mostly chronologically, with photographs, film clips, interviews, reenactments, and droll, playful contemporary scenes of her narrating her story.

Title: The Gleaners & I
Movie Plot: Varda films and interviews gleaners in France in all forms, from those picking fields after the harvest to those scouring the dumpsters of Paris.

Title: Faces Places
Movie Plot: Director Agnes Varda and photographer/muralist J.R. journey through rural France and form an unlikely friendship.

Title: Internal Affairs
Movie Plot: An Internal Affairs agent becomes obsessed with bringing down a cop who has managed to maintain a spotless reputation despite being involved in a web of corruption.

Title: Final Analysis
Movie Plot: A psychiatrist becomes romantically involved with the sister of one of his patients, but the influence of her controlling gangster husband threatens to destroy them both.

Title: Year of the Jellyfish
Movie Plot: Chris, a sexy teenager who appears mostly bare-breasted on the French Riviera, has a crush on Romain, her mother's lover. In reaction to her inability to attract his attention, she experiments with other risque affairs.

Title: Beyond the Limit
Movie Plot: During the Dirty War, a half-English doctor in Argentina befriends the police, the rebels and the alcoholic Honorary British Consul, whose Latino wife he seduces. When the consul is mistakenly kidnapped by the rebels, he must pick a side.

Title: The Big Easy
Movie Plot: A corrupt lieutenant in the homicide division is threatened by the righteous DA while trying to solve a string of mysterious murders.

Title: 8 Million Ways to Die
Movie Plot: A former police detective, still recovering from his alcohol addiction, is seemingly drawn into L.A's criminal underworld after stumbling upon a local drug ring.

Title: Blown Away
Movie Plot: Megan, the seventeen year old daughter of a strict but wealthy businessman, falls for Rich who works at his ski resort. Megan's mother has recently died in a car accident, which she blames on her father. Is Rich so in love with Megan that he'll watch her kill her own father?—Rob Hartill

Title: Same Old Song
Movie Plot: A musical story about how people find their love on the streets of beautiful Paris.

Title: Last Year at Marienbad
Movie Plot: In a strange and isolated chateau, a man becomes acquainted with a woman and insists that they have met before.

Title: Kahaani 2
Movie Plot: A woman with a mysterious past is charged with kidnapping and murder.

Title: Great Expectations
Movie Plot: A humble orphan boy in 1810s Kent is given the opportunity to go to London and become a gentleman, with the help of an unknown benefactor.

Title: Summertime
Movie Plot: An American spinster's dream of romance finally becomes a bittersweet reality when she meets a handsome--but married--Italian man while vacationing in Venice.

Title: The Killing Fields
Movie Plot: A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody 'Year Zero' cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million 'undesirable' civilians.

Title: Places in the Heart
Movie Plot: In central Texas in the 1930s, a widow with two small children tries to save her small 40-acre farm with the help of a blind boarder and an itinerant black handyman.

Title: Oliver Twist
Movie Plot: In Charles Dickens' classic tale, an orphan wends his way from cruel apprenticeship to den of thieves in search of a true home.

Title: Lost and Found: The Story of Cook's Anchor
Movie Plot: Filmmaker David Lean is scouting locations in Tahiti for a feature film about the famous mutiny on the HMS Bounty. His property master, Eddie Fowlie, discovers the whereabouts of an anchor which had belonged to Captain Cook, and historians and experts arrive to examine it before an attempt is made to raise it and bring it to land.—Anonymous

Title: Revenge of the Bridesmaids
Movie Plot: Two women plot revenge against the woman marrying their friend's ex-boyfriend.

Title: Crimes of Fashion: Killer Clutch
Movie Plot: An American psychologist, hired to coach a fashion designer, helps a guarded French detective unravel a list of fashionable suspects after a murder happens backstage of a Paris fashion show.

Title: Faces in the Crowd
Movie Plot: A horror-thriller centered on a woman living with "face-blindness" after surviving a serial killer's attack. As she lives with her condition, one in which facial features change each time she loses sight of them, the killer closes in.

Title: You Again
Movie Plot: When a young woman realizes her brother is about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school, she sets out to expose the fiancée's true colors.

Title: Beauty & the Briefcase
Movie Plot: A freelance writer looking for romance sells a story to Cosmopolitan magazine about finding love in the workplace and goes undercover at a Finance Company.

Title: Hobson's Choice
Movie Plot: Widower Henry Hobson refuses to let his three daughters get married because he doesn't want to pay settlements, so they'll just have to outsmart him.

Title: Home from the Hill
Movie Plot: Dramatic story of the influential Hunnicutt family set in Texas during the late 1950s.

Title: In Which We Serve
Movie Plot: This "story of a ship", the British destroyer H.M.S. Torrin, is told in flashbacks by survivors as they cling to a life raft.

Title: The Passionate Friends
Movie Plot: A woman meets a man whose love she rejected years ago.

Title: The Sundowners
Movie Plot: In Australia's Outback during the early twentieth century, the impoverished Carmody family lives a nomadic life out of their wagon, but the mom and son want to settle, while the dad is against it.

Title: Onegin
Movie Plot: Russia, 1820s: Onegin inherits his uncle's country estate and moves there from St. Petersburg. He befriends his neighbor, Lensky, and meets Tatyana through him. She falls in love with Onegin but he just wants friendship.

Title: Heaven Knows, Mr. Allison
Movie Plot: During World War II, an American marine and an Irish nun form an unlikely friendship after being stranded on a South Pacific island. They find comfort in one another while hoping for a rescue, as they try to avoid capture by the Japanese.

Title: Doktor Zhivago
Movie Plot: In Doctor Zhivago, the life of a young doctor is intertwined with the fate of Russia at the beginning of the 20th century. Yuri Zhivago is orphaned at a young age, and his uncle brings him to Moscow, where he studies medicine while living with his uncle's family. At a New Year's ball, he witnesses an assassination attempt on a high society lawyer named Komarovksy. What shocks Yuri is the identity of the shooter: Lara Gishar. By coincidence, he had been present earlier when Lara and Komarovsky first met at the Montenegro hotel. At the time, their magnetism and their unusual relationship, both extremely open and particularly secretive, revealed to the young doctor a world of emotions he had yet to experience. Yuri is told that Komarovsky played a role in his father's suicide, but this news has less effect on him than the chance meeting with Lara. At the beginning of WWI, Doctor Zhivago goes to the front, leaving his wife and children in Moscow. He is unaware that many years later Lara will touch his life again, changing it for ever; Yuri Zhivago's personal drama plays out against a backdrop of social and historical upheaval, with his generation's hopes and desires wiped out by war and revolution. Yuri's work and family suffer from his sense of having lost his bearings. Hoping to get back on his feet, he makes the fateful decision to leave Moscow and return to his family's house beyond the Urals. Yuri observes from the window of his train as a new Russia is born, and unexpected encounters during his travels come to symbolize for him the spirit of a new era. The people he meets in the train have been forged in this new world, and Yuri desperately tries to find his place among them, learning to live in the provinces and forgetting the dreams of his youth. As he lies on his bunk in the train, Yuri has no idea that Lara has also left Moscow, taking up residence not far from his family home.—Pavel P.

Title: Moll Flanders
Movie Plot: The daughter of a thief, young Moll is placed in the care of a nunnery after her mother's execution, but the actions of an abusive priest lead her to rebel as a teenager, and she escapes to the dangerous streets of London. Further misfortunes drive her to accept a job as a prostitute from the conniving Mrs. Allworthy, where she first meets Hibble.

Title: The Camomile Lawn
Movie Plot: In 1939, young Oliver, Calypso, Polly and Walter visit friends and family in Cornwall. Spanish Civil War is over and WW2 has begun, so they enjoy their love life while they can. Decades later, they gather again, this time for a funeral.

Title: The Duchess
Movie Plot: A chronicle of the life of 18th-century aristocrat Georgiana, Duchess of Devonshire, who was revered for her extravagant political and personal life.

Title: Daniel Deronda
Movie Plot: Set in Victorian London, Gwendolen Harleth is drawn to Daniel Deronda, a selfless and intelligent gentleman of unknown parentage, but her own desperate need for financial security may destroy her chance at happiness.

Title: Wuthering Heights
Movie Plot: Foundling Heathcliff is raised by the wealthy Earnshaws in Yorkshire but in later life launches a vendetta against the family.

Title: Tess of the D'Urbervilles
Movie Plot: The story of Tess Durbeyfield, a low-born country girl whose family find they have noble connections.

Title: Far from the Madding Crowd
Movie Plot: In Victorian England, the independent and headstrong Bathsheba Everdene attracts three very different suitors: Gabriel Oak, a sheep farmer; Frank Troy, a reckless Sergeant; and William Boldwood, a prosperous and mature bachelor.

Title: Emma
Movie Plot: Emma Woodhouse, a wealthy young woman living in the early 19th century, whose misplaced confidence in her matchmaking abilities occasions several romantic misadventures, which leads her into deeper meanings of love and life

Title: Rebecca
Movie Plot: A British gentleman's innocent bride grapples with intrusive reminders of his deceased wife.

Title: Road House
Movie Plot: Ex-UFC fighter Dalton takes a job as a bouncer at a Florida Keys roadhouse, only to discover that this paradise is not all it seems.

Title: Lee
Movie Plot: The story of photographer Elizabeth 'Lee' Miller, a fashion model who became an acclaimed war correspondent for Vogue magazine during World War II.

Title: The Greatest Hits
Movie Plot: A love story centering on the connection between music and memory and how they transport us, sometimes literally.

Title: Beau
Movie Plot: A neurotic middle-aged man's trip to visit his mother is delayed indefinitely when his keys are mysteriously taken from his door. He is subsequently haunted by an increasingly sinister chain of upsetting events. (Although it is not made apparent in the film, it should be said that Beau once used a Ouija board.)—Anonymous

Title: Priscilla
Movie Plot: When teenage Priscilla Beaulieu meets Elvis Presley, the man who is already a meteoric rock-and-roll superstar becomes someone entirely unexpected in private moments: a thrilling crush, an ally in loneliness, a vulnerable best friend.

Title: Daddio
Movie Plot: A woman taking a cab ride from JFK engages in a conversation with the taxi driver about the important relationships in their lives.

Title: Dead Mail
Movie Plot: An ominous help note finds its way to a 1980s post office, connecting a dead letter investigator to a kidnapped keyboard technician.

Title: Eric Larue
Movie Plot: It tells the story of Janice, the mother of a teenager who shot and killed three of his classmates.

Title: The Pack
Movie Plot: A farmer and his family must fight for survival after a ferocious pack of wild dogs infiltrates their isolated farmhouse. Through a series of frightening and bloody encounters they are forced into survival mode to make it through the night.—Kent Smith

Title: Divine
Movie Plot: Tells the story of insecure Gregory Spring, who first has to fly to Vatican City in order to overcome his fears, report on the election of the pope and to fall in love.

Title: Stella: A Life
Movie Plot: Stella, grows up in Berlin during the rule of the Nazi regime. She dreams of a career as a jazz singer, despite all the repressive measures she is forced to go into hiding with her parents in 1944, her life turns into a culpable tragedy.

Title: The Critic
Movie Plot: The Critic is a story of ambition, blackmail and desire with a dazzling anti-hero at its dark heart. A whodunnit wrapped in a Faustian pact which winds tighter and tighter. Patrick Marber adapted the script from Anthony Quinn's novel.

Title: Temple
Movie Plot: UK version of the Norwegian show about a surgeon who is determined to save his dying wife to the point of agreeing to treat criminals and others for cash in his highly illegal secret underground clinic.

Title: Soul Catcher
Movie Plot: Travel across Gothic landscapes and uncover the Haunting stories of abandoned Indian boarding schools built to imprison the once free spirit of Native Americans. Uncover ghosts, shape shifters and shadow people.

Title: Soulcatcher
Movie Plot: A military contractor hired to seize a weapon that turns people into savage killers seeks revenge when his brother falls victim to the device.

Title: Crown Vic
Movie Plot: Follows one memorable night in the life of LAPD officer Ray Mandel as he hunts two cop killers on the loose.

Title: Break Night
Movie Plot: A safecracker has one night to repay a debt before he can leave town, while he tries to win back the woman he left behind, as well as duck a crooked P.O., a burned-out Narc Cop, and a former partner in crime with a mysterious grudge.

Title: Rust
Movie Plot: A former pastor who walked away from his calling returns to his small hometown to discover that a mysterious fire tragically struck a local family. When he learns that his childhood friend is implicated in starting the fire, he sets out on a mission to find the truth?.and in the process, rediscovers his faith.—Anonymous

Title: Life Life in in Space Space
Movie Plot: Life Life in in Space Space is a concept TV show/short film that is about fanciful characters in space working together and getting along despite radical differences. It centers on the themes of tolerance and 'don't judge a book by its cover'. Some people have said, 'It's like Space Balls for the 90's'. The truth is, political correctness on a space ship, an isolated place, is probably a horrible idea in all practicality.—Anonymous

Title: My Uncle Rafael
Movie Plot: When a TV producer is desperate to find a replacement series, she convinces a 71 year-old Armenian, tell-it-like-it-is Uncle, to star in a new reality show.

Title: The Defenders
Movie Plot: Two flashy Las Vegas defense attorneys go to the mat for their clients.

Title: Dude
Movie Plot: A group of teenage girlfriends deal with their impending graduation from high school.

Title: The Bling Ring
Movie Plot: Teenagers break into celebrities houses to experience the rich life by stealing their belongings.

Title: Yoga Hosers
Movie Plot: Two teenage yoga enthusiasts must do battle with an evil presence that is threatening to rise from its underground lair and endanger their major party plans.

Title: Are You There, Chelsea?
Movie Plot: A comedy about a 20-something woman based loosely on the outrageous number one best-selling book by Chelsea Handler.

Title: Life Unexpected
Movie Plot: After 15 years in foster homes, Lux decides to get emancipated, which leads to her meeting her birth parents.

Title: Intercept
Movie Plot: Four college students get roped into solving crimes when one of them creates a high-tech communication device that intercepts conversations throughout the West Coast.

Title: Childhood's End
Movie Plot: After peaceful aliens invade Earth, humanity finds itself living in a utopia under the indirect rule of the aliens, but does this utopia come at a price?

Title: Two/One
Movie Plot: Two men. Living on the exact opposite side of the world. When one sleeps, the other one is awake. But when they finally meet, a simple question arises: Who is the dream and who is the dreamer?

Title: Boomtown
Movie Plot: A young father and husband looks towards the oil fields for a better life for him and his family. But will the fast money and glamour detour his agenda?

Title: The Fugitive
Movie Plot: With the city in a state of panic and misinformation traveling at the speed of social media, Mike's life and family hang in the balance as he becomes - The Fugitive.

Title: Justified: City Primeval
Movie Plot: Series based on Elmore Leonard's novel "City Primeval: High Noon in Detroit."

Title: Vengeance
Movie Plot: A writer from New York City attempts to solve the murder of a girl he hooked up with and travels down south to investigate the circumstances of her death and discover what happened to her.

Title: Broken Flowers
Movie Plot: As the extremely withdrawn Don Johnston is dumped by his latest woman, he receives an anonymous letter from a former lover informing him that he has a son who may be looking for him. A freelance sleuth neighbor moves Don to embark on a cross-country search for his old flames in search of answers.

Title: Only Lovers Left Alive
Movie Plot: A depressed musician reunites with his lover. However, their romance, which has already endured several centuries, is disrupted by the arrival of her uncontrollable younger sister.

Title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
Movie Plot: An African-American Mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.

Title: Gimme Danger
Movie Plot: An in-depth look at legendary punk band The Stooges.

Title: Night on Earth
Movie Plot: An anthology of 5 different cab drivers in 5 American and European cities and their remarkable fares on the same eventful night.

Title: Down by Law
Movie Plot: Two men are framed and sent to jail, where they meet a murderer who helps them escape and leave the state.

Title: The Limits of Control
Movie Plot: The story of a mysterious loner, a stranger in the process of completing a criminal job.

Title: Stranger Than Paradise
Movie Plot: A New Yorker's life is thrown into a tailspin when his younger cousin surprise-visits him, starting a strange, unpredictable adventure.

Title: Dead Man
Movie Plot: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange Native American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

Title: Wonder Woman
Movie Plot: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

Title: Agent State Farm
Movie Plot: The origin story and heroics of Agent State Farm, an elite State Farm agent who goes to any length necessary to be the good neighbor the world needs.

Title: Willy McBean and His Magic Machine
Movie Plot: Little Willy McBean joins up with a Mexican monkey named Pablo to travel back in time and stop the evil Prof. von Rotten from changing history.

Title: The Daydreamer
Movie Plot: An anthology of fairytales by Hans Christian Andersen: "The Little Mermaid", "The Emperor's New Clothes", "Thumbelina", and "The Garden of Paradise".

Title: Tom and Jerry: Robin Hood and His Merry Mouse
Movie Plot: Robin Hood, a merry man who steals from the rich to give to the poor, has a new capable sidekick, Jerry. The evil king deduces, in his own words "brilliantly", that the best way to deal with this new threat is a cat, so he hires Tom.

Title: Tom and Jerry: Back to Oz
Movie Plot: With the Wicked Witch of the West now vanquished from Oz, Tom and Jerry along with Dorothy are back in Kansas! But not for long as an all-new villain has surfaced from beneath the magical land, the Gnome King! Having captured the Good Witch, the Gnome King and his army are wreaking havoc throughout Oz and need but one item to take control of The Emerald City, Dorothy's ruby slippers! It's up to our favorite cat and mouse duo to team up, go Back to Oz and save the land they love. Take to the skies, courtesy of the Wizard himself, with Dorothy, Toto, the Scarecrow, the Tin Man and the Lion as they make their magical journey. The laughs and adventure will roar as they encounter all-new frights and mischievous creatures down the Yellow Brick Road, 'cause "we're not in Kansas anymore!"

Title: Tom and Jerry: Spy Quest
Movie Plot: Two groups of classic cartoon characters come together in this fun-filled crossover with the popular action-adventure animated series Jonny Quest. Fans of all ages won't want to miss this heart-stopping adventure as tussling twosome Tom and Jerry join Jonny Quest and his pal Hadji and embark on a dangerous spy mission in order to save the world. It's just another day at the beach for the dueling Tom and Jerry ... until they bump into world-class junior spies Jonny Quest and Hadji and their canine companion, Bandit. When longtime Quest family nemesis Dr. Zin discovers that Jonny's father, Dr. Benton Quest, possesses a device that could solve the world's energy problems, Zin sends his evil cat army to steal it and capture Benton and his bodyguard, Race Bannon. That's when Jonny and his new furry friends spring into action! Get set for intrigue, thrills and suspense for the whole family. Tia Carrere and Tim Matheson lend their voices.

Title: Tom and Jerry in Shiver Me Whiskers
Movie Plot: A cat and a mouse must outsmart a band of pirates to find buried treasure.

Title: Tom and Jerry Meet Sherlock Holmes
Movie Plot: Miss Red is being blackmailed. When she asks Sherlock Holmes for help, he connects her case to a series of jewel thefts and tells his assistant Jerry the Mouse to work with Red's butler Tom the Cat for the duration of this case.

Title: Tom and Jerry's Giant Adventure
Movie Plot: Tom and Jerry are the faithful servants of Jack, the owner of a struggling storybook amusement park that gets a much-needed boost thanks to some mysterious magical beans

Title: Tom and Jerry: A Nutcracker Tale
Movie Plot: Tom and his army of stray cats take over Jerry's magical kingdom of living toys. Chased by Tom and his cronies, Jerry must find the Toymaker and get help to win his kingdom back before sunrise when the window of opportunity closes.

Title: Tom and Jerry Blast Off to Mars!
Movie Plot: While carrying on their usual chases, Tom and Jerry inadvertently stow-away on a spaceship bound for Mars.

Title: Tom and Jerry: The Magic Ring
Movie Plot: Tom is left in charge of a priceless magical ring by his young wizard master. He is then horrified when the ring gets stuck on Jerry's head, who then runs off into the city.

Title: Tom and Jerry: The Lost Dragon
Movie Plot: When Tom and Jerry find a strange egg in the forest & it hatches open to produce a baby dragon, they find themselves having to babysit the little critter.

Title: Tom and Jerry: The Fast and the Furry
Movie Plot: After wrecking their house during a chase, Tom and Jerry enter a race around the world where the winner gets a new fancy house.

Title: Tom and Jerry: The Movie
Movie Plot: Cat and mouse duo Tom and Jerry reluctantly work together to save a young girl from her evil aunt.

Title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
Movie Plot: The adaptation of Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs.

Title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
Movie Plot: A protege of the magician Merlin must train his teacher's successor - an introverted but resourceful physics prodigy - in the art of sorcery to prevent the return of Morgana le Fay.

Title: The Golden Compass
Movie Plot: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

Title: Mio in the Land of Faraway
Movie Plot: A lonely boy who is transferred from his dull life with his adoptive parents to the land where his real father is the King. In that country, he sets out on a quest, together with his new friend, to destroy the evil Knight Kato.

Title: Tomorrowland
Movie Plot: Bound by a shared destiny, a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.

Title: A Series of Unfortunate Events
Movie Plot: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

Title: The BFG
Movie Plot: An orphan little girl befriends a benevolent giant who takes her to Giant Country, where they attempt to stop the man-eating giants that are invading the human world.

Title: Nanny McPhee Returns
Movie Plot: Nanny McPhee arrives to help a harried young mother who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war, though she uses her magic to teach the woman's children and their two spoiled cousins five new lessons.

Title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
Movie Plot: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

Title: The Tourist
Movie Plot: Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.

Title: The Italian Job
Movie Plot: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

Title: The Transporter
Movie Plot: Frank Martin, who "transports" packages for unknown clients, is asked to move a package that soon begins moving, and complications arise.

Title: Lucy
Movie Plot: A woman, accidentally caught in a dark deal, turns the tables on her captors and transforms into a merciless warrior evolved beyond human logic.

Title: Death Race
Movie Plot: Ex-con Jensen Ames is forced by the warden of a notorious prison to compete in our post-industrial world's most popular sport: a car race in which inmates must brutalize and kill one another on the road to victory.

Title: The Dark Crystal
Movie Plot: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

Title: Labyrinth
Movie Plot: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

Title: The Witches
Movie Plot: A young boy stumbles onto a witch convention and must stop them, even after he has been turned into a mouse.

Title: The Black Cauldron
Movie Plot: A young boy and a group of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

Title: Short Circuit
Movie Plot: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

Title: The Powerpuff Girls
Movie Plot: Made from sugar, spice, everything nice and Chemical X by the Professor; Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup now use their superpowers and super cuteness to save the world (or at least Townsville) from evil villains and all things icky.

Title: The Snow Queen 3: Fire and Ice
Movie Plot: The rare gift of getting into all kinds of trouble is their family trait. What else can you expect from the ones raised among trolls in snowy lands? But now Kai and Gerda have grown up and entered a new stage - this time they are going to cause a global disaster...—Wizart Animation

Title: The Snow Queen 2
Movie Plot: Snow queen casts a curse on her mirror making people see the worst in themselves.

Title: The Wild Life
Movie Plot: A daring parrot recounts how Robinson Crusoe came to be stranded on a tropical island.

Title: Elena of Avalor
Movie Plot: Princess Elena has saved her magical kingdom, Avalor, from an evil sorceress and must learn to rule as its crown princess. Elena's adventures will lead her to understand that her new role requires thoughtfulness, resilience and compassion.

Title: Sonic Underground
Movie Plot: Sonic and his royal siblings seek to find their mother and defeat the tyrant, Robotnik.

Title: The Loud House Movie
Movie Plot: With his parents and all 10 sisters in tow, Lincoln Loud heads to Scotland and learns that royalty runs in the family in this global musical journey.

Title: The Snow Queen
Movie Plot: The Snow Queen created a world of eternal winter where the polar wind cools human souls. Years later, a girl named Gerda, her pet ferret Luta, and the troll Orm must save her brother Kai and the world.

Title: 'Twas the Night Before Christmas
Movie Plot: When a town learns that Santa Claus has struck it off his delivery schedule due to an insulting letter, a way must be found to change his mind.

Title: A Christmas Carol
Movie Plot: This is a TV special of Charles Dickens story 'A Christmas Carol.' It's an abridged version of Scrooge being visited by three ghosts. Original songs are by Maxwell Anderson and Bernard Herrman.

Title: Mr. Popper's Penguins
Movie Plot: The life of a businessman begins to change after he inherits six penguins, and as he transforms his apartment into a winter wonderland, his professional side starts to unravel.

Title: Santa Claus: The Movie
Movie Plot: The legend of Santa Claus is put in jeopardy when an unscrupulous toy manufacturer attempts to take over Christmas.

Title: One Magic Christmas
Movie Plot: An angel must show a mother the true meaning of Christmas. It's not just presents and materialistic things, but the people she cares about too.

Title: The Farmer and the Belle: Saving Santaland
Movie Plot: Sparks fly between a famous model and a farmer with a young daughter when she visits her childhood home. The town is in danger of losing their beloved Santaland festival, but miracles can happen with a little love, family, and faith.

Title: Christmas Comes to Willow Creek
Movie Plot: Willow Creek, Alaska, is going through a depression because the local cannery has shut down putting many of the residents out of work. Ray and Pete are truck-driving brothers, different as day and night, who are hired by an old friend to bring Christmas presents and one huge surprise from sunny California up to there. Along the way, Ray, Pete, and the latter's son, Michael, argue and get stuck in a blizzard, but they finally reconcile with each other.—Jeff Olsen

Title: Mrs. Santa Claus
Movie Plot: Neglected by her husband during the pre-Christmas rush, Mrs. Claus (Dame Angela Lansbury) takes the reindeer and sleigh out for a drive, only to end up stranded in the multicultural neighborhood of Manhattan's Lower East Side of the early 1900s.—Stewart M. Clamen <clamen@cs.cmu.edu>

Title: Angels in the Snow
Movie Plot: When nothing short of a miracle can hold a deteriorating family together, a Christmas getaway sets the stage for a miracle to occur. A heartwarming family story of love, loss and rediscovery.

Title: It Came Upon the Midnight Clear
Movie Plot: Mickey Rooney plays Mike Halligan, a retired cop from Manhattan living in California with his family who decides to show his grandson, who has never seen snow before, what a real white Christmas in New York is like. But he dies from a sudden heart attack in which Halligan makes a deal with the Archangel of Heaven to return to Earth for a week until Christmas and show his grandson the seasonal glories of New York City.—Anonymous

Title: The Slipper and the Rose: The Story of Cinderella
Movie Plot: A musical retelling of the classic tale of Cinderella. In the tiny kingdom of Euphrania, the King and his court are anxious to get Prince Edward wed. But Edward wants to marry for love.

Title: Nutcracker
Movie Plot: The colorful holiday classic is brought to the big screen, designed by famed children's story author and artist Maurice Sendak, and written to be as close to the original story. Based on the Pacific Northwest Ballet's original production.

Title: A Christmas Memory
Movie Plot: Seven year old Buddy experiences the best of country life, friendship, and the joy of giving during the Christmas season. Based on the story by Truman Capote.

Title: A Christmas Snow
Movie Plot: A woman refuses to celebrate Christmas because of her father abandoning his family during the holiday.

Title: A Box of Faith
Movie Plot: Alone and on her own, sixteen-year-old Dior figures out how to survive on the streets by the stroke of a spiritual pen.

Title: The Girl Who Believes in Miracles
Movie Plot: When young Sara hears a preacher say that faith can move mountains, she starts praying. Suddenly, people in her town are mysteriously healed--but fame soon takes its toll.

Title: I Believe
Movie Plot: A 9-year-old boy experiences God's power in a supernatural way.

Title: The R.M.
Movie Plot: Jared Phelps (Kirby Heyborne) has completed two years of full-time missionary service for The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. His mission president has promised him that he will be blessed for his service, and he thinks he has it all worked out. His girlfriend has waited for him. His boss promised that he could have his old job back, and he has already sent his application to BYU. Everything that can go wrong does go wrong. His girlfriend dumps him. His loses his job, and he isn't accepted to BYU. Then, it gets even worse, and he has to decide if choosing the right is worth all the trouble.—Erin Howarth

Title: What If...
Movie Plot: Ben Walker is allowed to see how different his life would be if he had followed his heart.

Title: Once I Was a Beehive
Movie Plot: After losing her father to cancer, a teenage girl reluctantly joins her new stepcousin at a summer camp for Latter-day Saint (Mormon) girls.

Title: Heaven Is for Real
Movie Plot: A small-town father must find the courage and conviction to share his son's extraordinary, life-changing experience with the world.

Title: The Healing Garden
Movie Plot: An aging military chaplain and a young girl from a broken home join forces to plant a miracle garden touched by God. "The Healing Garden" is a faith-based film, laced with warmth and comedy. It celebrates the healing of families and communities through faith.

Title: The Colours of Infinity
Movie Plot: Arthur C. Clarke presents this unusual documentary on the mathematical discovery of the Mandelbrot Set (M-Set) in the visually spectacular world of fractal geometry. This show relates the science of the M-Set to nature in a way that seems to identify the hand of God in the design of the universe itself. Dr. Mandelbrot in 1980 discovered the infinitely complex geometrical shape called the Mandelbrot Set using a very simple equation with computers and graphics.—Sid Dithers <sid@dithers.com>

Title: Forgiven
Movie Plot: When Lieutenant Morgan (Kevin Sorbo) and his armed force arrive on the scene of a church hostage situation, James (Casey Fuller) weighs his options for an escape while Elizabeth (Jenn Gotzon) makes saving his life her mission.

Title: Pardoned by Grace
Movie Plot: The life of Scott Highberger, a Michigan City, Indiana pastor. Before he practiced religion he was strung out.

Title: I Can Only Imagine
Movie Plot: The inspiring and unknown true story behind MercyMe's beloved, chart topping song that brings ultimate hope to so many is a gripping reminder of the power of true forgiveness.

Title: The New Lassie
Movie Plot: The further adventures of the heroic Collie dog.

Title: Lassie
Movie Plot: A family in financial crisis is forced to sell Lassie, their beloved dog. Hundreds of miles away from her true family, Lassie escapes and sets out on a journey home.

Title: Dear Brigitte
Movie Plot: Professor Leaf, an absent-minded poet, is forced to face the fact that his son is a math prodigy who is as colorblind as he's in love with Brigitte Bardot, the French bombshell.

Title: Lassie
Movie Plot: When a family of 4 moves from Baltimore to a farm in rural Virginia, they adopt an abandoned collie. The dog becomes the son's companion and protector, helping him adapt to rural life.

Title: Lassie
Movie Plot: The ongoing saga of the Martin family and their beloved collie, Lassie.

Title: Lassie: A New Beginning
Movie Plot: The Stratton kids, Samantha and Chip, and their grandmother Ada. drive to "visit" their uncle Stuart. Grandma collapses and dies in a strange town, leaving the kids and Lassie on their own.

Title: Lassie's Great Adventure
Movie Plot: While in Canada Timmy and Lassie encounter a downed hot air ballonist. By accident they end up in the balloon which takes them into the wilderness. The young boy and his dog must find a way to survive even fending off a wild pig.

Title: Lassie Come Home
Movie Plot: After her destitute family is forced to sell her, a collie named Lassie escapes from her new owner and begins the long trek from Scotland to her Yorkshire home.

Title: Courage of Lassie
Movie Plot: Academy Award-winner Elizabeth Taylor stars in this touching family drama about a young girl who rehabilitates an Army's shell-shocked collie.

Title: The Magic School Bus
Movie Plot: An eccentric teacher takes her class on wondrous educational field trips with the help of a magic school bus.

Title: Reading Rainbow
Movie Plot: Levar Burton introduces young viewers to illustrated readings of children's literature and explores their related subjects.

Title: Arthur
Movie Plot: Based on the books by Marc Brown, these are the adventures of Arthur, an 8-year-old aardvark, and his family and friends as they grow up and learn how to be good neighbors to one another.

Title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
Movie Plot: Fred Rogers explores various topics for young viewers through presentations and music, both in his world and in the Neighborhood of Make-Believe.

Title: Dragon Tales
Movie Plot: Two children find a dragonscale, and have fun socializing with dragons.

Title: Beakman's World
Movie Plot: A wacky scientist and his companions answer viewer questions about science.

Title: Blue's Clues
Movie Plot: Blue is a puppy who puts her paw prints on three clues. Steve or Joe has to deduce the clues (with the help of off-screen children) to figure out what Blue wants to do.

Title: VeggieTales
Movie Plot: Bob the Tomato, Larry The Cucumber, and their friends teach Christian and Bible-based lessons in a fun way.

Title: Schoolhouse Rock!
Movie Plot: A series of shorts illustrating various songs that teach multiplication tables, grammar, science, American history, computers, economics, and environmentalism.

Title: Sesame Street
Movie Plot: On a special inner city street, the inhabitants, human and muppet, teach preschool subjects with comedy, cartoons, games, and songs.

Title: Wishbone
Movie Plot: An intelligent and witty dog imagines himself in the role of characters from classic books and gets involved in similar real-life adventures.

Title: Clifford the Big Red Dog
Movie Plot: The adventures of a larger-than-life red dog on Bridwell Island.

Title: Summer Magic
Movie Plot: A Bostonian widow moves with her kids to the country.

Title: The Moon-Spinners
Movie Plot: A teenager encounters romance, intrigue and a search for stolen jewels during her visit to the island of Crete.

Title: Swiss Family Robinson
Movie Plot: A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.

Title: That Darn Cat!
Movie Plot: After a kidnapped bank teller uses a neighbor's wandering cat to send an S.O.S., the F.B.I. assigns a cat-allergic Agent to the case.

Title: In Search of the Castaways
Movie Plot: In 19th century England, young Mary Grant and her brother, Robert, embark on a dangerous quest to find their missing father, a sea captain who vanished somewhere along the Chilean coast.

Title: Pollyanna
Movie Plot: Wealthy, impossible to please lady Polly, whom only gardener Tom's irresistibly charming, indomitably cheerful son Tim, the chauffeur-handyman, can handle, grudgingly lets her late sister's orphaned daughter Pollyanna (11) move into her grand home. The staff take to the playful child, who finds the grimly stern dignified house regime stifling, but often gets round it. The happy game Pollyanna's father taught her soon spreads friendship and joy in the village. After succeeding to adopt a stray cat and dog, she sets her mind to 'fellow orphan' Jimmy Bean. Finding recluse rich neighbour Pendleton with a broken leg and another accident starts a cascade involving his and her family's past.—KGF Vissers

Title: The Absent Minded Professor
Movie Plot: A college professor invents an anti-gravity substance which a corrupt businessman wants for himself.

Title: Old Yeller
Movie Plot: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive. First thought to be good-for-nothing mutt, Old Yeller is soon beloved by all.

Title: The Shaggy Dog
Movie Plot: A teenage boy is cursed with periodically turning into a sheepdog.

Title: Pollyanna
Movie Plot: Elizabeth Archard plays the overly optimistic orphan, Pollyanna, in this timeless heart-warming BBC mini-series based on the best-selling novel and classic child literature by Eleanor Porter. Pollyanna goes to live with her lonely, bitter old Aunt Polly (Elaine Stritch) after the death of her beloved father. Despite being paralyzed in a horrible accident, her sunny nature and determination to look on the brighter side of life has an astonishing effect on the lives of everyone she encounters, including an old hermit (Donald Bisset), an orphaned boy (Stephen Galloway), and her doctor (Paul Maxwell). Will all the people whose lives she's brightened be able to make her happy again?

Title: Ernest Goes to Camp
Movie Plot: Ernest, a lovable loser who works as a summer camp handyman and dreams of becoming a guidance councilor, must find a way to inspire a group of juvenile delinquents as well as stop a shady strip mining company from closing the camp.

Title: Pollyanna
Movie Plot: An orphan's optimistic outlook brings a change to the ill-tempered town in which she resides to her aunt.

Title: Ernest Goes to Jail
Movie Plot: Ernest P. Worrell is a bank janitor sent to jail when people mistake his identity for a look-alike.

Title: Ernest Scared Stupid
Movie Plot: Ernest accidentally unleashes an ugly troll that plots to transform children into wooden dolls in the town of Briarville, Missouri.

Title: Ernest Goes to School
Movie Plot: Jim Varney's recurring dim-bulb character Ernest P. Worrell returns in this film as a school maintenance man seeking to obtain a high school diploma.

Title: Ernest in the Army
Movie Plot: Ernest joins the Army reserves so he can drive the bigrigs, but ends up being sent into combat!

Title: Ernest Rides Again
Movie Plot: Buffoonish Ernest and his dimwitted pal Abner unearth a huge cannon reputed to contain the crown jewels of England.

Title: Ernest Goes to Africa
Movie Plot: Diamond smugglers kidnap the girl of his dreams, and Ernest P. Worrell goes to Africa to confront them and rescue her.

Title: Slam Dunk Ernest
Movie Plot: Ernest P. Worrell becomes a basketball star after an angel bearing an uncanny resemblance to Kareem Abdul-Jabbar gives him a pair of magic sneakers.—Anonymous

Title: Ernest Goes to Splash Mountain
Movie Plot: Ernest P. Worrell becomes the world's first "Splashronaut", when he volunteers to be the first person to ride Disneyland's Splash Mountain.

Title: Hey, Vern, It's Ernest!
Movie Plot: Hey, Vern. Ernest is on Saturday morning. The series follows Ernest, and several other colorful characters having all sorts of wacky fun.

Title: Ernest's Greatest Hits Volume 2
Movie Plot: A reel of more Ernest commercials.

Title: The Beverly Hillbillies
Movie Plot: Nice guy redneck Jed Clampett strikes it rich when he finds black oil. He and his kin move to posh Beverly Hills.

Title: Fred Claus
Movie Plot: Fred Claus, Santa's bitter older brother, is forced to move to the North Pole to help Santa and the elves prepare for Christmas in exchange for cash.

Title: The Christmas Chronicles: Part Two
Movie Plot: Kate Pierce, now a cynical teen, is unexpectedly reunited with Santa Claus when a mysterious troublemaker threatens to cancel Christmas--forever.

Title: Pete's Dragon
Movie Plot: The adventures of an orphaned boy named Pete and his best friend Elliott, who happens to be a dragon.

Title: Jack Frost
Movie Plot: A father who can't keep his promises is killed in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman who has the final chance to put things right with his son before he is gone forever.

Title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
Movie Plot: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

Title: The Rescuers
Movie Plot: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

Title: Oliver & Company
Movie Plot: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York City.

Title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
Movie Plot: In this collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A.A. Milne, Winnie the Pooh, a honey-loving teddy bear, embarks on some eccentric adventures.

Title: Muppets Now
Movie Plot: As a brand-new Muppet series get ready for streaming, Scooter rushes to deliver the episodes -- navigating obstacles, distractions, and complications that the rest of the Muppet gang throws at him.

Title: The Muppet Show
Movie Plot: Kermit the Frog and his fellow Muppets put on a vaudeville show at their theatre, bringing in a famous celebrity to help out for each episode.

Title: The Christmas Toy
Movie Plot: The toys in the playroom of the Jones household magically come to life when their owners aren't looking. On Christmas Eve, as the toys eagerly await the arrival of a new toy, Rugby the tiger plots to make sure he remains the favorite toy.

Title: MuppeTelevision
Movie Plot: An anthology show featuring the work of the great puppeteer and his staff.

Title: Emmet Otter's Jug-Band Christmas
Movie Plot: A poor otter family risks everything for the chance to win the cash prize of a talent contest for Christmas.

Title: The Muppets Valentine Show
Movie Plot: The Muppets Valentine show was the first of the two specials for The Muppet Show. Valentine on ABC in 1974.

Title: Follow That Bird
Movie Plot: Big Bird is sent to live far from Sesame Street by a pesky social worker named Miss Finch. Unhappy, he runs away from there, prompting the rest of the Sesame Street gang to go on a cross-country journey to find him.

Title: The Muppets: A Celebration of 30 Years
Movie Plot: Kermit the Frog and all his friends celebrate 30 years of master puppeteer and producer Jim Henson's extraordinary media franchise.

Title: Muppets Haunted Mansion
Movie Plot: On Halloween night, Gonzo is challenged to spend one night in The Haunted Mansion.

Title: The Muppets Mayhem
Movie Plot: Follow The Muppets' band as they try to record their first ever album.

Title: Rocky Mountain Holiday with John Denver and the Muppets
Movie Plot: The Muppets join John Denver for a holiday camping trip in the Rocky Mountains of Colorado.

Title: The Muppets Go to the Movies
Movie Plot: Along with Dudley Moore and Lily Tomlin, the Muppets spoof classic movies such as "The Wizard of Oz," "Casablanca," and even artsy Ingmar Bergman movies. They also promote their then-upcoming film "The Great Muppet Caper."

Title: The Muppets Celebrate Jim Henson
Movie Plot: While The Muppets prepare a tribute to the late Jim Henson, they learn about the life and career of the renowned puppeteer/film maker.

Title: Father Knows Best: Home for Christmas
Movie Plot: The original cast of "Father Knows Best" returns for the second reunion movie. After learning that none of the children will be home for Christmas, Jim and Margaret decide to sell their house.

Title: The Honeymooners
Movie Plot: A bus driver and his sewer worker friend struggle to strike it rich while their wives look on with weary patience.

Title: The Father Knows Best Reunion
Movie Plot: First of two reunion movies starring the original cast of the popular 1950's series "Father Knows Best." Jim and Margaret Anderson invite their children and grandchildren for a visit to celebrate their wedding anniversary.

Title: My Favorite Martian
Movie Plot: An exoanthropologist from the planet Mars, stranded on Earth, is rescued by Tim O'Hara, a newspaper reporter who introduces the Martian to his friends and the authorities as his uncle Martin.

Title: Gilligan's Island
Movie Plot: Four men and three women are stranded on an uncharted island following a torrential storm.

Title: Captain Kangaroo
Movie Plot: Daily children's program hosted by Captain Kangaroo.

Title: The Real McCoys
Movie Plot: From the hills of West Virginia, Amos McCoy moves his family to an inherited farm in California. Grandpa Amos is quick to give advice to his three grandchildren and wonders how his neighbors ever managed without him around.

Title: The Brady Bunch
Movie Plot: The misadventures of a large family united when a widower and a widow marry.

Title: The Beverly Hillbillies
Movie Plot: A nouveau-riche hillbilly family moves to Beverly Hills and shakes up the privileged society with their hayseed ways.

Title: Mister Ed
Movie Plot: The misadventures of a wisecracking talking horse and his human owner.

Title: Green Acres
Movie Plot: A New York City attorney and his wife attempt to live as genteel farmers in the bizarre community of Hooterville.

Title: Bewitched
Movie Plot: A witch married to an ordinary man cannot resist using her magic powers to solve the problems her family faces.

Title: I Love Lucy
Movie Plot: The wife of a band leader constantly tries to become a star - in spite of her having no talent, and gets herself (along with her best friend) into the funniest predicaments.

Title: Happy Days
Movie Plot: The Cunningham family live through the 1950s with help and guidance from lovable and almost superhuman greaser Fonzie.

Title: Sky King
Movie Plot: Fly plane... Bust bad guys... Fuss with niece and nephew... Eat Peter Pan Peanut Butter... Dat's it!

Title: The New Leave It to Beaver
Movie Plot: The continuing adventures of the "now adult" Beaver Cleaver, his family, and their friends.

Title: Dennis the Menace
Movie Plot: Good-natured, 6 y.o. Dennis is a menace to his parents and especially to his neighbor, Mr. Wilson. He has adventures with his friends and dog, Ruff. Each episode has 3 6-10 min. stories.

Title: Dennis the Menace
Movie Plot: When his parents must go out of town on business, Dennis stays with Mr. and Mrs. Wilson. He is driving Mr. Wilson crazy, but he is just trying to be helpful, even to the thief who has arrived in town.

Title: The Munsters
Movie Plot: A family of friendly monsters have misadventures, never quite understanding why people react to them so strangely.

Title: Flipper
Movie Plot: Ranger Porter Ricks is responsible for the animal and human life in Coral Key Park, Florida. Stories center on his 15-year-old son Sandy and 10-year-old Bud and, especially, on their pet dolphin Flipper.

Title: Laverne & Shirley
Movie Plot: The misadventures of two single women in the 1950s and '60s.

Title: The Carol Burnett Show
Movie Plot: Television show featuring skits by Carol Burnett and her comedy troupe.

Title: The Waltons
Movie Plot: The life and trials of a 1930s and 1940s Virginia mountain family through financial depression and World War II.

Title: Billie
Movie Plot: A 16-year-old tomboy and high school athlete finds herself caught between being beating boys at sports and having a boyfriend, while her conservative father opposes women's rights in his campaign for mayor.

Title: Bachelor Father
Movie Plot: The misadventures of a single adoptive father raising a teenage niece with the help of his manservant.

Title: Family Affair
Movie Plot: Bill's comfortable lifestyle must change when he receives a group of unexpected long-term guests.

Title: The Partridge Family
Movie Plot: The humorous adventures of a family of pop musicians.

Title: Room 222
Movie Plot: Teacher Pete Dixon tries to teach the students at Walt Whitman High to be tolerant. He's assisted by girlfriend and school counselor, Liz and student teacher (later teacher) Alice. The students love him.

Title: The Jetsons
Movie Plot: The misadventures of a futuristic family.

Title: I Dream of Jeannie... Fifteen Years Later
Movie Plot: Instead of retiring from NASA, Tony takes on another space mission. Upset, Jeannie decides to move out and takes their 15 year old boy, T.J. with her.

Title: The Flintstones
Movie Plot: The misadventures of two modern-day Stone Age families, the Flintstones and the Rubbles.

Title: The Little Drummer Boy Book II
Movie Plot: Aaron, the drummer boy, struggles to protect a bellmaker's great silver bells from seizure by Roman soldiers.

Title: The Most Beautiful
Movie Plot: World War II film about female volunteer workers at an optics plant who do their best to meet production targets.

Title: Nestor, the Long-Eared Christmas Donkey
Movie Plot: An outcast donkey in Roman era Judea with overlong ears finds his destiny on the way to Bethlehem.

Title: Cricket on the Hearth
Movie Plot: A cricket seeks to rescue a poor toymaker and his blind daughter from an exploitative miser.

Title: The Easter Bunny Is Comin' to Town
Movie Plot: The Mailman decides to stop another deluge of letters by answering questions about the Easter Bunny: Sunny, a baby rabbit found and adopted by Kidville (a town of only kids--even a kid mailman). And when Sunny goes delivering eggs to the nearby town (which he has to dye to fool Gadzooks, the mean bear on the mountain), he discovers that there are no kids in the town, and that the rightful (kid) ruler is being suppressed by his aunt. But the young king likes Sunny's dyed eggs and jelly beans. So Kidville, with the help of an old train engine, makes a few plans (and a decoy chocolate rabbit) to distribute them.—Kathy Li

Title: Pinocchio's Christmas
Movie Plot: It's Pinocchio's first Christmas, and he sells the book Geppetto gives him for present money, but Cat and Fox trick him out of it.

Title: You're in Love, Charlie Brown
Movie Plot: With the help of Linus and Peppermint Patty, Charlie Brown tries to pluck up the courage to talk to his crush, the Little Red-Haired Girl.

Title: He's Your Dog, Charlie Brown
Movie Plot: When Snoopy is sent back to the puppy farm for obedience training, he free-loads at Peppermint Patty's instead.

Title: It's the Easter Beagle, Charlie Brown!
Movie Plot: The Peanuts gang prepare for Easter in their own clumsy ways.

Title: A Boy Named Charlie Brown
Movie Plot: Charlie Brown makes his way to the national spelling bee finals.

Title: You're Not Elected, Charlie Brown
Movie Plot: Linus runs for school president with Lucy and Charlie Brown being his campaign managers.

Title: The First Christmas: The Story of the First Christmas Snow
Movie Plot: A young shepherd, Lucas (David Kelley), is blinded by lightning, and some kindly nuns at a nearby abbey take him in. Sister Catherine (Iris Rainer) describes snow to Lucas, who has never seen it. Lucas gets chosen to play an angel in the abbey's Christmas pageant, and the Christmas snow that falls during the pageant works a small miracle.—Kathy Li

Title: Annabelle's Wish
Movie Plot: A mute boy and a calf with the ability to speak form a deep friendship, learning what it means to love and sacrifice for another.

Title: Hamtaro
Movie Plot: The story of hamsters who get together at meetings to talk about their adventures.

Title: Yogi's First Christmas
Movie Plot: Yogi, Boo Boo and Cindy are awakened from hibernation and join their friends' Christmas activities while interfering with two villains' efforts to ruin the holiday.

Title: ARQ
Movie Plot: Trapped in a lab and stuck in a time loop, a disoriented couple fends off masked raiders while harboring a new energy source that could save humanity.

Title: Santa Buddies
Movie Plot: The Buddies remind Santa Paws' feisty son, Puppy Paws, about the true meaning of Christmas.

Title: I Am Mother
Movie Plot: In the wake of humanity's extinction, a teenage girl is raised by a robot designed to repopulate the earth. But their unique bond is threatened when an inexplicable stranger arrives with alarming news.

Title: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer
Movie Plot: Santa and his sleigh crash into some trees while attempting to deliver presents on a foggy Christmas Eve. Rudolph is enlisted to lead the sleigh and is hailed as a hero.

Title: Mickey's Magical Christmas: Snowed in at the House of Mouse
Movie Plot: Mickey and all his friends hold their own Christmas party at the House of Mouse, after being snowed in.

Title: Anon
Movie Plot: In a world without anonymity or crime, a detective meets a woman who threatens their security.

Title: Oxygen
Movie Plot: A woman wakes in a cryogenic chamber with no recollection of how she got there. As she's running out of oxygen, she must rebuild her memory to find a way out of her nightmare.

Title: Time Trap
Movie Plot: A professor enters a cave and goes missing. Some of his students come looking for him and get trapped in the cave as well.

Title: In the Shadow of the Moon
