Title: Dude, Where's My Car?
Movie Plot: Two potheads wake up after a night of partying and cannot remember where they parked their car.

Title: Heavy Metal
Movie Plot: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

Title: Termination
Movie Plot: Six short stories about space, inter-dimensional threat, and murder told by storytellers all over the world.

Title: Independence Day: Resurgence
Movie Plot: Two decades after the first Independence Day invasion, Earth is faced with a new extra-Solar threat. But will mankind's new space defenses be enough?

Title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
Movie Plot: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

Title: Dumb and Dumber To
Movie Plot: 20 years since their first adventure, Lloyd and Harry go on a road trip to find Harry's newly discovered daughter, who was given up for adoption.

Title: Scary Movie
Movie Plot: A year after disposing of the body of a man they accidentally killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.

Title: Back to the Future... The Ride
Movie Plot: Sitting in a flying DeLorean, the audience gets rocked when traveling through several times.

Title: Rick and Morty: C-132
Movie Plot: Short film that teases a fictional live-action "Rick and Morty" Trough a portal, Rick and Morty reach a live-action dimension and try to get back home. It uses scenes from the show and audio clips from "Back to the Future".

Title: Back to the 2015 Future
Movie Plot: Marty McFly (Tyler Dunivan) meets his son Devin McFly, who help fix the Time Machine. On the way he meets cast members of the Back to the Future series. He finds himself out of time.

Title: Hitch
Movie Plot: A smooth-talking man falls for a hardened columnist while helping a shy accountant woo a beautiful heiress.

Title: Spider-Man 2: Another World
Movie Plot: Leaping off of the events of Lost Cause, an experienced Spider-Man must grapple with the guilt of sectioning his old friend Eddie Brock and dealing with the aftermath of an unchained Oscorp.

Title: The Collective
Movie Plot: A young recruit to a mysterious agency of assassins finds himself going rogue on his first assignment, tracking down a dangerous group of human traffickers.

Title: Spider-Man: Cake Day
Movie Plot: On his girlfriend's birthday, Peter Parker's day gets more and more hectic as he deals with bank robbers and getting Mary Jane's cake.

Title: Batman: Dead End
Movie Plot: The Joker has escaped from Arkham and Batman must once again bring him in - once and for all. Unfortunately for the bat, there is something even more sinister than the Joker waiting in the alley for the dark knight detective..

Title: Meg 2: The Trench
Movie Plot: A research team encounters multiple threats while exploring the depths of the ocean, including a malevolent mining operation.

Title: River Wild
Movie Plot: Follows a pair of siblings who love but distrust each other as they embark on a white-water rafting trip with a small group. One of their friends from childhood turns out to be more dangerous than he appears.

Title: Destination Truth
Movie Plot: A globe-trekking reality show that follows Josh Gates around the world as he explores different sites of supernatural import.

Title: Tales from the Explorers Club
Movie Plot: It showcases the headquarters of the legendary Explorers Club to relive the epic adventures of members who have pushed the bounds of human possibility.

Title: Expedition Unknown
Movie Plot: An archeologist travels around the world looking for unknown and missing artifacts from throughout time.

Title: Expedition X
Movie Plot: Josh Gates sends scientist Phil Torres and paranormal researcher Jessica Chobot to investigate supernatural encounters, mysterious creatures, and astonishing extraterrestrial phenomena, taking viewers to the stranger side of the unknown.

Title: Fact or Faked: Paranormal Files

Movie Plot: Jack Osbourne and paranormal researcher Katrina Weidman search for ghosts.

Movie Plot: There are some places on earth where the land just seems different, and Blind Frog Ranch in eastern Utah is one of those places. Locals say the land is cursed. That it's trying to hold on to something.

Movie Plot: Deleted scenes cut from the film, 'Back to the Future Part II'.

Title: The Traveler
Movie Plot: A mysterious young man with the ability to time travel attempts to solve the disappearance of a loved one.

Title: Back to the Future Part III: Deleted Scene
Movie Plot: Deleted scene cut from the film, 'Back to the Future Part III'.

Movie Plot: Miami detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett must face off against a mother-and-son pair of drug lords who wreak vengeful havoc on their city.

Movie Plot: An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.

Movie Plot: A documentary about the making of Coppola's 1993 film.

Movie Plot: The life and legacy of Marlon Brando and how he changed acting.

Movie Plot: A sadistic warden asks a former pro quarterback, now serving time in his prison, to put together a team of inmates to take on (and get pummeled by) the guards.

Movie Plot: Oscar-winning producer Albert S. Ruddy's never-before-revealed experiences of making The Godfather (1972).

Title: Analyze That
Movie Plot: Mobster Paul Vitti is released into Dr. Ben Sobol's care, where only more chaos ensues.

Title: Analyze This: Gag Reel
Movie Plot: A gag reel for Analyze This.

Title: Love Story
Movie Plot: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.

Title: Analyze This
Movie Plot: A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number-one patient is an insecure mob boss.

Title: Righteous Kill
Movie Plot: Two veteran New York City detectives work on a case of serial executions of criminals who escaped justice.

Title: 15 Minutes
Movie Plot: A homicide detective and a fire marshal must stop a pair of murderers who commit videotaped crimes to become media darlings.

Movie Plot: The story of Carl Brashear, the first African-American U.S. Navy Diver, and the man who trained him.

Movie Plot: Gennaro lives with his ailing grandpa, who sits outside holding tight to his last quarter. But grandpa's not ready to die, he has some unfinished business with a woman from his past and he enlists Gennaro to act as his emissary.

Movie Plot: A documentary examining the decade of the 1970s as a turning point in American cinema. Some of today's best filmmakers interview the influential directors of that time.

They share their time between home, criminal underworlds, and their secret headquarter on Prince Street.—Steve Richer <sricher@sympatico.ca>

Her investigation also brings her into a mutual attraction with the small-town police chief who shares her investigation.—John Sacksteder <jsackste@bellsouth.net>

Movie Plot: LAPD officer Forney serves double duty supervising four widely differing parolees living in a half-way house. He tries to get them jobs; they try to help him solve crimes.

Movie Plot: An unmarried 18 year-old Amish girl is charged with the murder of her infant child.

Title: Man on Fire
Movie Plot: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

Title: American Gangster
Movie Plot: Follows the lives of American gangsters.

Title: The Book of Eli
Movie Plot: A drifter fights his way across a ravaged, post-apocalyptic America while protecting a sacred book that holds the secrets to humanity's salvation.

Title: The Butterfly Effect 2
Movie Plot: Nick Larson discovers a supernatural way to alter his life and travel back in time to key moments in his life by looking at photographs.

Movie Plot: An impulsive braggart takes a shy law student with him for a two-day road trip from Rome to Tuscany.

Title: Un borghese piccolo piccolo
Movie Plot: A meek middle-aged man finally takes justice into his own hands.

Title: Viva Italia!
Movie Plot: Several episodes depicting Italian's life in short humoristic stories.

Movie Plot: A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

Tokugawa Ieyasu sends his trusted samurai Mayeda, and his son Yourimune, to Spain. There, they are to purchase five thousand muskets. But it's a dangerous journey, and there are many who plot against them, and when they finally arrive in Spain, nothing goes the way they expected.—Mattias Pettersson <seaman@sbbs.se>

Movie Plot: A young officer, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friends," escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

Movie Plot: Ian Struan Dunross is chairman of Struan and Company, the oldest and largest trading company between Britain and East Asia.

Movie Plot: Ogami is hired to kill a tattooed female assassin. Gunbei Yagyu, an enemy samurai, happens upon Ogami's son, and sees his chance for revenge.

Movie Plot: A strikingly beautiful young woman is trained from birth to be a deadly instrument of revenge against the swindlers who destroyed her family.

Movie Plot: A samurai goes to extraordinary lengths to provide for his family.

Movie Plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

Movie Plot: A group of assassins come together for a suicide mission to kill an evil lord.

Title: Bandidos

Movie Plot: A soldier suffering from combat fatigue meets a young woman on Christmas furlough from prison and their mutual loneliness blossoms into romance.

Title: Angels in the Outfield

Title: The Red Pony
Movie Plot: A ranch boy is gifted with a colt, grows to love him but the colt escapes, with tragic results.

Title: Roots: The Next Generations

Movie Plot: An adaptation of Alex Haley's "Roots." Chronicles the history of an African man and his descendants sold into slavery in America.

As Queen grows up, she faces the struggle of trying to fit into the troubled world around her. She tries passing for white, but it leads to sorrow in post-Civil War America. Everywhere she goes, she faces obstacles and hardships while searching for happiness and a place to belong.—Anonymous

Title: Holocaust

Title: Locks

Movie Plot: Frigga, who tries to balance her risky job as a security manager in the Kiirunavaara mine with her family life, has to fight for her life and the lives of her loved ones when her city starts collapsing into the mine.

Movie Plot: People married and divorced, loved and lost. Murder, illicit passion, insanity, and secrets were the staples of Peyton Place.

Title: Rich Man, Poor Man - Book II

He then begins a vendetta with a man, who tried to take over the company of an old friend. Unfortunately for him, he has no evidence against him and the man is not about to let Rudy off the hook. He also has to deal with his step-son, Billy. And Falconetti, has been released from prison and is looking to get back at Rudy.—<rcs0411@yahoo.com>

Title: Lou Grant
Movie Plot: The trials of a former television station manager, turned newspaper city editor, and his journalist staff.

Title: Baretta
Movie Plot: The cases of maverick undercover New York City detective Tony Baretta (Robert Blake).

Movie Plot: A group of passengers on a plane deal with the beginning stages of the apocalypse.

Title: The Walking Dead: Hexagone
Movie Plot: After a post-apocalyptic epidemic that has transformed almost the entire French and world population into living dead, a group of family and friends decide to leave the city by heading for the south-east of France hoping to survive.

Title: Fear the Walking Dead: The Althea Tapes
Movie Plot: Web companion series to Fear the Walking Dead, focusing on the recordings made by the character Althea.

Title: The Lionheart
Movie Plot: Dan Wheldon, a two-time Indianapolis 500 champion, died on the track, shocking the world of motorsports to its very core. Ten years later, Sebastian and Oliver Wheldon continue their father's practice.

Title: Devil's Men
Movie Plot: The horrors of war through the eyes of a real WWII soldier, Sam Byrne was a Wyoming ranch boy who was drafted and went off to war to do his duty, in spite of the fact that he didn't want to "haf'ta kill unless I really haf'ta."

Title: Little Wing
Movie Plot: Follows a 13-year-old girl who is dragged into the world of pigeon racing as she deals with her parents' divorce and the impending loss of her home.

Title: The Walking Dead: The Journey So Far
Movie Plot: From the moment Rick wakes up in the hospital, all the way to the last moments of season 6, the story of 'The Walking Dead' is told by those who have lived it.

Title: Jonah
Movie Plot: A journalist's repressed childhood trauma surfaces during an investigation into a mother who claims that her son was abducted by aliens.

Title: Rudy
Movie Plot: Set in the heart of rural England, Rudy finds her relationship with her father being tested.

Title: Manhunt
Movie Plot: The aftermath of the first American presidential assassination and the fight to preserve and protect the ideals that were the foundation of Lincoln's Reconstruction plans.

Title: Sweet Sue
Movie Plot: A woman back on the dating scene embarks on a relationship with a mysterious biker at her brother's funeral, whose son turns out to be a social media influencer.

Title: Frida
Movie Plot: A raw and magical journey into the life of iconic artist Frida Kahlo, told through her own words from diaries, letters, essays, and interviews. Vividly brought to life with lyrical animation inspired by her unforgettable artwork.

Title: The Hobby
Movie Plot: Follows longtime collectors and a new generation of buyers from the trading card industry, diving deep into the real-time trading card fever as the hobby goes nuclear..

Title: The Woods Are Real
Movie Plot: Joba and Quincy are a wealthy Brooklyn couple who value charity above all. But when a friend returns from a country pilgrimage to challenge their bleeding hearts, they accept an invitation that will change their lives forever.

Title: Girl
Movie Plot: Ama and Grace and they only have each other and that's all they need. They live confined to their Glasgow apartment. Only Grace goes out to work as a cleaner, forbidding Ama to go out.

Title: Lost
Movie Plot: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

Title: The 100
Movie Plot: Set 97 years after a nuclear war destroyed civilization, when a spaceship housing humanity's lone survivors sends 100 juvenile delinquents back to Earth, hoping to repopulate the planet.

Title: One Day
Movie Plot: After spending the night together on the eve of their college graduation, Dexter and Emma are shown each year on the same date to see where they are in their lives. They are sometimes together, and sometimes not.

Title: My Life with the Walter Boys
Movie Plot: Jackie Howard's life is disrupted by a freak accident, she is ripped from her home and has to start over on a ranch in Colorado, with her guardian and a family of 9 boys, and 1 girl.

Title: Expats
Movie Plot: A look at the personal and professional lives of a tight-knit group of expatriates living in Hong Kong.

Title: Vikings: Valhalla
Movie Plot: Follow-up series to 'Vikings' set 100 years later and focusing on the adventures of Leif Erikson, Freydis, Harald Hardrada, and the Norman King William the Conqueror.

Title: Friends
Movie Plot: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty year-old friends living in the Manhattan borough of New York City.

Title: Vikings: The Viking Sagas
Movie Plot: Viking Ragnar Lothbrok is a young farmer and family man who is frustrated by the policies of Earl Haraldson, his local chieftain who sends his Viking raiders east to the Baltic states and Russia, whose residents are as poor as the Norsemen. Ragnar wants to head west, across the ocean, to discover new civilizations. With assistance from his friend Floki, Ragnar builds a faster, sleeker fleet of boats to help him make it to the Western world. Through the years Ragnar, who claims to be a direct descendant of the god Odin, continues to struggle with Earl until the two face each other in a final battle for supremacy. Following that, Ragnar goes on a search for new lands to conquer.—earthchild-37516

Title: The Last Kingdom
Movie Plot: As Alfred the Great defends his kingdom from Norse invaders, Uhtred--born a Saxon but raised by Vikings--seeks to claim his ancestral birthright.

Title: Money Heist
Movie Plot: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.

Title: Arcane
Movie Plot: Set in Utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League Of Legends champions and the power that will tear them apart.

Title: South Park
Movie Plot: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.

Title: Solar Opposites
Movie Plot: A family of aliens move to middle America, where they debate whether life is better there or on their home planet.

Title: BoJack Horseman
Movie Plot: BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit television show "Horsin' Around" in the '80s and '90s, but now he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

Title: We Stand Alone Together
Movie Plot: Compiled over two years, an 'on-camera oral history' of Easy Company, told by the veterans themselves. Accompanies the mini-series Band of Brothers.

Title: Greyhound
Movie Plot: Several months after the U.S. entry into World War II, an inexperienced U.S. Navy commander must lead an Allied convoy being stalked by a German submarine wolf pack.

Title: Feud
Movie Plot: An anthology series centering on famous feuds, including Bette Davis and Joan Crawford, and Truman Capote and the New York elite.

Title: Tracker
Movie Plot: Colter Shaw travels the country in his old-school RV, helping police and private citizens solve crimes and locate missing persons--until his latest case changes everything.

Title: Monsieur Spade
Movie Plot: The famous detective Sam Spade is now 60 and living as an expat in the south of France in 1963.

Title: Slow Horses
Movie Plot: Follows a team of British intelligence agents who serve as a dumping ground department of MI5 due to their career-ending mistakes.

Title: Mary & George
Movie Plot: The Countess of Buckingham who molded her son to seduce King James I and become his all-powerful lover, through intrigue, becoming richer, more titled and influential than England has ever seen.

Title: The Woman in the Wall
Movie Plot: Lorna Brady wakes one morning to find a corpse in her house with no idea who the dead woman is. She doubts herself, because she has long suffered from extreme bouts of sleepwalking.

Title: Hijack
Movie Plot: A plane from Dubai to London is hijacked over a 7-hour flight, while authorities on the ground scramble for answers.

Title: Monarch: Legacy of Monsters
Movie Plot: Set after the battle between Godzilla and the Titans, revealing that monsters are real, follows one family's journey to uncover its buried secrets and a legacy linking them to Monarch.

Title: Elsbeth
Movie Plot: Elsbeth Tascioni, an unconventional attorney, gives her singular point of view to make observations to catch criminals alongside the NYPD.

Title: The Girls on the Bus
Movie Plot: Four female journalists who follow the every move of a parade of flawed presidential candidates, finding friendship, love, and a scandal that could take down not just the presidency but our entire democracy along the way.

Title: Apples Never Fall
Movie Plot: The Delaney family seems happy but Joy disappears, forcing her husband and four adult children to reassess their family history.

Title: Bob Marley: One Love
Movie Plot: The story of how reggae icon Bob Marley overcame adversity, and the journey behind his revolutionary music.

Title: Morbius
Movie Plot: Biochemist Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but he inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism instead.

Title: Dick Turpin
Movie Plot: Famed 18th-century English highwayman Dick Turpin eludes authorities while romancing a farmer's daughter, though his days robbing coaches under the alias John Palmer may be numbered.

Title: The Mighty Boosh
Movie Plot: Surreal British comedy in which Vince Noir and Howard Moon have adventures filled with oddball characters while working as Zoo Keepers, before pursuing a musical career and running a second-hand shop.

Title: The Reluctant Traveler
Movie Plot: Follows the adventures of Levy as he visits some of the world's most remarkable hotels, as well as explores the people, places, and cultures.

Title: Crossing the Line
Movie Plot: Two young soldiers prepare for battle during World War I.

Title: Foundation
Movie Plot: A complex saga of humans scattered on planets throughout the galaxy all living under the rule of the Galactic Empire.

Title: See
Movie Plot: Far in a dystopian future, the human race has lost the sense of sight, and society has had to find new ways to interact, build, hunt, and to survive. All of that is challenged when a set of twins are born with sight.

Title: For All Mankind
Movie Plot: In an alternative version of 1969, the Soviet Union beats the United States to the Moon, and the space race continues on for decades with still grander challenges and goals.

Title: Invasion
Movie Plot: A Florida Park Ranger and his family deal with strange occurrences in the aftermath of a hurricane.

Title: Shrinking
Movie Plot: A grieving therapist starts to tell his clients exactly what he thinks. Ignoring his training and ethics, he finds himself making huge changes to people's lives - including his own.

Title: The Morning Show
Movie Plot: An inside look at the lives of the people who help America wake up in the morning, exploring the unique challenges faced by the team.

Title: Black Bird
Movie Plot: Jimmy Keene is sentenced to 10 years in a minimum security prison but he cuts a deal with the FBI to befriend a suspected serial killer. Keene has to elicit a confession from Larry Hall to find the bodies of as many as eighteen women.

Title: Revenge of the Mummy: The Ride
Movie Plot: Pre-show video that plays before Universal Orlando's Revenge Of The Mummy Ride documents the strange going-ons on the set of The Mummy films as the cast and crew discuss whether or not the curse is real.

Title: Transformers: The Ride - 3D
Movie Plot: The Autobots attempt to defend the Allspark from Megatron and the Decepticons.

Title: The Amazing Adventures of Spider-Man
Movie Plot: Spider-Man must stop the Sinister Syndicate from using an anti-gravity ray on New York, as well as rescue a group of reporters from them.

Title: The Simpsons Ride
Movie Plot: Springfield's theme park Krustyland, run by Krusty the Clown, is opening it's newest roller coaster, the upsy-downsy spins-aroundsy teen-operated thrill ride is opening, and in this simulator ride, you're going to be the first to ride it, along with the Simpsons family! However, Sideshow Bob has escaped from prison and has taken over the park, and soon you're on a wild adventure crashing through the Krusty's attractions, with Sideshow Bob doing anything to destroy you.—Anthony

Title: Harry Potter and the Forbidden Journey
Movie Plot: Amusement ride at the Wizarding World of Harry Potter in the Island of Adventure Park, Orlando, Florida.

Title: Out of Darkness
Movie Plot: In the Old Stone Age, a disparate gang of early humans band together in search of a new land. But when they suspect a malevolent, mystical being is hunting them down, the clan are forced to confront a danger they never envisioned.

Title: The Fellowship of the Ring
Movie Plot: Teleplay based on the of J.R.R. Tolkien's novel 'The Fellowship of the Ring'.

Title: The Beatles Anthology
Movie Plot: An autobiographical documentary of the greatest of the rock bands.

Title: The Beatles: Get Back
Movie Plot: In January 1969, The Beatles set out to write and record new songs for their first live show in more than two years, culminating in an impromptu concert atop their Savile Row studio.

Title: They Shall Not Grow Old
Movie Plot: A documentary about World War I with never-before-seen footage to commemorate the centennial of the end of the war.

Title: Let It Be
Movie Plot: The filmed account of The Beatles' attempt to recapture their old group spirit by making a back to basics album, which instead drove them further apart.

Title: Help!
Movie Plot: Sir Ringo Starr finds himself the human sacrifice target of a cult, and his fellow members of The Beatles must try to protect him from it.

Title: The Beatles: Eight Days a Week - The Touring Years
Movie Plot: A compilation of found footage featuring music, interviews, and stories of The Beatles' 250 concerts from 1963 to 1966.

Title: A Hard Day's Night
Movie Plot: Over two "typical" days in the life of The Beatles, the boys struggle to keep themselves and Sir Paul McCartney's mischievous grandfather in check while preparing for a live TV performance.

Title: Yellow Submarine
Movie Plot: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his yellow submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music-hating Blue Meanies.

Title: The Beatles: 1
Movie Plot: Compilation of almost all The Beatles' music videos, with other television appearances and live performances.

Title: Magical Mystery Tour
Movie Plot: The Beatles charter a special bus for a surreal mystery tour.

Title: McCartney 3,2,1
Movie Plot: 2021 Six Episode Series on Hulu: Producer Rick Rubin interviews Paul McCartney on his work with the Beatles, Wings, and as a solo artist, including stories about his personal relationships that inspired his songwriting.

Title: Now and Then - The Last Beatles Song
Movie Plot: Chronicling the final Beatles song and its journey to completion, Peter Jackson and his team bring The Fab Four's career full-circle with Now and Then.

Title: Squid Game: The Challenge
Movie Plot: Follows contestants as they compete in challenges based on the Korean children's games featured on the Squid Game to win a $4.56 million cash prize.

Title: Silo
Movie Plot: Disaster strikes when teenage Cody becomes the victim of a grain entrapment accident.

Title: Sex Education
Movie Plot: A teenage boy with a sex therapist mother teams up with a high school classmate to set up an underground sex therapy clinic at school.

Title: You
Movie Plot: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

Title: The Witcher: Blood Origin
Movie Plot: More than a thousand years before the events of "The Witcher," seven outcasts in an Elven world join forces in a quest against an all-powerful empire.

Title: The Umbrella Academy
Movie Plot: A family of former child heroes, now grown apart, must reunite to continue to protect the world.

Title: The Wheel of Time
Movie Plot: Set in a high fantasy world where magic exists, but only some can access it, a woman named Moiraine crosses paths with five young men and women. This sparks a dangerous, world-spanning journey. Based on the book series by Robert Jordan.

Title: The Sandman
Movie Plot: Upon escaping after decades of imprisonment by a mortal wizard, Dream, the personification of dreams, sets about to reclaim his lost equipment.

Title: Euphoria
Movie Plot: A look at life for a group of high school students as they grapple with issues of drugs, sex, and violence.

Title: White Lotus
Movie Plot: A cinematic journey of a Westerner who temporarily ordains as a Monk at the world's largest Buddhist temple in Thailand.

Title: Big Little Lies
Movie Plot: The apparently-perfect lives of upper-class mothers of students at a prestigious elementary school unravel to the point of murder when a single mother moves to their quaint California beach town.

Title: Ginny & Georgia
Movie Plot: Ginny Miller, an angsty fifteen-year-old, often feels more mature than her thirty-year-old mother, the irresistible and dynamic Georgia Miller.

Title: Lucifer
Movie Plot: Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.

Title: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners
Movie Plot: A Street Kid trying to survive in a technology and body modification-obsessed city of the future. Having everything to lose, he chooses to stay alive by becoming an Edgerunner, a Mercenary outlaw also known as a Cyberpunk.

Title: Parks and Recreation
Movie Plot: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

Title: Modern Family
Movie Plot: Three different, but related, families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A Toy Story
Movie Plot: A Star Wars fanatic decides to sell his toy collection to keep his overbearing girlfriend happy and salvage their relationship. An unbelievable adventure with his toys makes him realize that he doesn't need to change for anyone.

Title: Invincible: Atom Eve
Movie Plot: In this special prequel episode, Samantha 'Atom Eve' Wilkins discovers her superpowers as a young girl - and must come to terms with her own sinister origins as she discovers a family she never knew she had.

Title: Lars and the Real Girl
Movie Plot: A delusional young man strikes up an unconventional relationship with a doll he finds on the Internet.

Title: Gangster Squad
Movie Plot: It's 1949 Los Angeles, the city is run by gangsters and a malicious mobster, Mickey Cohen. Determined to end the corruption, John O'Mara assembles a team of cops, ready to take down the ruthless leader and restore peace to the city.

Title: The Nice Guys: The Nice Guys Detective Agency
Movie Plot: A series of shorts in which different women hire Healy and March from The Nice Guys Detective Agency for protection, then treated with a short clip from The Nice Guys (2016) that is relative to their individual stories.

Title: Half Nelson
Movie Plot: An inner-city junior high school teacher with a drug habit forms an unlikely friendship with one of his students after she discovers his secret.

Title: The Ides of March
Movie Plot: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail.

Title: Loki
Movie Plot: The mercurial villain Loki resumes his role as the God of Mischief in a new series that takes place after the events of “Avengers: Endgame.”

Title: Peacemaker
Movie Plot: Picking up where The Suicide Squad (2021) left off, Peacemaker returns home after recovering from his encounter with Bloodsport - only to discover that his freedom comes at a price.

Title: Gen V
Movie Plot: Ziba, the daughter of immigrants from Transylvania, navigates high school as a vampire stuck between the world of Vampire tradition and culture, and the American human high school experience.

Title: The Gray Man
Movie Plot: When the CIA's most skilled operative, whose true identity is known to none, accidentally uncovers dark agency secrets, a psychopathic former colleague puts a bounty on his head, setting off a global manhunt by international assassins.

Title: The Neon Demon
Movie Plot: An aspiring model, Jesse, is new to Los Angeles. However, her beauty and youth, which generate intense fascination and jealousy within the fashion industry, may prove themselves sinister.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum: HBO First Look
Movie Plot: Keanu Reeves and Halle Berry star in the third installment of the action film series.

Title: Training 'John Wick'
Movie Plot: A look at the fight choreography being developed for the film.

Title: Too Old to Die Young
Movie Plot: Detective Martin Jones, who leads a double life as a killer for hire in Los Angeles' deadly underground, suffers an existential crisis which leads him deeper into a blood splattered world of violence.

Title: Matrix: Generation
Movie Plot: After the 1999 premiere of the first Matrix movie, it became a pop culture phenomenon. A special documentary about the Matrix saga and its prophetic aspects.

Title: Bill the Galactic Hero
Movie Plot: Bill is a pizza delivery driver who is drugged and shanghaied into the Space Troopers. Bill initially works as a fuse tender but when his ship is struck by enemy fire he finds himself the only remaining soldier capable of firing back.

Title: Searchers 2.0
Movie Plot: The 'has-been' Hollywood Western actors, Mel Torres and Fred Fletcher, hear Fritz Frobisher will attend a screening of one of his movies in Arizona. They decide to go exact revenge on him for terrorizing them and other kids with a whip on their first set. To this end Mel's unenthusiastic daughter, Delilah, is persuaded to provide her decent car, and comes along all the way from L.A. Endless discussions about movies, simple philosophy and morality are interlaced with accidental and purely scare-induced horror. When they arrive, neither the screening nor Frobisher are anything like they imagined.—KGF Vissers

Title: Highway Patrolman
Movie Plot: Against his father's wishes, Pedro, a naive kid from Mexico City, joins the Federal Highway Patrol. His simple desire to do good rapidly comes into conflict with the reality of police work.

Title: Three Businessmen
Movie Plot: An American art dealer (Miguel Sandoval), who specializes in southwestern topaz, arrives by train in Liverpool. Similarly, a very proper British art dealer (Alex Cox), who specializes in African art, arrives in the same hotel. The two meet in the hotel's abandoned restaurant and decide to set off in finding an evening meal, which becomes problematic immediately when the Brit reveals he is vegetarian. While following their pursuit of a mutually acceptable meal, the main point of the film is their discourse en route to their various attempts at an eatery.—John Sacksteder <jsackste@bellsouth.net>

Title: Repo Chick
Movie Plot: As a repo chick, wealthy bad-girl Pixxi and her entourage get mixed up in a devious kidnapping plot that threatens to wipe out the city of Los Angeles.

Title: Revengers Tragedy
Movie Plot: In a post-apocalyptic Liverpool, a man returns seeking revenge for his wife's murder - and everyone speaks perfect Jacobean English.

Title: Straight to Hell
Movie Plot: A gang of bank robbers with a suitcase full of money go to the desert to hide out. After burying the loot, they find their way to a surreal town full of cowboys who drink an awful lot of coffee. The townspeople are hostile to the outsiders at first, but seem to accept them once they've killed a couple of people. After a while, a mysterious man named Dade arrives, who seems to have unpleasant business to settle with the robbers. A free-for-all shoot-em-up ensues.—George S. Davis <mgeorges@prodigy.net>

Title: Walker
Movie Plot: An unconventional retelling of the life of William Walker, a 19th century American mercenary leader who became the president of Nicaragua.

Title: The Winner
Movie Plot: When it is discovered that a man is having luck in the casinos in Las Vegas, people start attempting to take his money.

Title: A Hard Look
Movie Plot: Documentary about the Emmanuelle movies, looking at their making as well as their social and cultural impact.

Title: The Animatrix
Movie Plot: A collection of nine short films featuring stories related to The Matrix (1999).

Title: Scene Missing
Movie Plot: The unfinished documentary about the making of Dennis Hopper's mostly unseen feature film "The Last Movie" (1971).

Title: Red Summer
Movie Plot: Four young people come to Mallorca to enjoy idyllic summer holidays, but delving into the most inhospitable places on the island will begin a hellish journey.

Title: Rs-1281
Movie Plot: In a future where the human race has been self-destroyed, Duedan passes the toughest test of his life with RS-1281. Duedan is human. RS-1281, an android.

Title: Witch Walker
Movie Plot: Police Di Jun confronts the Chinese triads, the yakuza, and the Spanish mafia, in an attempt to prevent them from taking control of the city, with the help of Molly, a mysterious woman who turns out to be a magic witch.

Title: Zhan Du Xiao
Movie Plot: A policeman begins a revenge against a drug leader after the death of his brother. In his crusade take the help of a friends and the ex-girlfriend of drug leader.

Title: Lupin the Third: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
Movie Plot: The story of how the fashionable femme fatale Fujiko Mine first met Lupin III, her sometimes-lover and sometimes-rival, and the rest of his gang.

Title: Política correcta
Movie Plot: Politicians unite to try and prevent the closure of a school and other unattractive measures in a village in ruins.

Title: Lupin III: Part III
Movie Plot: The continuing adventures of the master thief Lupin III.

Title: Lupin III: Part 5
Movie Plot: While visiting his ancestral homeland of France, Lupin III becomes entangled with a dark web bank and a worldwide hunt for him spurred by social media.

Title: Lupin the Third: Goemon's Blood Spray
Movie Plot: Lupin's friend, the samurai Goemon Ishikawa, takes a job as bodyguard for a yakuza boss. But a brutal assassin kills the yakuza and Goemon is honor-bound to track him down.

Title: Lupin the Third: The Gravestone of Daisuke Jigen
Movie Plot: Lupin and Jigen face off with an assassin who has marked Jigen as his latest target.

Title: Rupan sansei: Pilot Film
Movie Plot: The grandmaster thief Lupin III and his associates devise a plan to escape from the stubborn Inspector Zenigata and the mercenary samurai Goemon Ishikawa.

Title: Crying Out Love in the Center of the World
Movie Plot: While searching for his fiancee Ritsuko, Sakutarou rediscovers through flashbacks the void deep within him caused by the events from his high school days.

Title: The Confidence Man JP: Episode of the Hero
Movie Plot: Dako, Boku-chan, and Richard commit their next con on Malta Island.

Title: Gunjô: Ai ga shizunda umi no iro
Movie Plot: A drama centered on a young woman who heads to her father's home in Okinawa to try and cope with her boyfriend's death.

Title: Before We Vanish
Movie Plot: Three aliens travel to Earth in preparation for a mass invasion, taking possession of human bodies.

Title: Masquerade Hotel
Movie Plot: A serial (3) killer leaves a GPS code of his next target with each victim - this time Hotel Cortesia Tokyo. A detective goes undercover as hotel staff - haircut, manners etc.

Title: Masquerade Night
Movie Plot: An anonymous letter is delivered to the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department. The letter states that a criminal of a murder case will appear at the countdown party Masquerade Night that will be held at Hotel Cortesia Tokyo.

Title: The Confidence Man JP
Movie Plot: Dako (Masami Nagasawa) is a con woman who takes money from wealthy people like yakuza bosses and evil businessmen. She works with Boku-chan (Masahiro Higashide) and Richard (Fumiyo Kohinata) to carry their plans using fantastic teamwork.

Title: The Confidence Man JP: The Movie
Movie Plot: The con artists: Dako (Masami Nagasawa), Boku-chan (Masahiro Higashide), and Richard (Fumiyo Kohinata) attempt to steal the diamond from a member of the triad in Hong Kong, who is cold-blooded and appropriately called "Ice Princess."

Title: Close-Knit
Movie Plot: Tomo, an 11-year old girl, discovers her mother has abandoned her. Tomo's uncle and his transgender girlfriend, Rinko, take her in. Together they tackle the task of knitting 108 of Rinko's special hopes and dreams, one stitch at a time.

Title: Bunny Drop
Movie Plot: A man adopts his six-year-old aunt and raises her as his own kid.

Title: Detective Chinatown 3
Movie Plot: A major crime occurs in Tokyo when detectives Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to investigate the crime. A battle between the strongest detectives in Asia is about to break out with bursts of laughter.

Title: Face of a Fugitive
Movie Plot: A robber who is falsely accused of murdering a deputy sheriff tries to start a new life in a border town near Mexico, but his past catches up with him.

Title: Angel and the Badman
Movie Plot: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

Title: Trail Street
Movie Plot: Bat Masterson's old friend Billy Burns convinces him to become marshal of Liberal, Kansas and help the residents fight drought and a destructive range war.

Title: Cave of Outlaws
Movie Plot: Released after serving 15 years in prison for train robbery Pete Carver being the only survivor of the gang goes looking for the loot in the caves where it was hidden.

Title: Utah Blaine
Movie Plot: Gunslinger Utah Blaine rescues rancher Joe Neal from lynching by vigilante land-grabbers and runs afoul of their leader Russ Nevers' interests.

Title: Gunfighters
Movie Plot: Gunfighter Brazos Kane takes a job on a ranch but he is unjustly accused of killing fellow cowhand Bob Tyrell and must clear himself by finding the real killer.

Title: Story of G.I. Joe
Movie Plot: At the close of WWII, Pulitzer Prize-winning war correspondent Ernie Pyle travels with the U.S. Army's Company C Division during their liberation of Italy.

Title: Station West
Movie Plot: After two U.S. cavalrymen transporting a gold shipment get killed, U.S. Army Intelligence investigator John Haven goes undercover to a mining and logging town to find the killers.

Title: Objective, Burma!
Movie Plot: A platoon of special ops are tasked to parachute into the remote Burmese jungle and destroy a strategic Japanese radar station, but getting out isn't as easy.

Title: Man in the Saddle
Movie Plot: A private deadly feud ensues when ruthless wealthy rancher Will Isham attempts a takeover of small rancher Owen Merritt's land and marries Owen's old flame, Laurie Bidwell.

Title: King of the Pecos
Movie Plot: In Cottonwood, Texas, claim-jumper Alexander Stiles killed John Clayborn's parents when they refused to sell their ranch to him. Ten years later, John, now a lawyer, returns under the name of John Clay to exact vengeance.

Title: Badlands of Dakota
Movie Plot: Indian raids are being perpetrated by an outlaw gang in disguise.

Title: Robotech: The Shadow Chronicles
Movie Plot: Picking up where the original series left off, Scott Bernard continues his search for Rick Hunter and the fate of the SDF-3.

Title: Destiny: The Tale of Kamakura
Movie Plot: Not only is Kamakura-based Masakazu Isshiki a mystery novelist, but he is also a good detective himself. His wife Akiko and he are acquainted with all manners of creatures and gods who are of, from or passing through the town. Dealing with and tackling his cases means he can use all the help he can get.—aghaemi

Title: Living with the Dead
Movie Plot: A man begins to have disturbing visions of dead people, among whom are his mother and victims of a local serial killer. The detective investigating the murders looks to him for help in solving the case.

Title: Jackal of Nahueltoro
Movie Plot: The real story about an illiterate murderer, educated in prison, where he reflects on his actions days before he died.

Title: Jitterbugs
Movie Plot: The boys team up with a likable con man to help a pretty singer's mother who's been taken in by swindlers.

Title: Red Obsession
Movie Plot: The great chateaux of Bordeaux struggle to accommodate the voracious appetite for their rare, expensive wines, which have become a powerful status symbol in booming China.

Title: The Insect Woman
Movie Plot: Life story of a woman born in poverty trying to succeed. Through her many schemes, she faces her ups and downs in a cyclical nature, fueled mostly by self-interest.

Title: Intentions of Murder
Movie Plot: A housewife living under her tyrannical husband has her life stressfully turned upside down after getting raped by a burglar.

Title: The Eel
Movie Plot: A businessman kills his adulterous wife and is sent to prison. After the release, he opens a barbershop and meets new people, talking almost to no one except an eel he befriended while in prison.

Title: Profound Desires of the Gods
Movie Plot: An engineer from Tokyo arrives on a drought-ridden tropical island to drill a well to power a nearby sugar mill. He meets the inbred Futori family, hated by the locals for breaking religious customs.

Title: Pigs and Battleships
Movie Plot: A young hoodlum decides to work for a criminal organization that is tearing itself apart.

Title: Vengeance Is Mine
Movie Plot: Chronological exploits of Iwao Enokizu, a murderous thief on the run.

Title: Black Rain
Movie Plot: The story of the aftermath of the Hiroshima bombing, based on Masuji Ibuse's novel.

Title: The Ballad of Narayama
Movie Plot: In a poor 19th century rural Japanese village, everyone who reaches the age of 70 has to climb a nearby mountain to die. An elderly woman is reaching close to her cut-off age during her last days with her family.

Title: A Man Vanishes
Movie Plot: Plastics salesman Oshima disappeared without a word to anyone, and has been missing for two years. Shohei Imamura and his crew follow Oshima's fiancé Yoshie and actor Shigeru Tsuyuguchi as they investigate the disappearance.

Title: Double Suicide
Movie Plot: A doomed love between a paper merchant and a courtesan.

Title: American Pop
Movie Plot: The story of four generations of a Russian Jewish immigrant family of musicians whose careers parallel the history of American popular music in the 20th century.

Title: Endless Desire
Movie Plot: Endless Desire is a black comedy on the spoils of war much extended and enhanced by the greed, treachery, laziness, and lust of the postwar decade.

Title: The Ballad of Narayama
Movie Plot: A kabuki theatre-inflected story about a poor village whose people have to be carried to a nearby mountain to die once they get old.

Title: Macross: Do You Remember Love?
Movie Plot: Earth braces for an invasion of giant male bionoids and their enemy, giant female bionoids.

Title: Angel's Egg
Movie Plot: A mysterious young girl wanders a desolate, otherworldly landscape, carrying a large egg.

Title: Rail of the Star
Movie Plot: A young Japanese actress remembers her war childhood in Korea. Her father goes to fight, her baby sister Miko dies of typhoid, her beloved Korean maid Ohana is fired due to a mistake which could cost Chiko her life... By and by Chiko realizes that the country is being ruled by the Japanese and the Koreans are persecuted. When the war ends, the Koreans chase the Japanese rule and the roles change. Now Chiko's family is unwanted. But then the Russians come and this is the end. They have to burn all the pictures to avoid all suspicions... even Miko's picture. But when the Russians come to their house, they decide to flee over the 38th Parallel towards freedom. A group of men, women, children struggles along the mountains, led by the light of the Northern Star. Along the way they meet a Korean man, who is willing to help them to escape the Russian soldiers although his family was killed by the Japanese.—animenewsnetwork.com

Title: Detective Conan: The Time Bombed Skyscraper
Movie Plot: The detective genius Conan must solve a series of bombings or his true love will die!

Title: Garasu no usagi
Movie Plot: Toshiko Ei and her family are residents of Tokyo. Her father is a respected and skilled glass craftsmen so the family makes a good living. However, the Ei family soon finds itself having to suffer through many tragic hardships as a result of World War II.—N/A

Title: Behind Your Touch
Movie Plot: A veterinarian with psychic powers, and a hot-blooded detective who fall in love with each other while solving minor crime cases in a small town in Mujin, Chungcheong-do.

Title: Castaway Diva
Movie Plot: An aspiring singer who spends fifteen years alone on a deserted island before setting out on a journey to become a diva.

Title: Soundtrack #1
Movie Plot: Best friends for almost twenty years, our two main characters can no longer ignore the feelings blooming between them as they start living together.

Title: Time of Eve
Movie Plot: In a not too distant future, a young man's outlook on his home android begins to change after tracking the android's behavioral log to a mysterious cafe.

Title: Miss Hokusai
Movie Plot: The life and works of Japanese artist and ukiyo-e painter Katsushika Hokusai, as seen from the eyes of his daughter, Katsushika O-Ei.

Title: Colorful
Movie Plot: A sinful spirit is granted the opportunity to prove worthy for rebirth, inhabiting the body of a student who killed himself.

Title: Summer Days with Coo
Movie Plot: A boy befriends an orphaned water spirit, or Kappa, he found dried up and buried in a riverbank. He and his family help the creature adjust to life in the modern world.

Title: Tekkonkinkreet
Movie Plot: Two boys defend Treasure Town and Yakuza try to take over and clear it for new development.

Title: Threads
Movie Plot: The effects of a nuclear holocaust on the working class city of Sheffield, England and the eventual long-term effects of nuclear war on civilization.

Title: Goodbye, Don Glees!
Movie Plot: During an unusual summer vacation in Iceland, the Don Glees boys discover a treasure.

Title: The War Game
Movie Plot: A docudrama depicting a hypothetical nuclear attack on Britain.

Title: Watership Down
Movie Plot: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.

Title: The Day After
Movie Plot: The effects of a devastating nuclear holocaust on small-town residents of eastern Kansas.

Title: Animal Farm
Movie Plot: A successful farmyard revolution by the resident animals vs. the farmer goes horribly wrong when the victors create a new tyranny among themselves.

Title: Testament
Movie Plot: The life of a suburban American family is scarred after a nuclear attack.

Title: Ethel & Ernest
Movie Plot: The life and times of the parents of the hailed British graphic novelist Raymond Briggs.

Title: Birdboy: The Forgotten Children
Movie Plot: Three children decide to leave their homes looking for a better life.

Title: Felidae
Movie Plot: A cat must investigate brutal murders of other cats in a neighborhood he has moved into with his owner.

Title: Son of the White Mare
Movie Plot: In this dreamlike Hungarian folk myth, a horse goddess gives birth to three powerful brothers who set out into the Underworld to save three princesses from three evil dragons and reclaim their ancestors' lost kingdom.

Title: My Little Goat
Movie Plot: The mother goat rescues her little goats from the wolf's belly. But, she can't find Toruku, her eldest son! Where is Toruku?!

Title: Wizards
Movie Plot: On a post-apocalyptic Earth, a wizard and his faire folk comrades fight an evil wizard who's using technology in his bid for conquest.

Title: Stacking
Movie Plot: A Montana teenager struggles to keep her family's farm together.

Title: Cat Soup
Movie Plot: A young anthropomorphic cat goes on a psychedelic journey with his sister in order to save her soul.

Title: Mind Game
Movie Plot: After a deadly encounter with two yakuza, a loser with a crush on his childhood girlfriend goes to heaven and back, embarking on a psychedelic self-discovery experience with her and his friends.

Title: Promare
Movie Plot: A futuristic firefighting mecha service is created to protect the world.

Title: Genius Party
Movie Plot: Several directors take part in an anthology dedicated to short anime films.

Title: Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt
Movie Plot: Two Angels, Panty and Stocking, are kicked out of Heaven for bad behaviour and sent Ghost hunting by Garterbelt, a Priest of Daten City.

Title: Aachi & Ssipak
Movie Plot: In a future where energy is made from fecal matter, the government rewards defecation with "juicybars". Small-time hustlers try to get rich while fending off the mutated Diaper Gang.

Title: Hells
Movie Plot: Amagane Rinne, an upbeat schoolgirl, has died. But even dead, she still has to attend school in the underworld.

Title: Spriggan
Movie Plot: An elite superhuman agent must stop a foreign military unit from seizing control of an ancient artifact that holds the key to ultimate power.

Title: 3000 Leagues in Search of Mother
Movie Plot: An Italian child goes on a journey to find his mother in Argentina.

Title: Bannertail: The Story of Gray Squirrel
Movie Plot: In 1922, children's author Ernest Thompson Seton wrote a story abouf a gray squirrel named Bannertail. It was turned into an anime series in 1979 by Nippon Animation and became known as Bannertail: The Story of Gray Squirrel. It ran for a total of 26 episodes and told the story of Banner, a young orphaned squirrel raised by a kindly mother cat, and his adventures in the forest. It is also known by its German version, entitled Puschel, das Eichhorn. In the Arab world, it is known as Sanjoob or Sanajeb-el Gaaba and in Spain and Latin America under the name Banner y Flappy.—Sissy2807

Title: Visiting Marco
Movie Plot: Marco and his family live in Genoa, Italy, a poor town where many local Italians went to work overseas. Marco's mother, Anna, is among one of them. Initially, Anna keeps writing back home while working in Argentina, but one day, the letters stopped. The boy then decides to search for his mother. Despite the journey's difficulties, Marco heads off into Argentina's interior, to meet his mother, who as the boy's bad luck would have to see his mother on her deathbed...—L.H. Wong <lhw@sfs.org.sg>

Title: Isamu the Wilderness Boy
Movie Plot: Isamu was born under a rough sign, a Japanese father and an American Indian mother, both killed by a group of racist thugs in the old west, and rescued by one of the most wanted men of the era. The son of a samurai and an Indian tracker he could become the most powerful gunslinger in the west, if can only survive one of the roughest childhoods anyone has ever seen.—over_the-world

Title: 10 Years with Hayao Miyazaki
Movie Plot: A chronicle of the creative process of the legendary Japanese filmmaker Hayao Miyazaki, a passionate artisan, a steadfast trailblazer, and a father butting heads with his son.

Title: Lupin the 3rd Part 6
Movie Plot: Lupin III challenges a shadowy British organization that has framed him for murder, and later searches for a mysterious woman from his past.

Title: Isao Takahata and His Tale of Princess Kaguya
Movie Plot: A documentary about the making of The Tale of Princess Kaguya, Isao Takahata's first feature film for 14 years.

Title: Zen - Grogu and Dust Bunnies
Movie Plot: "Zen - Grogu and Dust Bunnies" is a hand drawn animated short by Studio Ghibli.

Title: The Whale Hunt
Movie Plot: A group of school children play in their classroom, imagining that they are on a boat in the ocean. Fantasy becomes reality, and they encounter a whale.

Title: Nandarou
Movie Plot: A short TV featuring a small green pig with enormous eyes. The title Nandarou implies that even its creators didn't really know what kind of creature it was supposed to be. However, NTV (Nihon TV) chose it as their station's mascot.

Title: Giant God Warrior Appears in Tokyo
Movie Plot: This short focuses on the God Warrior from Nausicaa of The Valley of The Wind (1984). Super-powered bio-weapons in ceramic armor begin attacking Tokyo, annihilating human civilization.

Title: The Night of Taneyamagahara
Movie Plot: Four farmers spend the night at a campfire. Three of them talk about work, nature and weather, while one of them has dreams about buying his own plot.

Title: Môretsu atarô
Movie Plot: Ataro is a 10-year-old Tokyo boy, who inherits the family store after his father's early death in an accident. The store is threatened by Kokoro Boss and his gang. Ataro has to face the threat with the help of his father's ghost X-goro, his own best friend Dekoppachi, the anthropomorphic alley cat Nyarome, and retired crime boss Butamatsu.—Dimos I

Title: In Search of the Unreturned Soldiers in Thailand
Movie Plot: In Thailand, Imamura brings together three Japanese soldiers who did not return home after World War II to discuss their experiences during and after the war.

Title: In Search of the Unreturned Soldiers in Malaysia
Movie Plot: The searching of un-return japanese soldier in Malaysia by Imamura Shohei with the help from local people.

Title: Stolen Desire
Movie Plot: A rumbunctious and ribald tale of a troupe of travelling actors who alternate highlights of kabuki theatre with strip shows.

Title: The Pixar Story
Movie Plot: The Pixar Story takes audiences behind the scenes of the groundbreaking company that pioneered a new generation of animation and forever changed the face of filmmaking.

Title: Paradise Alley
Movie Plot: Three Italian-American brothers, living in the slums of 1940's New York City, try to help each other with one's wrestling career using one brother's promotional skills and another brother's con-artist tactics to thwart a sleazy manager.

Title: Ghiblies
Movie Plot: Ghiblies, a totally different look on the staff of Studio Ghibli as they go through life, work on new animation projects, office jokes, off the wall events, and deciding what to have for lunch.

Title: Ibarado time
Movie Plot: A fantastical city portrayed in artful pictures that come to life through animation, music and background sounds.

Title: A Fugitive from the Past
Movie Plot: Three thieves escape from a heist, one of them killing the other two. He is sheltered by a prostitute and sought after by the police, but only after ten years his true motivation unravels.

Title: Big Time Gambling Boss
Movie Plot: Tokyo, 1934. The boss of the clan that controls gambling agonizes and some of his followers propose to Nakai to take his place, but he refuses the offer and suggests they choose Matsuda, who is in prison.

Title: Summer Time Machine Blues
Movie Plot: A sci-fi club concocts a plan to repair a remote by using a time machine that suddenly appears.

Title: Nijisseiki shônen dokuhon
Movie Plot: Two brothers, Jinta and Wataru, are raised in a travelling circus. After an accident, Jinta decides to leave the circus and travels the countryside working as a con-man. After a run-in with a local gang of yakuza, he is invited to join their ranks, where he makes the mistake of falling for a boss's mistress. Wataru stays with the circus and works hard to regain its former glory.—Todd K. Bowman <tkbowman@aol.com>

Title: The Red Angel
Movie Plot: During the Sino-Japanese War, a young army nurse gives sympathy to her patients and falls in love with an impotent doctor who's addicted to morphine.

Title: Giants and Toys
Movie Plot: In the middle of a fierce commercial competition between three caramel companies, an executive builds up a ditsy teenage girl as a mascot while simultaneously trying to uncover the rival companies' plans.

Title: Blind Beast
Movie Plot: A blind sculpter and his mother kidnap a young model.

Title: Twilight
Movie Plot: When a schoolgirl is found murdered in the woods, a retiring detective tries to find her murderer.

Title: Farewell to the Ark
Movie Plot: A surreal, isolated village sees its inhabitants gradually leave behind their mutual traditions and superstitions as they leave for the city. Among them are two cousins who love each other and who get into a quarrel with other villagers.

Title: August in the Water
Movie Plot: A teenage girl gains supernatural power after an accident and comes to understand her place in the universe.

Title: Black Test Car
Movie Plot: Two car manufacturers spy on each other to try to find out details and prices of a new sports car each is about to launch.

Title: Seisaku's Wife
Movie Plot: On the eve of the Russo-Japanese war at the beginning of the 20th century, small-town girl Okane has married an old wealthy man to escape a life of poverty.

Title: Swastika
Movie Plot: A childless housewife falls in love with a beautiful model.

Title: Irezumi
Movie Plot: To satisfy her lover's fetish for tattooed women, Akane agrees to have her body covered in eloborate tattoos by Kyogoro, an old craftsman. Kyogoro has developed a special technique, by which his assistant, Harutsune, keeps Katsuko's mind off the pain while Kyogoro does his work. After the work is done, Harutsune makes the shocking discovery of how Kyogoro mastered his technique.—Jean-Marc Rocher <rocher@tss.nec.co.jp>

Title: Black Statement Book
Movie Plot: After a businessman is murdered, an investigation identifies a suspect who is then put on trial for that crime.

Title: Orgies of Edo
Movie Plot: A collection of stories dealing with punishment toward women.

Title: Horrors of Malformed Men
Movie Plot: After escaping from an insane asylum, a medical student assumes the identity of a mysterious dead man, who appeared to be his doppelganger, and gets lured to a sinister island ruled by a mad scientist and his malformed men.

Title: The Music
Movie Plot: A young woman undergoes psychiatric treatment after she no longer hears music and develops sexual hang-ups.

Title: Women of the Night
Movie Plot: A mistress of a drug dealer in post-war Japan is shocked when she discovers that he is having an affair with her sister.

Title: Funeral Parade of Roses
Movie Plot: The trials and tribulations of Eddie and other transvestites in Japan.

Title: Adieu Philippine
Movie Plot: Paris, summer 1960. Michel is about to leave for Algeria for military service. He meets Liliane and Juliette, two inseparable friends. Michel goes on vacation to Corsica, where the two girls decide to join him

Title: Boy
Movie Plot: A young boy reluctantly aids his swindling father in a threatening scam.

Title: His Motorbike, Her Island
Movie Plot: After a failed romance, a temperamental young biker meets a carefree rural girl while riding through her island hometown and gets her obsessed about riding a motorcycle.

Title: Enjeru dasuto
Movie Plot: Every Monday at 6 pm a young woman is murdered in the subway. The psychiatrist Setsuko Suma is called in to assist the police. The trail leads to another psychiatrist - Dr Rei Aku - who Setsuko used to date. As she get closer to the solution, she gets more and more convinced that Aku's deprogramming of former sectmembers is important.—Mattias Sandstrm <d92-mas@nada.kth.se>

Title: Afraid to Die
Movie Plot: Takeo is a young yakuza who renounces his former criminal activities after being released from prison. But sometimes escaping the past is not so easy.

Title: The Affair
Movie Plot: A woman, unhappily married to a cheating executive, starts meeting her dead mother's lover and gets thrown into a romantic dilemma after succumbing to a rough laborer.

Title: Eros + Massacre
Movie Plot: Two interwoven stories. The first is a biography of anarchist Sakae Osugi which follows his relationship with three women in the 1920s. The second centers around two 1960s students researching Osugi's theories.

Title: Woman of the Lake
Movie Plot: A married woman lets her lover take naked pictures of her. The photos end up in possession of a man who starts blackmailing the couple.

Title: Akitsu Springs
Movie Plot: Just after WW2, a romance between an innkeeper and a man with tuberculosis unravels near a thermal spring.

Title: Affair in the Snow
Movie Plot: In an isolated mountain resort, a woman gets involved in a love triangle between herself, her volatile lover, and her ex-boyfriend, who she had platonic feelings for.

Title: Heroic Purgatory
Movie Plot: An engineer's wife returns home with a lost teenager. A man posing as her dad tries to get her back, causing the engineer to recall his youth as a revolutionary, obscured by dreamlike disruptions of time and space, fantasy and reality.

Title: Gonin no Shôkin Kasegi
Movie Plot: A government siege on Enoki Village spurs an uprising among peasants who build a fort to defend themselves. A young villager enlists bounty hunter Shikoro Ichibei to help prevent the government from wiping them out.

Title: Nanami: The Inferno of First Love
Movie Plot: A teenage goldsmith with a dark past tragically falls in love with a young nude model.

Title: Chi wa kawaiteru
Movie Plot: An insurance company employee threatens suicide after a massive layoff is announced by the management. The company takes advantage of his threat by turning it into an advertising campaign.

Title: Confessions Among Actresses
Movie Plot: The lives of three movie actresses unfold, transform and get exposed. Each of them owes their choice of profession to a respective traumatic event.

Title: Killer's Mission
Movie Plot: A shogunate secret agent is sent to investigate a secret deal with a Dutch warship involving repeating rifles to be used in an uprising against the Shogun, but finds there's more going on than previously suspected.

Title: Zatoichi Challenged
Movie Plot: After an artist is threatened by the yakuza into creating valuable but highly illegal pornography, the law aims to execute him. Zatoichi, having been honor bound to protect the man and his family, must now run against the law.

Title: Zatoichi's Pilgrimage
Movie Plot: Zatoichi's trek through 88 temples to atone for his violent past is interrupted as he stumbles into a village terrorized by a violent yakuza boss.

Title: Zatoichi and the One-Armed Swordsman
Movie Plot: Two of Japan and China's greatest heroic swordsman find themselves caught in a plot to protect a young child. But will national distrust and simple misunderstanding keep the two kindred spirits apart?

Title: Zatoichi's Cane Sword
Movie Plot: Zatoichi, while fighting off the usual group of gangsters, meets the apprentice of the swordsman who created his blade, who relays bad news about the sword.

Title: Black River
Movie Plot: A love triangle develops between a benevolent student, his innocent girlfriend, and a cruel petty criminal, all as a point of diagnosis of a social disease that had Japan slowly succumbing to lawlessness during the post-War era.

Title: Swing Girls
Movie Plot: A tale of delinquent and lazy school girls. In their efforts to cut remedial summer math class, they end up vitiating and replacing the schools brass band.

Title: Zatoichi at Large
Movie Plot: On the road, Zatoichi meets a dying pregnant woman and delivers the child moments before she passes. Honor bound, he sets out to find the next-of-kin who he discovers have their own problems.

Title: Empire of Passion
Movie Plot: A married woman and her lover murder her husband and dump his body into a well. After a while, his ghost comes to haunt them while the local gossip grows stronger.

Title: Throw Away Your Books, Rally in the Streets
Movie Plot: An angst-ridden teen dealing with his dysfunctional family hits the streets. The story is inter-cut with various psychedelic, energetic vignettes.

Title: Tsuma futari
Movie Plot: After a random encounter at a bar, two couples collide. Two men, two women, embroiled in a love-and-hate drama that threatens to engulf them. The sexual anxiety between the interwoven couples tautens right up to the nearly unbearable tension of the climax.—patriot

Title: Kurenai no nagareboshi
Movie Plot: A young yakuza hitman named Goro does a job and needs to hideout away from Tokyo for a while. He hangs out with loose women and hard men and always manages to stay one step ahead of the law. In his exile, he comes under suspicion for a murder and meets the girlfriend of the murdered man. They develop a strange bond while unbeknown to Goro, another hitman is after him for the job he did in Tokyo.—Fred Cabral <ftcabral@hotmail.com>

Title: Double Suicide: Japanese Summer
Movie Plot: Over the course of a night, a sex-obsessed young woman, a suicidal man, and a gun-crazy wannabe gangster are taken prisoner of a gang awaiting a shootout between a rival gang at dawn.

Title: The Tattooed Hitman
Movie Plot: One of the only pre-1980s yakuza films to be dubbed-into-English.

Title: Ballad of Orin
Movie Plot: A blind traveling musician is abused and oppressed while she tours the country, even though the modern world imposes changes on people's behavior.

Title: The Shape of Night
Movie Plot: A woman is pushed into prostitution by her violent yakuza boyfriend.

Title: Alone on the Pacific
Movie Plot: Kenichi Horie is determined to challenge his family, the law and the nature crossing the Pacific to America in a small sailboat. Despite his careful planning many unforeseen events will test his determination.

Title: Tonight or Never
Movie Plot: A young opera singer finds her career stalled because of her cold and passionless performances, until she finds romance with a handsome admirer.

Title: The Burmese Harp
Movie Plot: A conscience-driven Japanese soldier traumatized by the events of WWII adopts the lifestyle of a Buddhist monk.

Title: Floating Clouds
Movie Plot: A tragic social drama set in post war Japan and concerns a lonely woman trying to find purpose and stability in a devastated Tokyo.

Title: Yearning
Movie Plot: After a bombing raid destroys the family store and her husband, Reiko rebuilds and runs the shop out of love stopped short by destruction.

Title: She Was Like a Wild Chrysanthemum
Movie Plot: An old man, being rowed along a river, sees a field of daisies and thinks back to when he was fifteen. He recalls his time with, and away from, the girl cousin he grew up with and would have married, except the family and other pressures got in the way.—sharptongue

Title: A Japanese Tragedy
Movie Plot: Alternating in time, between the end of World War II and 1953, Haruko, a widow, does what she can to keep her daughter Utako and son Seiichi safe, fed, and sheltered. By 1953, it's clear that the children, as they enter adulthood, want little to do with their mother. They have a different view of their childhood and her sacrifices: in their eyes, she abandoned them to live a life of pleasure. The self-pitying Haruko is sure her life was one of pain and humiliation, for her children. As Seiichi, now a medical student, announces his plans to let a wealthy man adopt him, and as Utako considers the offer to go away with a married man who is her English teacher, what is left for Haruko?—<jhailey@hotmail.com>

Title: Sound of the Mountain
Movie Plot: An ingratiating bride develops warm ties to her father-in-law while her cold husband blithely slights her for another woman.

Title: Onna goroshi abura no jigoku
Movie Plot: A young man's frequent patronage of a prostitute leads to debt.

Title: Sazen Tange and the Pot Worth a Million Ryo
Movie Plot: A man gets rid of a cheap pot without knowing it contains a map to a treasure. As word spreads, many join in hunting it.

Title: Tadare
Movie Plot: Based on the original novel by Tokuda Shusei, adaptation by Kaneto Shindo, Masumura Yasuzo directs. A battle of woman competing for the same man. Masuko (Ayako Wakao) is the number one hostess at a cabaret, living with her lover, but finds out that he has a wife.—patriot

Title: Double Suicide of Sonezaki
Movie Plot: A poor merchant and a prostitute plan to commit suicide together after being pressured and betrayed by their surroundings.

Title: Portrait of Chieko
Movie Plot: Takamura, poet and sculptor, is married to Chieko, who also has artistic desires. However, she is becoming increasingly aware that she can not match her husband's work.

Title: A Woman's Testament
Movie Plot: Three stories about modern women. The first works in a nightclub and plans to marry the boss. The second is used by a real estate agent as a lure for customers. The third is a retired geisha who waits to be reunited with her jailed lover.

Title: Mr. Thank You
Movie Plot: A friendly bus driver and his passengers over the duration of one journey through the mountains to the nearest train station.

Title: The Hot Little Girl
Movie Plot: More of a sex melodrama than an actual yakuza film, but it has yakuza elements.

Title: Vixen
Movie Plot: Although not a pure yakuza film, it does have quite a few of the genre's elements and, more importantly, it truly gets inside the sociopathic soul that serves as fertile ground for the ever-burgeoning yakuza ranks.

Title: Ken ki
Movie Plot: A man of questionable birth peacefully raises flowers, but after he masters a special sword-fighting technique, his life takes a dark turn.

Title: Conflagration
Movie Plot: Goichi Mizoguchi, an aspiring Buddhist monk who became involved in the temple that was owned by his father, through a series of flashbacks, framed as a police interrogation, Mizoguchi unravels the story of his obsession with the temple beginning with his childhood.

Title: A Geisha
Movie Plot: A seasoned geisha and her apprentice maiko are forced to give in to their clients' sexual advances to survive.

Title: Hoodlum Soldier
Movie Plot: A young intellectual conscientious objector is forced to serve with the Japanese army in Manchuria. He joins with a dim-witted former gangster in an effort to desert by stealing a train.

Title: The Outcast
Movie Plot: A young man struggles to come to terms with his true identity in a remote caste-based village in early 20th century Japan.

Title: Le Jour Se Leve
Movie Plot: After committing a murder, a man locks himself in his apartment and recollects the events that led him to the killing.

Title: Seasons
Movie Plot: In the animated film with the remarkable music of Petr Tchaikovsky, there is a story about a young couple in love and their experiences at each time of the year. Blooming in spring, they are waiting for a meeting with each other, and a hot summer brings them joy at each moment being together. In autumn comes the time of separation, and in winter the long-awaited reunion. Each of these intervals shows the inner psychology of the characters, their different relationships. Simultaneously, through the actions of the heroes, the folk motives of Russian traditional seasonal entertainment and celebrations and the incomparable beauty of Russian nature are transmitted.—Peter-Patrick76 (peter-patrick@mail.com)

Title: Tsaplya i zhuravl
Movie Plot: Animated short about a love between a heron and a crane.

Title: The 25th, the First Day
Movie Plot: A short film made by Yuri Norstein for the 60th anniversary of the October Revolution, The 25th - the First Day recounts that day using art from the revolutionary period.

Title: The Sandman
Movie Plot: Upstairs, in the moonlit and empty room, a little boy scared of the dancing shadows, encounters a figment of his vivid imagination: the horrible Sandman.

Title: Moy zelenyy krokodil
Movie Plot: An ugly crocodile and a beautiful cow fall in love. Everybody else laughs at them.

Title: Steklyannaya garmonika
Movie Plot: A musician playing a glass harmonica comes to a town governed by bureaucracy and corruption. Can the melodies he plays defeat the powers governing this seemingly indifferent group of people?

Title: Shpionskie strasti
Movie Plot: The story about trying to self-treatment toothache.

Title: Martynko
Movie Plot: The story about young deserter who found a magic cards and fell in love with a horned princess .

Title: Aru tabibito no nikki
Movie Plot: Strange things happen to a traveller.

Title: Junior and Karlson
Movie Plot: A Soviet cartoon adaptation of a classic Swedish tale by Astrid Lindgren about Karlsson-on-the-Roof.

Title: How the Little Lion and the Turtle Sang a Song
Movie Plot: The story about a formation of one of the most famous singing duets of the country.

Title: A Kitten Named Woof
Movie Plot: Adventures of a cute Siamese kitten whose name happens to be Woof.

Title: Bobick Is a Guest of Barbos
Movie Plot: In the absence of the owner, the dog throws a party with a homeless friend.

Title: 38 Parrots
Movie Plot: 38 parrots - a cycle of Soviet puppet cartoons for children. The cycle consists of 10 short cartoons about the relationship of four animals - the Monkey, the Baby Elephant, the Parrot, the Boa constrictor and the grandmother of the latter.

Title: Treasure Island
Movie Plot: Cartoon adaptation of Robert Louis Stevenson's most famous adventure novel.

Title: Wow, a Talking Fish!
Movie Plot: A poor fisherman catches a talking fish, upon releasing it he summons a shape-shifting wizard by mistake.

Title: Dimensions of Dialogue
Movie Plot: Three surreal depictions of failures of communication that occur on all levels of human society.

Title: Beware of the Monkeys!
Movie Plot: Mother of many children can't cope with kids who have a pound of explosive inside.

Title: The Overcoat
Movie Plot: An animated adaptation of Nikolai Gogol's classic short story about an office worker (Cillian Murphy) who saves all his money to buy a new coat in time for Christmas, only to have fate take a ghostly hand.

Title: Varezhka
Movie Plot: The story is about the girl who dreams of having a dog, but a strict and busy mother does not allow her to do this.

Title: The Hand
Movie Plot: A delicate and secluded ceramist sees his orderly life turn upside down, when a gigantic hand in a white glove invades his space, demanding that a sculpture of itself is made. When will the hand's obstinate demands stop?

Title: The Overcoat
Movie Plot: Soviet film of Nikolay Gogol's classic tale.
Several women enter a science fiction author's life over the course of a few years, after the author has lost the woman he considers his one true love.

Title: Four Seasons
Movie Plot: The last collaboration of Artavazd Peleshian and cinematographer Mikhail Vartanov is a film-essay about Armenia's shepherds, about the contradiction and the harmony between man and nature, scored to Vivaldi's Four Seasons.

Title: Tango
Movie Plot: Subsequent characters appear in a poorly-decorated room, intertwining but never colliding, all possessed by never-ending rituals.

Title: The House Is Black
Movie Plot: Set in a leper colony in the north of Iran, The House is Black juxtaposes "ugliness", of which there is much in the world as stated in the opening scenes, with religion and gratitude.

Title: Franz Kafka's a Country Doctor
Movie Plot: Surreal events occur when a hapless country doctor visits an ill boy one cold night.

Title: Food
Movie Plot: Examines the human relationship with food by showing breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

Title: Darkness/Light/Darkness
Movie Plot: A human body gradually reconstructs itself as its various component parts crowd themselves into a small room and eventually, after much experimentation, sort out which part goes where.

Title: Wings of Honneamise
Movie Plot: In an alternative Earth, a young astronaut participates in a controversial fledgling space program.

Title: Tales of a Street Corner
Movie Plot: In a small and colourful town, a little girl, a tiny grey mouse, a plentiful sycamore tree, a troublesome moth and a vivid community of posters coexist in a forgotten street corner.

Title: Eve no jikan
Movie Plot: In the not too distant future androids have come into common usage. Taking the androids for granted, humans treat them as if they were common everyday tools, while on the other hand, some people empathize with androids due to their human-like appearance (save for a digital ring floating above their heads). This has become a social problem and these people are frowned upon as a result.
